cung da mo mot co so tai wynn vao nam 2018. nam 2021, khu nghi mat da mo them delilah, mot cau lac bo toi duoc dat theo ten mot co so da ton tai o west hollywood. delilah duoc thiet ke dua tren cac cau lac bo toi las vegas trong thap ky 1950. cac nha hang khac bao gom lakeside, mot nha hang hai san do dau bep david walzog giam sat; va tableau, mot nha hang am thuc tinh tu. nam 2023, dau bep alon shaya du kien mo mot nha hang dia trung hai tai khu nghi mat. cau lac bo dem. wynn las vegas khai truong voi mot cau lac bo dem mang ten la bete, co chu de nuoc va nghia la "quai vat" trong tieng phap. ban dau hoat dong nhu nha hang va quan bar, sau do cau lac bo chuyen thanh hoat dong sau gio. tuy nhien, cau lac bo khong dat duoc ky vong va giam doc hoat dong cau lac bo dem roi khoi vi tri sau it hon hai tuan. victor drai duoc tuyen dung vao nam do de cai thien la bete. sau mot thoi gian dong cua de doi moi trong hai thang voi kinh phi hang trieu do la, cau lac bo mo cua lai vao dem giao thua nam 2005 voi ten tryst. tryst bo sung them nhieu cho ngoi ngoai troi va duoc quan ly boi drai cung voi hai anh em cy va jesse waits. drai roi khoi wynn las vegas vao nam 2010 de theo duoi cac du an kinh doanh khac. tryst dong cua vao thang 11 nam 2015, va duoc tai thiet ke mo cua lai vao thang 4 nam 2016 duoi ten intrigue, voi dien tich 14,000 feet vuong, truoc khi dong cua vao nam 2019. mot cau lac bo dem khac la blush, duoc quan ly boi nhom las vegas nightlife cua sean christie. blush hoat dong tu nam 2007 den nam 2011. ban le. khuon vien mo cua voi khu mua sam boutique trong nha duoc goi la wynn esplanade, noi anh sang tu nhien thong qua cac mai kinh tran duoc su dung rong rai. dien tich khu mua sam la . khi mo cua, co 32 cua hang, trong do co mot so do wynn resorts so huu va quan ly. cac nha ban le noi tieng bao gom cartier, chanel, dior, louis vuitton, va graff. cac nha thiet ke thoi trang jean paul gaultier, manolo blahnik, va oscar de la renta cung mo cua hang tai khu nghi duong. ngoai ra, wynn las vegas cung mo mot cua hang tien loi danh rieng cho nhan vien. day la mot trong nam khu nghi duong tren dai lo las vegas co tinh nang nhu vay. khu nghi duong cung khai truong voi dai ly penske wynn ferrari maserati, la mot du an chung giua wynn resorts va penske automotive group. day la dai ly ferrari va maserati duy nhat o tieu bang, va bao gom mot showroom trung bay cac xe moi va da qua su dung. dai ly nay da rat pho bien trong cong dong, khien khu nghi duong bat dau thu phi $10 de vao cua. ngoai viec ban xe, dai ly cung cho thue xe cho khach san va co mot so gara bao tri cho chu so huu. nam 2015, penske va wynn resorts quyet dinh khong gia han hop dong thue cho dai ly, va cua hang da dong cua vao cuoi nam do. no da duoc thay the bang trung tam mua sam wynn plaza, duoc khai truong vao nam 2018. trung tam nay co dien tich , va da them vao danh sach 25 nha ban le cao cap, bao gom breitling sa, celine, kiton, le labo, loewe, omega sa, stella mccartney, va rimowa. no duoc quan ly boi wynn resorts va cong so huu boi crown acquisitions.
cup efl 2023-24 la mua giai thu 64 cua cup efl (duoc goi la carabao cup vi ly do tai tro). giai dau danh cho tat ca cac cau lac bot premier league va english football league. doi vo dich giai dau du dieu kien tham du vong play-off uefa europa conference league 2024-25. manchester united hien dang la duong kim vo dich cua giai dau sau khi danh bai newcastle united voi ti so 2–0 trong tran chung ket nam 2023. the thuc. tat ca 92 cau lac bo tai premier league va english football league deu tham du cup efl mua giai. suat tham du duoc phan phoi dua vao 4 giai dau hang dau cua he thong giai bong da anh. vong 1. co tong cong 72 cau lac bo thi dau o vong 1: 24 tu league two (hang 4), 24 tu league one (hang 3) va 24 tu championship (hang 2). boc tham cho vong 1 duoc chia theo vung dia ly gom "phia bac" va "phia nam". vong 2. tong cong co 48 cau lac bo thi dau o vong hai: 36 doi thang o vong dau tien, cong voi 12 cau lac bo premier league khong tham du giai dau chau au. boc tham cho vong nay duoc chia theo vung dia ly gom "phia bac" va "phia nam". vong 3. tong cong co 32 doi choi o vong thu ba. 24 doi thang o vong 2 va 8 doi premier league (tham du cup chau au) gom arsenal, aston villa, brighton &amp; hove albion, liverpool, manchester city, manchester united, newcastle united va west ham united vong 4. tong cong co 16 doi choi o vong thu ba gom 16 doi thang vong 3. vong tu ket. tong cong co tam doi choi trong vong tu ket. vong ban ket. tong cong co bon doi choi trong vong ban ket.
nhan quyen tai phan lan bao gom nhung quyen co ban ve tu do ngon luan, tu do tin nguong, tu do hoi hop va lap hoi duoc an dinh trong phap luat va thuc thi trong doi song xa hoi. quyen co ban cua moi ca nhan duoc dam bao boi hien phap, phap luat va cac dieu uoc ve nhan quyen do chinh phu phan lan phe chuan. hien phap cong hoa phan lan quy dinh ban chat doc lap cua nganh tu phap. to chuc an xa quoc te tung bay to su quan ngai doi voi mot so van de con ton dong tai phan lan, nhu cho phep co quan tinh bao trung uong hoa ky thuc hien cac vu bat coc tren lanh tho; bat giam nhung nguoi khong dong y thuc hien nghia vu quan su; phan biet doi xu doi voi nguoi dan toc di-gan cung mot so dan toc va nhom ngon ngu thieu so khac.
georges diran garvarentz (, 1 thang 4, 1932 – 19 thang 3, 1993) la nha soan nhac nguoi phap goc armenia, noi tieng qua phan nhac sang tac cho cac xuat pham dien anh va cac bai hat cua charles aznavour. thieu thoi. ong sinh ra tai thanh pho athens, hy lap trong mot gia dinh nguoi armenia nhap cu. cha ong la kevork garvarentz, lam nghe giao su van chuong va nha tho va la tac gia cua quan ca armenia. nam 1942, ca nha doi sang song tai paris, phap; tai day garvarentz theo hoc nhac vien paris. su nghiep. nam 1956, ong quen biet charles aznavour va bat dau viet phan nhac cho cac bai hat ma aznavour bieu dien. qua hang chuc nam, hai nguoi da sang tac tren 100 ca khuc, nhu "prends garde a toi" (1956), "et pourtant" (1962), "il faut saisir sa chance" (1962), "retiens la nuit" (1962), "la plus belle pour aller danser" (1964), "hier encore" (1964), "paris au mois d'août" ("paris in august", 1966), "une vie d'amour" (1980)... giai doan nua sau thap nien 1980 cho den nam 1993 khi garvarentz qua doi la thoi ky sang tac hang say va ben bi nhat cua ong va aznavour. du cho aznavour da buoc sang do tuoi luc tuan va da xac lap duoc cho dung vung chac tren dinh cao danh vong, nhung cac tac pham cua ho van khong bo sung cho kho tang nhac duong dai va dong thoi khong he thua kem cac sang tac cu, duoc aznavour dung bieu dien khap noi. nam 1986 va 1987, lan luot cac album "aznavour 1986: je bois" va "embrasse-moi" ra doi, dua den voi thinh gia nhieu bai hat duoc aznavour dien di dien lai ve sau nhu 'je me raccroche a toi", "je bois", "les emigrants", "une idee"... nam 1991, cap doi ra album "aznavour 92" voi cac bai thanh cong nhu "vous et tu", "napoli chante" va "la marguerite". san pham cong tac cuoi cung la album "toi et moi" ra nam 1994 (phat hanh quoc te voi nhan de "you and me" vao nam 1995); trong album nay co bai hat cuoi cung garvarentz cong tac voi aznavour, do la ban "ton doux visage". ong ket hon vao nam 1965 voi em gai cua charles aznavour, la ba aida aznavourian. georges garvarentz cung soan khoan 150 nhac nen phim, nhu "taxi for tobruk" (1961), "tales of paris" (1962), "the devil and the ten commandments" (1962), "rat trap (film)" (1963), "that man in istanbul" (1965), "the sultans (film)" (1966), "the sea pirate" (1966), "triple cross (1966 film)" (1966), "the peking medallion" (1967), "darling caroline (1968 film)" (1968), "they came to rob las vegas" (1968), "the southern star (film)" (1969), "the heist (1970 film)" (1970), "love me strangely" (1971), "someone behind the door" (1971), "the pebbles of etretat" (1972), "murder in a blue world" (1973), "killer force" (1976), "teheran 43" (1981), "hambone and hillie" (1983), "triumphs of a man called horse" (1983), "too scared to scream" (1985), "yiddish connection" (1986), "a star for two" (1991), "catorce estaciones" (1991)... nam 1979, ong viet nhac nen cho phim "the golden lady". day la ca khuc hop soan giua ong va ca si chinh cua nhom the three degrees la sheila ferguson. ong cung la tac gia cua nhac kich hai "deux anges sont venus" va cua operetta "douchka".
trang trai pizza co the vua la mot co so an uong tai mot trang trai ban banh pizza hoac co the la mot trang trai trinh dien nham huan thi cho du khach ve nong nghiep bang cach trong cac nguyen lieu lam banh pizza, doi khi duoc thuc hien tren mot manh dat hinh tron, chia thanh cac o co hinh dang nhu nhung lat banh pizza. trang trai trinh dien. mot so trang trai pizza duoc dung thanh trang trai trinh dien, nham huan thi cho du khach ve nong nghiep bang cach trong nhung nguyen lieu lam banh pizza, doi khi tren mot manh dat hinh tron duoc chia thanh cac o co hinh dang giong nhu nhung lat pizza. trang trai thuong trong cac nguyen lieu co the dung lam pizza, chang han nhu lua mi de lam vo banh, ca chua, rau thom, thit lon de lam pepperoni, bo sua de lam pho mai va tham chi trong ca cay de lam cui cho lo nuong banh. mot so trang trai tham chi con co quyen su dung than hoac khi dot tu nhien, su dung lam nhien lieu bo sung cho lo nuong pizza. am thuc trang trai pizza. mot so trang trai pizza chu yeu la cac co so dich vu an uong, ban banh pizza ngay tai do. cac trang trai pizza da tro nen pho bien o minnesota, wisconsin va iowa. cac trang trai thuong trong hoac nuoi nhieu nguon nguyen lieu cho rieng minh, tuong tu nhu cac trang trai pizza trinh dien.
vao luc 1:00 (theo gio dia phuong) ngay 31 thang 8 nam 2023, mot vu chay lon xay ra o toa nha bo hoang nam tang o goc duong delvers va albert thuoc thanh pho johannesburg, nam phi. mot nhan chung cho biet, co khoang 200 nguoi co mat trong toa nha nay. hau qua vu chay da lam 73 nguoi chet, 52 nguoi bi thuong.
dia dang sup do (tieng anh: "concrete utopia", tieng han: 콘크리트 유토피아) la mot bo phim dien anh han quoc thuoc the loai tham hoatam lychinh kich ra mat vao nam 2023 do um tae-hwa lam dao dien kiem viet kich ban, voi su tham gia dien xuat cua cac dien vien chinh gom lee byung-hun, park seo-joon, park bo-young, park ji-hu, kim do-yoon va kim sun-young. duoc dua tren truyen tranh "joyful outcast"phan thu hai cua loat webtoon "pleasant bullying" cua kim soong-nyung, tac pham tap trung xoay quanh vao tham kich dai dia chan san bang seoul thanh dong do nat va hanh trinh sinh ton cua nhung nguoi song sot tai chung cu imperial palace, va tu day, hang loat cuoc tranh gianh giua nhung nguoi o chung cu va nhung ke vo gia cu dien ra du doi. bo phim duoc cong chieu tai han quoc vao ngay 9 thang 8 nam 2023 va ngay 1 thang 9 nam 2023 tai viet nam. duoc gioi chuyen mon va khan gia nhiet liet khen ngoi, ngay 17 thang 8 nam 2023, tac pham duoc han quoc chon lam dai dien di tranh giai oscar cho phim quoc te hay nhat tai giai oscar lan thu 96.
"et pourtant" la mot bai hat tieng phap cua ca si kiem nha viet ca tu charles aznavour, co phan nhac do georges garvarentz sang tac con phan loi cua aznavour. dia don nay trich tu album "la mamma" nam 1963 , von la mot trong nhung album thanh cong lon cua ong , ban chay so 1 tai phap, duoc hon mot trieu ban. phien ban tieng viet duoc nhac si truong hai dat la "buon theo gio thu", con nhac si nhat ngan dat la "gia tu em yeu". lich su. sau khi buoc chan vao nghiep ca hat va sang tac vao nhung nam 1950, charles aznavour nhanh chong tro thanh ngoi sao tam co quoc te tu thap nien 1960 nho rat nhieu bai hat tieng phap, tao thanh mot chuoi vo van ban hit voi hon 2000 tua de. cac bai hat ong hat thuong lay cam hung tu chu de tinh yeu va chinh cuoc doi ong , nhu "heureux avec des riens" (1955), "je m'voyais deja" (1961), "il faut savoir" (1961), "les comediens" (1962), "la mamma" (1963), "je t'attends" (1963), "et pourtant" (1963), "for me formidable" (1963), "hier encore" (1964), "la boheme" (1965), "emmenez-moi" (1967), "desormais" (1969), "mes emmerdes" (1976)... nhung bai ong viet loi hay sang tac cung mang lai tieng tam cho nhieu ca si khac, nhu "retiens la nuit" (1961) do johnny hallyday ca, "la plus belle pour aller danser" (1963) do sylvie vartan ca hay "celui que j'aime" (1966) do mireille mathieu ca... phien ban khac. ban than charles aznavour cung tung hat "et pourtant" bang nhieu thu tieng khac nhau. ban tieng anh co tua la "yet i know" (do steve lawrence trinh bay) con ban tieng tay ban nha la "y por tanto" . phien ban tieng viet duoc nhac si truong hai dat la "buon theo gio thu" do chinh ong hat, con nhac si nhat ngan dat la "gia tu em yeu" do elvis phuong hat. ban hit nay duoc nhieu nghe si ten tuoi bieu dien lai, trong so do co rika zaraï, serge lama hay dany brillant (trong album "dany brillant chante aznavour - la boheme" vao nam 2020)... sinn sisamouth cung chuyen ngu bai nay qua tieng khmer voi tua de "tuos yang na" ("ទេាះយ៉ាងណា"). ben quebec (canada), ca si sylvain cossette cover bai nay vao nam 2005.
giai dua o to cong thuc 1 ha lan 2023 (ten chinh thuc la formula 1 heineken dutch grand prix 2023) la mot chang dua cong thuc 1 duoc to chuc vao ngay 27 thang 8 tai truong dua zandvoort o zandvoort, ha lan, va la chang dua thu 13 cua giai dua xe cong thuc 1 2023. boi canh. bang xep hang truoc cuoc dua. sau giai dua o to cong thuc 1 bi, max verstappen dan dau truoc sergio perez (189 diem) va fernando alonso (179 diem) trong bang xep hang cac tay dua voi 314 diem. trong bang xep hang cac doi dua, red bull racing tiep tuc dan dau truoc mercedes (247 diem) va aston martin (196 diem) voi 503 diem. lua chon bo lop. nha cung cap lop xe pirelli cung cap cac bo lop hang c1, c2 va c3 (duoc chi dinh lan luot la cung, trung binh va mem) de cac doi su dung tai su kien nay. thay doi tay dua. liam lawson da ra mat cong thuc 1 tai cuoc dua nay de thay the cho tay dua alphatauri daniel ricciardo sau khi xuong ban tay trai cua ricciardo bi gay trong buoi tap thu hai. tuong thuat. buoi tap. trong buoi tap dau tien, max verstappen lap thoi gian nhanh nhat la 1:11,852 phut truoc fernando alonso va lewis hamilton. ferrari la doi dau tien cua mua giai su dung tay dua tre trong buoi tap nay khi robert schwarzman tiep quan chiec xe dua cua sainz jr. cho buoi tap nay. trong buoi tap tu do thu hai, lando norris lap thoi gian nhanh nhat voi 1:11,330 phut truoc verstappen va alexander albon. trong buoi tap nay, oscar piastri va daniel ricciardo va cham o khuc cua so 3. sau vu va cham nay, piastri khong bi he han gi trong khi ricciardo duoc dua den benh vien dia phuong de kiem tra them va duoc xac dinh rang anh bi gay xuong co tay cua tay trai. liam lawson duoc de cu lam tay dua thay the va tiep quan chiec xe alphatauri cua ricciardo trong phan con lai cua su kien nay. anh chinh thuc ra mat cong thuc 1 lan dau tien trong suot su nghiep dua xe cua minh. trong buoi tap thu ba, verstappen lap lap thoi gian nhanh nhat la 1:21,631 truoc george russell va sergio perez. vong phan hang. vong phan hang bao gom ba phan voi thoi gian chay 45 phut. trong phan dau tien (q1), cac tay dua co 18 phut de tiep tuc tham gia phan thu hai vong phan hang. tat ca cac tay dua dat duoc thoi gian trong phan dau tien voi thoi gian toi da 107% thoi gian nhanh nhat duoc phep tham gia cuoc dua. 15 tay dua nhanh nhat lot vao phan tiep theo. albon la tay dua nhanh nhat phan nay. sau khi q1 ket thuc, ca hai tay dua cua alfa romeo, esteban ocon, kevin magnussen va lawson bi loai. phan thu hai (q2) keo dai 15 phut va muoi tay dua nhanh nhat cua phan nay di tiep vao phan thu ba cua vong phan hang. verstappen la tay dua nhanh nhat phan nay. sau khi q2 ket thuc, lance stroll, pierre gasly, lewis hamilton, yuki tsunoda va nico hülkenberg bi loai. phan cuoi cung (q3) keo dai muoi hai phut, trong do muoi vi tri xuat phat dau tien duoc xac dinh san. trong nhung giay phut dau tien cua q3, sargeant da va cham o khuc cua so 3 khi duong dua dang kho. anh khong he han gi nhung khong the tiep tuc tham gia q3. ve cuoi, leclerc dam vao hang rao giua khuc cua so 9 va 10 va anh cung khong he han gi. voi thoi gian la 1:10,567, verstappen gianh vi tri pole truoc norris va russell. ket qua. vong phan hang. chu thich: cuoc dua. chu thich:
  dong dat ambunti 2023 la tran dong dat xay ra vao luc 4:04 (theo gio dia phuong), ngay 3 thang 4 nam 2023. tran dong dat co cuong do 7.1 richter, tam chan do sau khoang 62,6 km. hau qua tran dong dat da lam 8 nguoi chet, 17 nguoi bi thuong.
mua bong 2023–24 la mua giai thu 25 trong lich su cua cau lac bo dong a thanh hoa va la mua thu 15 lien tiep doi bong thi dau tai v.league 1, giai bong da cap do cao nhat trong he thong giai dau cua bong da viet nam. day cung la mua giai ma dong a thanh hoa voi tu cach la duong kim vo dich cup quoc gia mua 2023 cung se thi dau tai tran dau tranh sieu cup quoc gia 2023.
 la thi tran nam o , tinh kagawa. tinh den ngay 1 thang 7 nam 2023, dan so thi tran uoc tinh la 22.114 nguoi va mat do dan so la 200 nguoi/km². tong dien tich thanh pho la 109,75 km².
"yesterday when i was young" la mot bai hat tieng anh duoc nam ca si nguoi my roy clark thu am va phat hanh nam 1969, voi phan nhac cua tac gia nguoi phap georges garvarentz va phan loi cua herbert kretzmer. bai nay von la phien ban cua bai "hier encore" (tam dich: "moi vua hom qua") ra doi nam 1964, do charles aznavour viet loi va bieu dien bang tieng phap. ca "yesterday when i was young" va "hier encore" deu tro thanh mot trong nhung hit lon nhat cua clark va aznavour vao thoi gian do. phan loi tieng anh co noi dung la loi tu su cua mot nguoi voi ham y nguoi do sap qua doi. nguoi nay hoi tuong lai ca cuoc doi da qua da lang phi nam thang tuoi tre theo duoi lac thu nhu the nao, de roi khi ve gia thi khong con co hoi thuc hien nhung gi da du dinh nua. cac ban cover. sau ban goc bang tieng phap va phien ban noi tieng bang tieng anh, bai nay con duoc chuyen ngu o nhieu quoc gia khac, gom: tieng y la "ieri si", tieng dan mach "hvor tiden går", tieng nhat 帰り来ぬ青春 ("kaeri konu seishun"), tieng tay ban nha "ayer aun", tieng phan lan "eilen kun mä tiennyt en", tieng czech "když jsem ja byl tenkrat kluk" va tieng hy lap la "μόλις χθες". nam 1970 aznavour ra dia don hat lai "hier encore" va dat nhieu thanh cong tai chau au. nam 2008, aznavour va elton john thu ban tieng anh "yesterday when i was young" vao album "duos" cua aznavour. nhieu ngoi sao ca nhac quoc te hat lai ca khuc nay, nhu bing crosby, shirley bassey, dusty springfield, mel torme, jack jones, lena horne, andy williams, bebe buell, jimmy durante, bobby bare, al martino, the peanuts, glen campbell, julio iglesias, tony kenny, eddy mitchell, dean reed, johnny mathis, marc almond, patricia kaas, matt monro, lena martell, nora aunor, willie nelson, elina duni, ... hay blossom dearie voi phien ban uptempo. theo billboard, truoc nam 1972 da co toi hon 90 phien ban cua bai nay. nam 2001, amanda lear cover lai vao album "heart." nam 2018, ghassan yammine thu video clip cho show "musical". nam 2020, willie nelson hat lai vao album "first rose of spring." nghe si rap glockboyz teejae muon y tuong mot phan cua bai hat nay vao bai "wack jumper". xep hang. "yesterday when i was young" tro thanh ban hit lon nhat cua clark vao thoi gian do, xep thu 9 "billboard" hot country songs vao thang 8 nam 1969 va xep 19 trong so 40 bai hit cua ong, dong thoi la bai pop duy nhat trong danh sach nay. clark con bieu dien bai nay tai dam tang cua mickey mantle vao nam 1995 theo di nguyen cua mantle. tai canada, bai nay xep thu 7 tren bang xep hang pop, thu 2 tren bang xep hang nhac dong que va thu 1 ac.
vu nu chan dai (ten khac la kho nhai) la mot mon an duoc che bien tu thit nhai hoac chang hiu bat nguon tu mot so huyen giap ranh campuchia cua tinh an giang va tai khu vuc dong bang song cuu long.  nguon goc. ten goi "vu nu chan dai" bat nguon tu nhai lam kho cua vung bay nui (an giang) va mot so vung lan can nhu bac lieu, dong thap. nguoi dan dia phuong tai day thuong bat nhai ke tu khi xuat hien nhung con mua trai mua truoc khi buoc sang mua mua. theo mot so bao dien tu, nguoi dan noi day cho biet kho nhai la mon an xuat phat tu campuchia nhung sang viet nam duoc nguoi dan thay doi che bien theo cach rieng nham phu hop voi khau vi. che bien. nhai dong xuat hien quanh nam o vung dong ruong nhu tinh bien, bac lieu, dong thap... khi den thoi diem hoang hon, nhai thuong phat ra nhieu tieng keu, tao dieu kien thuan loi cho nguoi dan bat voi so luong lon. ngoai ra, nhai dong thuong co so luong nguon hang khong on dinh do nguon nguyen lieu phu thuoc vao thoi tiet va tu nhien.  nguoi dan dia phuong sau khi bat ve se phoi kho de co the du tru trong nha hoac mang ban. do song trong moi truong hoang da, khong the chan nuoi cong nghiep nhu ech nen thit cua nhai duoc xem la rat dai va khong chua doc to. de lam ra kho nhai, nhai song sau khi duoc bat ve phai chat bo dau, lot da, mo bung, loi het phan ruot, rua ky luong, sau do dem uop cung muoi, hat tieu va ot de tham deu truoc khi phoi kho. sau khi trai qua phoi 2 lan nang, thanh pham la kho nhai be lai chi con bang ngon tay. kho nhai co the duoc che bien theo nhieu cach khac nhau nhu xao, nau canh chua, nhung lau hoac chien gion.  kinh doanh. theo mot bai bao nam 2014, nhai duoc dan dia phuong huyen tri ton va tinh bien cua tinh an giang lam kho ban quanh nam voi gia 300.000 den 350.000 dong tren 1kg, nhung gia thi truong nam 2016 da len toi 500.000 dong 1kg. xa vinh trung cua huyen tinh bien tung duoc xem la "lang vu nu chan dai" khi co so luong nguoi bat nhai de che bien va mang di ban nhieu. nghe san bat nhai cung nhu nghe lam kho nhai deu mang lai cho nguoi dan trong vung thu nhap on dinh, tham chi con co the khien cho nguoi san bat nhai kiem mot so tien nhieu hon binh thuong chi trong moi dem. trong dip tet nguyen dan cua mot so nam, vu nu chan dai thuong tang manh nhu cau tieu thu va cung vi the nen duoc ban voi gia tang cao dot bien. mon an nay khong chi duoc ban cho cac dau moi hang quan tai viet nam ma con duoc nguoi dan ban sang ca hai nuoc lang gieng la campuchia va lao. van de. dau thap nien 2010, dang kho nhai co chan dai dac biet tung la mat hang thinh hanh o mot so nha hang sang trong tai thanh pho ho chi minh duoc ban voi gia dat. nhung luc khan hiem hang, gia nhap vao toi 1.000.000 dong mot kg. nhung sau do vai nam, mat hang kho nhai tren cac trang mang chuyen hang dac san da bi tiep thi tran lan voi gia re, day len nghi van ve viec khong dam bao chat luong. theo bao "thanh nien", kho nhai lam tu nhai cua campuchia duoc cho la chat luong hon cua viet nam nen gia thanh dat hon, tham chi mot so noi co the da lam kho nhai tu mot loai ech tu an do de ban voi gia cao hon. don nhan. theo nhieu bao nhan dinh, nho cong doan che bien ti mi, hinh dang mon an khi che bien va huong vi khi an ma mon kho nhai da tro nen noi tieng trong khu vuc. nguoi dan khi an da tang cho loai thuc pham nay nhung cai ten nhu "vu nu chan dai", "kieu nu dai gia"... ban dau, vu nu chan dai chi la dac san cua nhung nguoi dan vung dong bang song cuu long nhung dan dan da duoc yeu thich trong cac nha hang, quan nhau. ten goi cua mon an cung duoc xem la mot yeu to khac gay to mo va kich thich thuc khach den thu. mon an da tro nen noi tieng den muc khi tra google voi cum tu "vu nu chan dai", nhieu nguoi to ra bat ngo vi ket qua cho thay lai khong thay hinh anh cua nhung nu vu cong ma thay vao do la mon an kho nhai.
4 co the de cap den: trong am nhac:
dong dat zumpango 2011 la tran dong dat xay ra vao luc 19:47 (theo gio dia phuong), ngay 10 thang 12 nam 2011. tran dong dat co cuong do 6.5 richter, tam chan do sau khoang 64,9 km. hau qua tran dong dat da lam 3 nguoi chet, 10 nguoi bi thuong.
lauren may hemp (sinh ngay 7 thang 8 nam 2000) la mot nu cau thu bong da chuyen nghiep nguoi anh hien tai dang thi dau o vi tri tien dao cho cau lac bo manchester city tai fa wsl, va doi tuyen bong da nu quoc gia anh. co gianh giai thuong england young player of the year vao thang 9 nam 2016, 2017 va cau thu tre nu xuat sac nhat mua cua pfa vao cac nam 2018, 2019, 2020 va 2022. dau doi. hemp lon len o north walsham, norfolk, noi co theo hoc tai truong tieu hoc millfield va truong trung hoc north walsham. co quan tam den bong da khi con tre va bat dau choi cho cau lac bo dia phuong north walsham youth fc. su nghiep cau thu tre cua co bat dau vao nam 2008 tai norwich city noi chi gai cua co la amy cung thi dau. co choi tran cuoi cung cho norwich vao nam 2015 nhung van tiep tuc gan bo voi cau lac bo trong mua giai 2015–16. la mot phan cua chien dich "where greatness is made", mot tam bang ton vinh hemp da duoc lap dat tai north walsham youth. su nghiep thi dau. nam 2016, sau khi roi norwich city, hemp gia nhap cau lac bo bristol city. vao ngay 10 thang 9 nam 2016, co co tran ra mat chuyen nghiep cho vixens va ghi ban thang thu ba cho doi nha trong chien thang 4–1 truoc watford. vao ngay 19 thang 3 nam 2017, co ra san lan dau tien tai fa women's cup, ghi hai ban thang trong chien thang 5–0 truoc millwall lionesses. trong spring series 2017, hemp ra san tong cong 4 lan, ghi duoc mot ban thang. vao thang 4 nam 2018, co duoc vinh danh la cau thu tre nu xuat sac nhat mua cua pfa.  co ket thuc mua giai 2017–18 voi 9 ban thang sau 24 lan ra san tren moi dau truong. vao ngay 31 thang 5 nam 2018, hemp ky hop dong voi cau lac bo manchester city. su nghiep quoc te. thang 2 nam 2015, hemp lan dau tien duoc goi len doi u-15 anh. vao thang 5 nam 2017, co la doi truong doi tuyen anh tai giai vo dich bong da nu u-17 chau au, ghi mot ban thang trong chien thang 5–0 truoc cong hoa ireland. vao thang 9 nam 2017, co duoc vinh danh giai thuong vauxhall england young player of the year. vao thang 8 nam 2018, co giup doi u-20 anh gianh hang 3 tai giai vo dich bong da nu u-20 the gioi 2018. hemp co tran ra mat quoc te cho doi tuyen quoc gia anh vao ngay 8 thang 10 nam 2019, khi vao san thay nguoi o phut thu 86 cho beth mead trong tran giao huu thang 1–0 truoc bo dao nha. vao ngay 27 thang 5 nam 2021, co thong bao rang co da duoc chon vao doi hinh cua doi tuyen bong da nu olympic vuong quoc lien hiep anh va bac ireland tham du the van hoi mua he 2020. vao thang 1 nam 2020, hemp duoc uefa vinh danh la mot trong 10 cau thu tre trien vong nhat o chau au.  vao ngay 30 thang 11 nam 2021, co ghi bon ban thang dau tien cho doi tuyen anh, trong tran thang ky luc 20–0 truoc latvia. vao thang 6 nam 2022, hemp duoc co ten trong doi hinh doi tuyen anh da gianh chuc vo dich giai vo dich bong da nu chau au 2022. trong tran chung ket, tu pha treo bong cua qua phat goc do hemp thuc hien, dong doi chloe kelly dem bong vao luoi de tao nen ban thang thu 2 truoc su chung kien cua 87.000 khan gia co mat tren san. mac du la mot tien dao chay canh, hemp duoc choi o vi tri so 9 (tien dao) khi anh doi dau voi hoa ky trong mot tran giao huu tren san van dong wembley vao ngay 7 thang 10 nam 2022. su thu nghiem nay da mang lai hieu qua cho huan luyen vien sarina wiegman, khi hemp ghi ban trong vong 10 phut dau tien trong chien thang 2-1 cua doi tuyen anh. ngay 31 thang 5 nam 2023, hemp co ten trong danh sach cac cau thu tham du giai vo dich bong da nu the gioi 2023 vao thang 7 nam 2023. hemp da ghi mot ban thang trong tran thang 6–1 cua anh truoc trung quoc. o tran tu ket gap colombia, hemp ghi ban go hoa cho doi tuyen anh trong thoi gian bu gio cua hiep mot khi doi tuyen anh gianh chien thang 2-1. toi vong ban ket, hemp ghi ban thu hai va kien ​​tao cho ban thang thu ba, giup anh danh bai uc 3–1 de lot vao tran chung ket world cup bong da nu dau tien trong lich su. doi tu. tinh den nam 2022, hemp co moi quan he voi cau thu bong da ellie butler, nguoi hien dang choi cho rugby borough. danh hieu. manchester city u-20 anh anh ca nhan
otto iv (1175 – 19 thang 5 nam 1218) la hoang de la ma than thanh tu nam 1209 cho den khi ong qua doi vao nam 1218. otto danh phan lon thoi gian dau doi o anh va phap. ong da di theo chu minh richard tim su tu, nguoi da phong ong lam ba tuoc xu poitiers vao nam 1196. voi su ung ho cua richard, ong duoc bau lam vua duc trong mot cuoc bau cu gay tranh cai vao nam 1198, gay ra cuoc noi chien keo dai 10 nam. cai chet cua doi thu ong, philipp xu schwaben, vao nam 1208 da khien ong tro thanh vi vua duy nhat cua duc. nam 1209, otto hanh quan toi ban dao y de duoc giao hoang innocent iii phong ong len ngoi hoang de. nam 1210, ong tim cach hop nhat vuong quoc sicilia voi de quoc, doan tuyet voi giao hoang innocent, nguoi da rut phep thong cong ong. ong lien minh voi vuong quoc anh de chong lai vuong quoc phap va tham gia vao that bai cua lien minh tai tran bouvines vao nam 1214. ong bi hau het nhung nguoi ung ho bo roi vao nam 1215 va song phan doi con lai khi nghi huu tai khu dat cua minh gan brunswick. ong la vi vua duc duy nhat den tu vuong toc welf.
tran nam dong dien ra tu ngay 5 den ngay 6 thang 7 nam 1964 trong thoi ky chien tranh viet nam, khi mat tran dan toc giai phong mien nam viet nam (qgp) va quan doi nhan dan viet nam (qdndvn) tan cong va co gang danh chiem trai cidg nam dong. trong tran danh, 57 linh viet nam cong hoa, hai nguoi my, mot co van quan su uc va it nhat 62 linh cong san da thiet mang. dien bien. nam dong nam cach da nang ve phia tay, trong mot thung lung gan bien gioi voi lao. cu diem nay do quan mien nam viet nam cung voi cac co van my va uc kiem soat, va la "cai gai" lon doi voi luc luong qgp dia phuong. qdndvn/qgp tan cong vao trai luc 02:30 ngay 5 thang 7 de gay bat ngo, va tien den vanh dai ben ngoai noi luc luong cidg dang co thu. luc 04:00, si quan cap cao, dai uy roger donlon goi dien xin chi vien. hai gio sau, sau truc thang hmm-162 cho quan tiep vien cung hai truc thang vu trang ho tong uh-1b cua quan doi hoa ky roi can cu khong quan da nang den nam dong, nhung khi den noi, quan chi vien khong the do bo do hoa luc du doi va phai quay tro lai da nang. mot chiec cv-2 caribou cua quan doi hoa ky da ban dan vao trai va nhung chieca-1 skyraiders cua khong luc viet nam cong hoa (rvnaf) da thuc hien cac cuoc khong kich vao quan qdndvn/qgp xung quanh trai. luc 09:45, 18 chiec hmm-162 uh-34d duoc ho tong boi 4 chiec uh-1b va 2 chiec a-1 cua rvnaf bat dau tha mot luc luong cuu tro gom 93 nguoi va dua nhung nguoi bi thuong ra ngoai. luc 15:45, mot chuyen bay tiep theo gom 10 chiec uh-34 chuyen dan duoc va thiet bi den trai, nhung luc nay tran chien da ket thuc lien minh mien nam co hai nguoi my, mot nguoi uc va 50 linh vnch chet, trong khi qdndvn/qgp co 62 nguoi chet xung quanh trai. sau tran danh. dai uy donlon tro thanh nguoi my dau tien duoc trao huan chuong danh du tai viet nam vi da tieu diet hai dac cong qgp va ngan chan ho dot nhap can cu nam dong, dong thoi ong cung bi thuong do manh dan bay trong tran danh nay. chuan uy kevin conway cua doi huan luyen quan doi uc tai viet nam (aattv) da thiet mang trong vu tan cong. ong la nguoi uc dau tien thiet mang trong chien tranh viet nam. thuong si gabriel alamo va trung si john l. houston cung thiet mang trong tran chien vao ngay 6 thang 7 nam 1964. alamo va houston duoc truy tang huan chuong chu thap phuc vu xuat sac. trung si d. terrin, bac si mu noi xanh cua quan doi hoa ky, duoc trao tang huan chuong sao bac vi long dung cam trong tran chien. "the green berets". mot canh chien dau trong bo phim "the green berets" nam 1968 duoc lay cam hung tu tran nam dong.
anatoly anatolyevich zubkov (; 1900–1967) la mot nha sinh ly hoc nguoi lien xo, va la mot tien si khoa hoc. giao su anatoly zubkov da xuat ban hon 60 cong trinh ve cac van de khac nhau trong linh vuc sinh ly va benh ly cua tim cung nhu viec kiem soat cac chuc nang than kinh va noi tiet. ong la nguoi dau tien dich tac pham kinh dien cua ivan mikhaylovich sechenov sang tieng anh. thu muc.  
ihor zubko (; sinh ngay 30 thang 9 nam 1991) la mot tien dao bong da nguoi ukraina. nam 2014, anh co duoc quoc tich nga voi ten la igor albertovich zubko (). quoc te. vao thang 3 nam 2010, zubko duoc goi vao doi tuyen bong da u-19 quoc gia ukraina cho mot loat cac tran giao huu voi phap de chuan bi cho giai vo dich bong da u-19 chau au 2010.
denis ivanovich zubko (; sinh ngay 7 thang 11 nam 1974) la mot huan luyen vien bong da va cuu tien dao. su nghiep quoc te. zubko choi tran dau tien cho nga vao ngay 30 thang 4 nam 1997 trong vong loai giai vo dich bong da the gioi 1998 truoc luxembourg. ong choi them 3 tran nua trong mau ao doi tuyen quoc gia.
vao ngay 30 thang 8 nam 2023, mot cuoc dao chinh xay ra tai gabon nham lat do tong thong ali bongo ondimba. sau dao chinh, luc luong phong ve da tuyen bo lenh gioi nghiem va dong cua bien gioi. gabon la quoc gia thu 8 o chau phi xay ra dao chinh ke tu nam 2020.
mot so gia treo hoac hop dung giay ve sinh cho phep treo giay ve sinh o phia truoc (tren) hoac phia sau (duoi) cuon giay khi no duoc dat song song voi tuong. dieu nay gay chia re y kien tranh cai rang, huong treo nhu the nao la tot hon. cac lap luan bao gom tu tinh tham my, su hieu khach, kha nang de tiep can va sach se, cho den viec bao quan giay, viec de dang tach cac to giay ra va kha nang tuong thich voi vat nuoi. chuyen muc tu van cua hoa ky "ask ann landers" bao cao rang chu de nay la van de gay tranh cai nhieu nhat trong lich su cua chuyen muc cung voi 15.000 la thu vao nam 1986, lam day len luong phan hoi cao nhat cho chuong trinh. nghien cuu ve “dinh huong giay ve sinh” da duoc su dung nhu la mot cong cu giang day trong viec huong dan sinh vien nganh xa hoi hoc thuc hanh chu nghia kien tao xa hoi. cac lap luan. nhung ly do chinh duoc moi nguoi dua ra de giai thich tai sao ho treo giay ve sinh theo mot cach nhat dinh la de cam nam va theo thoi quen.  vi tri huong len giup lam giam nguy co vo tinh dung ngon tay cham vao tuong hoac tu chan, co kha nang truyen bui ban va vi trung; khien cho viec xac dinh vi tri va cam nam giay duoc de dang hon; cung cap tuy chon gap dau mieng giay lai vao cuon giay de chung to rang can phong da duoc don sach; noi chung day la quan diem co chu dich cho viec xay dung thuong hieu cua nha san xuat, cho nen giay ve sinh co hoa van trong dep de hon voi cach treo nay. vi tri huong xuong giup cho tong the cuon giay trong ngan nap hon, theo do dau mieng giay co the duoc an ra khoi tam nhin nhieu hon; lam giam nguy co tre nho hoac thu nuoi nhu meo go cuon giay khi nghich gia treo; va trong nhung chiec xe tu che, chung co the giam thieu kha nang bi tuot giay khi lai xe. nhung nguoi ung ho da tuyen bo rang, moi phuong phap giup cho viec xe giay ve sinh tren le cua mieng giay duc duong ke tro nen de dang hon.vi tri huong len nhu hinh minh hoa voi cac bang sang che dau tien cho gia treo giay ve sinh tu do, duoc cap nam 1891. co san nhieu loai hop dung giay ve sinh khac nhau de tranh van de ve dinh huong qua muc hoac duoi muc; vi du: bo phan phoi giay don, bo phan phoi giay cuon lon, trong do cuon giay ve sinh duoc dat vuong goc voi tuong va bo phan phoi giay cuon doi. may phan phoi giay ve sinh xoay cung duoc phat trien, cho phep cuon lai giay theo mot trong hai huong. y kien cong dong. trong cac cuoc khao sat khac nhau, co khoang 70% moi nguoi thich vi tri huong len. trong mot cuoc khao sat voi 1.000 nguoi my, cottonelle nhan thay rang nguoi ta se de y den vi tri "huong len" hon la "huong xuong" (74%), so nguoi cam thay kho chiu khi huong "khong chinh xac" (24%), va tung doi lai huong o nha mot nguoi ban (27%). theo nhu "w. c. privy's original bathroom companion, number 2", "ty le lon hon 4 choi 1 doi voi nhung nguoi lon tuoi thich rut giay ve sinh tu phia truoc hon.". tuyen bo tuong tu cung duoc dua ra trong "the bathroom companion" cua james buckley danh cho nhung nguoi tren 50 tuoi. viec dinh huong giay ve sinh doi khi duoc coi la tro ngai doi voi cac cap vo chong. van de cung co the phat sinh tai cac doanh nghiep va noi cong cong. tai tram nghien cuu amundsen–scott o nam cuc, nguoi ta da dua ra nhung loi phan nan ve cach lap dat giay ve sinh. ho khong ro la lieu huong nay co tiet kiem hon huong kia hay khong. "co quan dang ky quan cam" quy trach mot tuyen bo cho planet green ve viec tiet kiem "qua" muc viec su dung giay. ung dung trong cac nghien cuu xa hoi. nghien cuu ve “dinh huong giay ve sinh” la mot cong cu giang day quan trong trong viec huong dan cac sinh vien nganh xa hoi hoc thuc hanh chu nghia kien tao xa hoi. trong bai viet “chinh tri phong tam: gioi thieu cho sinh vien ve tu duy xa hoi hoc tu duoi len”, giao su xa hoi hoc edgar alan burns cua vien eastern institute of technology mo ta mot so ly do khien cho nhung quan tam ve giay ve sinh dang duoc xem xet. vao ngay dau tien cua khoa hoc nhap mon xa hoi hoc cua burns, ong hoi cac sinh vien cua minh: "cac em nghi cuon giay ve sinh nen treo huong nao?". trong 50 phut tiep theo, hoc sinh se xem xet ly do tai sao ho lai chon cau tra loi, kham pha cau truc xa hoi cua "cac quy tac va thong le ma truoc day ho chua bao gio nghi den mot cach co y thuc". hoat dong cua burns da duoc ap dung trong mot khoa hoc tam ly xa hoi tai dai hoc notre dame, noi no duoc su dung de minh hoa cac nguyen tac trong tac pham kinh dien nam 1966 cua berger va luckmann "xay dung xa hoi cua hien thuc". christopher peterson, giao su tam ly hoc tai dai hoc michigan, da phan loai viec lua chon huong giay ve sinh theo "thi hieu, so thich va su ua chuong", trai nguoc voi cac gia tri hoac "thai do, dac diem, chuan muc va nhu cau". cac so thich ca nhan khac bao gom do uong cola yeu thich hoac doi bong yeu thich cua mot ca nhan. so thich la mot phan quan trong cua ban sac; nguoi ta mong doi va ua thich rang nhung nguoi khac nhau co nhung so thich khac nhau, dieu nay nham thoa man "cam giac ve su doc dao" cua mot nguoi. su khac biet ve so thich thuong dan den hanh vi treu choc va khien trach nhe nhang. doi voi hau het moi nguoi, so thich khong gay ra su chia re nghiem trong do xung dot ve gia tri gay ra; mot ngoai le co kha nang xay ra la dieu ma peterson goi la "nhung ke 'cau co' trong so chung ta", nhung nguoi nang cao so thich thanh cac van de dao duc. morton ann gernsbacher, giao su tam ly hoc tai dai hoc wisconsin–madison, so sanh cach treo cuon giay ve sinh voi huong cua dao keo trong may rua chen, viec lua chon ngan keo nao trong tu ngan keo de dat tat va thu tu dat tat cua mot nguoi. thu tu goi dau va thoa bot len co the khi tam. trong moi su lua chon, co mot giai phap nguyen mau duoc da so lua chon va that hung thu khi co the dua ra nhung loi giai thich don gian ve viec thieu so phai khac biet nhu the nao. ba cung canh bao rang, cac thi nghiem hinh anh than kinh (neuroimaging) - ma tinh den nam 2007 da bat dau tham do cac hanh vi tu xoay chuyen tinh than va bieu hien net mat cho den viec mua ban hang tap hoa va cu let - phai co gang tranh nhung thanh kien va khuon mau van hoa nhu vay. trong cuon sach "conversational capital" "(von dam thoai)" cua minh, bertrand cesvet lay vi tri dat cuon giay ve sinh lam mot vi du ve hanh vi duoc nghi thuc hoa—mot trong nhung cach ma cac nha thiet ke va nha tiep thi co the tao ra trai nghiem dang nho xung quanh mot san pham dan den dong luc truyen mieng (word-of-mouth momentum). cac vi du khac cua cesvet bao gom lac mot chiec hop keo tic tac va cach tach go banh quy oreo.
ban dao cap vert (chu phap: "presqu'île du cap-vert", chu anh: "cape verde peninsula", chu wolof: "kap weert", "bopp bu nëtëx"), la ban dao cua senegal, cung la ban dao lon nhat tay phi, nam o diem cuc tay cua chau phi, cach dao quoc cape verde 570 kilomet (350 dam anh) ve phia tay. cu dan chu yeu la nong dan va ngu dan, bat dau tu nam 1444 noi day la cang chuyen khau cho mau dich giua chau phi voi chau au, nam 1857 phap thiet lap dakar, hien nay la thu do cua senegal tren ban dao.  tom tat. ban dao cap vert nam o cuc tay cua senegal, phia tay giap dai tay duong. cau luc dia do cac dao nui lua gan bien va dong nuoc bo bien tao thanh noi lien voi dat lien. chieu theo pham vi dai khu hanh chinh dakar, dien tich 570 kilomet vuong; chieu theo pham vi vung tu nhien, chan ban dao lay popenguine o phia nam va kayar o phia bac lam moc gioi, dien tich rat lon. cay coi tren ban dao xanh tuoi, hinh thanh su khac biet ro ret voi doi cat vang va ban sa mac o phia bac nhap nho lien tuc khong ngung. vinh dakar nam o dau ban dao la ben cang tu nhien. nguoi lebou - nguoi ban dia cua ban dao, song bang nghe danh ca va lam nong. ke tu khi bi nguoi bo dao nha phat hien vao nam 1444 den nay, ban dao cap vert da bien thanh cho trung chuyen cho mau dich giua hai chau luc phi - au. sau nam 1857, bi nguoi phap chiem dong. hien la khu vuc co mat do dan so lon nhat ca nuoc senegal, moi kilomet vuong dat hon 1.100 nguoi; cung la khu vuc co phat trien kinh te va muc do thanh thi hoa cao nhat ca nuoc. thu do dakar toa lac o dau ban dao. tru dakar ra, con co thanh pho rufisque va cac thi tran nhu yoff, malika, pikine, mbao... dan so thanh thi chiem tren 60% tong dan so thanh thi ca nuoc. co 70% cong nghiep toan quoc tap trung o ban dao. 
duong len dinh olympia nam thu 24, thuong duoc goi la olympia 24 hay o24 la nam thu 24 cua chuong trinh duong len dinh olympia do dai truyen hinh viet nam va cong ty truyen thong ncc thuc hien, phat song so dau tien vao ngay 15 thang 10 nam 2023. tran chung ket nam cua chuong trinh du kien duoc truyen hinh truc tiep vao ngay 13 thang 10 nam 2024. day cung la nam thu 8 lien tiep (ke tu nua sau nam thu 17) cong ty co phan tap doan truong hai la nha tai tro cua chuong trinh.
 la mon an nhe cua nhat ban. day la mot loai "senbei" (banh gao) mong hinh qua chuoi duoc them vao nhieu huong vi khac nhau. mon nay do kuriyama beika (栗山米菓) tinh niigata che bien. tu "bakauke" trong phuong ngu niigata cua tieng nhat thong tuc co nghia la "duoc don nhan cuc ky nong nhiet". nhan vat xuat hien tren goi san pham ten la borin va barin nghia la ban trai va ban gai.
arega kebede () la chinh khach nguoi ethiopia. hien tai, ong dang giu chuc vu lam thong doc vung amhara ke tu ngay 25 thang 8 nam 2023.
buu nygren (sinh ngay 25 thang 12 nam 1986) la vi tong thong thu 10 cua xu navajo. nygren-montoya nhan duoc 34.890 phieu bau, danh bai cuoc van dong cua nez-abeyta nhan duoc 31.339 phieu bau trong cuoc bau cu nam 2022. ong tuyen the nham chuc vao ngay 10 thang 1 nam 2023, chuc vu chinh tri dau tien cua doi ong. nygren chao doi ngay 25 thang 12 nam 1986 tai blanding, utah. me la nguoi navajo va cha la nguoi goc mien nam viet nam. nygren thuoc dong toc tachiiʼnii. ong von khong co ho noi vi cha minh khong phai la nguoi navajo. do do, ong duoc cho la "sinh ra la nguoi viet" khi dat ten cho dong ho cua minh. ong tung theo hoc truong trung hoc red mesa. nygren la ban dong hanh cua joe shirley jr. trong cuoc bau cu tong thong xu navajo nam 2018. o do tuoi 35, nygren la nguoi tre nhat tung duoc bau lam tong thong xu navajo. nygren tung lam viec trong linh vuc quan ly xay dung. ong ket hon voi cuu dan bieu bang arizona jasmine blackwater-nygren.
raymond john muro con goi la bobby trendy, la nha trang tri noi that, nha thiet ke, nhan vat truyen hinh nguoi my goc viet noi tieng voi su xuat hien tren chuong trinh "the anna nicole show". muro lon len o bac california. nam 17 tuoi, anh chuyen den beverly hills, california bang tien tiet kiem cua minh. anna nicole smith da thue trendy trang tri ngoi nha moi cua co trong chuong trinh truyen hinh "the anna nicole show". ve cach ma minh tham gia chuong trinh nay, trendy cho biet nhu sau "hay lang nghe cho that tot. ho da nhin thay toi tren chuong trinh ngoi nha noi tieng cua e!, va ho biet rang toi rat kho hieu".
loan chabanol (sinh ngay 30 thang 12 nam 1982) la nu dien vien, nghe si va nguoi mau nguoi my goc phap. co duoc biet den nhieu nhat voi vai dien trong bo phim hai "fading gigolo" cua john turturro, phim tinh cam lang man "third person", phim hanh dong giat gan "the transporter refueled" va phim truyen hinh dai tap kinh di "tales of the walking dead". than the va su nghiep. loan chabanol chao doi o thu do paris, phap vao ngay 30 thang 12 nam 1982. co mang trong minh dong mau goc viet, duc va y. co tung tham gia cac lop hoc nghe thuat voi nghe si bernard bistes vao nhung nam dau doi. tinh co duoc hang elite model management phat hien hoi 16 tuoi, co lan luot xuat hien tren trang bia cac tap chi nhu "elle" va "marie claire". nam 2010, co chuyen sang new york de theo hoc dien xuat tai hoc vien san khau va dien anh lee strasberg. dien xuat. chabanol co vai dien dien anh dau tien trong bo phim hai "fading gigolo" cua john turturro. nam 2014, co duoc chon vao vai sam trong phim "third person" dong vai mot nhan vat giau long nhan ai cung voi mila kunis. nam 2015, co duoc chon vao vai "nu chinh" trong phim "the transporter refueled". nam 2022, chabanol gia nhap vu tru "the walking dead" voi vai chinh trong phan dau tien cua tuyen tap dai ky "tales of the walking dead", hien than moi nhat cua loat phim amc thanh cong. tac pham nghe thuat. nam 2015, chabanol dung ra mo trien lam nghe thuat ca nhan dau tien tai thanh pho new york, "born in blue" do monica watkins phu trach. chuong trinh di kem voi mot bo phim hoat hinh ngan mo ta su ra doi cua mot con phuong hoang song day tu day dai duong. tac pham tiep theo cua co " namsis " da duoc gioi thieu trong mot cuoc trien lam o la vao nam 2018, sau do la buoi trinh dien nhom "werise" cung voi nhieu nghe si khac. nam 2019, co phat hanh cuon sach thieu nhi dau tien cua minh mang ten "blueboo", cau chuyen ke ve mot con quai vat mau xanh lam song trong rung nau gap con sau buom cuoi cung con sot lai trong rung. doi tu. thang 2 nam 2020, chabanol duoc nhap quoc tich my.
dong dat puntarenas 2017 () la tran dong dat xay ra vao luc 20:28 (theo gio dia phuong), ngay 12 thang 11 nam 2017. tran dong dat co cuong do 6.5 richter, tam chan do sau khoang 19,8 km. hau qua tran dong dat da lam 3 nguoi thiet mang.
tan trang co the la :
tam trong co the la :
the kingfisher la mot buc tranh son dau tren vai bat cua hoa si nguoi ha lan vincent van gogh. no duoc ve tu thang 7 den thang 12 nam 1886, o paris, phap. hien tac pham dang o bao tang van gogh, amsterdam, ha lan. "the kingfisher" mo ta mot con boi ca song trong dam lay. con chim huong ve ben phai buc tranh. ten "vincent" nam o goc duoi ben trai cua buc tranh.
canh an co the la :
lisa barbier cristiani (24 thang 12 nam 1827 - 24 thang 10 nam 1853), con duoc goi la lise cristiani hoac elise cristiani, la mot nghe si cello va nghe si bieu dien chuyen nghiep nguoi phap. co duoc biet den la mot trong nhung nguoi duoc ghi nhan som nhat ve viec mot nguoi phu nu tro thanh nghe si chuyen nghiep trong thoi dai cua minh. thoi tho au. cristiani duoc sinh ra o paris, nhung nguoi ta tin rang co la nguoi goc y, mac du co rat it thong tin cho thay nhung nam dau doi cua co. sau do cristiani hoc cello chuyen nghiep duoi su dan dat cua edouard benazet va co buoi hoa nhac ra mat cong chung vao ngay 14 thang 2 nam 1845 tai salle des concerts herz.  su nghiep. cristiani la mot trong nhung nu nghe si bieu dien am nhac chuyen nghiep som nhat trong thoi dai cua co, tham chi la co da bat dau bieu dien nhieu buoi hoa nhac o sau do tuoi thieu nien. cac chuyen cong dien dau tien ma co thuc hien bao gom cac diem den tai vienna, linz, ratisbon, baden-baden va hamburg. buc tranh chan dung cuoi cung ve cristiani o hamburg da khien co duoc nhieu nguoi yeu thich den noi buc chan dung cua co ("duoc hien thi trong hop thong tin") da tro thanh mot vat trang tri duoc san lung nhieu dang ke. trinh do bieu dien cello cua cristiani cung da thu hut duoc su chu y va ung ho cua nha soan nhac felix mendelssohn vao nam 1845 trong mot buoi hoa nhac o leipzig. mot bai nhac danh cho dan cello trong loat tac pham "nhung bai ca khong loi" cua mendelssohn duoc danh tang cho cristiani vao cung nam do, mac du dieu nay da khong duoc tiet lo cong khai cho den khi chung duoc xuat ban sau khi mendelssohn qua doi.  sau khoang thoi gian nay, cristiani bat dau chuyen luu dien am nhac vong quanh chau au, giup co co them nhieu danh tieng hon nua va cuoi cung co den nga, noi co bieu dien trong mot so buoi hoa nhac. trong khoang thoi gian nay, vua dan mach frederick vii da phong tang co danh hieu chamber virtuosa. (tam dich la "bac thay thinh phong").  vao nam 1852, khi den tham nha cua nha su hoc nikolai markevitch o kiev, co da gap go nghe si cello adrien-françois servais. ba nguoi ho da danh mot thoi gian trong thanh pho de cung nhau trau doi am nhac. su ket hop cua cristiani voi servais chi nham nang cao danh tieng cua co trong khu vuc.  qua doi. khong lau sau, vao mua thu nam 1853, co bat dau chuyen di moi xuyen qua vung dat hoang da siberia den ban dao kamchatka de thuc hien mot chuyen luu dien khac trong khu vuc, la nguoi chau au dau tien to chuc cac buoi hoa nhac cong cong tai cac thanh pho xa xoi cua khu vuc bac a. ke hoach ban dau cua co la ket thuc o kamchatka va sau do den caucasus de thuc hien mot chuyen luu dien hoa nhac khac. truoc do, cristiani bieu dien o thi tran nho tobolsk, nhung ngay sau do co mac benh ta va phai o lai ngoi lang nay. cristiani qua doi vao ngay 24 thang 10 nam 1853.  anh huong den thiet ke va su dung cello. do cach choi dan cello, voi mot tam go lon kep giua hai chan, thoi trang vay cua phu nu trong thoi dai nay khien viec choi cello tro nen bat kha thi. da tung co mot giai phap thay the khac la dat tam go dan o vi tri hong ben canh, nhung viec choi dan van tro nen kho khan. vi vay, phai den khi phat trien thanh ghim cuoi de nang han tam go dan len khoi san, viec choi cua phu nu moi tro nen pho bien hon. trong nhieu an pham khac nhau, nguoi ta da khang dinh rang cristiani co the la nguoi dau tien pho bien loai thanh ghim cuoi nay va dan den viec no duoc su dung ngay cang nhieu o chau au cung nhu su noi len cua mot lan song nu nghe si cello moi trong nhung thap ky sau khi co qua doi.  cristiani con noi tieng voi su doc dao cua chiec dan cello ma ban than su dung, chiec dan do stradivarius che tac nam 1700 voi ten co duoc khac o ben hong dan. do hinh khac nay, cay dan cuoi cung duoc biet den voi cai ten cu the la "cristiani", tao tien de cho phong cach ma dan cello stradivari thuong khac ten. sau khi co qua doi, chiec dan cello stradivarius 1700 ma co bieu dien sau do da duoc hugo becker gianh duoc. sau do, no duoc mua vao nam 2005 de tro ve dia diem ban dau cua buoi hoa nhac ra mat o cremona va duoc trung bay tai to chuc am nhac walter stauffer cua cremona, truoc khi duoc chuyen den museo del violino cua cremona. 
thymidine diphosphate glucose (thuong viet tat la dtdp-glucose hoac tdp-glucose) la mot phan tu lien ket nucleotide-duong giua deoxythymidine diphosphate va glucose. no la hop chat khoi nguon cho cac qua trinh tong hop nhieu loai duong deoxy. sinh tong hop. dtdp-glucose duoc tao ra boi enzym glucose-1-phosphate thymidylyltransferase va duoc tong hop tu dttp va glucose-1-phosphate. pyrophosphate la mot san pham phu cua phan ung. nhiem vu ben trong te bao. dtdp-glucose ho tro tao thanh nhieu loai hop chat da dang khac nhau trong qua trinh trao doi chat cac loai duong nucleotide. nhieu loai vi khuan toi uu hoa viec su dung dtdp-glucose de tao ra nhieu loai duong phuc tap, duoc tich hop vao cac loai duong lipopolysaccharide cua no hoac vao cac chat chuyen hoa thu cap vi du nhu la khang sinh. trong cac qua trinh tong hop nhieu loai duong phuc tap nay, dtdp-glucose trai qua mot phan ung tong hop o-xi hoa/khu thong qua enzym dtdp-glucose 4,6-dehydratase, san sinh ra dtdp-4-keto-6-deoxy-glucose.
igor zubjuk (sinh nam 1961) la mot van dong vien bong nem nguoi hungary. ong sinh ra o kyiv, ukraina. ong tung choi cho doi tuyen bong nem quoc gia hungary va tham gia the van hoi mua he 1992, noi hungary xep thu 7 sau khi danh bai doi romania trong tran cuoi cung.
trung doan bo binh so 2 sofia mang ten nga hoang alexander iii (tieng nga: 2-й пехотный софийский императора александра iii полк) la mot trung doan bo binh cua quan doi de quoc nga . den nam 1914, trung doan bo binh sofia so 2 la mot phan cua su doan bo binh so 1 va da chien dau trong the chien thu nhat truoc khi bi giai the vao nam 1918 sau cach mang nga. lich su. don vi duoc thanh lap vao ngay 17 thang 1 nam 1811 voi ten goi trung doan egersky thu 49 . vao thang 3 nam do no duoc doi ten thanh trung doan bo binh sofia. den nam 1833, trung doan hai quan so 2 duoc truc thuoc don vi nen trung doan duoc doi ten thanh trung doan hai quan sofia truoc khi doi ten tro lai vao nam 1856. vao ngay 6 thang 4 nam 1863, ba tieu doan cua trung doan duoc dua ra de thanh lap mot trung doan bo binh du bi sofia moi. nam sau, no duoc doi ten thanh trung doan bo binh sofia so 2 va vao thang 12 nam 1877, no dat danh hieu "trung doan bo binh sofia cua hoang than va nguoi thua ke cua tsarevich ". vao thang 2 nam 1881, no tro thanh "cua be ha" va vao ngay 11 thang 2 nam 1894, no tro thanh trung doan bo binh thu 2 sofia mang ten hoang de alexander iii . thanh tich chien dau. trung doan so 2 da chien dau bao ve smolensk vao nam 1812 trong cuoc xam luoc cua phap vao nga , chong lai cuoc tan cong cua phap voi tu cach la mot phan cua su doan bo binh so 7 chong lai cac quan mstislav va roslavl cua thanh pho. khoang 200 nguoi cua don vi da thiet mang hoac mat tich. trong the chien thu nhat , no la mot phan cua su doan bo binh so 1 va tham gia tran tannenberg . trung doan bo binh so 2 sofia bi giai the vao nam 1918 sau cach mang nga . tuong niem. mot dai tuong niem trung doan sofia duoc xay dung tai thanh pho smolensk , vao ngay 5 thang 8 nam 1912 tai cong vien lopatinsky. no duoc thuc hien nhan ky niem 100 nam chien thang trong chien tranh ve quoc nam 1812 chong lai phap , ky niem su tham gia cua trung doan trong cuoc xung dot.
guanosine diphosphate mannose hoac gdp-mannose la mot loai duong nucleotide duoc dung lam chat nen cho phan ung glycosyltransferase trong qua trinh trao doi chat. hop chat nay la chat nen cho cac loai enzym co ten la cac mannosyltransferase. duoc biet den nhu la nguon cung cap mannose hoat hoa trong tat ca cac phan ung glycolytic, gdp-mannose la mot hop chat vo cung thiet yeu doi voi cac loai sinh vat nhan chuan. sinh tong hop. gdp-mannose duoc san sinh tu gtp va mannose-6-phosphate boi enzym mannose-1-phosphate guanylyltransferase. mot trong cac enzym tu ho hop chat nucleootidyl-transferase, gdp-mannose pyrophosphorylase (gdp-mp) la mot enzym pho bien duoc tim thay trong vi khuan, nam, thuc vat va cac loai dong vat.
riize (thuong duoc cach dieu la riize, ) la mot nhom nhac nam thuoc sm entertainment se ra mat vao thang 9 nam 2023. cac thanh vien cua nhom bao gom shotaro, eunseok, sungchan, wonbin, seunghan, sohee va anton. ten goi. ten goi cua nhom, riize, la ket hop cua tu "rise" (vuon len) va tu "realize" (hien thuc hoa), voi y nghia "mot nhom nhac cung nhau vuon len va hien thuc hoa uoc mo". lich su. 2020–2023: truoc khi ra mat. cac thanh vien shotaro va sungchan da tung ra mat cong chung voi tu cach thanh vien mot nhom nhac nam khac cua sm entertainment, nct, vao thang 10 nam 2020. ngay 1 thang 7 nam 2022, sm gioi thieu eunseok va seunghan voi tu cach thanh vien cua sm rookies. thang 11 nam 2022, eunseok va seunghan duoc cong bo la se xuat hien trong chuong trinh thuc te "welcome to nct universe" do shotaro va sungchan dan chuong trinh. nhung thong tin dau tien ve nhom nhac nam moi cua sm xuat hien vao ngay 3 thang 2 nam 2023, khi sm cong bo ke hoach sm 3.0 cua cong ty. theo do, nhom nhac nay se ra mat vao quy 4 nam 2023 duoi su chi dao cua giam doc dieu hanh tak young-jun. ngay 24 thang 5 nam 2023, sm cong bo ke hoach hoat dong cua nhom nhac nay, theo do shotaro va sungchan se roi nct de gia nhap nhom, dong thoi eunseok va seunghan cung se ra mat cung nhom. cong ty cung xac nhan rang cac thanh vien khac "mang quoc tich han quoc va hoa ky" cung se gia nhap doi hinh cua nhom. ngay 11 thang 7, mot so nguon tin cho biet nhom nhac nam bay thanh vien nay dang ghi hinh cho video am nhac dau tay de ra mat vao thang 9. dap lai thong tin tu gioi truyen thong rang anton lee, con trai cua yoon sang, la mot thanh vien cua nhom, sm cho biet cong ty se bat dau tiet lo thong tin ve nhom vao ngay 1 thang 8. ngay 31 thang 7, sm xac nhan rang nhom co ten la "riize". ngay 1 thang 8, sm cong bo thong tin ve bay thanh vien va thanh lap tai khoan instagram cua nhom. 2023–nay: ra mat. ngay 7 thang 8 nam 2023, sm entertainment cong bo rang nhom se ra mat vao ngay 4 thang 9 voi album dia don dau tay "get a guitar". ngay 19 thang 8, riize phat hanh web novel "rise &amp; realize" duoc sm hop tac san xuat cung kakao entertainment. truoc khi album dia don duoc phat hanh, riize da bieu dien "memories" va "siren" tai kcon la vao ngay 20 thang 8 nam 2023. "memories" duoc phat hanh voi tu cach mot dia don pre-release vao ngay 21 thang 8. quang cao. ngay 16 thang 8 nam 2023, riize duoc chon lam dai su cua cua hang thoi trang truc tuyen han quoc musinsa. ngay 25 thang 8 nam 2023, nhom tro thanh nguoi mau doc quyen cua thuong hieu cham soc da han quoc uiq.
dong dat cinchona 2009 la tran dong dat xay ra vao luc 13:21 (theo gio dia phuong), ngay 8 thang 1 nam 2009.  tran dong dat co cuong do 6.1 richter, tam chan do sau khoang 12,5 km. hau qua tran dong dat lam 34 nguoi chet, 91 nguoi bi thuong.
persististrombus la mot chi oc bien thuoc ho strombidae.  ghi nhan hoa thach. hoa thach cua "persisistrombus" duoc tim thay o cac tang bien tu oligocene den de tu. cac hoa thach duoc biet den tu chau au, bac va nam my, algeria, an do, indonesia, libya, somalia, tho nhi ky va iran. 
dong dat kütahya 2011 () la tran dong dat xay ra vao luc 23:15 (theo gio dia phuong), ngay 19 thang 5 nam 2011. tran dong dat co cuong do 5.8 richter, tam chan do sau khoang 9,1 km. hau qua tran dong dat da lam 2 nguoi chet, 122 nguoi bi thuong.
dong dat dalbandin 2011 la tran dong dat xay ra vao luc 1:23 (theo gio dia phuong), ngay 18 thang 1 nam 2011.  tran dong dat co cuong do 7.2 richter, tam chan do sau khoang 90 km. hau qua tran dong dat da lam 3 nguoi thiet mang.
cytidine diphosphate glucose, thuong duoc viet tat la cdp-glucose, la mot phan tu lien ket nucleotide-duong giua cytidine diphosphate va glucose. sinh tong hop. cdp-glucose duoc tao ra tu ctp va glucose-1-phosphate boi enzym glucose-1-phosphate cytidylyltransferase.
daniel peretz (, ) la mot cau thu bong da chuyen nghiep nguoi israel thi dau o vi tri thu mon cho cau lac bo bundesliga bayern munich va doi tuyen quoc gia israel.
tinh dao nhat bao () la to bao tieng trung lau doi nhat va lon thu hai o hong kong. bao nay thuoc so huu cua tap doan tin tuc tinh dao do quach anh thanh () lam chu tich. to bao tieng anh cua no la "the standard". an ban toronto cua "tinh dao" mot phan thuoc so huu cua star media group, nha xuat ban cua "toronto star", mot cong ty thuoc tap doan torstar. lich su. "tinh dao nhat bao" la to nhat bao tieng trung lau doi nhat o hong kong, bat dau xuat ban vao ngay 1 thang 8 nam 1938. an ban nuoc ngoai dau tien cua to bao duoc ra mat vao nam 1963 tai san francisco, noi van phong nuoc ngoai dau tien cua tap doan duoc thanh lap vao thang 5 nam 1964. nam 1992, "tinh dao nhat bao", encountering gap kho khan ve tai chinh da thanh lap mot an pham chung voi tap doan xuat ban van hoa quoc te, mot to chuc binh phong cua bo an ninh quoc gia. cho den nam 2002, cong ty me cua "tinh dao nhat bao" la tap doan tinh dao; ke tu do no duoc doi ten thanh tap doan tin tuc tinh dao. nam 2021, cac cong ty con cua tinh dao co tru so tai my da dang ky voi bo tu phap hoa ky tren cuong vi la dai dien nuoc ngoai theo dao luat dang ky dai dien nuoc ngoai. "tinh dao" co lich su lau doi than chinh phu. truoc khi ban giao hong kong cho trung quoc, to bao nay da ung ho quoc dan dang va chinh phu hong kong thuoc anh; va sau khi hong kong duoc chuyen giao va tro thanh dac khu hanh chinh, bao ben chuyen huong ung ho sang chinh quyen bac kinh.
tinh chau nhat bao (), la to bao tieng trung hang dau o malaysia. theo bao cao cua cuc kiem toan phat hanh cho giai doan ket thuc vao ngay 31 thang 12 nam 2011, "tinh chau nhat bao" co so luong phat hanh trung binh hang ngay gan 500.000 ban va cung la to bao tieng trung ban chay nhat ben ngoai trung quoc dai luc. chi vao chu nhat, so luong phat hanh cua cac to bao bang tieng ma lai (ngon ngu quoc gia cua malaysia) moi vuot qua so luong cua "tinh chau nhat bao". "tinh chau nhat bao" thuoc so huu cua sin chew media corporation berhad, von la cong ty con cua media chinese international limited. no con la thanh vien thuoc mang tin tuc chau a. to bao nay duoc luu hanh khap malaysia va cac nuoc lan can, o mien nam thai lan, brunei va indonesia. no cung duoc xuat ban va in o indonesia va campuchia, duoi cac tieu de khac nhau. "tinh chau nhat bao" co toi 53 van phong tin tuc va sau nha may in o ban dao va dong malaysia. lich su. "tinh chau nhat bao" do ho van bao (胡文豹) va ho van ho (胡文虎), chu dau cu la tiger balm (虎標萬金油) thanh lap vao ngay 15 thang 1 nam 1929 tai cac khu dinh cu eo bien nhu mot phan cua to bao "star amalgamated" duoc hai nha tu thien nay lap nen. to bao bi dinh chi tu nam 1942 den nam 1945 trong thoi ky nhat ban chiem dong ma lai. van phong o kuala lumpur duoc thanh lap vao nam 1950, nhung ngay ca sau khi singapore tach khoi malaysia vao nam 1965, "tinh chau nhat bao" van hoat dong voi tru so chinh tai singapore duoi su quan ly cua hau due anh em nha ho ho. de day nhanh qua trinh in an, vao nam 1966, "tinh chau nhat bao" da xay dung mot nha may moi dat tai tru so chinh hien tai o petaling jaya. voi viec thanh lap nha may moi nay, cac bo phan khac nhu tin tuc, bien tap, san xuat va phat hanh da duoc bat dau. hoat dong cua petaling jaya tro nen doc lap voi tru so chinh tai singapore. tuan theo chi thi cua chinh phu ve viec han che nguoi nuoc ngoai kiem soat bao chi, gia dinh ho ho da chuyen quyen so huu "tinh chau nhat bao" cho lam khanh kim vao nam 1982. nam 1987, "tinh chau nhat bao" chim sau vao rac roi tai chinh va nguoi quan ly cong ty duoc bo nhiem. ngay 27 thang 10 nam 1987, giay phep xuat ban cua "tinh chau nhat bao" da bi dinh chi theo operasi lalang, mot trong nhung cuoc dan ap quyet liet nhat doi voi nhung nguoi bat dong chinh kien ​​dan su do chinh phu phat dong. doanh nhan truong hieu khanh den tu sarawak da mua lai "tinh chau nhat bao" vao nam 1988. sau 5 thang 11 ngay, "tinh chau nhat bao" tiep tuc xuat ban vao ngay 8 thang 4 nam 1988. dau thap nien 1990, "tinh chau nhat bao" noi len la to bao tieng trung ban chay nhat, danh bai "nam duong thuong bao", to bao tieng trung hang dau luc bay gio o malaysia. lap truong bien tap cua "tinh chau nhat bao" duoc coi la phe phai ung ho barisan nasional (bn), chinh dang nam quyen kiem soat chinh phu lien bang malaysia ke tu khi nuoc nay gianh doc lap cho den khi that bai trong cuoc tong tuyen cu nam 2018. tuong tu nhu hau het cac an pham khac o malaysia, "tinh chau nhat bao" con duoc coi la to bao than bac kinh, thuong dang tin tuc tu cac nguon than dang cong san trung quoc nhu "thoi bao hoan cau" va dai truyen hinh trung uong trung quoc.
nam duong thuong bao () la to bao tieng trung do doanh nhan kiem nha tu thien tran gia canh sang lap vao ngay 6 thang 9 nam 1923 tai cac khu dinh cu eo bien, hien duoc xuat ban o malaysia. "nam duong thuong bao" la mot trong nhung to bao tieng trung lau doi nhat trong nuoc, chi sau moi to "quang hoa nhat bao" duoc xuat ban lau hon. no da duoc xuat ban lien tuc ngoai tru bon thang nam 1923 va 1924 va trong the chien thu hai tu nam 1942 den nam 1945, truoc khi tiep tuc xuat ban vao ngay 8 thang 9 nam 1945. lich su. ngay 6 thang 9 nam 1923, tran gia canh sang lap to "nam duong thuong bao" tai cac khu dinh cu eo bien. khi xay ra su kien nhat ban xam luoc man chau nam 1931, "nam duong thuong bao" bat dau xuat ban cac an pham chu nhat tu ngay 20 thang 12 nam 1931 de dua tin ve cuoc chien nay. phien ban dac biet sau nay duoc dat ten la "an ban chu nhat".  "nam duong thuong bao" lan dau tien dat chan den kuala lumpur vao nam 1958, nhung to bao van duoc dem in o singapore. nam 1962, tru so chinh cua to bao nay chuyen den kuala lumpur, dau tien la jalan travers, brickfields va tiep theo la jalan bangsar vao nam 1972. an ban singapore cua to bao nay da sap nhap voi "tinh chau nhat bao" vao ngay 16 thang 3 nam 1983 de tao thanh "lien hop tao bao" nhu hien nay. thang 8 nam 1932, "nam duong nhat bao" was duoc tach khoi cong ty cua ho tran. ten cong ty bao duoc doi thanh nam duong xuat ban xa vao nam 1975. nam 1993, nam duong xuat ban xa tiep quan quyen quan ly mot nhat bao khac cua trung quoc la to "trung quoc bao" va mot nam sau, van phong cua to bao nay chuyen den khu 7, petaling jaya, dia diem hien tai.  "nam duong thuong bao" da phat hanh co phieu lan dau ra cong chung (ipo) vao nam 1989, to nhat bao dau tien cua trung quoc duoc niem yet tai bursa malaysia. cho den cuoi nhung nam 1980, day la to bao tieng trung ban chay nhat o malaysia, truoc khi bi "tinh chau nhat bao" , vuot qua, day cung la to bao tieng trung ban chay nhat ben ngoai hong kong, trung quoc dai luc va dai loan. ngay 28 thang 5 nam 2001, huaren holdings, chi nhanh dau tu cua dang chinh tri cong hoi nguoi hoa malaysia (mca), da mua lai nam duong xuat ban xa, trong mot giao dich gay tranh cai dan den cong dong nguoi hoa tay chay to bao hang loat. den thang 6 nam 2005, nam duong da quyen gop duoc hon 240 trieu ringgit cho nen giao duc tieng trung o malaysia thong qua cac buoi hoa nhac tu thien top ten ket hop voi carlsberg malaysia. nam 2006, huaren holdings chuyen nhuong 21,02% co phan cua minh cho ezywood options sdn bhd, mot cong ty thuoc so huu cua tan sri truong hieu khanh. so co phan con lai cua huaren duoc doi lay co phan cua media chinese international ltd (mcil) vao nam 2008, nhung sau do ban toan bo co phan cua minh tai mcil vao nam 2010.
altay bayındır (sinh ngay 14 thang 4 nam 1998) la mot cau thu bong da chuyen nghiep tho nhi ky thi dau o vi tri thu mon cho cau lac bo süper lig fenerbahçe va doi tuyen bong da quoc gia tho nhi ky .
bi tich hoa giai (con goi la bi tich hoan cai hay sam hoi, xung toi, tha toi, giai toi, bi tich cua su hoi cai, bi tich thong hoi, bi tich xung toi, bi tich ban on tha thu, bi tich giao hoa, bi tich cao giai... tieng anh: sacrament of penance) la mot trong bay bi tich trong giao hoi cong giao roma va chinh thong giao dong phuong. bi tich hoa giai la bi tich ma chua giesu da lap de xa toi cho cac hoi nhan pham toi tu khi lanh nhan bi tich rua toi tro ve sau de giao hoa nguoi do voi chua va hoi thanh. trong qua trinh xung toi, hoi nhan phai xung cac "toi trong" minh da pham va "toi nhe" co the duoc xung vi ly do dao duc. neu chi mac toi nhe ma lanh bi tich nay thi duoc nhieu on ich thieng lieng. theo giao dieu va thong le khong thay doi cua giao hoi, chi nhung nguoi duoc tan phong giam muc va thu phong linh muc moi duoc quyen giai toi nhan danh thien chua ba ngoi. tin lanh khong co bi tich hoa giai, ho khong thong qua cac linh muc de xung toi ma ho xung thu toi loi truc tiep voi thien chua. lich su. cong giao. trong sach phuc am theo thanh gioan co ghi rang chua giesu da lap bi tich nay vao chieu ngay phuc sinh, khi hien den cung cac tong do va noi: ""anh em hay nhan lay thanh than. anh em tha toi cho ai thi nguoi ay duoc tha, anh em cam giu ai thi nguoi ay bi cam giu" (ga 20,22-23). giao ly cong giao quan niem rang: toi la be gay moi hiep thong khong nhung voi chua ma voi ca hoi thanh. vi the, ta can duoc thien chua tha thu va can giao hoa voi hoi thanh. y nghia do duoc the hien day du trong bi tich hoa giai. "khong ai co quyen tha toi ngoai tru mot minh thien chua" (mc 2,7). dung nhu the. nhung chua kito chinh la thien chua nen ngai co quyen tha toi: "toi loi cua con da duoc tha" (mc 2,5). sau do, ngai ban cho hoi thanh quyen tha toi nhan danh ngai (x. ga 20,21-23). dong thoi trong cuoc song tran the, khi duc giesu tha toi cho ai, ngai cung dua ho hoi nhap cong doan dan chua. vi the, khi trao cho cac quyen tha toi, ngai cung trao cho cac ong quyen giao hoa toi nhan voi hoi thanh: "cac con cam buoc ai, tren troi cung cam buoc. cac con coi mo cho ai, tren troi cung coi mo"" (mt 16,19). hoi thanh da thuc thi quyen binh duc giesu trao pho trong cu hanh bi tich hoa giai. trong suot chieu dai lich su, hinh thuc cu hanh co the thay doi, nhung van luon luon giu co cau nen tang voi hai yeu to quan trong: mot la hanh vi cua hoi nhan: thong hoi, xung toi, den toi; hai la hanh dong cua thien chua qua hoi thanh: giam muc va linh muc nhan danh chua ma tha toi va ra viec den toi cho hoi nhan. thoi ki so khai (dau cong nguyen den the ki vi). khoang tu nam 90 - 150. kito giao thuo xua, cac toi nhan chi co duy nhat mot lan de duoc tha toi do la thong qua phep rua (con goi phep rua toi hay bap tem). vao thoi nay, hoi thanh con rat it tin huu, ho chi la mot cong dong nho giua da so la "ngoai dao". giai doan nay cac kito huu rat sung dao, ho co duc tin nong nhiet, mot doi song luan ly nghiem khac nen viec bi pham toi nang la rat hiem. trong boi canh nhu the nen ta co the suy doan rang o giai doan nay viec thiet lap ra mot cach thuc giai toi khac voi viec lanh nhan phep rua la chuyen khong duoc nghi den. cac buc thu ma cac chuc sac kito giao gui cho cac giao hoi tieu a ma cac loi khuyen sam hoi chi nhac den cum tu "hay sam hoi" duoc nhac di nhac lai nhieu lan. duong nhu giao hoi da y thuc rat som rang toi loi la mot thuc te se xay ra trong doi song cua nguoi da chiu phep rua va giao hoi la giao hoi cua cac toi nhan. chang han trong thu gui tin huu corinto cua thanh clemente viet vao khoang nam 95 – 98 nham cham dut nhung chia re trong cong doan ma khong ngan ngai goi giao hoi la "noi an nau cho cac ten trom". cach thuc xung toi. cac tai lieu huong dan xung toi co nhieu cach thuc nhung chi khac nhau ve cach su dung ngon tu va loi doi dap giua hoi nhan voi vi linh muc, ve he thong cau truc va quy trinh xung toi thi van thong nhat voi nhau. trong cac sach giao ly cong giao ghi rang viec xung toi gom 5 buoc:
duong chuyen hoa mevalonate, hay con duoc goi la duong chuyen hoa isoprenoid hoac duong chuyen hoa enzym khu hmg-coa la mot he thong trao doi chat thiet yeu co o loai sinh vat nhan chuan, vi khuan co dai va mot so loai vi khuan khac. con duong nay tao ra hai khoi 5 nguyen tu carbon xay dung, duoc goi la isopentenyl pyrophosphate (ipp) va dimethylallyl pyrophosphate (dmapp), duoc su dung de san sinh isoprenoid, mot lop phan loai da dang bao gom hon 30.000 phan tu sinh hoc nhu cholesterol, vitamin k, coenzym q10 va tat ca cac hoc-mon steroid. duong chuyen hoa mevalonate bat dau bang acetyl-coa va ket thuc bang viec san sinh ipp va dmapp. no duoc biet den nhieu nhat nhu la muc tieu cua cac statin, mot nhom thuoc giam nong do cholesterol. cac statin uc che enzym khu hmg-coa trong duong chuyen hoa mevalonate. duong chuyen hoa mevalonate thuong. duong chuyen hoa mevalonate cua sinh vat nhan chuan, vi khuan co dai va loai vi khuan "eubacteria" deu bat dau cung mot cach nhu nhau. nguon cung carbon duy nhat cua con duong nay la acetyl-coa. buoc dau tien, ngung tu hai phan tu acetyl-coa de san sinh acetoacetyl-coa. tiep theo la qua trinh ngung tu thu hai nham tao ra hmg-coa (3-hydroxy-3-methyl-glutaryl-coa). phan ung khu hmg-coa giup san sinh (r)-mevalonate. 3 buoc enzyme dau tien nay duoc goi la duong chuyen hoa mevalonate thuong. duong chuyen hoa mevalonate ha. duong chuyen hoa mevalonate ha chuyen doi (r)-mevalonate thanh ipp va dmapp bao gom 3 bien the khac nhau. o loai sinh vat nhan chuan, mevalonate duoc phosphoryl hoa hai lan tai vi tri 5-oh, sau do duoc decarboxyl hoa de tao ra ipp. o mot so loai vi khuan co dai nhu "haloferax volcanii", mevalonate duoc phosphoryl hoa mot lan tai vi tri 5-oh, duoc decarboxyl hoa de tao ra isopentenyl phosphate (ip), va cuoi cung lai duoc phosphoryl hoa lan nua de tao ra ipp (duong chuyen hoa archaeal mevalonate thu 1). mot bien the thu ba cua duong chuyen hoa mevalonate cung duoc tim thay trong loai "thermoplasma acidophilum", phosphoryl hoa mevalonate tai vi tri 3-oh, sau do la phosphoryl hoa tai vi tri 5-oh. chat chuyen hoa thu duoc, mevalonate-3,5-bisphosphate, duoc decarboxyl hoa thanh ip, va cuoi cung duoc phosphoryl hoa de tao ra ipp (duong chuyen hoa archaeal mevalonate thu 2). quy dinh va phan hoi. mot so enzym chu chot co the duoc kich hoat thong qua su dieu chinh qua trinh phien ma adn khi kich hoat srebp(cac protein-1 va -2 gan voi yeu to dieu chinh sterol). cam bien noi bao nay se theo doi va phat hien muc cholesterol thap va kich thich san xuat noi sinh bang con duong chuyen hoa enzym khu hmg-coa, cung nhu tang cuong hap thu lipoprotein bang cach tang chinh thu the ldl. viec dieu chinh con duong nay cung co the dat duoc thong qua viec kiem soat toc do dich ma cua mrna, su phan huy cua cac enzym khu va qua trinh phosphoryl hoa. duoc ly hoc. mot so loai thuoc nham vao "duong chuyen hoa mevalonate": benh tat. mot so loai benh gay anh huong den "duong chuyen hoa mevalonate": con duong thay the. cac loai thuc vat, hau het cac loai vi khuan va mot so loai dong vat nguyen sinh nhu ky sinh trung sot ret co kha nang san xuat isoprenoid bang mot con duong thay the goi la duong chuyen hoa methylerythritol phosphate (mep) hoac duong chuyen hoa phi mevalonate. dau ra cua ca hai duong mevalonate va duong mep deu giong nhu nhau, ipp va dmapp, tuy nhien cac phan ung enzym de chuyen acetyl-coa thanh ipp lai hoan toan khac nhau. su tuong tac giua hai con duong trao doi chat nay co the duoc nghien cuu bang cach su dung dong vi 13c-glucose. o loai thuc vat bac cao, duong chuyen hoa mep hoat dong trong lap the plastid trong khi duong chuyen hoa mevalonate hoat dong trong bao tuong cytosol. nhung vi du ve vi khuan so huu duong chuyen hoa mep bao gom "escherichia coli" va cac mam benh nhu "mycobacteria benh lao".
carlos zubizarreta la mot nha van sinh ra o asuncion, paraguay vao nam 1904. tuoi tho va tuoi tre. zubizarreta hoc tai colegio san jose o asuncion va theo hoc nganh luat tai universidad nacional de asuncion. ong la nguoi sang lap va giam doc tap chi van hoa "juventud" ("tuoi tre") va cong tac vien cua tap chi "alas" ("doi canh"). ong duoc coi la nguoi ke chuyen, nha van tieu luan hay nhat va nha van tao nha nhat trong lich su van hoc paraguay the ky 20. nhung nam cuoi doi. ong qua doi o asuncion nam 1972.
keysher fuller spence (sinh ngay 12 thang 7 nam 1994 tai limon, costa rica) la cau thu bong da chuyen nghiep nguoi costa rica dang choi o vi tri hau ve canh phai cho cau lac bo liga fpd herediano va doi tuyen bong da quoc gia costa rica. anh da co tran dau ra mat cho costa rica bang tran dau giao huu voi hoa ky tren san van dong avaya vao ngay 2 thang 2 nam 2019. su nghiep cau lac bo. keysher fuller sinh ngay 12 thang 7 nam 1994 tai limon, costa rica. anh tung da cho doi tre cua cau lac bo deportivo saprissa. anh da co tran dau dau tien cho doi du bi o giai hang nhi costa rica vao thang 1 nam 2012. vao nam 2016, anh chuyen den cau lac bo uruguay de coronado va mot mua giai sau do, anh chuyen den cau lac bo municipal grecia, noi anh thuong xuyen duoc ra san thi dau trong mua giai 2017–2018. phong do cua anh tai municipal grecia da giup cho cau lac bo herediano co duoc chu ky cua anh vao thang 3 nam 2018. trong mua giai dau tien voi herediano, anh cung doi bong moi gianh chuc vo dich concacaf league. su nghiep thi dau quoc te. keysher fuller sinh ra tai costa rica, nhung anh la nguoi goc jamaica. anh ra mat doi tuyen costa rica vao ngay 2 thang 2 nam 2019 bang tran dau ra mat voi doi tuyen hoa ky. ngay 27 thang 3 nam 2019, anh da co ban thang dau tien trong su nghiep thi dau trong chien thang 1–0 truoc doi tuyen jamaica. anh cung co mat trong doi hinh tuyen costa rica tham du cup vang concacaf 2021. vao thang 11 nam 2022, anh duoc trieu tap cho doi tuyen costa rica tham du giai vo dich bong da the gioi 2022. tai giai dau nay, sau tran thua dang tui ho 0–7 truoc doi tuyen tay ban nha, trong tran dau thu 2 cua costa rica tai vong bang, tan dung sai lam hang phong ngu cua doi tuyen nhat ban, anh tung cu dut diem ngau hung, ghi ban thang duy nhat cua tran dau. danh hieu. herediano
alberto fermin zubiria urtiague (9 thang 10 nam 1901 – 4 thang 10 nam 1971) la mot nhan vat chinh tri nguoi uruguay, tung giu chuc chu tich thu ba cua hoi dong chinh quyen quoc gia uruguay, la nguyen thu tren danh nghia cua mot quoc gia trong mot hoi dong hanh phap co 9 thanh vien, va vi tri chu tich duoc luan phien giua cac thanh vien trong nhiem ky mot nam. nhiem ky chu tich cua fermin bat dau tu ngay 1 thang 3 nam 1956 va ket thuc vao ngay 1 thang 3 nam 1957. ly lich. alberto fermin zubiria la mot dang vien noi bat cua dang colorado cua uruguay, chinh dang cam quyen trong mot thoi gian dai. ong tro thanh nghi si vao nam 1932. ong duoc chu y vi phan doi tong thong gabriel terra. nam 1947, ong duoc bo nhiem lam bo truong bo cong nghiep duoi thoi tong thong tomas berreta. tu nam 1948 den nam 1950, ong giu chuc bo truong noi vu duoi thoi tong thong luis batlle berres. ong la chu tich cua banco de la republica oriental del uruguaytu nam 1950 den nam 1954. chu tich hoi dong chinh quyen quoc gia. nam 1956, sau khi chinh khach dong dang, tong thong batlle berres tu nhiem nhiem ky chu tich thu hai, ong duoc cu giu chuc vu nay cho den nam 1957. chuc vu nay da duoc ke nhiem boi mot chinh khach dong dang khac la arturo lezama, hau chu tich. mac du co co hoi de nam giu mot chuc vu trong thuong vien vao nam 1966, nhung ong da tu choi. ong qua doi vao ngay 4 thang 10 nam 1971, vai ngay truoc sinh nhat lan thu 70 cua minh.
iga świątek la duong kim vo dich. van dong vien khac. rut lui. † – khong co trong danh sach tham du ‡ – rut lui khoi danh sach tham du
carlos alcaraz la duong kim vo dich.
giai quan vot my mo rong 2023 la lan thu 143 giai quan vot my mo rong duoc to chuc va la giai grand slam cuoi cung trong nam. giai dau thi dau tren mat san cung ngoai troi tai usta billie jean king national tennis center o thanh pho new york. carlos alcaraz la duong kim vo dich noi dung don nam, trong khi iga świątek la duong kim vo dich noi dung don nu. giai dau. giai quan vot my mo rong 2023 la lan thu 143 giai dau duoc to chuc va dien ra tai usta billie jean king national tennis center o flushing meadows–corona park tai queens o thanh pho new york, new york, hoa ky. giai dau duoc dieu hanh boi lien doan quan vot quoc te (itf) va la mot phan cua lich thi dau atp tour 2023 va wta tour 2023 duoi the loai grand slam. giai dau bao gom cac noi dung don va doi cua nam va nu, voi noi dung doi tro lai voi 64 tay vot, va noi dung don van giu nguyen 128 tay vot. giai dau cung co cac noi dung don va doi cho cac van dong vien nam tre va nu tre (duoi 18 tuoi), la mot phan o the loai hang a cua giai dau. giai dau duoc thi dau tren mat san cung va duoc dien ra tren 17 san voi mat san laykold, trong do co 3 san chinh – san van dong arthur ashe, san van dong louis armstrong va grandstand. diem va tien thuong. phan phoi diem. duoi day la bang phan bo diem cho tung giai doan cua giai dau. tien thuong. tong so tien cua giai quan vot my mo rong 2023 la $65 trieu, tang 8% so voi giai dau nam 2022. lien ket ngoai.  
dong dat sumatra 2022 () la tran dong dat xay ra vao luc 8:39 (wib), ngay 25 thang 2 nam 2022. tran dong dat co cuong do 6.2 richter, tam chan do sau khoang 4 km. tran dong dat da gay ra thiet hai lon. hau qua, dong dat da lam 27 nguoi chet va 457 nguoi bi thuong.
chung ket giai vo dich bong ro the gioi 2023 la tran dau se xac dinh ra nha vo dich cua giai vo dich bong ro the gioi 2023. tran dau se dien ra vao ngay 10 thang 9 nam 2023 tai sm mall of asia arena, pasay, vung do thi manila, philippines. chiec cup naismith se duoc trao cho doi vo dich lan thu hai ke tu khi ra mat phien ban moi vao nam 2017. dong thoi, ba nuoc chu nha philippines, nhat ban va indonesia se trao quyen dang cai giai vo dich bong ro the gioi 2027 cho nuoc chu nha qatar. dia diem. tran chung ket se dien ra tai sm mall of asia arena, pasay, mot thanh pho truc thuoc vung do thi manila, philippines. nha thi dau nay la 1 trong 5 dia diem duoc de xuat trong cuoc dau thau dang cai giai dau cua 3 nuoc philippines, nhat ban va indonesia. dia diem nay to chuc 12 tran dau thuoc giai
