doan vong bang, 4 tran dau vong 2, 4 tran dau phan hang 17–32 va tat ca cac tran dau vong cuoi cung. sm mall of asia arena, thuoc quyen so huu cua sm lifestyle entertainment, truc thuoc sm prime holdings, duoc xay dung nhu mot quy hoach tong the cua khu phuc hop sm mall of asia. nha thi dau duoc thiet ke boi hang arquitectonica va co suc chua len toi 15,000 cho ngoi nhung co the chua toi 20,000 nguoi voi suc chua ben trong nha thi dau. cong trinh duoc xay dung vao nam 2010 va to chuc le cat noc vao thang 9 nam 2011. noi day da to chuc su kien bong ro dau tien vao ngay 7 thang 7 nam 2012. nha thi dau nay la mot dia diem thi dau tai giai bong ro nha nghe philippines (pba) va cac giai dau lon cho cap do dai hoc tai philippines. dia diem nay da tung dang cai giai vo dich bong ro chau a 2013, mot bang dau tai vong loai mon bong ro nam tai the van hoi mua he 2016, mon bong ro nam tai dai hoi the thao dong nam a 2019 cung nhu la cac tran dau tren san nha cua philippines tai vong loai giai dau nam 2019 va 2023. thay doi dia diem. dia diem ban dau dang cai cac tran dau thuoc vong dau cuoi cung la philippine arena, o bocaue, tinh bulacan, philippines, tu tran tu ket den tran chung ket. nha thi dau nay da tung dang cai giai vo dich bong ro 3x3 the gioi 2018, 3 tran dau cua philippines tai vong loai giai dau nam 2019 va 2023 va le khai mac dai hoi the thao dong nam a 2019. tuy nhien, vao ngay 28 thang 4 nam 2023, fiba da to chuc cuoc hop mat voi ban chap hanh trung uong va quyet dinh chuyen dia diem tu philippine arena sang sm mall of asia arena, do cac van de ve hau can va van chuyen da xay ra trong cac su kien khac nhau tai philippine arena, bao gom nhieu buoi hoa nhac khac nhau va giai doan thu sau cua vong loai giai vo dich bong ro the gioi 2023 khu vuc chau a. thay vao do, dia diem nay se dang cai 2 tran dau dau tien cua bang a: angola gap y va cong hoa dominica gap philippines. tran dau. &lt;onlyinclude&gt;&lt;/onlyinclude&gt;
jose maria "joey" fernandez zubiri iii (sinh ngay 30 thang 4 nam 1963), thuong duoc goi la jose ma. zubiri iii hay don gian la jose zubiri iii, la mot chinh khach nguoi philippines. ong tung la nghi si cua vien dan bieu philippines, dai dien cho khu 3 cua bukidnon tu nam 2007 den 2016. tieu su. joey zubiri sinh ra tai thanh pho manila, philippines va lon len o tinh bukidnon. cha ong, jose ma. rubin zubiri, jr., la nguoi da den, tung la thong doc tinh bukidnon den tu kabankalan, negros occidental, va me la nguoi bicolana, ma. victoria fernandez, lon len o bukidnon. ong noi duoc tieng cebu, tieng tagalog, tieng anh, tieng tay ban nha va tieng me de cua cha ong la tieng hiligaynon. gia dinh ong la nguoi goc tay ban nha xu basque. nguoi tien nhiem cho chuc vu cua ong la em trai ong, thuong nghi si juan miguel zubiri, va cha ong, jose zubiri, jr. tham khao. &lt;/br&gt;vien dan bieu philippines
wenceslao "ben" zubiri (28 thang 9 nam 1911 – 9 thang 11 nam 1969), con duoc goi la iyo karpo la mot nha soan nhac, dien vien va nhan vat truyen thong tieng cebu. sang tac noi tieng nhat cua ong, do ong viet ca loi va nhac, la bai hat "matud nila". zubiri sinh ra tren dao cebu nam 1911 va bat dau di hoc tai truong tieu hoc san nicolas. ngay tu khi con nho, ong da boc lo nang khieu ca hat va am nhac. ong dam nhiem mot vai trong bo phim "bertoldo-balodoy", la bo phim tieng cebu dau tien duoc phat hanh. ben zubiri cung sang tac cac bai hat bang tieng cebu. nam 1941, ong viet bai hat noi tieng nhat cua minh, "matud nila". bai hat nay da duoc mot so nguoi coi la quoc ca van hoa cua nguoi noi tieng cebu. ong cung la dien vien hai trong cac vo kich truyen thanh cung nhu lam co van trong chuong trinh "purico amateur hour". ben zubiri qua doi nam 1969. ong ket hon voi luz butalid, mot nguoi boholana. hai nguoi gap nhau tai bohol khi zubiri dang la mot chien binh du kich trong chien tranh the gioi thu hai. mot con pho o barangay labangon, thanh pho cebu duoc dat ten de vinh danh zubiri.
ridho rahmadi (sinh ngay 13 thang 4 nam 1985) la mot chinh tri gia, nha khoa hoc may tinh va nha giao duc nguoi indonesia, anh hien giu chuc chu tich dang ummah tu khi thanh lap vao nam 2021. rahmadi la con re cua nguoi sang lap dang . dau doi va hoc van. rahmadi sinh ngay 13 thang 4 nam 1985 tai yogyakarta. anh dat bang cu nhan ve truyen thong tu dai hoc hoi giao indonesia (uii) vao nam 2007, truoc khi hoc tai dai hoc johannes kepler, linz (tot nghiep nam 2012) va tai dai hoc ky thuat sec voi tam bang thac si. sau do anh dat hoc vi tien si tu dai hoc radboud o nijmegen, ha lan vao nam 2019, rahmadi bat dau lap trinh vao nam 2013. trong luc hoc tien si, anh la nha nghien cuu thinh giang tai dai hoc carnegie mellon trong vai thang vao nam 2017. nghien cuu trong tam cua rahmadi la ve tri tue nhan tao, cung luan an tien si mang ten "finding stable causal structures from clinical data". su nghiep. rahmadi ban dau giang day tai uii tu nam 2009. nam 2018, anh thanh lap trung tam khoa hoc du lieu tai uii. vao ngay 29 thang 4 nam 2021, khi dang ummah thanh lap anh duoc bo nhiem giu chuc chu tich o tuoi 36. vi viec bo nhiem nay, rahmadi da tu chuc giang vien tai uii. rahmadi la con re cua nguoi sang lap dang amien rais. theo rahmadi chia se trong mot cuoc phong van nam 2022, anh da giup dieu chinh dau cuoi cong nghe cua dang trong thoi gian nghi phep luc hoc o nuoc ngoai, phat trien tham do y kien va nghien cuu ung dung. khong lau truoc tuyen bo chinh thuc cua dang ummah, khi chu tich dang van chua duoc xac dinh, rahmadi cho biet minh duoc de nghi giu chuc chu tich ma khong dam phan truoc va anh chap nhan chuc vu nay. bai phat bieu dau tien cua rahmadi sau khi duoc bo nhiem chuc chu tich dang la keu goi von dau tu quoc gia vao cong nghe thong tin va tri tue nhan tao. rahmadi la nguoi tre nhat trong so nhung nha lanh dao thuoc cac dang chinh tri tham gia cuoc tong tuyen cu indonesia nam 2024. gia dinh. rahmadi ket hon voi tasniem fauzia rais, con gai cua amien rais. rahmadi va tasniem cung hoc mot truong trung hoc co so tai yogyakarta, rahmadi hoc nam cuoi voi tasniem. den nam 2016, ho co hai nguoi con.
rafael epifanio zubaran capmany (7 thang 4 nam 1875 – 1 thang 2 nam 1948) la mot luat su nguoi mexico den tu campeche, tung giu chuc bo truong bo noi vu mexico va la dai dien cho cac quoc gia abc tai hoi nghi hoa binh niagara falls vao nam 1914. ong la bso truong bo kinh te mexico tu nam 1920 den nam 1922.
joseph zubin (sinh ngay 9 thang 10 nam 1900 va mat ngay 18 thang 12 nam 1990) la mot nha tam ly hoc giao duc nguoi my goc litva va la chuyen gia ve benh tam than phan liet, duoc dat ten cho giai joseph zubin. ong la nguoi sang lap phong nghien cuu sinh trac hoc cua vien tam than tieu bang new york. cuoc doi. zubin sinh ngay 9 thang 10 nam 1900 tai raseiniai, litva, nhung ong chuyen toi my vao nam 1908 va lon len o baltimore. bang cap dau tien cua ong la trong linh vuc hoa hoc tai dai hoc johns hopkins nam 1921. ong tot nghiep bang tien si ve tam ly hoc giao duc tai dai hoc columbia vao nam 1932. nam 1934, ong ket hon voi winifred anderson va ho co ba nguoi con (2 con trai, david va jonathan, va mot con gai, winfred). tai thoi diem ong qua doi vao ngay 18 thang 12 nam 1990, ong co bay nguoi chau. ton vinh. zubin la chu tich cua ca hiep hoi tam benh hoc hoa ky (1951-2) va truong dai hoc neuropsychopharmacology hoa ky (1971-2) va da nhan duoc nhieu giai thuong cho cac tac pham cua minh. nam 1946 ong duoc bau lam hoi vien cua hiep hoi thong ke hoa ky.
 la mot ca si kiem sang tac nhac nguoi nhat. co duoc biet den nhieu nhat voi tu cach la giong ca chinh cua bo doi yoasobi voi nha san xuat ayase, duoi nghe danh la ikura, va la cuu thanh vien cua nhom cover . sau nhieu dia don va dia choi nhac mo rong, ikuta da phat hanh album phong thu dau tay cua minh "sketch" vao thang 3 nam 2023 va dat vi tri thu 4 tren oricon albums chart. dau doi va giao duc. ikuta lilas sinh ngay 25 thang 9 nam 2000, tai tokyo, nhat ban, va co ba anh chi em. co chuyen den chicago, hoa ki, vao nam 2001, va song o do den khi co ba tuoi. ikuta da hoc piano khi co hoc nam nhat tieu hoc, va acoustic guitar vao nam lop 6. co cung la thanh vien cua cau lac bo am nhac cua truong tu lop ba den lop sau. ikuta da viet bai hat dau tien cua minh khi co van con hoc tieu hoc va bieu dien buoi hoa nhac dau tien khi co con la hoc sinh trung hoc co so. co noi trong mot cuoc phong van cua "cinematoday" rang co mong muon tro thanh mot nhac si khi cha me co hua se viet bai hat cho nhau vao dip ngay valentine va valentine trang. co theo hoc truong cao dang nghe thuat cua dai hoc nihon vao thang 4 nam 2019 va tot nghiep vao thang 3 nam 2023. ikuta has cited taylor swift as her major music influence. su nghiep. 2015–2019: su nghiep hat don. vao nam 2015, ikuta da tham gia mot so buoi casting va thu giong, bao gom ca singin' japan do sony music entertainment japan to chuc va co duoc chon vao vong chung ket. nam 2016, co tham gia khoa dao tao nghe si moi mang ten lesson do smej tai tro va phat hanh cd demo cua minh "15 no omoi". sau do co tro thanh thanh vien cua nhom nhac cover den nam 2021. vao thang 2 nam 2018, ikuta xuat hien lan dau tren truyen hinh tai '. co da phat hanh hai vo kich mo rong dau tien rerise vao thang 4 nam 2018, and ' vao thang 11 nam 2019 thong qua nhan hieu doc lap after school. nam 2020, ikuta trinh dien phien ban tieng nhat cua bai hat end-credit "rocket to the moon" cho bo phim hoat hinh gia tuong tren may tinh "over the moon", va phat hanh dia don moi "hikari", dong hanh cung buoi trien lam cua kissme "atta koto aru no ni, hajime mashite". vao ngay 9 thang 3 nam 2021, ikuta phat hanh "answer" cho quang cao bao hiem khuyet tat anshin cua tokio marine &amp; nichido life insurance. co da hat lai "sweet memories" cua seiko matsuda cho album ky niem 50 nam cua takashi matsumoto '. ikuta da tai phat hanh "romance no yakusoku", ban dau tu ep "jukebox" cua co ay, vao ngay 14 thang 8, kem theo loat phim thuc te ve tinh yeu '. co long tieng cho hiro-chan trong bo phim hoat hinh khoa hoc gia tuong nam 2021 '. ngoai ra, vao nam 2021, ikuta con xuat hien tren "tarinai sukunai" cua fujifabric tu album phong thu thu muoi mot cua ho ', phien ban tieng nhat cua tomorrow x together cua "0x1=lovesong (i know i love you)" tu ep tieng nhat dau tien cua ho "chaotic wonderland", va "hōseki" cua rei, va hop tac voi milet va aimer cho "omokage" cua "the first take" de quang cao cho tai nghe khu tieng on khong day cua sony wf-1000xm4. "sparkle" cua ikuta duoc phat hanh vao ngay 17 thang 1 nam 2022, lam chu de cho "kyō, suki ni narimashita: mikan-hen, sotsugyō-hen 2022". co hop tac voi bo doi hip-hop va ayase cho dia don "baka majime", phat hanh vao ngay 20 thang 3. no duoc di kem voi san khau ky niem 55 nam cua "all night nippon" "ano yoru o oboe teru". dia don 'lens', mot chu de cho drama tbs "", da den vao ngay 14 thang 6. ikuta xuat hien tren dia don cua tokyo ska paradise orchestra "free free free", phat hanh vao ngay 27 thang 7. co phu trach bai hat chu de "jump" cua giai vo dich bong da the gioi 2022 fuji tv, den vao ngay 20 thang 11.  vao thang 1 nam 2023, ikuta da phat hanh "tanpopo" cho drama 10 cua nhk "". album phong thu dau tay cua co "sketch" duoc phat hanh vao ngay 8 thang 3. no ra mat o vi tri thu tu tren oricon albums chart, va thu hai tren hot album "billboard japan". ikuta xuat hien tren dia don "senkō hanabi" cua chiaki satō tu album phong thu thu ba cua co "butterfly effect". bai hat duoc phat hanh vao ngay 14 thang 6. co da phat hanh dia don "p.s." cho bo phim "1 byō saki no kare" vao ngay 7 thang 7. 2019–nay: yoasobi. nha san xuat vocaloid ayase duoc yeu cau thanh lap mot du an am nhac nhu mot phan cua su hop tac voi phuong tien truyen thong xa hoi viet van sang tao monogatary.com, da lien he voi ikuta sau khi xem mot video tren instagram va hoi co ay lieu co ay co san long bat dau mot du an am nhac voi minh hay khong, bat dau nen su khoi dau cho bo doi yoasobi. dia don dau tay cua ho "yoru ni kakeru", duoc phat hanh vao cuoi nam 2019, tro nen lan truyen va tro thanh mot thanh cong ve mat am nhac o nhat ban, giup yoasobi tro nen noi tieng lan dau trong nen am nhac nhat ban.
emil zubin (sinh ngay 18 thang 9 nam 1977) la mot cau thu bong da nguoi slovenia thi dau cho fc primorje ke tu ngay 31 thang 7 nam 2017. anh la mot tien dao trung tam va thuan chan phai.
cecilio zubillaga perera, hay con duoc goi la chio zubillaga, la mot nha bao nguoi venezuela. ong sinh ra o carora, bang lara vao ngay 1 thang 2 nam 1887 va mat o do vao ngay 25 thang 7 nam 1948. tieu su. ong da viet rat nhieu bai bao ve lich su va cac van de xa hoi cho cac to bao o carora, barquisimeto va caracas, du ong it duoc hoc tap chinh quy va phan lon la tu hoc. ong cung la thanh vien cua hoc vien lich su quoc gia venezuela. de cap. nha su hoc guillermo moron da xuat ban mot tuyen tap cac bai bao va cac bai viet khac cua ong voi tua de "la voz del comun". cac nha van rafael montes de oca martinez va juan paez avila da ban luan ve cuoc doi cua ong trong cac cuon sach co tua de "biografia de un genio popular" va "chio zubillaga, caroreño universal".
ruby thuy quai tuoi teen (tieng anh: ruby gillman, teenage kraken) la mot bo phim hai hoat hinh may tinh do dreamworks animation san xuat va duoc phan phoi boi universal pictures vao nam 2023. bo phim do kirk demicco la dao dien va faryn pearl dong dao dien, pam brady va nhom bien kich cua brian c. brown va elliott diguiseppi phu trach viec viet kich ban. phim co su tham gia cua cac dien vien long tieng: lana condor, toni collette, annie murphy, colman domingo va jane fonda, cung voi sam richardson, liza koshy, will forte, jaboukie young-white, blue chapman, ramona young va eduardo franco gop mat trong bo phim, dong vai tro ho tro. bo phim ke ve mot co gai 15 tuoi nhut nhat nhung tot bung ten la ruby gillman (condor) dang khao khat duoc hoa nhap voi moi nguoi trong truong trung hoc oceanside, nhung khi co bi dua xuong bien do vi pham quy tac cua me co (collette) doi voi nhung nguoi ban se tro thanh ban be cua co, co da phat hien ra rang minh la hau due cua nhung con kraken thien chien, nhung nguoi da bao ve dat va bien ca khoi nhung nang tien ca doc ac qua nhieu the he, dong thoi cung duoc dinh rang co se thua ke ngai vang tu ba ngoai cua minh, chien binh nu hoang cua bay vung bien (fonda). bo phim lan dau tien duoc brown va diguiseppi gioi thieu cho dreamworks animation thuc hien va da duoc san xuat trong vai nam. no duoc cong bo vao thang 6 nam 2021 voi ten phim ban dau la "meet the gillmans", sau do la viec tuyen chon cac dien vien cho cac vai dien va du kien se duoc phat hanh vao nam 2022. paul tibbitt phu trach dao dien, voi brady ky hop dong viet kich ban voi brown va diguiseppi, va qua trinh san xuat du kien ​​se bat dau vao nam 2022. phan lon cac dien vien long tieng da duoc cong bo vao thang 3 nam 2023, cung voi viec demicco thay the tibbitt trong vai tro dao dien. bo phim lay cam hung tu "easy a" (2010), "" (2017), "booksmart" (2019) va cac bo phim khac cua john hughes. phan am nhac do stephanie economou sang tac, ben canh hai bai hat goc do ca si kiem nhac si nguoi anh mimi webb va freya ridings trinh bay. "ruby thuy quai tuoi teen" da co buoi ra mat the gioi tai lien hoan phim hoat hinh quoc te annecy vao ngay 15 thang 6 nam 2023 va duoc universal pictures phat hanh tai hoa ky vao ngay 30 thang 6. bo phim da nhan duoc nhieu loi danh gia trai chieu tu cac nha phe binh, cung voi loi khen ngoi ve viec dien xuat va hoat hinh nhung lai bi chi trich ve cau chuyen cua phim. dieu do da khien bo phim chi thu ve 42 trieu usd so voi kinh phi len den 70 trieu usd, khien no tro thanh bo phim cua dreamworks co doanh thu thap nhat, voi du doan rang universal se lo mot so tien len den 80 trieu usd. long tieng. ngoai ra, echo kellum va nicole byer lan luot long tieng cho doug va janice. cac youtuber preston va bri arsement lan luot long tieng cho mot nguoi mua nha va mot khach du lich. binh luan vien phim juju green long tieng cho giao vien the duc. nha thiet ke am thanh randy thom long tieng cho nessie va khau phao hoa giay. atticus shaindlin long tieng cho topher. suzanne buirgy long tieng cho carol. cac hoc sinh khac duoc long tieng boi sydney bell, ricardo hurtado, qalil ishmail, merk nguyen, caleb pierce va tiffany wu. san xuat. vao thang 6 nam 2021, "thegww" da dua tin rang co mot bo phim co tua de ban dau la "meet the gillmans" dang duoc san xuat tai dreamworks animation, voi qua trinh tuyen chon dien vien dang dien ra va du kien se phat hanh vao nam 2022. cuu nguoi dan chuong trinh "spongebob squarepants la" paul tibbitt dong vai tro dao dien, voi pam brady da xac nhan viet phim. lana condor, laura dern va michael sheen lan luot duoc chon de long tien cac vai ruby, me va cha cua co, trong khi annie murphy duoc chon de long tieng clarica. chris kuser va christi soper duoc bo nhiem dieu hanh san xuat. viec san xuat cung du kien se bat dau vao nam 2022. on march 14, 2023, the cast and crew were announced via universal pictures ireland's website. along with condor and murphy's roles confirmed, other new cast members of the film include toni collette, sam richardson, liza koshy, will forte, colman domingo, jaboukie young-white, blue chapman, eduardo franco, ramona young, echo kellum, nicole byer, and jane fonda, while kirk demicco (replacing tibbitt), faryn pearl, and kelly cooney cilella were revealed as the director, co-director, and producer, respectively. dreamworks animation also announced its official title as "ruby gillman, teenage kraken". the cast, crew, and official title were publicly announced two days later. following the release of the film's second trailer in may 2023, longtime dreamworks director mike mitchell was revealed to have served as executive producer. according to "animation magazine", cilella stated that the film has been in the works for several years. it was first pitched to dreamworks about a family of sea monsters that were moved to the land and are hiding in plain sight. she stated: "our heroine is such a lovable character and i'm so excited for audiences to meet her and fall in love with her the way we have because she starts the movie as a quirky, slightly insecure but bighearted character, but she's harboring a secret that she can't tell her friends. but ultimately the kraken is awakened inside her and there's no hiding this. she learns that her destiny is so much more than being an average high school teenager, and she's destined to be the next big protector of the seas. her journey is self-discovery and embracing that side of her that had been dormant for so long, and for her to become a fully actualized character was such an exciting story for me to tell on such a grand scale." demicco stated that he cited john hughes films, "easy a" (2010), "lady bird" (2017) and "booksmart" (2019) as his inspirations. pierre-olivier vincent serves as the production designer, taking inspiration for the main character from the body of an octopus and bringing the "curviness to all the design language of the film", from the cars to the underwater world. the film was dedicated to nick levenduski, a crowds artist of the film who died before the film was released. am nhac. stephanie economou was confirmed to score the film by the first trailer's release on march 16, 2023. british singer-songwriter mimi webb performed the original song "this moment", released on june 23 as a single, a week before the film's release. the soundtrack album was released on june 30, 2023, the same day as the theatrical release, in addition to the original song "rise" performed by freya ridings, which plays during the end credits. phat hanh. rap. "ruby gillman, teenage kraken" debuted at the annecy international animation film festival on june 15, 2023, and was theatrically released in the united states on june 30. the film was screened early on june 19, 2023, at various regal cinemas theaters as part of the chain's "monday mystery movie" promotion. in december 2022, deputy manager director of universal pictures international italy massimo proietti revealed that the film would be released in mid-2023. on march 16, 2023, following the release of the first official trailer, it was revealed that the film would be released on june 30, 2023, taking over the original release date of illumination's "migration". truyen thong gia dinh. "ruby gillman, teenage kraken" was released on digital hd on july 18, 2023, 18 days after its theatrical release. it is scheduled to be released on dvd and blu-ray on september 26, 2023. as part of their 18-month deal with netflix, the film will stream on peacock for the first four months of the pay-tv window, then will move to netflix for the next ten, and then will return to peacock for the remaining four. don nhan. phong ve. "ruby gillman, teenage kraken" grossed $15.8 million in the united states and canada, and $26.7 million in other territories, for a worldwide gross of $42.4 million. it was the lowest-grossing film from dreamworks animation following "spirit untamed" (2021), which grossed $42.7 million during its theatrical run and was also a box-office disappointment, with projections of an $80 million loss for universal pictures. in the united states and canada, "ruby gillman, teenage kraken" was released alongside "indiana jones and the dial of destiny", and was projected to gross $4–8 million from 3,400 theatres in its opening weekend. the film made $2.3 million on its first day, including $725,000 from thursday night previews. the film debuted with $5.5 million, becoming dreamworks animation's lowest-grossing opening weekend of any of their feature films to date. the film's sixth place finish also made it the studio's lowest-ranking three-day opening weekend, tying ' from 2003. several publications, including "thewrap", "/film", and "variety", attributed the reasons for its low opening to the film's limited three-month marketing, the trailers, and competition from ' and "elemental". phe binh.  audiences polled by cinemascore gave the film an average grade of "a–" on an a+ to f scale, while posttrak reported 68% of filmgoers gave it a positive score. peter debruge of "variety" gave the film a positive review, writing, ""south park" veteran pam brady, who shares screenwriting credit with brian c. brown and elliott diguiseppi, brings all kinds of funny ideas to the film, which demicco does an admirable job of executing. but there's a simpler, more sincere movie underneath it all that seems to be taunting audiences, like a glowing shape from deep below. if you buy the notion that krakens shrink down to human scale — and that none-too-bright people might be daft enough not to spot them — then the high school scenes are charming. ruby's a big nerd with a head for quadratic equations, and she's having trouble working up the nerve to ask her study buddy to prom (it's pretty clear he feels the same way about her). not that overprotective agatha would let her attend anyway."
wannarot sonthichai (tieng thai: วรรณรท สนธิไชย, phien am: van-na-rot xon-thi-chai, sinh ngay 10 thang 4 nam 1989) con co nghe danh la vill (วิว), la mot nu ca si, dien vien va nguoi mau nguoi thai lan. co duoc biet den qua vai nampetch trong "dem dinh menh", dao trong "vi sao lac" va hai chi em sinh doi kandaomani/kandaowasi trong "bi tinh song sinh" ...  su nghiep. wannarot sonthichai tung theo hoc mot truong trung hoc o thai lan. sau nay, co tot nghiep dai hoc silapakorn (khoa "khao co hoc", chuyen nganh "nhan hoc"). co buoc vao lang giai tri thai cung voi yuke songpaisan khi ho cung nhau thu giong tai exact. ca hai sau do da cap doi va tro thanh nhung vai dien hang dau trong lakorn "dem dinh menh" (ban lam lai cua phim "dong mau phuong hoang"). bo phim la mot thanh cong lon va dat duoc danh gia cao nhat cho mot tap phim la 17. ca hai da nhanh chong tro thanh mot trong nhung cap koo jin noi tieng nhat trong nhung nam do. nam 2010, co dong phim "em la phu nu" cung voi ca si noi tieng bie sukrit wisedkaew. rating cua phim dat den con so 14 va duoc giai thuong "bo phim nuoc ngoai cua nam hay nhat" cua dai an huy trung quoc 2011. bo phim dat ti le nguoi xem cao nhat tren dai ch5 nam 2010. nam 2013, vill dong cap voi toomtam yuthana puengklarng, quan quan the star 7 trong phim "bi tinh song sinh". bo phim dat ti le nguoi xem cao nhat tren dai ch5 nam 2013. tap cuoi cua phim dat rating 6.8. nam 2014, vill dong cap voi put puttichai trong phim "bat lay thien than". bo phim cung duoc danh gia la top 10 phim hay nhat xu so chua vang nam 2014, cap doi push - vill trong phim cung tro thanh mot trong nhung cap doi dep nhat man anh va duoc yeu cau tai hop lien tuc.
guildfordia ostarrichi la mot loai oc bien da tuyet chung, thuoc ho turbinidae. 
guildfordia megapex la mot loai oc bien da tuyet chung, thuoc ho turbinidae. 
guildfordia hendersoni la mot loai oc bien da tuyet chung, thuoc ho turbinidae. 
cong tuoc xu addis abeba (tieng y: "duca di addis abeba") la mot tuoc hieu cha truyen con noi trong gioi quy toc y duoc ban tang trong cuoc chinh phuc ethiopia cua y duoi dang danh hieu chien thang cua vua victor emmanuel iii cho nguyen soai pietro badoglio sau khi ong dan quan y vao addis ababa. vao ngay 5 thang 5 nam 1936. vao ngay 5 thang 5 nam 1936, benito mussolini tuyen bo vua victor emmanuel iii cua y la hoang de moi cua ethiopia va ethiopia la mot tinh cua y. cung dip do, nguyen soai pietro badoglio duoc bo nhiem lam pho vuong dau tien cua ethiopia va duoc nha vua phong lam "cong tuoc xu addis abeba".
 la mot cong ty san xuat phim nguoi lon (av) nhat ban chuyen lam ve cac video ton sung. van phong cua cong ty duoc dat tai phuong toshima cua tokyo, nhat ban. thong tin cong ty. studio glory quest da va dang san xuat phim nguoi lon it nhat la ke tu ngay 10 thang 6 nam 2000, khi hang phim phat hanh bo "sweet doll 01" (スイートドールスペシャル 01) tren bang vhs (sds-01). thang 12 nam 2019, dmm da liet ke 3532 bo phim co san de mua thong qua studio glory quest, va 2110 bo phim duoi thuong hieu glory quest. cong ty phat hanh phim hai lan mot thang, voi toc do khoang 18–20 phim moi thang. tren trang web cua ho, "www.gloryquest.tv", cac thanh vien co the tai phim xuong va dat mua bo dia dvd glory quest. ho cung kinh doanh cac san pham cua minh tai cac cua hang tren khap nhat ban. glory quest san xuat phim nguoi lon thuoc nhieu the loai khieu dam khac nhau, bao gom ca cac nu dien vien noi tieng trong cac bo phim "nguc to" (巨乳). hang phim cung tung phat hanh nhieu bo phim ton sung cuc doan hon duoi nhan hieu maniac cua minh, bao gom cac the loai nhu fisting, s&amp;m bao dam, phan nguoi va tung co mot thoi la thu tinh. cac nhan hieu maniac shemale (nam chua chuyen gioi han dien ro), transgender (chuyen gioi) va ultra sex co cac bo phim co su tham gia cua cac nu dien vien chuyen gioi. mot the loai dang chu y khac cua glory quest do la "khieu dam nguoi lon tuoi" (ai lao), mot the loai ngach dang phat trien nhanh chong trong nganh khieu dam nhat ban. nhu kayoko iimura, dai dien quan he cong chung cua glory quest, da noi: “neu nhu chung toi chi san xuat phim theo tieu chuan, chung toi khong the danh bai cac hang phim khac… do do chung toi muon tao ra thu gi do moi me. moi quan he giua vo va bo chong gia da co du tinh tiet va vong xoay de tao nen mot bau khong khi bi an va lam say dam trai tim nguoi xem.”. ngoi sao dan anh cua glory quest la shigeo tokuda, sinh nam 1934, nguoi da “chung to minh la mot mo vang cho glory quest” thong qua hai tuyen tap “ong gia”: "maniac training of lolitas - buoi dao tao dien cuong cho cac thieu nu" (thang 12/2004) va "forbidden elderly care - dieu duong cam doan" (thang 8/2006). loat phim thu ba, "big tits loving grandfather erotic mischief -" "tro nghich ngom tinh ai cua ong noi" "yeu" "nguc" "to", bat dau vao thang 4 nam 2008. glory quest, duoc thanh lap duoi ten goi gqe inc. (有限会社gqe), co so von 3 trieu yen nhat (khoang 30.000 $) vao nam 2010. giam doc dieu hanh cong ty la ken miyasaka (宮坂謙). no van la mot cong ty doc lap va khong phai la mot phan cua mot tap doan. giong nhu cac cong ty phim nguoi lon av khac tai nhat ban, no thuoc ve mot trong nhung "nhom dao duc", tu nguyen quan ly noi dung va kiem duyet: "hiep hoi noi dung phan mem" (csa - content soft association) (tieng nhat: コンテンツ・ソフト協同組合), duoc sang lap boi hoi nhom cac cong ty soft on demand. nhan hieu. ngoai nhan hieu glory quest ra, cong ty cung su dung cac nhan hieu sau day cho cac bo phim cua minh: nu dien vien. cac than tuong av (av idol) sau day tung xuat hien trong cac san pham cua glory quest: cac tuyen tap. cac tuyen tap phim glory quest noi tieng bao gom: giai av grand prix. nam 2008, glory quest tham gia cuoc thi trong nganh av grand prix, voi bai du thi "she male jam ～exclusive tune～" (avgp-012) cung su tham gia cua cac nu dien vien chuyen gioi arisawa sena va yumeno mina. nam 2009, tai giai av grand prix, de cu cua gq, "gia dinh loan luan" (近親相姦 昭和禁断血族「母さん、この家は狂ってます」) (avgp-115), cung voi su tham gia cua kitahara natsumi, yamaguchi reiko va nanase kasumi, da gianh duoc "giai thuong nguoi ung ho".
noi dung khieu dam loan luan la mot the loai noi dung khieu dam lien quan den viec mo ta hoat dong tinh duc giua nhung nguoi than voi nhau. noi dung khieu dam loan luan co the co nhung nguoi than thuc su, the nhung the loai chinh cua noi dung nay la fauxcest gia tao, theo do cac dien vien khong co quan he huyet thong dong phim cung nhau de goi y moi quan he gia dinh. the loai nay bao gom cac nhan vat co nhieu cap do quan he ho hang khac nhau, bao gom anh chi em ruot, anh chi em ho, co, chu, cha me, con cai, chau gai va chau trai. dac biet, moi quan he me con la mot hien than cua phuc cam oedipus. tai nhieu quoc gia, noi dung khieu dam loan luan duoc xem la noi dung bat hop phap. lich su va tinh phap ly. co the noi rang vi du noi tieng nhat cua the loai nay la loat phim "taboo" trong thap nien 1980. bo phim dau tien trong loat phim nay, co su tham gia cua kay parker, duoc ra mat vao nam 1980. tu do nhieu phan phim tiep theo cung duoc ra mat, trong do co mot so da gianh duoc cac giai thuong phim nguoi lon. co mot luong lon phim khieu dam ve loan luan tren internet, dan den viec mot so nguoi cho rang dieu nay co the lam cho viec loan luan trong doi thuc tro nen hop phap hoac duoc chap nhan, khuyen khich. ngay ca jeffrey masson con tung binh luan rang, phim khieu dam loan luan la "hat nhan chinh cua phim khieu dam - hinh thuc nguyen ban cua no". noi dung khieu dam loan luan co the duoc tao ra boi cha me va con cai, anh chi em thuc su. tuy nhien, loai phim khieu dam chinh nay chi don gian la su dung cac dien vien o do tuoi kha khac nhau hoac cac dien vien co ngoai hinh giong nhau khien cho ho tuong tuong ra moi quan he gia dinh. trong moi truong hop, nhung su ket hop nay cung co the bao gom nhung nguoi o do tuoi thap va neu tat ca cac doi tac deu la nguoi lon thi o nhat ban la hop phap neu nhu ho tren 18 tuoi, nhung neu doi tac la tre em (duoi 17 tuoi) thi do la noi dung khieu dam tre em. noi dung khieu dam loan luan chiem mot vi tri doc ton trong so nhung cuon sach khieu dam, va cung co nhung truong hop co tinh chat dac biet tren cac tap chi tong hop va tap chi chuyen biet. ngoai ra, nhieu loi thu nhan ve trai nghiem tu doc gia, bao gom ca nhung trai nghiem bi cam doan, cung duoc gioi thieu trung bay, dong thoi nhieu tap chi loan luan va bo truyen chuyen biet cung tung duoc xuat ban. phim khieu dam sinh doi va anh chi em. trong khoang thoi gian tro lai it nhat la tu thoi cap doi anh em dong tinh christy thap nien 1970, cac noi dung ve loan luan, dac biet la giua cac cap anh em sinh doi, da tro thanh mot dac diem cua nganh cong nghiep khieu dam dong tinh nam. mac du anh em christy co the khong lien quan gi toi nhau nhung ho lai co ngoai hinh tuong tu va mot so cap anh em sinh doi cung tung xuat hien cung nhau trong nhung canh quay ma khong co su tiep xuc dang ke giua ho. ngoai ra con co mot so cap anh em sinh doi thuc su da thuc hien hanh vi tinh duc voi nhau. dieu nay bi xem la vi pham phap luat tai nhieu vung lanh tho. vi du nhu tai uc, no duoc danh gia la "refused classification" (tu choi phan loai) (rc). bo phim san xuat nam 1999 cua william higgins mang ten "double czech" bao gom canh quan he tinh duc that giua cap anh em sinh doi bartok, cung nhu an ban tiep theo nam 2009 giua cap anh em sinh doi richter, tuy nhien, canh quay cua anh em bartok duoc mo ta la "ho trong hoan toan kinh hai" trong phan canh cua ho. khong giong nhu cap anh em sinh doi nguoi czech khac, elijah va milo peters, ho lam viec cung nhau ma con khong su dung bao cao su cho ca quan he bang mieng va hau mon cho hang san xuat bel ami. vao nam 2010, ho duoc bao cao lai la song chung voi nhau nhu mot cap doi doc than ngoai le cong viec khieu dam cua ho va mong muon tiep tuc lam viec cung nhau them 50 nam nua. mot so canh quay cap anh em peters cung tham gia da can phai chinh sua lai de nhan duoc su chap thuan tu co quan kiem duyet phan loai phim phan phoi tren thi truong, bao gom ca vuong quoc anh va hoa ky. tai nhat ban, the loai khieu dam anh chi em thuong duoc goi mot cach cu the la "em gai moe" (妹萌え). phim gia loan luan fauxcest. "fauxcest" duoc hieu la nhung hinh tuong khieu dam hoac tinh duc mo phong su loan luan giua cac dien vien chi dang gia vo la anh chi em nhung thuc te thi khong co moi quan he huyet thong nao. thuat ngu "fauxcest" la su ket hop cua "faux" va "incest", doi khi duoc viet tat thanh "faux-incest" va cung doi khi duoc su dung hoan doi voi thuat ngu "dong vai gia dinh" hoac "loan luan gia tuong". ngoai phu nu, nhung nguoi tieu thu chinh cua the loai nay la cac cap doi va the he gen y. theo mot nha dao dien phim khieu dam, mot phan cua su hap dan the loai "fauxcest" nay la do mong muon cua khan gia muon xem nhung noi dung cam ky va gay tranh cai. den nam 2016, the loai nay da gia tang muc do pho bien len toi 1000% ke tu nam 2011 va 178% ke tu nam 2014, mot su tang truong manh me ma mot so chuyen gia trong nganh cong nghiep da cho la do khan gia nu gioi, nhung nguoi chu yeu tim kiem noi dung kem theo mot cau chuyen boi canh. cac bien the cua moi quan he gia dinh bao gom anh chi em ruot, me-con trai, cha-con gai, moi quan he cha ke/me ke va nhieu the loai khac. mot trong nhung ly do dang sau xu huong loan luan gia tao duoc ua chuong hon loan luan quan he huyet thong thuc te trong kha nang gia tuong do la tinh chat cam doan cua cac hinh thuc quan he huyet thong vi mot so nha xuat ban se tu choi phat hanh noi dung kieu vay. tren gamelink, cu muoi giao dich mua ban thi co mot giao dich mua co chu de "fauxcest," va mot nha xa hoi hoc cho biet rang, chu de nay da tro nen pho bien hon, bang chung la no duoc mo ta thong qua tieu thuyet gia tuong va loat phim truyen hinh nhu "game of thrones". sach hu cau gia loan luan bat dau tro nen pho bien vao nam 2011. mot so cong ty tu xuat ban cung dang hoan nghenh noi dung co chu de gia loan luan.
danh bom bang dong vat la viec su dung dong vat lam he thong van chuyen chat no. chat no duoc buoc vao dong vat tho co the la ngua, la hoac la lua. con vat van chuyen co the duoc kich no trong mot dam dong. cac du an doi danh bom, cho danh bom, bo cau danh bom cung tung duoc tim hieu. su kien vu viec. afghanistan. nam 2009, quan taliban buoc thiet bi no tu che (ied) vao mot con lua va tha con lua tu do mot doan ngan ngoai doanh trai cua luc luong vu trang anh o tinh helmand. thang 4 nam 2013, tai kabul, mot qua bom gan tren mot con lua da phat no truoc mot don cong an, giet chet mot canh sat va lam bi thuong 3 thuong dan. mot phat ngon vien cua chinh phu tuyen bo rang, quan noi day dang thach thuc tham quyen cua chinh phu afghanistan truoc khi quan doi hoa ky rut quan vao nam 2014. i-rac. ngay 21 thang 11 nam 2003, tam qua hoa tien da duoc ban ra tu nhung chiec xe day lua tai bo nang luong dau mo iraq va hai khach san o trung tam baghdad, lam mot nguoi bi thuong va gay ra mot so tan pha. nam 2004, mot con lua o ramadi da duoc chat day thuoc no va kich pha ve phia mot tram kiem soat do hoa ky van hanh. no da phat no truoc khi co the lam bi thuong hoac giet chet bat ky mot ai. su viec nay, cung voi mot so su co tuong tu lien quan den cho, da lam day len noi so hai hoang mang ve cac phuong thuc khung bo thuc hanh su dung dong vat song lam vu khi, mot su thay doi so voi cach lam loi thoi hon su dung xac dong vat chet de nhet thuoc no. viec su dung cac thiet bi no tu che giau trong xac dong vat cung la mot cach lam pho bien trong cuoc khang chien iraq. li-bang. malia sufangi, mot thieu nu tre nguoi li-bang, bi bat tai vung an ninh vao thang 11 nam 1985 cung voi mot thiet bi no gan tren mot con lua ma co da that bai khi co gang thuc hien mot cuoc tan cong. co khai rang da duoc tuyen dung va dieu phai boi chuan tuong syria ghazi kanaan, nguoi cung cap chat no cung nhung chi dan cach thuc hien cuoc tan cong tu tru so cua ong tai thi tran anjer o thung lung bekaa. hoa ky. nam 1862, trong chien dich new mexico cua noi chien hoa ky, mot luc luong thuoc phe lien minh mien nam "confederate" da tiep can phao dai valverde, cach phao dai craig sau dam ve phia bac, voi hy vong cat dut duong day lien lac cua phe lien minh mien bac "union" giua phao dai va tru so cua ho o santa fe. khoang nua dem, dai uy phe "union" james craydon da co gang cho no tung mot so don bot cua quan noi day bang cach gui nhung con la chat day cac thung thuoc sung hop nhat thang vao phong tuyen cua quan "confederate", nhung nhung con la quan doi gia nua trung thanh nay nhat quyet di nguoc tro lai trai cua quan "union" truoc khi no tung thanh tung manh. mac du thuong vong duy nhat chi la hai con la, nhung cac vu no da day dan bo va ngua cua quan "confederate" vao phong tuyen cua quan "union", tuoc di mot so quan nhu va ngua thiet yeu cua quan "confederate". trong vu danh bom wall street nam 1920, mot su co duoc cho la lien quan den cac vu danh bom cua nhung nguoi theo chu nghia vo chinh phu hoa ky nam 1919, nhung nguoi theo chu nghia vo chinh phu da su dung mot qua bom chat len xe keo ngua. quan su. trong the chien thu hai, hoa ky da dieu tra ve viec su dung "bom doi", hay doi mang bom chay co nho. trong cung cuoc chien nay, du an "pigeon" (sau nay la du an "orcon", hoac "dieu khien huu co") la mot no luc cua nha hanh vi hoc nguoi my b. f. skinner nham phat trien ten lua dan duong bang chim bo cau. du an hau nhu khong duoc tai tro va bi huy bo ngay 8 thang 10 nam 1944. ho cung da su dung bom chay van chuyen bang doi nhung phan lon deu khong hieu qua. cung thoi gian nay, lien xo cung phat trien "cho chong tang" nham khang do lai xe tang duc. du an cho chong tang hau het deu bi that bai, boi nhung con cho nay thuong xuyen bi hoang so boi tieng on va tieng sung, cong them viec chung hay chay xuong gam xe tang nga do nhung con cho nay duoc huan luyen bang xe tang diesel, trai nguoc voi cac dong xe duc chay bang xang. quan doi de quoc nhat ban cung tung su dung cho va cac loai dong vat khac deo bom de xong vao phong tuyen hoa ky trong tran iwo jima va okinawa. gan day hon, iran co mua mot so luong ca heo, mot vai trong so do la ca heo quan su xo viet truoc day, cung voi cac loai dong vat bien co vu va chim bien khac, trong mot dong thai ma mot so ben cho rang la no luc cua iran nham phat trien "ca heo kamikaze", voi muc dich tim kiem va tieu diet tau ngam va tau chien ke thu. tuy nhien, cac con vat nay hien duoc trung bay tai cong vien ca heo kish, truc thuoc dao resort kish cua iran o vinh ba tu. trong chien tranh lanh, hai quan lien xo da huan luyen ca heo de mang chat no duoi nuoc va den hieu cho tau va tau ngam tai object 825 gts o balaklava, crimea.
nghi vien scotland (tieng scotland: "pairlament o scotland"; tieng gael scotland: "parlamaid na h-alba"; tieng anh: "parliament of scotland") la co quan lap phap cua vuong quoc scotland tu the ky xiii cho den nam 1707, khi hiep uoc lien minh voi vuong quoc anh duoc ky ket. nghi vien phat trien vao dau the ky xiii tu curia regis cua cac giam muc va ba tuoc, voi nghi vien dau tien duoc xac dinh la to chuc vao nam 1235 duoi thoi tri vi cua vua alexander ii, khi no da nam giu vai tro chinh tri va tu phap. la mot the che don vien, trong phan lon thoi gian ton tai cua no, nghi vien bao gom ba dang cap giao si, quy toc va thi dan. den nhung nam 1690, no bao gom gioi quy toc, lanh dao cap quan scotland, thi dan va nhieu quan chuc nha nuoc khac nhau. nghi vien da dong y tang thue va dong mot vai tro quan trong trong viec quan ly luat phap, chinh sach doi ngoai, chien tranh va thong qua mot loat bo luat. hoat dong thue cua nghi vien cung duoc thuc hien boi cac to chuc "chi em", chang han nhu dai hoi dong hoac cong uoc ve dien trang, ca hai deu co the thuc hien nhieu cong viec do nghi vien xu ly, nhung thieu quyen luc va tham quyen toi cao cua mot co quan lap phap day du. nghi vien scotland bi hoan lai va giai tan vao nam 1707 sau khi hiep uoc lien minh giua scotland va anh duoc phe chuan. voi viec thanh lap vuong quoc dai anh vao ngay 1 thang 5 nam 1707, nghi vien cua scotland va anh da duoc ke thua boi nghi vien dai anh moi. theo dao luat lien minh 1800, nghi vien cua vuong quoc dai anh va nghi vien ireland sap nhap de tro thanh nghi vien cua quoc hoi vuong quoc lien hiep anh va bac ireland. tu lau duoc mieu ta la mot co quan co khiem khuyet ve mat hien phap va chi dong vai tro nhu mot con dau cao su cho cac quyet dinh cua hoang gia, nghien cuu hien dai da phat hien ra rang nghi vien scotland dong mot vai tro tich cuc trong cac van de cua scotland. vao the ky xv va dau the ky xvi, nghi vien la mot doi trong manh me doi voi quyen luc cua cac vi vua stewart. nghi vien cung cap loi khuyen va vien tro cho cac vi vua ke nhiem, dong thoi phan doi thanh cong cac chinh sach hoang gia khong duoc long dan.
hiep uoc lien minh (tieng anh: "treaty of union") la ten thuong duoc dat cho hiep uoc dan den viec thanh lap nha nuoc moi vuong quoc dai anh ("kingdom of great britain"), voi dieu kien vuong quoc anh (da bao gom xu wales) va vuong quoc scotland phai "thong nhat thanh mot vuong quoc mang ten dai anh". vao thoi diem do, no thuong duoc goi la dieu khoan cua lien minh. cac chi tiet cua hiep uoc da duoc thong nhat vao ngay 22 thang 7 nam 1706, va cac dao luat lien minh rieng biet sau do da duoc nghi vien cua anh va scotland thong qua de dua cac dieu khoan da thong nhat co hieu luc. lien hiep chinh tri co hieu luc vao ngay 1 thang 5 nam 1707.
guildfordia subfimbriata la mot loai oc bien da tuyet chung, thuoc ho turbinidae. 
mackay co the la:
ba tuoc spencer (tieng anh: "earl spencer") la mot tuoc hieu trong dang cap quy toc dai anh duoc lap ra vao ngay 1 thang 11 nam 1765, cung voi tuoc hieu tu tuoc althorp, cua althorp o hat northampton, trao cho john spencer, tu tuoc spencer thu nhat. ong la thanh vien cua gia toc spencer noi tieng va la chat cua cong tuoc marlborough thu nhat. truoc day, ong da duoc phong lam tu tuoc spencer, xu althorp o hat northampton, va nam tuoc spencer xu althorp, cua althorp o hat northampton, vao ngay 3 thang 4 nam 1761. ba tuoc spencer thu 6 lai duoc phong them tuoc vi tu tuoc althorp, cua great brington o hat northampton, vao ngay 19 thang 12 nam 1905 thuoc dang cap quy toc vuong quoc lien hiep anh. diana, cuu than vuong phu nhan xu wales, la con ut trong ba co con gai cua ba tuoc spencer thu 8. vi the ma vuong tu william, than vuong xu wales va vuong tu harry, cong tuoc xu sussex la chau trai cua ba tuoc spencer thu 8.
miramar co the la:
weißach la mot con song o bayern, duc. no chay vao ho tegernsee, ma lai chay ra song mangfall, gan rottach-egern.
prisogaster elevatus la mot loai oc bienthuoc ho turbinidae. mo ta. chieu dai cua vo oc co the dat den 13 mm, duong kinh la 12 mm. phan bo. loai nay phan bo o thai binh duong, ngoai khoi chile.
pomaulax spiratus la mot loai oc bien thuoc ho turbinidae.  phan bo. loai nay phan bo o vinh california, tay mexico
lunella viridicallus la mot loai oc bien thuoc ho turbinidae.  mo ta. loai nay co chieu dai cua vo dat 3,2 mm. phan bo. chung thuong xuat hien o bien do .
lunella smaragda la mot loai oc bien thuoc ho turbinidae. mo ta. loai nay co nap mang mau xanh la cay. kich thuoc vo thay doi tu 35 mm den 70 mm. phan bo. "lunella smaragda" la loai dac huu duoc tim thay o ca bo da bai trieu va bai trieu thap cung nhu cac nen dat mem (bao gom ca rong bien) cua new zealand. chung thuong duoc tim thay xung quanh cac dao bac, nam va stewart, tren cac tang da giua thuy trieu thap va trung binh.
cuoc dinh cong cua cong nhan lien bang canada nam 2023 la cuoc dinh cong cua cac cong nhan lien bang canada thuoc nghiep doan lien minh dich vu cong canada (psac). cuoc dinh cong dien ra tu ngay 19 thang 4 den ngay 3 thang 5 nam 2023, mac du cac don vi thuong luong cua hoi dong tai chinh da cham dut dinh cong vao ngay 1 thang 5. cuoc dinh cong la su kien dinh diem cua hon mot nam thuong luong tap the, sau khi thoa thuan tap the truoc do het han vao nam 2021. va nguyen nhan chinh xuat phat tu nhung bat dong giua psac va chinh phu canada (dai dien trong cuoc thuong luong cua ban thu ky hoi dong tai chinh canada) ve cac van de lien quan den lam viec tu xa, nang cao tien nghi lam viec va tang luong nham giam ganh nang lam phat. dinh cong anh huong den mot so chuong trinh lien bang, bao gom gia han ho chieu va xu ly nhap cu. no cung duoc cho la se co tac dong den van de thue, chang han nhu cham tre trong xu ly, voi thoi han nop thue khong thay doi la ngay 30 thang 4 nam 2023 (thuc te la ngay 1 thang 5 nam 2023, vi ngay 30 thang 4 la chu nhat). dau ngay 1 thang 5, psac thong bao rang cac don vi thuong luong , , va da dat duoc thoa thuan du kien ​​va cho biet nhan vien trong cac don vi nay phai quay lai lam viec luc 9 gio sang (gio et) vao ngay 1 thang 5, hoac theo lich trinh chuyen sang ngay hom sau cua ho. cong nhan tu don vi thuong luong cua lien minh nhan vien thue (ute) tiep tuc dinh cong cho den khi mot thoa thuan du kien ​​​​duoc cong bo vao ngay 3 thang 5, cham dut hoan toan cuoc dinh cong. luc do, ho duoc yeu cau tro lai lam viec truoc ngay 4 thang 5, cham nhat la 11:30 sang (gio et). boi canh. nghiep doan lien minh dich vu cong canada (psac) la cong doan khu vuc cong lon nhat o canada, dai dien cho 159.000 nhan vien dich vu cong, trong do co 120.000 nguoi thuoc hoi dong tai chinh canada va 39.000 thuoc co quan thue canada (cra) thuoc thanh phan lien minh nhan vien thue (ute) cua psac. hop dong lam viec truoc day cua cac nhan vien psac da het han vao nam 2021. ke tu thang 6 nam 2021, psac da thuong luong voi chinh phu canada de thiet lap mot hop dong moi, chu yeu nham co gang tang luong cho cong nhan de theo kip voi da tang cua lam phat, keo theo do la gia tang chi phi sinh hoat. nhan vien cra yeu cau tang luong 30% trong ba nam toi, trong khi nhung nguoi khac yeu cau tang 13,5%, tuong duong muc tang 4,5% hang nam. tuy nhien, chinh phu canada dua ra muc tang 9%, nhung psac khong chap nhan. ngoai ra, psac lien tuc keu goi mot thoa thuan lien quan den lam viec tu xa, bat chap lenh cua hoi dong tai chinh vao thang 12 nam 2022 yeu cau nguoi lao dong phai lam viec tai cac van phong chinh phu it nhat 40–60% thoi gian (trong hau het hai den ba ngay moi tuan moi truong hop). cong doan cung keu goi tang dao tao chong phan biet chung toc va tang gioi han doi voi cong viec theo hop dong. vao thang 5 nam 2022, cong doan da den gap hoi dong lao dong, va sau do cong bo mot bao cao khong mang tinh rang buoc vao thang 1 nam 2023. bao cao khuyen nghi tang cac khoan phu cap cho nhan vien va cai thien che do nghi phep gia dinh, phi bao hiem theo ca va tinh linh hoat. mot thong cao bao chi tiet lo rang chinh phu se dam phan voi psac vao thang 4. ca chinh phu canada va cong doan deu dong y rang can tang luong cho nguoi lao dong. tuy nhien, muc luong tang con phai duoc dam phan. bat chap nhung no luc de dat duoc su dong thuan, cac cuoc thao luan giua cac ben van tien trien cham. ket qua la vao ngay 22 thang 2 nam 2023, mot cuoc bo phieu dinh cong cua cac thanh vien da duoc hoi dong tai chinh cua psac to chuc. thanh phan ute cua psac da to chuc mot cuoc bo phieu dinh cong vao ngay 31 thang 1. cac don vi thuong luong cua hoi dong tai chinh bat dau dinh cong hop phap vao ngay 12 thang 4 tiep do la don vi thuong luong ute vao ngay 14 thang 4. dinh cong. ngay 7 thang 4, nhom thuong luong cra da bo phieu ung ho quan diem hop phap hoa dinh cong. ngay 12 thang 4, chu tich quoc gia cua psac, chris aylward, thong bao rang don vi thuong luong cua hoi dong tai chinh co ket qua bo phieu ap dao ung ho viec tham gia vao quan diem hop phap hoa dinh cong, do do cho phep nhom nay co thoi han 60 ngay de bat dau mot cuoc dinh cong lao dong. ngay 19 thang 4 luc 12:01 sang (gio et), cuoc dinh cong bat dau. khoang 100.000 trong so 159.000 thanh vien psac da dung viec de tham gia bieu tinh tai hang tram dia diem tren khap dat nuoc. tuy nhien, khoang 30.000–46.000 lao dong (bao gom khoang 8.600 nhan vien co quan dich vu bien gioi canada cau thanh don vi thuong luong cua psac) duoc coi la thanh phan thiet yeu (co nghia ho duoc coi la can thiet cho su an toan hoac an ninh cua cong chung hoac mot bo phan cong chung). dieu co co nghia la nhom lao dong nay khong the tham gia dinh cong va can tiep tuc lam viec, cung nhu nhung nguoi dinh cong khong the can tro nhung nguoi lao dong thiet yeu di lam. vung thu do quoc gia. o vung thu do quoc gia, cac cong nhan dinh cong da bieu tinh tai 13 dia diem bieu tinh khac nhau, bao gom phia truoc van phong thu tuong va hoi dong co mat, doi quoc hoi, van phong hoi dong tai chinh, van phong bo truong du lich, van phong bo quoc phong, van phong co quan thu nhap canada, tunney's pasture, tru so buu chinh canada, bo tai chinh, cung nhu van phong cua cac nghi si greg fergus, mona fortier, marie-france lalonde va steven mackinnon. toan quoc. cong nhan dinh cong tai nhieu dia diem khac nhau tren khap canada, bao gom cac van phong ho chieu o ontario, van phong dac xa o edmonton, van phong tai nguyen thien nhien canada o vancouver, van phong chien luoc huu tri canada o victoria, cac can cu quan su o quebec, cung nhu cac van phong dia phuong o winnipeg, new brunswick, newfoundland, nova scotia va dao hoang tu edward. dam phan. ngay 24 thang 4, mona fortier da viet mot buc thu ngo gui toi cac cong chuc va nguoi dan canada, trong do ba xac dinh bon linh vuc bat dong chinh con ton dong giua chinh phu va psac: tien luong, lam viec tu xa, hop dong gia cong phan mem va cac quy dinh ve tham nien trong truong hop bi sa thai. psac da tra loi buc thu nay bang cach nhac lai mong muon dat duoc mot "thoa thuan cong bang". ngay 26 thang 4, fortier tuyen bo rang co that vong voi nhung loi de nghi ma cac nha dam phan psac dua ra. ngay 28 thang 4, ban thu ky hoi dong tai chinh canada dua ra "de nghi toan dien duoc cap nhat cuoi cung nham giai quyet tat ca cac nhu cau con lai cua psac", ma khong tiet lo chi tiet ve loi de nghi cho cong chung. cung ngay, psac xac nhan da nhan duoc loi de nghi, nhung du kien ​​cac cuoc dam phan se tiep tuc keo dai den cuoi tuan. dau gio ngay 1 thang 5, vao khoang 1:20 sang (gio et), psac xac nhan rang ho da dat duoc thoa thuan du kien ​​​​cho cac don vi thuong luong , , va tai hoi dong tai chinh, va cac nhom nay se phai quay lai lam viec luc 9 gio sang (gio et) ngay 1 thang 5 hoac ca lam viec tiep theo theo lich trinh cua ho sau ngay do. tac dong. tac dong den cac chuong trinh, dich vu va hoat dong lien bang. trong buoi hop bao vao ngay 19 thang 4 nam 2023, cac bo truong mona fortier (chu tich hoi dong tai chinh), karina gould (bo truong gia dinh, tre em va phat trien xa hoi), diane lebouthillier (bo truong thu nhap quoc gia) va sean fraser (bo truong nhap cu, nguoi ti nan va quyen cong dan) da neu cac tac dong cua cuoc dinh cong doi voi mot so chuong trinh va hoat dong cua lien bang. trong so nhung tac dong nay co cham tre xu ly to khai thue thu nhap va don xin nhap cu, cung nhu chi cap ho chieu trong cac tinh huong nhan dao hoac khan cap. tac dong kinh te. chinh phu canada tuyen bo rang cuoc dinh cong se khong anh huong den dong nguoi va hang hoa binh thuong ra vao dat nuoc. tuy nhien, cuoc dinh cong co quy mo lon co nay cua lien bang truoc day (vao nam 1991) da gay ra cham tre trong mot so chuyen hang hoa quoc te, cung nhu gian doan cac chuyen bay va du lich quoc te. charles st-arnaud, nha kinh te truong tai trung tam alberta, suy doan rang muc do tang luong do dam phan co the khien cac cong doan khac lam theo, va dieu nay co the gay ra lam phat, boi vi viec nhieu nguoi yeu cau muc luong cao hon co the duy tri chu ky lam phat bang cach tang suc mua cua nguoi tieu dung, tu do kich thich nhu cau ve nhieu hang hoa va dich vu hon va do do gay ap luc ve gia len chi phi. vi thi truong lao dong dang bi that chat, cac cong ty tu nhan co the phai tra luong ngang bang voi linh vuc cong de ngan nhung nguoi co trien vong chuyen sang lam viec cho chinh phu. tuy nhien, bat ke luong tang nhu the nao, khu vuc tu nhan van co kha nang hap thu chi phi thay vi tang gia va ngan hang canada co kha nang kiem soat nhu cau tang tiem nang (do muc luong cao hon) bang cach tang lai suat. tu do, co the han che kha nang cua cac cong doan khac dam bao loi ich tuong duong. mo hinh tu hoi dong hoi nghi canada cho rang thu nhap ho gia dinh o vung thu do quoc gia se giam 44 trieu do la moi tuan, chiem 5% tong chi phi va tien luong o cma, vi chi phi dinh cong thap hon dang ke so voi muc luong thong thuong cua nguoi lao dong. do do, mot cuoc dinh cong keo dai se anh huong nhieu nhat den cac doanh nghiep huong toi nguoi tieu dung nhu nha hang va nha ban le. dong thoi, dinh cong cung co the co tac dong rong hon den nen kinh te canada do cac chuong trinh va dich vu cua chinh phu bi gian doan keo dai. ngoai ra, viec cong nhan dinh cong khong nhan duoc tien luong thuong xuyen (va thay vao do duoc cong doan tra) se keo giam chi tieu chinh phu (mac du co the it hon so voi muc luong bi mat), va dieu nay se tac dong tieu cuc den gdp danh nghia. phan ung. lien doan doanh nghiep doc lap canada, trong mot thong cao bao chi ngay 19 thang 4 do chu tich dan kelly soan thao, da bay to lo ngai ve tac dong cua cuoc dinh cong. ho keu goi chinh phu canada dam bao rang tat ca cac bo phan duy tri dich vu day du cho doanh nghiep nho, tiep tuc dam phan "de dam bao mot thoa thuan thuong luong tap the dai han voi chi phi phai chang duoc ky ket" va chuan bi luat ve quay lai lam viec "khi dinh cong keo dai hon". restaurants canada cung bay to lo ngai ve tac dong cua cuoc dinh cong, dac biet la doi voi nganh dich vu thuc pham va rong hon la doi voi cac doanh nghiep vua va nho. lanh dao dang ndp jagmeet singh bay to su ung ho doi voi cong nhan lien bang truoc cuoc bo phieu dinh cong. ong cung bay to rang ndp se khong ung ho bat ky dao luat quay tro lai lam viec nao do dang tu do dua ra. quan diem nay da duoc dai hoi lao dong canada chia se trong mot la thu ngay 19 thang 4, do chu tich bea bruske viet gui den mona fortier, rang ho phan doi viec lien doan doanh nghiep doc lap canada thuc day luat quay tro lai lam viec. nghi si dang bao thu stephanie kusie binh luan ve cuoc dinh cong bang cach chi trich hanh dong cua thu tuong justin trudeau ke tu khi ong nham chuc vao nam 2015, cho rang dinh cong la do lam phat, tang ngan sach dich vu cong va tang chi tieu cho tu van ben ngoai.
lunella moniliformis la mot loai oc bien thuoc ho turbinidae.  loai nay doi khi duoc xem la dong nghia cua "lunella granulata"  mo ta. chieu dai cua vo loai nay thay doi trong khoang tu 20 mm den 25 mm. phan bo. loai oc bien nay phan bo ngoai khoi viet nam . ghi chu. thong tin bo sung ve loai nay:
cookia kawauensis la mot loai oc bien da tuyet chung, thuoc ho turbinidae.  phan bo. loai nay duoc ghi nhan tung xuat hien o vung bien new zealand.
uvanilla unguis la mot loai oc bien thuoc ho turbinidae. mo ta. kich thuoc vo cua loai nay thay doi tu 20 mm den 40 mm. phan bo. loai oc bien nay nay phan bo tu vinh california, tay mexico toi panama
uvanilla olivacea la mot loai oc bien thuoc ho turbinidae.  phan bo. loai oc bien nay duoc tim thay tu la paz o vinh california ve phia nam toi oaxaca, mexico . 
 la tran dong dat xay ra vao luc 14:33 (jst), ngay 19 thang 8 nam 1961. tran dong dat co cuong do 7.0 richter, tam chan do sau khoang 10 km. hau qua tran dong dat lam 8 nguoi chet, 48 nguoi bi thuong.
 la mot doanh nghiep tu nhan so huu nhat ban, cong ty san xuat cac mat hang van phong pham. ten goi bat nguon tu mot trong nhung san pham noi danh nhat cua cong ty va la cach choi chu cua cac tu tieng anh "pen" va "pastel." pentel cung dong thoi la nha phat minh ra cong nghe but da xoa duoc. hau het cac san pham cua pentel duoc san xuat tai nhat ban, dai loan, han quoc, mexico va phap.  cong ty duoc cho la da phat minh ra but dau soi (felt-tip/fibre-tip) nam 1963.  ngay nay, pentel san xuat mot loat cac san pham bao gom dung cu viet, hoa cu va do dung van phong. lich su. cong ty duoc thanh lap vao nam 1946 voi ten goi "cong ty van phong pham nhat ban" ("nihonbungu kabushiki gaisha") tai tokyo boi yokio horie, voi muc dich san xuat but sap mau va but pastel. nhung san pham dau tien duoc ban ra thi truong vao nam 1951, tiep theo la but chi vao nam 1960. nam 1963, pentel ra mat but "sign pen", mot loai but soi fibre-tip duoc su dung boi tong thong hoa ky thoi do lyndon b. johnson, nguoi da mua mot ta but de ky ten tren cac buc anh, ngoai viec duoc chon lam dung cu viet chinh thuc cua nasa va duoc mang len khong gian trong nhiem vu gemini nam 1966. nhu cau doi voi but "sign pen" lon toi noi cac nha may tai tokyo khong the cung cap du cac don hang. but "sign pen" la mot trong nhung san pham thanh cong nhat cua pentel voi hon hai ty don vi duoc ban ra. nam 1971, cong ty doi ten thanh "cong ty pentel co. ltd." va mot nam sau, ho ra mat but bi muc nuoc mau xanh la cay. horie tiep tuc giu chuc vu chu tich cong ty cho den khi ong ta the nam 2010. vao thap ky 2010, pentel ra mat "but long pocket", mot loai but fudepen su dung hop tiep muc cartridge khong tham nuoc co the thay the, tuong tu nhu but may (khac voi but co thong thuong, ma chung giong nhu but da.) but co (duoc thiet ke, khuyen dung cho thu phap) cung tro nen pho bien trong so cac hoa si truyen tranh, duoc ua chuong dung vao cac tac pham cua ho thay vi but nhung hoac but co truyen thong. mot trong nhung nghe si su dung but pentel nay la neal adams. cac san pham. van phong pham. cac dong san pham bao gom "sharp kerry", "feel-it", "'sharp p200 series", "graph 1000", "graphgear" ("500, 800 va 1000"), "graphlet", "sharplet", "smash", "stein", "orenz", "orenznero" (but chi co hoac "sharps"); "ain" va "hi-polymer" (ngoi but chi kim, gom tay); "energel" (but muc gel); "vicuna" (but bi muc hybrid); "pentel pen" (but da vinh vien), va "sign pen" (but da ngoi manh). mot loat cac san pham duoc san xuat boi pentel bao gom: cac san pham khac. cac san pham thiet bi dien tu va thiet bi san xuat do pentel san xuat ben canh van phong pham:
day la danh sach cac bieu tuong cam xuc thuong xuyen duoc su dung hoac nhung mieu ta bang van ban ve tam trang hoac net mat cua nguoi viet duoi dang bieu tuong . ban dau, cac bieu tuong nay bao gom nghe thuat ascii, va sau do la nghe thuat shift jis cung voi nghe thuat unicode. trong thoi gian gan day, cac bieu tuong do hoa, ca tinh va ca dong, da gia nhap cung cac bieu tuong cam xuc dua tren van ban truyen thong; chung thuong duoc goi la cac "emoji". bieu tuong cam xuc (emoticons) thuong duoc chia thanh ba nhom chinh: phong cach phuong tay (chu yeu tu my va chau au) hoac doc theo chieu ngang (mac du khong phai tat ca deu o dang ngang); phong cach phuong dong hoac doc theo chieu doc (chu yeu tu khu vuc dong a); va phong cach 2channel (ban dau duoc su dung tren 2channel va cac dien dan tin nhan khac tai nhat ban). cach giai thich pho bien nhat cho nhung phong cach khac nhau nay la tai phuong dong, doi mat dong vai tro chinh trong bieu hien khuon mat, trong khi tai phuong tay, ca khuon mat thuong duoc su dung. phuong tay. cac bieu tuong cam xuc kieu phuong tay hau het duoc viet theo chieu tu trai sang phai nhu the chiec dau duoc quay nguoc chieu kim dong ho 90 do. nguoi ta thuong se nhin thay mat o ben trai ngoai cung, tiep theo la mui (thuong khong duoc bao gom) va sau do la mieng. thong thuong, dau hai cham duoc su dung lam mat cua khuon mat, tru phi nhay mat ma trong truong hop do, dau cham phay duoc su dung. tuy nhien, dau bang, so 8, hoac chu cai in hoa b cung duoc su dung de bieu thi con mat binh thuong, mat mo rong hoac nhung nguoi deo kinh. cac bieu tuong cho mieng khac nhau, vi du: ")" cho khuon mat cuoi hoac "(" cho khuon mat buon. nguoi ta cung co the them "}" sau ky tu mieng de bieu thi bo rau. phuong dong. cac bieu tuong cam xuc phuong dong thuong khong duoc xoay theo chieu ngang va co the bao gom cac ky tu phi latinh de tang them do phuc tap. nhung bieu tuong cam xuc nay lan dau tien xuat hien tai nhat ban, noi chung duoc goi la cac "kaomoji" (nghia den la "ky tu khuon mat"). hinh thuc co ban bao gom mot chuoi dau ngoac tron mo, ky tu cho mat trai, ky tu cho mieng hoac mui, ky tu cho mat phai va dau ngoac tron dong. cac dau ngoac don thuong duoc bo qua doi voi kaomoji noi tieng thong dung. phan mieng/mui cung co the bi luoc bo neu nhu doi mat dong vai tro quan trong hon nhieu. hau het cac ky tu dong a thuong duoc viet trong mot hinh vuong vo hinh voi chieu rong co dinh. mac du cung co lich su ve cac ky tu ban giac, nhung nhieu phong chu nhat ban, han quoc va trung quoc bao gom cac the co do rong toan giac cho cac chu cai trong bang ky tu la ma co ban, bao gom ca cac chu so va dau cau nhu trong ascii hoa ky. cac dang the co chieu rong co dinh nay cung co san o dang unicode. chu yeu tuy thuoc vao che do nhap co san, kaomoji co the su dung cac loai ky tu phuong tay nay, nhung hau nhu khong bao gio dua vao bat ky chieu rong cu the nao de co the nhan biet duoc. bieu tuong cam xuc 2channel. mot so bieu tuong cam xuc phuong dong ban dau duoc phat trien tren trang thao luan cua dien dan 2channel nhat ban. mot vai trong so nay co do rong lon hon (duoc tao thanh tu nhieu ky tu) hon "kaomoji" thong thuong hoac trai dai tren nhieu dong van ban. nhieu nguoi su dung cac ky tu tu cac bo ky tu khac ngoai tieng nhat va tieng latin. ky tu unicode. co nhieu bieu tuong cam xuc duoc bao gom san duoi dang cac ky tu trong bang ma unicode tieu chuan, trong bang ma cac "bieu tuong linh tinh", bang cac "bieu tuong cam xuc", va bang "ky hieu va chu tuong hinh bo sung".
dayanand chandrashekhar shetty (sinh ngay 11 thang 12 nam 1969 tai karnataka, an do) la mot nam dien vien, nguoi mau, doanh nhan va nguoi dan chuong trinh nguoi an do. ong duoc biet den qua vai dien thanh tra daya trong loat phim truyen hinh "doi dac nhiem cid". ong duoc gioi thieu vao dai sanh danh vong cua giai vang vao nam 2018. tieu su va su nghiep. dayanand shetty sinh ngay 11 thang 12 nam 1969 trong mot gia dinh thuoc cong dong bunt noi tieng tulu tai shirva, huyen udupi bang mysuru (nay la karnataka, an do). ong tung la mot van dong vien the thao truoc khi chuyen sang lam dien vien do gap chan thuong o chan. ong tung la mot van dong vien nem dia, mon the thao nay da giup ong gianh duoc nhieu giai thuong trong su nghiep. nam 1996, ong gianh chuc vo dich nem dia tai giai dau o bang maharastra. ong da tung dong nhieu bo phim quang cao va tung nhan giai thuong voi tu cach la mot dien vien kich. ong da gianh giai thuong "nam dien vien xuat sac nhat" voi vai dien cho vo kich bang tieng tulu mang ten "secret". nam 1998, ong duoc khan gia biet den qua vai dien "thanh tra daya" trong "doi dac nhiem cid". trong bo phim, ong cung voi shivaji satam va aditya srivastava la bo ba dien vien chinh. ong cung viet kich ban cho mot so tap cua bo phim. ong cung dong mot so bo phim quang cao, phim dien anh va phim truyen hinh dai tap. ong cung tung nhan giai thuong "best looking guys" (tam dich la: "chang trai dep nhat man anh") vao nam 2002. ong cung tham gia "jhalak dikhhla jaa" (mua 4 nam 2010), mot chuong trinh truyen hinh thuc te ve khieu vu o an do. ong tung tham gia mua 5 cua chuong trinh "", mot chuong trinh truyen hinh thuc te ve linh vuc xay dung o an do, va da thuc hien nhieu tinh huong nguy hiem, tuy nhien ong bi loai va xep thu 13 chung cuoc. ong va shivaji satam tung xuat hien voi tu cach khach moi trong chuong trinh "sa re ga ma pa l'il champs" (phat song nhan dip ky niem 64 nam ngay quoc khanh an do vao nam 2011). nam 2014, ong cung voi shivaji satam, aditya srivastava va narendra gupta da tung tham gia chuong trinh "kaun banega crorepati" (ai la trieu phu phien ban tieng hindi). ong tung nhan giai "nam dien vien phu xuat sac nhat" tai giai vang 2012. doi tu. ong tung ket hon voi smitha shetty va ca hai nguoi da co mot co con gai ten la viva shetty.
bang e cua vong loai giai vo dich bong da chau au 2024 la mot trong 10 bang de quyet dinh doi se vuot qua vong loai cho vong chung ket giai vo dich bong da chau au 2024 dien ra tai duc. bang e bao gom 5 doi: , , , va . cac doi tuyen se thi dau voi nhau moi tran khac tren san nha va san khach voi the thuc dau vong tron. hai doi tuyen dung nhat va nhi bang se vuot qua vong loai truc tiep cho tran chung ket. cac doi tham gia vong play-off se duoc quyet dinh dua tren thanh tich cua ho trong uefa nations league 2022–23. cac tran dau. lich thi dau da duoc xac nhan boi uefa vao ngay 10 thang 10 nam 2022, sau le boc tham mot ngay. thoi gian la cet/cest, nhu duoc liet ke boi uefa (gio dia phuong, neu khac nhau, nam trong dau ngoac don). ky luat. mot cau thu se bi dinh chi tu dong trong tran dau tiep theo cho cac hanh vi pham loi sau day:
dong dat paphos 2022 la tran dong dat xay ra vao luc 3:07 (), ngay 11 thang 1 nam 2022. tran dong dat co cuong do 6.6 richter, tam chan do sau khoang 21 km. dong dat da tao ra song than nho khoang 10 cm. hau qua tran dong dat da lam 3 nguoi chet, 1 nguoi bi thuong.
dong dat thanh hai 2022 () la tran dong dat xay ra vao luc 1:45 (), ngay 8 thang 1 nam 2022. tran dong dat co cuong do 6.6 richter, tam chan do sau khoang 13 km. hau qua tran dong dat da lam 9 nguoi bi thuong.
chien tranh ba lan–ukraina, dien ra tu thang 11 nam 1918 den thang 7 nam 1919, la cuoc xung dot giua cong hoa ba lan thu hai va cac luc luong ukraina (ca cong hoa nhan dan tay ukraina va cong hoa nhan dan ukraina). xung dot bat nguon tu su khac biet ve sac toc, van hoa va chinh tri giua cac cu dan nguoi ba lan va nguoi ukraina song trong khu vuc, trong khi ba lan va ca hai nuoc cong hoa ukraina deu la quoc gia ke thua cua cac de quoc nga va ao da bi giai the. chien tranh bat dau tai dong galicia sau khi de quoc ao-hung tan ra, va lan sang cac vung tung thuoc de quoc nga la kholm (chełm) va volyn (wołyń). ba lan tai chiem lanh tho tranh chap vao ngay 18 thang 7 nam 1919. boi canh. nguon goc cua xung dot nam o tinh hinh dan toc phuc tap tai galicia vao dau the ky 20. do nha habsburg khoan dung tuong doi voi cac dan toc thieu so, ao-hung la nen tang hoan hao cho su phat trien cua ca cac phong trao dan toc ba lan va ukraina. trong cach mang 1848, ao lo ngai truoc cac yeu cau cua nguoi ba lan ve quyen tu tri lon hon trong tinh, nen ho ung ho mot nhom nho nguoi ruthenia, la ten goi cua nhung nguoi dong slav sau nay chap nhan ten la "nguoi ukraina" hoac "nguoi rusyn"; muc tieu cua nguoi ruthenia la duoc cong nhan la mot dan toc rieng biet. cac truong day tieng ruthenia duoc thanh lap, cac dang chinh tri ruthenia duoc thanh lap va bat dau co nhung no luc de phat trien van hoa dan toc cua ho. dieu nay gay ngac nhien cho mot so nguoi ba lan, vi cho den truoc cuoc cach mang ho cung voi hau het nhung nguoi ruthenia co y thuc chinh tri cho rang nguoi ruthenia la mot phan cua "dan toc ba lan", luc do duoc dinh nghia theo thuat ngu chinh tri thay vi dan toc hoc. vao cuoi thap nien 1890 va nhung thap ky dau tien cua the ky 20, gioi tri thuc dan tuy ruthenia su dung thuat ngu nguoi ukraina de mo ta dan toc cua ho. ho no luc quang ba van hoa dan toc, bao gom cac no luc huong toi tieu chuan hoa ngon ngu ukraina, dong thoi thanh lap va ho tro cac to chuc van hoa ukraina nhu hiep hoi khoa hoc, nha hat va bao tang dan toc tai lviv; bat dau tu dau the ky 20, y thuc dan toc phat trien trong cong dong dan cu ruthenia, luc nay ho chu yeu la nguoi dan nong thon. nhieu su co giua hai dan toc xay ra trong suot cuoi the ky 19 va dau the ky 20. chang han nhu gioi cam quyen ba lan phan doi nguoi ukraina trong cuoc bau cu nghi vien nam 1897. mot cuoc xung dot khac phat trien vao nam 1901 den nam 1908 xung quanh dai hoc lviv vi sinh vien ukraina yeu cau mot truong dai hoc ukraina rieng biet, nhung sinh vien va giang vien ba lan co gang dan ap phong trao. den nam 1903, ca nguoi ba lan va nguoi ukraina deu to chuc cac hoi nghi rieng biet tai lviv: nguoi ba lan vao thang 5 va nguoi ukraina vao thang 8. sau do, hai phong trao dan toc phat trien voi muc tieu trai nguoc nhau, la nguyen nhan dan den xung dot sau nay. thanh phan dan toc cua galicia la nguyen nhan dan den xung dot giua nguoi ba lan va nguoi ukraina tai day. tinh galicia cua ao bao gom lanh tho tinh ruthenia la mot phan cua ba lantu nam 1434, va bi ao chiem giu vao nam 1772 trong phan chia ba lan lan dau tien. vung dat nay bao gom lanh tho co tam quan trong lich su doi voi ba lan, bao gom co do krakow, va co phan lon dan so la nguoi ba lan, nhung dong galicia bao gom vung trung tam cua lanh tho lich su galicia-volyn va co nguoi ukraina chiem da so. o mien dong galicia, nguoi ukraina chiem khoang 65% dan so va nguoi ba lan chi chiem 22% dan so. trong so 44 don vi hanh chinh cua mien dong galicia thuoc ao, lviv (, ) la thanh pho lon nhat va la thu phu tinh, cung la noi duy nhat ma nguoi ba lan chiem da so dan so. o lviv, dan so nam 1910 co xap xi 60% la nguoi ba lan va 17% la nguoi ukraina. nguoi ba lan nhin nhan lviv la mot trong nhung thu do van hoa cua ba lan va viec khong kiem soat duoc thanh pho la dieu khong the tuong tuong duoc doi voi ho. su phan chia ton giao va sac toc tuong ung voi phan tang xa hoi. tang lop xa hoi hang dau cua galicia la quy toc ba lan hoac hau due cua dong doi quy toc rus' da bi ba lan hoa trong qua khu, nhung o mien dong cua tinh, nguoi ruthenia (nguoi ukraina) chiem da so nong dan. nguoi ba lan va nguoi do thai kiem soat phan lon qua trinh phat trien thuong mai va cong nghiep tai galicia vao cuoi the ky 19. trong suot the ky 19 va dau the ky 20, nguoi ukraina dia phuong co gang thuyet phuc ao chia galicia thanh cac tinh mien tay (nguoi ba lan) va mien dong (nguoi ukraina). nguoi ba lan dia phuong phan doi va can tro cac no luc nay, ho lo so mat quyen kiem soat lviv va dong galicia. ao cuoi cung dong y tren nguyen tac ve viec chia tach tinh galicia. vao thang 10 nam 1916, hoang de karl i hua se lam nhu vay sau khi chien tranh ket thuc. khuc dao dau. do su can thiep cua dai cong tuoc wilhelm cua ao, mot nguoi mang ban sac ukraina va tu coi minh la mot nguoi ukraina ai quoc, vao thang 10 nam 1918, hai trung doan chu yeu la binh si ukraina dong quan tai lemberg (lviv hien dai). khi chinh phu ao-hung sup do, vao ngay 18 thang 10 nam 1918, hoi dong quoc gia ukraina ("rada") duoc thanh lap, bao gom cac thanh vien nguoi ukraina trong quoc hoi ao va cac hoi dong lap phap khu vuc galicia va bukovina, cung nhu cac nha lanh dao cua cac dang chinh tri ukraina. hoi dong cong bo y dinh thong nhat cac vung dat tay ukraina thanh mot quoc gia duy nhat. khi nguoi ba lan dang tien hanh cac buoc di nham tiep quan lviv va dong galicia, dai uy dmytro vitovsky cua quan sung truong sich dan dau nhom si quan tre ukraina thuc hien mot hanh dong quyet dinh va trong dem 31 thang 10 – ngay 1 thang 11, cac don vi quan doi ukraina, bao gom 1.400 binh si va 60 si quan, nam quyen kiem soat lviv. cong hoa nhan dan tay ukraina duoc tuyen bo thanh lap vao ngay 13 thang 11 nam 1918, voi thu do la lviv. thoi diem tuyen bo thanh lap nen cong hoa da khien nguoi dan va gioi cam quyen dan toc ba lan bat ngo. nuoc cong hoa ukraina moi tuyen bo chu quyen doi voi dong galicia, bao gom day nui karpat cho den thanh pho nowy sącz o phia tay, cung nhu volyn, ruthenia karpat va bukovina (hai lanh tho cuoi cung lan luot duoc hungary va romania yeu sach chu quyen). mac du phan lon dan so cua cong hoa nhan dan tay ukraina la nguoi ukraina, nhung nhieu khu dan cu do thi co da so la nguoi ba lan. tai lviv, cu dan ukraina nhiet tinh ung ho tuyen bo nay. cong dong thieu so do thai dang ke cua thanh pho chap nhan hoac giu thai do trung lap doi voi tuyen bo cua nguoi ukraina, trong khi nguoi ba lan chiem da so cua thanh pho bi soc khi thay minh o trong mot nha nuoc ukraina duoc tuyen bo thanh lap. do cong hoa nhan dan tay ukraina chua duoc quoc te cong nhan va ranh gioi cua ba lan van chua duoc xac dinh, nen van de quyen so huu lanh tho tranh chap duoc giam xuong thanh mot van de kiem soat quan su. chien tranh. giai doan dau. giao tranh giua cac luc luong ukraina va ba lan tap trung xung quanh lviv duoc tay ukraina tuyen bo la thu do, va cac tuyen duong tiep can thanh pho nay. tai lviv, quan ukraina gap chong doi tu cac don vi tu ve dia phuong, chung duoc thanh lap chu yeu tu cac cuu chien binh trong the chien, sinh vien va tre em. tuy nhien, kha nang chi huy kheo leo, chien thuat tot va tinh than cao khien nguoi ba lan co the chong lai cac cuoc tan cong duoc len ke hoach kem cua nguoi ukraina. ngoai ra, nguoi ba lan con co the kheo leo cau gio va cho doi quan tiep vien thong qua viec thoa thuan ngung ban voi nguoi ukraina. trong khi nguoi ba lan co the trong cay vao nen tang ung ho rong rai tu dan chung thanh pho, thi phia ukraina chu yeu phu thuoc vao giup do tu ben ngoai thanh pho. cac cuoc noi day khac chong lai quyen cai tri cua tay ukraina no ra tai drohobych, przemyśl, sambir va jarosław. tai przemyśl, binh si ukraina dia phuong nhanh chong giai tan ve nha cua ho va nguoi ba lan chiem giu cac cay cau bac qua song san va tuyen duong sat den lviv, tao dieu kien cho luc luong ba lan tai thanh pho nay co duoc tiep vien dang ke. sau hai tuan giao tranh ac liet tai lviv, mot don vi vu trang duoi quyen chi huy cua trung ta michał karaszewicz-tokarzewski cua luc quan ba lan moi thanh lap da vuot qua vong vay cua ukraina vao ngay 21 thang 11 va den thanh pho. nguoi ukraina da bi day lui. ngay sau khi ba lan chiem duoc thanh pho, mot so dan quan do thai dia phuong tan cong cac binh si ba lan, dong thoi mot so thanh phan cua luc luong ba lan cung nhu toi pham thong thuong tien hanh cuop pha cac khu do thai va ukraina trong thanh pho, giet chet khoang 340 thuong dan. nguoi ba lan cung giam giu mot luong lon cac nha hoat dong ukraina trong trai giam. chinh phu ukraina cung cap ho tro tai chinh cho cac nan nhan do thai trong bao luc va co the chieu mo mot tieu doan do thai vao quan doi cua ho. mot so phe phai do loi nhung hanh dong tan bao nay cho lam quan cua tuong haller. dieu nay kho xay ra vi luc luong chien dau do phap huan luyen va ho tro nay da khong roi phap va mat tran phia tay cho den thang 4 nam 1919, sau khi cuoc bao loan xay ra. vao ngay 9 thang 11, quan ba lan co gang bat ngo chiem giu cac mo dau drohobych, nhung do quan ukraina dong hon nen ho bi danh lui. nguoi ukraina giu quyen kiem soat cac mo dau cho den thang 5 nam 1919. vao ngay 6 thang 11, mot chinh the ukraina moi duoc thanh lap tai nua phia bac cua vung bukovina: bukovina thuoc ukraina duoi quyen tong thong . nha nuoc moi co thu do tai chernivtsi. no bi giai the vao ngay 11 thang 11, khi luc quan romania chiem linh chernivtsi. chinh quyen ukraina va nhung ho tro quan su cua ho rut khoi thanh pho mot ngay truoc do. den cuoi thang 11 nam 1918, luc luong ba lan kiem soat lviv va tuyen duong sat noi lviv voi mien trung ba lan qua przemyśl, trong khi nguoi ukraina kiem soat phan con lai cua dong galicia ve phia dong song san, bao gom cac khu vuc phia nam va phia bac cua tuyen duong sat vao lviv. do do, thanh pho lviv (lwow) do ba lan kiem soat phai doi mat voi quan ukraina o ba phia. chien dau tai volyn. ngay sau khi ao-hung sup do, quan ba lan da chiem duoc khu vuc kholm (tieng ba lan: "chełm"); ngay sau do cac chi huy cua ao tai mien tay nam volyn (volodymyr-volynskyi va kovel) ban giao chinh quyen cho cac uy ban dan toc ba lan dia phuong. vao thang 11 den thang 12 nam 1918, nguoi ba lan cung tien vao podlachia va tay polesia, nhung bi quan cua tuong m. osetsky chan lai tai tay volyn. khi cac don vi ba lan co gang gianh quyen kiem soat khu vuc, quan cua cong hoa nhan dan ukraina duoi quyen chi huy cua symon petliura co gang gianh lai lanh tho cua tinh kholm da bi quan ba lan kiem soat truoc do. theo richard pipes, pogrom lon dau tien trong vung nay dien ra vao thang 1 nam 1919 tai thi tran ovruch, noi cac trung doan kozyr-zyrka lien ket voi chinh phu cua symon petliura cuop boc va giet hai nguoi do thai. nicolas werth tuyen bo rang cac don vi vu trang cua cong hoa nhan dan ukraina cung phai chiu trach nhiem ve cac vu ham hiep, cuop boc va tham sat tai zhytomir, trong do 500–700 nguoi do thai thiet mang. sau hai thang giao tranh ac liet, xung dot da duoc giai quyet vao thang 3 nam 1919 do cac don vi quan doi ba lan moi va duoc trang bi tot duoi quyen chi huy cua tuong edward rydz-śmigły. be tac tai dong galicia. nho huy dong nhanh chong va hieu qua nen den thang 12 nam 1918, quan ukraina chiem uu the lon ve quan so cho den thang 2 nam 1919, va day quan ba lan vao the phong thu. theo mot bao cao cua my trong khoang thoi gian tu ngay 13 thang 1 den ngay 1 thang 2 nam 1919, quan ukraina cuoi cung da bao vay duoc lviv tu ba phia. nguoi dan thanh pho bi thieu nuoc va dien. quan doi ukraina cung tran giu cac ngoi lang o hai ben tuyen duong sat dan den przemyśl. quan ukraina tiep tuc kiem soat phan lon mien dong galicia va la moi de doa doi voi thanh pho lviv cho den thang 5 nam 1919. trong thoi gian nay, theo bao cao cua y va ba lan, quan ukraina co tinh than cao (mot nha quan sat nguoi y dung sau phong tuyen galicia noi rang quan ukraina dang chien dau voi "long dung cam cua nhung ke cam chiu") trong khi nhieu binh si ba lan, dac biet la tu ba lan lap hien, muon tro ve nha vi ho khong thay co ly do gi de chien dau chong lai nguoi ruthenia tren vung dat cua nguoi ruthenia; quan so ba lan bi ap dao boi luong dich gap doi va bi thieu dan duoc. mac du ban dau bi ap dao ve so luong nhung quan ba lan co nhung loi the nhat dinh. luc luong cua ho co nhieu si quan hon va duoc dao tao tot hon, ket qua la mot luc luong co ky luat tot hon va co dong hon; nguoi ba lan cung co duoc tinh bao xuat sac va nho kiem soat duoc cac tuyen duong sat phia sau phong tuyen cua minh nen ho co the di chuyen binh si kha nhanh chong. ket qua la, mac du quan ba lan co tong quan so it hon quan ukraina, nhung trong nhung tran chien dac biet quan trong, ho co the dieu dong nhieu binh si tuong duong phia ukraina. vao ngay 9 thang 12 nam 1918, quan ukraina choc thung tuyen phong thu ben ngoai przemyśl voi hy vong chiem duoc thanh pho va do do cat dut lviv do ba lan kiem soat khoi mien trung ba lan. tuy nhien, nguoi ba lan nhanh chong gui quan tiep vien va den ngay 17 thang 12, quan ukraina buoc phai rut lui. vao ngay 27 thang 12, co ho tro tu quan nong dan duoc gui tu dong ukraina den galicia voi hy vong rang nguoi tay ukraina co the thanh lap mot luc luong co ky luat tu ho, mot cuoc tong tan cong cua ukraina chong lai lviv da bat dau. luc luong phong thu cua lviv duoc giu vung va quan doi mien dong ukraina noi loan. tu ngay 6 thang 1 den ngay 11 thang 1 nam 1919, mot cuoc tan cong cua ba lan gom 5.000 tan binh duoc tuyen mo tu khu vuc ba lan thuoc nga truoc day do jan romer chi huy da bi day lui truoc quan tay ukraina gan rava-ruska, phia bac lviv. chi mot so it quan cung voi romer co the dot pha duoc den lviv sau khi chiu ton that nang ne. trong khoang thoi gian tu ngay 11 thang 1 den ngay 13 thang 1, quan ba lan co gang danh bat quan ukraina dang bao vay lviv tu phia nam, trong khi cung luc do quan doi ukraina co gang thuc hien mot cuoc tong tan cong khac vao lviv. ca hai no luc tren deu that bai. vao thang 2 nam 1919, quan ba lan co gang chiem sambir nhung
