chung duoc su dung lam nguon cam hung cho nganh nhiep anh boi akira gomi. chung cung duoc su dung trong thoi trang duong pho nhat ban nhu "kogal" va "fairy kei". hoa ky. tai hoa ky, tat long tro nen thinh hanh luc noi luc chim ke tu nhung nam 1980.. ke tu khoang 1984 cho toi 1997, tat long la mot phu trang thinh hanh cho tre em, thanh thieu nien va nguoi lon bat ke gioi tinh. hai thuong hiep noi tieng nhat la wigwam va e.g. smith. nhieu phu nu va co gai mac tat long mau den, xanh la chanh, xanh duong hoac leggings cac mau khac cung tat long trang, giay the thao sneaker va ao thun hoac ao ni qua kho nhu trang phuc thuong ngay hoac trang phuc tap the duc. cac mau sac khac nhu vang pastel, xanh duong hoac hong nhat cung den, do, tim va xanh luc neon cung duoc pho bien. nhieu co gai, thanh thieu nien, sinh vien va phu nu mac vo long thuong la mac qua leggings hoac doi khi la quan ni, thuong di cung giay keds va ao thun qua kho, ao ni va ao len, doi khi kem theo co lo duoi ao ni (pho bien), hoac ao len. hoac la mac tat long cung voi vay babydoll, vay truot van hoac quan dui bermuda cung tat long trang wigwam don tren quan bo den kem voi giay keds. ngoai ra, tat long cung duoc mac cung voi quan jeans hoac quan lung duoc cuon hoac gap lai, de lo phan tat hoac mac qua quan jeans cap cheo. giay thuyen va giay sneaker the thao da nang cung duoc mac cung tat long. nhieu phu nu, sinh vien, thanh thieu nien va tre em mac tat long lam mot phan cua trang phuc tap aerobic hoac mac len leggings the thao vao thoi tiet lanh de chay va tap cac mon the thao khac. cac co vu vien cheerleader cung mac tat long cung voi giay keds lam mot phan dong phuc cua ho tu dau den giua nhung nam 1990 cho den khi tat long bat dau duoc thay the bang tat co thap crew hoac tat co chan vao cuoi thap nien 1990. nhung hoc sinh mac dong phuc hoc duong cung mac tat long cung voi vay, quan dui, quan dai va giay thuyen hoac giay luoi. thong thuong la mau trang hoac mau theo truong hoc. cac nam sinh, thanh thieu nien, sinh vien va nam gioi mac tat long cung giay thuyen, giay sneaker the thao vai sperry trang va giay the thao da nang khac voi quan jeans hoac quan lung duoc cuon hoac gap lai de lo tat ra, voi quan dui thong thuong hoac quan ngan dao pho, quan ni hoac mac qua leggings the thao trong thoi tiet lanh de chay duong dai va cac mon the thao khac.
bang b cua vong loai giai vo dich bong da chau au 2024 la mot trong 10 bang de quyet dinh doi se vuot qua vong loai cho vong chung ket giai vo dich bong da chau au 2024 dien ra tai duc. bang b bao gom 5 doi: , , , va . cac doi tuyen se thi dau voi nhau moi tran khac tren san nha va san khach voi the thuc dau vong tron. hai doi tuyen dung nhat va nhi bang se vuot qua vong loai truc tiep cho tran chung ket. cac doi tham gia vong play-off se duoc quyet dinh dua tren thanh tich cua ho trong uefa nations league 2022–23. cac tran dau. lich thi dau da duoc xac nhan boi uefa vao ngay 10 thang 10 nam 2022, sau le boc tham mot ngay. thoi gian la cet/cest, nhu duoc liet ke boi uefa (gio dia phuong, neu khac nhau, nam trong dau ngoac don). ky luat. mot cau thu se bi dinh chi tu dong trong tran dau tiep theo cho cac hanh vi pham loi sau day: cac dinh chi sau day se duoc thuc hien xuyen suot cac tran dau vong loai:
bang a cua vong loai giai vo dich bong da chau au 2024 la mot trong 10 bang de quyet dinh doi se vuot qua vong loai cho vong chung ket giai vo dich bong da chau au 2024 dien ra tai duc. bang a bao gom 5 doi: , , , va . cac doi tuyen se thi dau voi nhau moi tran khac tren san nha va san khach voi the thuc dau vong tron. hai doi tuyen dung nhat va nhi bang se vuot qua vong loai truc tiep cho tran chung ket. cac doi tham gia vong play-off se duoc quyet dinh dua tren thanh tich cua ho trong uefa nations league 2022–23. cac tran dau. lich thi dau da duoc xac nhan boi uefa vao ngay 10 thang 10 nam 2022, sau le boc tham mot ngay. thoi gian la cet/cest, nhu duoc liet ke boi uefa (gio dia phuong, neu khac nhau, nam trong dau ngoac don). ky luat. mot cau thu se bi dinh chi tu dong trong tran dau tiep theo cho cac hanh vi pham loi sau day: cac dinh chi sau day se duoc thuc hien xuyen suot cac tran dau vong loai:
ngoc oanh ten day du la nguyen ngoc oanh (sinh nam 1988 tai thai nguyen) la mot sieu mau nguoi viet nam. co doat giai bac sieu mau viet nam 2011 va giai ba sieu mau quoc te nam 2012.
cuoc bau cu tong thong hoa ky nam 1896 la cuoc bau cu tong thong bon nam mot lan lan thu 28, duoc to chuc vao thu ba, ngay 3 thang 11 nam 1896. cuu thong doc william mckinley, ung cu vien cua dang cong hoa, da danh bai cuu dan bieu william jennings bryan, ung cu vien cua dang dan chu. chien dich tranh cu nam 1896, dien ra trong thoi ky suy thoai kinh te sau hoang loan 1893, la mot cuoc bau cu tai dinh hinh he thong chinh tri hoa ky, cham dut he thong dang phai thu ba va danh dau khoi dau cua he thong dang phai thu tu. tong thong duong nhiem cua dang dan chu grover cleveland da tuyen bo se khong tham gia tranh cu nhiem ky thu 2 lien tiep (va la nhiem ky thu 3 cua ong), bo ngo chien dich tranh cu lan 4. sau do, voi tu cach la mot luat su va cuu dan bieu, bryan da khoi day su ung ho cua dang bang bai phat bieu thap gia vang, keu goi cai cach he thong tien te va coi cac lanh dao doanh nghiep la nguyen nhan gay ra tinh trang suy thoai kinh te dang dien ra. dai hoi toan quoc dang dan chu nam 1896 da quay lung voi chinh quyen cua cleveland va de cu bryan trong lan bo phieu thu 5. bryan sau do con gianh duoc de cu cua dang dan tuy, dang da thang mot so bang vao nam 1892 va co nhieu diem chung trong chinh sach voi bryan. trai nguoc voi bryan, mot so dang vien dang dan chu bourbon bao thu da thanh lap dang dan chu quoc gia va de cu thuong nghi si john m. palmer. ve phia dang cong hoa, ngay tu dau, mckinley da chiem uu the voi cach biet lon tai dai hoi toan quoc dang cong hoa nam 1896. ke tu khi hoang loan 1893 xay ra, dat nuoc da sa lay vao tinh trang suy thoai kinh te, duoc ghi dau boi gia ca thap, loi nhuan thap, ty le that nghiep cao va nhieu cuoc dinh cong day bao luc. cac van de kinh te, dac biet la chinh sach thue quan va cau hoi lieu che do ban vi vang co nen duoc duy tri de cung ung tien hay khong, la nhung van de trong tam. mckinley da tao dung mot lien minh bao thu voi cac doanh nhan, chuyen gia, nong dan giau co va cong nhan nha may lanh nghe phan doi cac chinh sach nong nghiep cua bryan. ong manh nhat o cac vung thanh thi va vung dong bac, thuong trung tay va bo tay hoa ky. quan ly chien dich tranh cu cua dang cong hoa, mark hanna, da tien phong trong nhieu ky thuat tranh cu hien dai, duoc ho tro boi ngan sach 3,5 trieu do la. bryan coi chien dich cua minh la mot cuoc "thap tu chinh" cua nguoi lao dong chong lai nhung nguoi giau co, nhung nguoi da lam ngheo nuoc my bang cach han che nguon cung tien. ong noi, bac co nguon cung doi dao va neu duc thanh tien se khoi phuc lai su thinh vuong dong thoi lam suy yeu quyen luc cua cac quy tin thac tien te. bryan manh nhat o cac bang mien nam, vung nong thon trung tay va day nui rocky. nhung loi hung bien ve dao duc va chien dich chong lam phat cua ong (ung ho ban vi luong kim) da khien nhung nguoi bao thu phan doi gay gat. bryan van dong manh me khap cac bang dao dong o trung tay, trong khi mckinley tien hanh chien dich "truoc hien nha". cuoc bau cu day cang thang ket thuc khi mckinley gianh duoc da so phieu pho thong va phieu dai cu tri. bryan gianh duoc 46,7% so phieu pho thong va palmer gianh duoc duoi 1%. ty le cu tri di bo phieu rat cao, hon 90% so cu tri du dieu kien o nhieu bang. viec dang dan chu cach mat phe bourbon da mang lai cho bryan va nhung nguoi ung ho ong quyen kiem soat dang cho den nhung nam 1920, dong thoi tao tien de cho su thong tri cua dang cong hoa trong he thong dang phai thu tu. de cu. de cu cua dang cong hoa. ung cu vien khac. tai dai hoi cua dang tai st. louis, missouri, duoc to chuc tu ngay 16 den ngay 18 thang 6 nam 1896, dang cong hoa da de cu william mckinley lam tong thong va garret hobart tu new jersey lam pho tong thong. mckinley truoc do vua roi vi tri thong doc ohio. ca hai ung cu vien deu de dang duoc de cu o lan bo phieu dau tien. quan ly chien dich tranh cu cua mckinley, doanh nhan giau co va tai nang o ohio, mark hanna, da den gap mat lanh dao cac tap doan lon va cac ngan hang lon, co anh huong sau dai hoi dang cong hoa de gay quy cho chien dich. voi viec nhieu doanh nhan va chu ngan hang lo so truoc luan dieu dan tuy cua bryan va yeu cau cham dut che do ban vi vang, hanna gap rat it kho khan khi huy dong duoc so tien ky luc. ong da huy dong duoc 3,5 trieu do la cho chien dich tranh cu va chi nhieu gap 5 lan dang dan chu. mckinley la cuu chien binh tung tham gia noi chien hoa ky cuoi cung duoc 1 trong 2 dang lon de cu lam tong thong. de cu cua dang dan chu. ung cu vien khac. mot thang sau khi mckinley duoc de cu, nhung nguoi ung ho bac da gianh quyen kiem soat dai hoi dang dan chu, duoc to chuc tai chicago tu ngay 7 den ngay 11 thang 7. hau het cac dai bieu mien nam va mien tay deu quyet tam hien thuc hoa lap truong “bac tu do” cua dang dan tuy. dai hoi da bac bo cac chinh sach ung ho ban vi vang cua cleveland va cung cat dut lien he voi ban than cleveland. dieu nay khien dai hoi ban dau khong the tim ra nguoi ke nhiem ro rang cleveland. can phai co 2/3 tong so phieu bau de duoc de cu va nhung nguoi ung ho bac da lam duoc dieu nay bat chap su phan cuc cuc doan theo khu vuc cua cac dai bieu. trong mot cuoc bo phieu gia nghiem ve van de chong bac, cac bang mien dong (tu maryland den maine), voi 28% so dai bieu tham gia, da bo phieu ung ho 96%. cac dai bieu khac bo phieu phan doi 91%, vi vay nhung nguoi ung ho bac co the tin tuong vao da so 67% so dai bieu. luat su, cuu dan bieu va ung cu vien tranh cu vao thuong vien khong thanh cong william jennings bryan sau do noi len la mot nguoi phu hop cho de cu. la mot nha hung bien xuat sac, bryan den tu nebraska va dai dien nhung nguoi nong dan dang phai chiu dung cuoc suy thoai kinh te sau hoang loan 1893. tai dai hoi, ong da dua ra bai phat bieu duoc coi la mot trong nhung bai phat bieu chinh tri vi dai nhat trong lich su hoa ky, bai phat bieu thap gia vang. bryan da nhiet tinh bao ve nhung nguoi nong dan va cong nhan nha may dang vat lon de ton tai trong thoi ky suy thoai kinh te, dong thoi da kich cac chu doanh nghiep va lanh dao cac thanh pho lon la nguyen nhan gay ra moi van de. ong keu goi cai cach he thong tien te, cham dut che do ban vi vang va ho tro cho nong dan va nhung nguoi khac gap ton that do suy thoai. bai phat bieu cua bryan an tuong den muc nhieu dai bieu da cong ong tren vai di vong quanh hoi truong sau do. ngay hom sau, 8 cai ten duoc de cu truoc dai hoi: richard bland, william j. bryan, claude matthews, horace boies, joseph blackburn, john r. mclean, robert e. pattison va sylvester pennoyer. bat chap suc manh ban dau cua bland, nguoi dan dau trong 3 lan bo phieu dau tien, bai phat bieu cua bryan da giup ong tien gan den viec gianh duoc de cu, dieu ma ong da lam duoc o lan bo phieu thu 5, sau khi hau het cac ung cu vien khac rut lui va ung ho ong. sau that bai cua bland, nhung nguoi ung ho ong ay da co gang de cu ong lam dong tranh cu cua bryan, nhung bland quan tam hon den viec gianh lai chiec ghe cu cua ong o ha vien, nen da rut lui mac du da dan dau trong nhung lan bo phieu som. arthur sewall, mot tho dong tau giau co den tu maine, cuoi cung da duoc chon lam ung cu vien pho tong thong. nguoi ta cam thay rang su sewall co the trang trai mot so chi phi van dong tranh cu nho su giau co cua minh. moi 36 tuoi, bryan chi lon hon 1 tuoi so voi quy dinh cua hien phap de tro thanh tong thong. ong van la nguoi tre nhat tung duoc mot dang lon de cu lam tong thong. dang nho. de cu cua dang cam ruou. ung cu vien khac. dang cam ruou truoc do bi chia thanh hai phai va moi phai khong muon nhuong bo hoac thoa hiep voi phai kia. phai "broad-gauge", do charles bentley va cuu thong doc kansas john st. john lanh dao, da yeu cau bo sung vao cuong linh cac muc ung ho duc bac tu do cung nhu ung ho quyen bau cu cua phu nu, hon nua ho khong nhan de cu neu nhung yeu cau nay khong duoc dap ung. phai "narrow-gauge", do samuel dickie cua michigan lanh dao va ung ho joshua levering, van nhat quyet yeu cau cuong linh cua dang van danh rieng cho viec ung ho cam ruou. xung dot giua hai ben nhanh chong no ra khi de cu chu tich thuong truc cua dai hoi, voi mot so ung cu vien duoc de cu cho vi tri nay da rut lui cho den khi oliver stewart tu illinois, thanh vien phai "broad-gauge", duoc de cu. mot bao cao thieu so do st. john soan da ung ho viec duc tien mien phi bang bac, gia tang su kiem soat cua chinh phu doi voi duong sat va dien bao, thue thu nhap. mot so cuoc bo phieu da dien ra da mang lai su tu tin cho "broad-gauge", nhung mot so nguoi da bo phieu ung ho bao cao chi don thuan la chua quyet dinh hoac chong lai viec tieu huy bao cao. sau khi da so 188 nguoi dua bao cao ra truoc dai hoi, "narrow-gauge" da van dong cac dai bieu trung lap o vung dong bac va trung tay de thuyet phuc ho ve nhung hau qua bau cu neu no duoc thong qua: rang loi ich cua dang o cac bang nhu new york se bi dao nguoc chi sau mot dem ve cac van de nhu tien duc mien phi va chu nghia dan tuy. khi bao cao cua st. john duoc dua ra bo phieu chinh thuc, no da bi tu choi voi 492 phan doi va 310 ung ho. voi viec cac dai bieu ung ho bac van con bi soc va st. john dang co gang tien hanh bo phieu lai, phai "narrow-gauge" tu illinois da de nghi thay the ca bao cao thieu so va da so bang mot cuong linh chi tap trung vao van de cam ruou. mot cuoc bo phieu da duoc tien hanh va cuong linh cua "narrow-gauge" duoc thong qua. trong mot no luc nham xoa diu nhung nguoi ung ho quyen bau cu cua phu nu vi thieu muc ung ho quyen bau cu cua phu nu, ban than muc nay sau do duoc thong qua boi mot nghi quyet cua dai hoi. sau do, phai "broad-gauge" da cong khai xem xet viec ung ho mot lien danh rieng vi "narrow-gauge" ro rang da gianh duoc quyen kiem soat dai hoi. voi viec charles bentley tu choi tranh cu, mot so no luc da duoc thuc hien de de cu thong doc lanh tho arizona vua nghi huu, louis hughes, nhung ro rang la levering da nhan duoc su ung ho cua hau het cac dai bieu, hughes sau do bi gach ten. sau khi dai hoi de cu levering ma khong vap phai bat ky su phan doi lon nao, khoang 200 nguoi trong so nhung nguoi ung ho quyen bau cu cua phu nu, nhung nguoi ung ho bac va nhung nguoi theo chu nghia dan tuy da tham gia mot dai hoi khac, do bentley va st. john lanh dao, cung voi "dang" cai cach quoc gia thanh lap dang quoc gia. sau do, dai hoi nhat tri de cu hale johnson cua illinois lam pho tong thong.  de cu cua dang quoc gia. ban dau duoc goi la "dang cai cach quoc gia", ban than dai hoi chi bat dau 1 ngay truoc dai hoi dang cam ruou, cung duoc to chuc tai pittsburgh, pennsylvania. mac du ban dau chi trieu tap khoang 8 dai bieu, nhung ho hy vong rang bat ky nguoi bat man voi dang cam ruou co the tim duoc duong den do va se ung ho viec de cu dan bieu joseph c. sibley lam tong thong. mot buoc tien lon thuc su da xay ra khi dang cam ruou de cu joshua levering vao chuc vu tong thong, va nhung nguoi bat man, do charles e. bentley va cuu thong doc kansas john st. john dan dau, roi khoi dai hoi cua dang cam ruou, st. john tham chi con het len rang dai hoi da bi "... pho wall mua chuoc." hai nhom sau do gap mat va cung nhau thanh lap "dang quoc gia" va nhanh chong de cu charles bentley lam tong thong, voi james southgate, chu tich dang cam ruou bac carolina, lam dong tranh cu cua ong. cac dai bieu da thong qua bao cao thieu so da bi tu choi tai dai hoi dang cam ruou lam cuong linh cua ho, keu goi phat hanh tien xu va dong bac xanh mien phi, gia tang kiem soat cua chinh phu doi voi duong sat va dien bao, bau cu truc tiep cac thuong nghi si va tong thong...  de cu cua dang lao dong xa hoi. dai hoi dang lao dong xa hoi duoc to chuc tai thanh pho new york vao ngay 9 thang 7 nam 1896. dai hoi da de cu charles matchett tu new york va matthew maguire tu new jersey. cuong linh cua no ung ho viec giam gio lao dong; yeu cau chinh phu lien bang kiem soat cac mo, duong sat, kenh dao, dien bao va dien thoai; kiem soat cac cong trinh nuoc, cong trinh khi dot va nha may dien; van de tien bac chi nen do chinh phu lien bang thuc hien; giam ty le that nghiep; bai bo quyen phu quyet; bai bo thuong vien hoa ky; ung ho quyen bau cu cua phu nu; va luat hinh su thong nhat tren toan lien bang. de cu cua dang nhan dan. ung cu vien khac. trong so cac dang nho hoat dong vao nam 1896, noi bat nhat la dang nhan dan (hay dang dan tuy). duoc thanh lap vao nam 1892, dang dan tuy dai dien cho triet ly cua chu nghia nong nghiep (bat nguon tu nen dan chu jeffersonian), cho rang nong nghiep la mot loi song uu viet dang bi cac chu ngan hang ha be. dang dan tuy thu hut nhieu nong dan trong bong o mien nam va nong dan lua mi o mien tay, nhung lai thu hut rat it nong dan o vung dong bac va vung nong thon trung tay. trong cuoc bau cu tong thong nam 1892, ung cu vien cua dang dan tuy james b. weaver da thang 4 bang, va vao nam 1894, ho da gianh chien thang trong cac cuoc dua vao quoc hoi va co quan lap phap tieu bang o mot so bang mien nam va mien tay. o cac bang mien nam, bao gom alabama, north carolina, tennessee va texas, chien thang dat duoc nho lien minh voi dang cong hoa, nhung nguoi dang co gang chong lai dang dan chu bourbon dang thong tri tai day, trong khi o phan con lai cua dat nuoc, ho lai thuong lien minh voi dang dan chu, nhu o bang washington. den nam 1896, dang dan tuy tin rang ho co the thay the dang dan chu tro thanh dang doi lap chinh voi dang cong hoa. tuy nhien, viec dang dan chu de cu bryan, nguoi ung ho nhieu muc tieu va y tuong cua dang dan tuy, da dat dang vao tinh the kho xu. bi giang xe giua viec lua chon ung cu vien tong thong cua rieng ho hay chon ung ho bryan, ban lanh dao dang quyet dinh rang viec tu de cu ung cu vien se chi don gian la phan hoa luc luong ung ho cai cach va mang ve chien thang cho dang cong hoa bao thu. tai dai hoi toan quoc nam 1896, dang dan tuy da chon bryan lam ung cu vien tong thong cua ho. tuy nhien, de chung minh rang ho van doc lap voi dang dan chu, dang dan tuy chon cuu dan bieu georgia thomas e. watson lam ung cu vien pho tong thong thay vi arthur sewall. bryan nhanh chong chap nhan de cu cua dang dan tuy, nhung mo ho khong biet lieu neu duoc bau, ong co chon watson lam pho tong thong thay vi sewall hay khong. tu cuoc bau cu nay, dang dan tuy bat dau sap nhap vao dang dan chu; trong vong mot vai cuoc bau cu nua, dang se bien mat hoan toan. cuoc bau cu nam 1896 dac biet bat loi cho dang dan tuy o mien nam; khi ho bi chia re giua cac thanh vien ung ho lien minh voi dang dan chu de dat duoc cai cach o cap quoc gia va cac thanh vien ung ho lien minh voi dang cong hoa de dat duoc cai cach o cap tieu bang. nhung nguoi ung ho tu dang dan chu va dan tuy cua bryan da to chuc cac lien minh o mot so bang voi cac dai cu tri duoc bau ung ho ong den tu ca 2 dang. to "new york times" thong ke duoc 71 dang vien dang dan tuy va 6 ung cu vien dang cong hoa bac da cam ket ung ho bryan. o 10 bang noi lien minh thanh cong, 27 dai cu tri da bo phieu bau bryan lam tong thong va watson lam pho tong thong. (phan con lai trong so 176 dai cu tri cua bryan, bao gom ca cac dai cu tri cua dang dan tuy va dang cong hoa bac tu colorado va idaho, da bo phieu cho sewall.) de cu cua dang cong hoa bac. dang bac duoc thanh lap vao nam 1892. gan dau nam do, cac thuong nghi si hoa ky tu cac bang san xuat bac (colorado, idaho, nevada va montana) bat dau phan doi cac chinh sach kinh te cua tong thong benjamin harrison va ung ho viec duc bac tu do. thuong nghi si henry teller thong bao voi thuong vien rang neu 2 dang lon khong tu bo chinh sach tai chinh cua minh thi 4 bang mien tay se ung ho dang thu 3. to portland morning oregonian dua tin vao ngay 27 thang 6 nam 1892, rang dang bac duoc thanh lap de theo duoi chinh sach nay bac tu do. nhung nguoi dan o nevada da keu goi to chuc dai hoi cap bang vao ngay 5 thang 6 nam 1892, chi vai ngay sau khi dai hoi toan quoc cua dang dan chu ket thuc. dai hoi cho rang rang ca dang cong hoa va dang dan chu deu khong giai quyet duoc moi lo ngai ve bac cua cac bang mien tay va chinh thuc thanh lap "dang bac nevada". dang bac da can quet bang nay vao nam 1892; james weaver, ung cu vien dang nhan dan tranh cu tong thong voi tu cach la thanh vien dang bac, da gianh duoc 66,8% so phieu bau. francis newlands duoc bau vao ha vien hoa ky voi 72,5% so phieu bau. nguoi ung ho bac nam quyen kiem soat co quan lap phap, dam bao viec cu william stewart vao thuong vien hoa ky. su thanh cong cua dang bac nevada da thuc day nhung dong minh o colorado hanh dong; tuy nhien, dang bac colorado chua bao gio duoc thanh lap. trong cuoc bau cu giua ky nam 1894, dang bac van la mot dang lon o nevada. no quet sach tat ca cac van phong tren toan tieu bang, truoc day do dang cong hoa nam giu. john edward jones duoc bau lam thong doc voi 50% phieu bau; newlands tai dac cu voi 44%. sau that bai cua dang dan chu vao nam 1894, james weaver bat dau van dong thanh lap dang bac cap quoc gia. ong da thay doi cuong linh cua dang nhan dan tu nam 1892 va loai bo nhung muc ong cam thay se gay kho chiu cho cac dang lon hon va bat dau van dong ung ho tu nhung nguoi ung ho bac tren khap ca nuoc. tuyen bo quan trong dau tien cua dang bac cap quoc gia la mot bai phat bieu gui toi lien doan luong kim hoa ky, duoc in tren to emporia daily gazette vao ngay 6 thang 3 nam 1895. tuyen bo nay da giup thang chuc dan bieu hoa ky joseph sibley cua pennsylvania lam chu tich lien doan, luu y rang ong con nhan duoc ca su ung ho cua dang cam ruou. cac nha lanh dao dang bac da gap nhau tai washington dc vao ngay 22 thang 1 de thao luan ve viec to chuc dai hoi toan quoc. ho quyet dinh doi cho den sau dai hoi cua 2 dang lon trong truong hop mot trong so ho ung ho duc tien tu bac. tuy nhien, chi vai ngay sau, nhung nguoi dieu hanh dang da thuyet phuc duoc cac nha lanh dao thay doi duong loi. vao ngay 29 thang 1, cac nha lanh dao da dua ra loi keu goi to chuc mot dai hoi toan quoc tai st. louis vao ngay 22 thang 7. jj mott, chu tich toan quoc dang bac, da no luc rat nhieu de tim cach thanh lap dang cap tieu bang, nhung nhung no luc cua ong khong mang lai ket qua dang ke. dai hoi cap bang dang bac o ohio chi co 20 nguoi tham du, mac du chu tich cua lien doan luong kim, aj warner, song o do. mac du hau het nguoi ung ho bac deu thuc day viec de cu thuong nghi si teller, nhung tinh hinh da thay doi sau khi dang dan chu de cu william jennings bryan. dan bieu newlands da den chicago voi tu cach la khach moi chinh thuc cua dang bac va ong keu goi vao ngay 10 thang 7 rang dang bac nen ung ho lien danh cua dang dan chu. chu tich mott, nguoi dang o st. louis de thuc hien nhung thu xep cuoi cung cho dai hoi toan quoc dang bac, noi voi mot phong vien 5 ngay sau "tat ca nhung gi dang bac muon la bac, va cuong linh cua dang dan chu da mang lai cho chung toi dieu do." vao ngay 25 thang 7, ca bryan va arthur sewall deu duoc nhat tri de cu. de cu cua dang dan chu quoc gia. ung cu vien khac. dang dan chu ung ho vang da phan doi su de cu cua bryan trong su tuc gian, tuyet vong va boi roi. mot so thanh vien phai bourbon ung ho vang da thuc giuc thanh lap mot dang moi. de dap lai, mot hoi nghi duoc trieu tap voi va vao ngay 24 thang 7 da thanh lap dang dan chu quoc gia. mot hoi nghi tiep theo vao thang 8 da len lich cho mot dai hoi toan quoc vao thang 9 o indianapolis va gui loi keu goi toi cac thanh vien dang dan chu. trong do, dang dan chu quoc gia tu mieu ta ho la nguoi thua ke hop phap cua cac tong thong jefferson, jackson va cleveland. cac dai bieu tu 41 bang da tap trung tai dai hoi toan quoc cua dang dan chu quoc gia o indianapolis vao ngay 2 thang 9. mot so dai bieu du dinh de cu cleveland, nhung co mot buc dien gui den noi rang ong se khong tham gia tranh cu. thuong nghi si william freeman vilas tu wisconsin, nguoi soan thao cuong linh chinh cua dang dan chu quoc gia, la nguoi duoc cac dai bieu yeu thich. tuy nhien, vilas tu choi tranh cu de lam "con cuu hien te" cua dang. nguoi duoc lua chon thay vao do la john m. palmer, mot cuu thuong nghi si 79 tuoi den tu illinois. simon bolivar buckner, cuu thong doc bang kentucky, 73 tuoi, duoc de cu lam pho tong thong. lien danh, bieu tuong cua su hoa giai sau noi chien, co do tuoi tong cong cao nhat so voi bat ky lien danh nao khac trong lich su hoa ky. bat chap tuoi tac da cao, palmer va buckner van bat tay vao mot chuyen cong du dien thuyet ban ron, bao gom ca nhung chuyen tham toi hau het cac thanh pho lon o mien dong. dieu nay khien ho nhan duoc su ton trong dang ke tu nhung nguoi trung thanh voi dang, mac du mot so nguoi cam thay ho kho gianh duoc su ung ho. luat su kenesaw mountain landis viet: “ban se cuoi phat om neu nhin thay ong gia palmer”. "ong ay thuc su da nghi trong dau rang minh dang tranh cu." lien danh cua palmer duoc coi la mot "phuong tien" de thu hut phieu bau cho mckinley, william collins whitney va abram hewitt, thu quy cua dang dan chu quoc gia, deu nhan duoc su ho tro tai chinh bi mat tu mark hanna. ban than palmer da noi tai mot diem dung chien dich rang neu "dam dong khong lo nay bo phieu cho william mckinley vao thu ba toi, toi se khong buoc toi ho." tham chi con co mot so thanh vien hop tac voi dang cong hoa, dac biet la ve van de tai chinh. dang cong hoa hy vong rang palmer co the thu hut du so phieu bau cua dang dan chu tu bryan de thang cac bang vung bien va vung trung tay. trong mot buc thu rieng, hewitt nhan rang dang dan chu quoc gia giong nhu dang lien minh voi dang cong hoa de chong lai bryan. tuy nhien, dang dan chu quoc gia khong chi don thuan la mot luc luong phu tro cho chien dich mckinley. mot muc tieu quan trong cua no la duy tri dang qua cuoc bau cu de huong toi cac chien thang trong tuong lai. ho lien tuc mo ta that bai sap xay ra cua bryan va man the hien dang tin cay cua palmer, la mo duong cho viec gianh lai dang dan chu tu tay phe ung ho bac, va dieu nay thuc su da xay ra vao nam 1904. chien luoc. trong khi dang cong hoa buoc vao nam 1896 voi day hy vong khi cho rang dang dan chu dang roi vao hon loan va chien thang se de dang den voi ho, dac biet la sau chien thang long troi lo dat cua dang cong hoa trong cuoc bau cu quoc hoi nam 1894, the nhung phan ung day cam xuc tren toan quoc doi voi viec dang dan chu de cu bryan da thay doi moi thu. vao mua he, co ve nhu bryan da dan dau o mien nam, mien tay va co le ca o trung tay. chien dich cua mckinley da buoc phai ra mot chien luoc hoan toan moi. muc tieu cua no la lam sang to van de tien te cho cu tri de chung minh nhung sai lam cua nguoi ung ho bac va mieu ta ban than bryan la mot ke nguy hiem. mckinley thi duoc mieu ta la nha vo dich ve viec lam va an toan tien te, voi nhung de xuat ve muc thue cao cua ong dam bao mang lai su thinh vuong cho moi nguoi. chien dich cua mckinley mang tinh chat quoc gia va tap trung vao uy ban toan quoc dang cong hoa nhu mot "cong cu" cua ung cu vien, thay vi la "cong cu" cua cac bang. hon nua, chien dich cua mckinley nhan manh cam ket cua ong doi voi su thinh vuong chung cho tat ca cac nhom xa hoi (bao gom ca cac nhom thieu so). tai chinh. chien dich cua mckinley da phat minh ra mot hinh thuc tai tro chien dich moi ma da thong tri nen chinh tri hoa ky ke tu do. thay vi yeu cau nhung nguoi nam giu chuc vu cat mot khoan luong de dong gop thi hanna da den gap cac nha tai chinh, cac nha cong nghiep de thuc hien nhung trao doi ve mat kinh doanh. ong ay giai thich rang bryan se thang neu khong co chuyen gi xay ra, va neu chien dich mckinley co mot pha phan cong va gianh thang loi thi dieu nay se rat co loi cho cac doanh nghiep. sau do, ong dat van de ve gia tri cua doanh nghiep se nhieu den muc nao neu bryan khong lam tong thong. co the thay, hanna da vuot ra ngoai chien dich dang phai va van dong gay quy tranh cu giong nhu cach cua mot doanh nhan. ong ay da huy dong duoc 3,5 trieu do la. hanna con moi chu ngan hang charles g. dawes den dieu hanh van phong cua minh o chicago va chi khoang 2 trieu do la de van dong tai cac khu vuc quan trong. trong khi do, cac nha tai tro truyen thong cua dang dan chu (hau het den tu vung dong bac) deu tu choi ung ho bryan, mac du ong cuoi cung cung huy dong duoc khoang 500.000 usd. mot so trong so do den tu cac doanh nhan quan tam den viec khai thac bac. su chenh lech tai chinh ngay cang ro khi dang cong hoa tai tro cho nhieu cuoc bieu tinh, bai phat bieu va dieu hanh dot duoc, cung nhu hang tram trieu to roi tan cong bryan va ca ngoi mckinley. thieu mot he thong gay quy co he thong, bryan khong the thu hut duoc nhung nguoi ung ho tiem nang cua minh va ong phai xin tien tu nguoi ung ho. chu tich toan quoc jones da buoc phai xin, "du so tien nho den dau, du dong gop co khiem ton den dau, hay de nhung nguoi ban cua tu do va danh du quoc gia dong gop tat ca nhung gi ho co." dang cong hoa tan cong bryan. cang ngay, dang cong hoa cang gia tang cac cuoc tan cong cua ho nham vao bryan khi mieu ta ong la mot ke cuong tin nguy hiem.ho tuyen truyen rang bryan giong nhu mot ke lieu linh co chinh sach pha huy he thong kinh te. thong doc illinois john peter altgeld cung dang tai tranh cu sau khi an xa cho mot so ke vo chinh phu bi ket an trong vu haymarket. cac ap phich va bai phat bieu cua dang cong hoa cho rang altgeld va bryan la hai ke theo chu nghia vo chinh phu nguy hiem. dang cong hoa da dung moi chien thuat de che nhao cac chinh sach kinh te cua bryan. mot lan, ho da in nhung to do la gia co guong mat cua bryan va in dong chu "in god we trust. . . cho 53 xu khac", y noi mot to do la se chi co gia tri 47 xu neu no duoc cung ung bang bac thay vi vang. phan ung dan toc. dang dan chu o cac thanh pho mien dong va trung tay dang ra phai co duoc su ung ho cua nhieu nguoi cong giao goc duc song o day nhung ho lai bi xa lanh vi chinh sach bac tu do va lam phat cua minh. ho to ra khong may hao hung voi bryan, mac du nhieu nguoi lo lang rang chien thang cua dang cong hoa se khien lenh cam ruou co hieu luc. nguoi cong giao goc ireland khong thich loi hung bien mang tinh phuc hung cua bryan va cung lo lang ve su cam ruou. tuy nhien, cac nha lanh dao cua ho lai quyet dinh ung ho bryan, vi phai bourbon voi da so doanh nhan da cach mat voi dang khien nguoi ireland ngay cang tro nen quyen luc.  cong doan lao dong va cong nhan lanh nghe. chien dich cua bryan truoc het thu hut duoc rat nhieu nong dan. ho tuyen truyen voi nguoi lao dong thanh thi rang ho chi co the tro lai thinh vuong neu nong dan tro nen giau co truoc. bryan da neu quan diem nay mot cach thang than trong bai phat bieu "thap gia vang", doc o chicago, noi ma 25 nam sau thuc su da bi dot chay: "hay dot chay cac thanh pho cua cac nguoi va de lai trang trai cua chung toi, thi cac thanh pho cua cac nguoi se moc len tro lai; nhung mot khi da pha huy cac trang trai cua chung toi thi co se moc tren duong pho cua moi thanh pho trong ca nuoc." viec dat canh nhau cac cum tu "trang trai cua chung toi" va "thanh pho cua cac nguoi" da lam phat long dan thanh thi, noi da bo phieu voi ty le 59% cho mckinley. trong so cac thanh pho cong nghiep, bryan chi thang 2 thanh pho (troy, new york va fort wayne, indiana). cac cong doan lao dong chinh mien cuong ung ho bryan vi cac thanh vien cua ho lo ngai lam phat. trong khi do, cac cong nhan duong sat dac biet lo lang rang cac chinh sach ung ho bac cua bryan se lam pha san cac cong ty duong sat, von dang trong tinh trang tai chinh suy kiet trong thoi ky suy thoai va trai phieu cua ho dang duoc thanh toan bang vang. cong nhan nha may khong thay lam phat co loi gi doi voi cac tho mo va nong dan, vi chi phi sinh hoat cua ho se tang cao va ho se gap ton that. chien dich cua mckinley danh su quan tam dac biet den nhung nguoi lao dong co tay nghe cao, dac biet la o vung trung tay va cac bang lan can. cac cuoc tham do bi mat cho thay phan lon cong nhan duong sat va nha may da bo phieu cho mckinley. tong tuyen cu. trong suot chien dich, cac bang mien nam va mien nui duong nhu chac chan bo phieu cho bryan, trong khi mien dong chac chan bo phieu cho mckinley. tam diem cua chien dich la cac bang trung tay va cac bang vung bien. dang cong hoa da tich luy mot quy chien dich lon chua tung co o moi cap do: quoc gia, tieu bang va dia phuong. thang than va tranh xa cac to bao truyen thong cua dang, bryan quyet dinh co hoi tot nhat de gianh chien thang trong cuoc bau cu la thuc hien mot chuyen di dien thuyet soi noi tren toan quoc bang tau hoa. loi hung bien manh me ve cai ma ong goi la chien dich "thap tu chinh" cua ong truoc luong khan gia khong lo se khien chien dich tranh cu cua ong tro thanh mot cau chuyen dang dua tin, va ong co the noi chuyen truc tiep voi cu tri thay vi thong qua cac bai xa luan. ong la ung cu vien tong thong dau tien ke tu stephen douglas nam 1860 truc tiep van dong tranh cu va la nguoi dau tien di khap dat nuoc va gap go truc tiep cu tri. su moi la khi duoc nhin thay mot ung cu vien tong thong den tham, ket hop voi tai hung bien loi cuon cua bryan, da thu hut nhung dam dong khong lo. nhung nguoi ung ho bac chao don nguoi hung cua ho bang nhung le ky niem keo dai ca ngay voi cac cuoc dieu hanh, ban nhac, bua an da ngoai, nhung bai phat bieu bat tan va nhung cuoc mit tinh ung ho bat diet. bryan tap trung no luc vao cac bang trung tay, noi moi nguoi deu dong y se la chien truong quyet dinh cho cuoc bau cu. chi trong 100 ngay, bryan da co hon 500 bai phat bieu truoc hang trieu nguoi. ky luc cua ong la da dua ra 36 bai phat bieu trong mot ngay o st. louis. chi dua vao vai gio ngu moi dem, ong da di 18.000 dam bang duong sat de noi chuyen voi 5 trieu nguoi ung ho cua minh. nguoc lai voi nhung no luc dang ke cua bryan, mckinley da tien hanh mot chien dich "truoc hien nha" tu nha cua ong o canton, ohio. thay vi bat mckinley di gap cu tri, mark hanna da dua 500.000 cu tri di tau den nha mckinley. khi den do, mckinley se chao don nhung nguoi ung ho tu hien nha cua minh. doi ngu nhan vien duoc to chuc bai ban cua ong da chuan bi ca cau hoi cho cac doan khach den tham va len san cac cau tra loi cho ong, moi ngay ong va nguoi ung ho lai trao doi ve cac chu de khac nhau. cac cau tra loi sau do se xuat hien tren to bao vao ngay hom sau. mckinley cho rang nhung cai cach kinh te va xa hoi do bryan de xuat la moi de doa nghiem trong doi voi nen kinh te quoc gia. khi cuoc suy thoai sau hoang loan 1893 sap ket thuc, su ung ho danh cho cac chinh sach kinh te bao thu hon cua mckinley ngay cang tang, trong khi cac chinh sach cap tien hon cua bryan bat dau mat di su ung ho cua nong dan trung tay va cong nhan nha may. de dam bao chien thang, hanna da tra tien cho mot so luong lon cac nha hung bien cua dang cong hoa (bao gom ca theodore roosevelt) de di khap dat nuoc tuyen truyen bryan la mot ke cuc doan nguy hiem. cung co bao cao rang mot so cu tri co kha nang ung ho dang dan chu da bi de doa va phai bo phieu cho mckinley. vi du, mot so chu nha may da dan bien mot ngay truoc cuoc bau cu thong bao rang, neu bryan thang cu, nha may se dong cua va cong nhan se mat viec lam. bryan da phai ban ron hon bao gio het o cac bang trung tay khi chien dich phan cong du doi cua dang cong hoa to ra hieu qua. bryan da danh phan lon thang 10 o trung tay, dua ra 160 trong so 250 bai phat bieu cuoi cung cua minh o do. morgan cho rang "su co to chuc, su hoa hop cua dang cong hoa cung nhu chien dich tuyen truyen bang chu in" co hieu qua hon cac bai phat bieu cua bryan. mot so co van cua bryan da de xuat van dong bo sung o cac bang thuong nam nhu kentucky, tay virginia, maryland va delaware. mot ke hoach khac keu goi mot chuyen cong du tu bang washington den nam california. tuy nhien, bryan da chon tap trung o trung tay va khoi dong mot chuyen cong du den vung dong bac co nhieu dang vien cong hoa. bryan khong thay co co hoi chien thang o new england, nhung cam thay rang minh can tao ra suc hap dan thuc su tren toan quoc. vao ngay bau cu, ket qua tu tai bo tay va vung thuong nam se la ket qua sit sao nhat cua cuoc bau cu. ket qua. mckinley da gianh duoc chien thang trong dai cu tri doan bang cach thang hau het mien dong va dong bac, trong khi bryan da the hien tot o mien nam, mien tay va vung nong thon trung tay. so luong rat lon nguoi my goc duc da ung ho mckinley, nguoi da gianh duoc da so phieu trong tang lop trung luu, cong nhan nha may lanh nghe, cong nhan duong sat va nong dan giau co. phieu pho thong toan quoc cua 2 ung cu vien kha sit sao, khi mckinley danh bai bryan voi 602.500 phieu bau, gianh duoc 51% so voi 46,7% cua bryan. neu nhu co su thay doi o 53.000 phieu bau o california, kentucky, ohio va oregon, bryan se thang cu mac du mckinley gianh duoc da so phieu pho thong, nhung do co su lien minh cua dang dan chu va dang dan tuy, dieu nay cung co the khien hobart va sewell thieu mot it so voi 224 phieu dai cu tri can thiet de gianh duoc chuc pho tong thong, va do do, buoc phai to chuc mot cuoc bau cu phu tai thuong vien. dang dan chu quoc gia khong thang duoc bang nao, nhung ho da chia re phieu bau cho dang dan chu o mot so bang va giup dang cong hoa thang kentucky; dang dan chu quoc gia tham chi nhan duoc so phieu bau con cao hon cach biet rat sit sao cua mckinley o day. day la lan dau tien mot ung cu vien tong thong cua dang cong hoa thang kentucky, va ho se khong lam duoc nhu vay nua cho den khi calvin coolidge thang tai day vao nam 1924. tu do, co the ket luan rang palmer da bon rut so phieu bau cho dang dan chu va do do giup mckinley thang bang nay. tuy nhien, mckinley van se gianh chien thang trong cuoc tong tuyen cu ngay ca khi ong thua bryan o kentucky. thi truong tom l. johnson cua cleveland, ohio da tom tat chien dich nay la “cuoc bieu tinh lon dau tien cua nguoi dan my chong lai su doc quyen – cuoc dau tranh vi dai dau tien cua quan chung nhan dan trong nuoc chong lai giai cap thuong luu”. mot nghien cuu nam 2022 cho thay moi chuyen di phat bieu cua bryan giup tang ty le phieu bau cua ong len trung binh mot diem phan tram. tong quan. mckinley nhan duoc khoang bay trieu phieu bau trong khi bryan gianh duoc khoang sau trieu ruoi phieu bau, nhieu hon khoang 800.000 phieu bau so voi cleveland nam 1892. bryan gianh duoc nhieu phieu bau hon ca cac ung cu vien dang dan chu trong cac nam 1900, 1904 va 1912. tuy nhien, ong gianh duoc it hon mot chut so voi tong so phieu bau cho cac ung cu vien cua dang dan chu va dan tuy vao nam 1892. nguoc lai, mckinley nhan duoc nhieu hon gan 2.000.000 phieu bau so voi so phieu bau ma benjamin harrison, ung cu vien dang cong hoa, gianh duoc vao nam 1892. so phieu bau cua dang cong hoa se tang nhe trong thap ky toi. tai dinh hinh nen chinh tri. cuoc bau cu tong thong nam 1896 thuong duoc coi la mot cuoc bau cu tai dinh hinh, ma cac quan diem cua mckinley ve mot chinh quyen trung uong manh me, mot nen cong nghiep lon, thue bao ho va ban vi vang da chien thang. he thong dang phai thu tu moi sau do da ra doi, thay the he thong dang phai thu ba co khoi nguon tu noi chien. dang cong hoa luc do se thuong thong tri o cac bang lon va tren toan quoc cho den cuoc bau cu nam 1932, mot cuoc bau cu tai dinh hinh khac voi chien thang cua franklin roosevelt va su ra doi cua he thong dang phai thu nam. phillips lap luan rang mckinley la dang vien dang cong hoa duy nhat co the danh bai bryan - ong ket luan rang cac ung cu vien tu mien dong se co ket qua toi te truoc bryan, von sinh ra o illinois thuoc vung trung tay vo cung quan trong. mac du bryan duoc cu tri nong thon yeu thich, nhung "mckinley lai thu hut mot nuoc my dang do thi hoa va cong nghiep hoa." ket qua theo dia ly. mot nua tong so phieu bau cua ca nuoc nam o 8 bang ma mckinley thang (new york, new jersey, pennsylvania, ohio, indiana, illinois, michigan, wisconsin). o nhung bang nay, bryan khong chi thua xa ung cu vien dang cong hoa ma con gianh duoc so phieu chua bang nua so phieu cho mckinley. bryan chi gianh chien thang o 12 trong so 82 thanh pho o hoa ky voi dan so tren 45.000 nguoi va 7 trong so do o mien nam. o cac bang ma bryan thang, 7 trong so 17 thanh pho da bo phieu cho mckinley trong khi o cac bang bo phieu cho mckinley, chi co 3 trong so 65 thanh pho bo phieu cho bryan. bryan thua moi quan o new england va chi thang mot quan o new york, bryan tham chi con thua o thanh pho new york co truyen thong ung ho dang dan chu. chi rieng o new england, noi dang cong hoa thang; so phieu cua dang cong hoa (614.972) nhieu gap doi so phieu cua dang dan chu (242.938), dang cong hoa da thang tat ca quan o vung nay. o ca vung trung tay bac va bo tay, mckinley deu dan truoc sit sao. tuy nhien, trong nhung vung nay, bryan lai thang duoc cac bang missouri, nam dakota, nebraska, kansas va washington. o vung nam dai tay duong va vung trung dong nam, dang dan chu dan truoc ro ret, con o vung trung tay nam va mien nui, so phieu bau cho bryan cao hon ap dao. trong 4 khu vuc nay, bao gom 21 tieu bang, mckinley chi thang 322 quan va 4 tieu bang - delaware, maryland, west virginia va kentucky. mot dac diem thu vi cua cuoc bau cu tai 22 trong so 45 bang do la luon co mot ung cu vien dan truoc ap dao. mckinley ap dao o moi bang new england cung voi new york, pennsylvania va illinois. trong khi do, bryan ap dao o 8 bang mien nam va 5 bang mien nui. do do, danh dau bat dau cua su phan hoa vung, mot dac trung tieu bieu cua he thong dang phai thu tu. day la cuoc bau cu cuoi cung ma dang dan chu thang nam dakota cho den nam 1932, cuoc bau cu cuoi cung ma dang dan chu thang utah va washington cho den nam 1916, va la cuoc bau cu cuoi cung ma dang dan chu thang kansas va wyoming cho den nam 1912. day cung la lan cuoi cung nam dakota va washington khong bo phieu cho dang cong hoa cho den khi ho bo phieu cho dang cap tien vao nam 1912. day cung la cuoc bau cu duy nhat mot dang vien dang cong hoa gianh duoc chuc tong thong ma khong thang duoc kansas, south dakota, utah hoac wyoming. ngay nay day la nhung bang ung ho dang cong hoa vung chac va khong ung ho mot ung cu vien nao cua dang dan chu ke tu chien thang cua lyndon johnson vao nam 1964. day la 1 trong 2 lan idaho va montana ung ho mot dang vien dang dan chu thua cuoc (cung voi nam 1900) va la 1 trong 2 lan nebraska lam nhu vay (cung voi nam 1908). day la lan dau tien dang cong hoa gianh chien thang ma khong thang colorado. (a) "bao gom 912,241 phieu bau cho dang dan tuy" (b) "sewall la dong tranh cu tai dang dan chu cua bryan" (c) "watson la dong tranh cu tai dang dan tuy cua bryan" tieu bang sit sao. cac bang co cach biet chien thang duoi 1% (26 phieu dai cu tri; 20 phieu cho dang cong hoa; 6 phieu cho dang dan chu): cac bang co cach biet chien thang giua 1% va 5% (55 phieu dai cu tri; 42 phieu cho dang cong hoa; 13 phieu cho dang dan chu): cac bang co cach biet chien thang giua 5% va 10% (66 phieu dai cu tri; 6 phieu cho dang cong hoa; 60 phieu cho dang dan chu): thong ke. cac quan voi ty le phieu bau cho dang cong hoa cao nhat cac quan voi ty le phieu bau cho dang dan chu cao nhat cac quan voi ty le phieu bau cho dang dan tuy cao nhat trong van hoa dai chung. cuoc dieu hanh bau cu cho william mckinley xuat hien trong bo phim "the little house" vao nam 1952.
ga cheonan–asan (onyangoncheon) (tieng han: 천안아산역(온양온천), hanja: 天安牙山驛(溫陽溫泉)) la ga duong sat duoc dieu hanh boi tong cong ty duong sat han quoc nam o jangjae-ri, baebang-eup, asan-si, chungcheongnam-do, han quoc. no duoc ket noi voi ga asan tren tuyen janghang va tau dien ngam vung thu do seoul tuyen 1 thong qua mot loi di trung chuyen va duoc coi nhu mot tram trung chuyen cung voi nha ga chinh. ktx va srt duoc van hanh. lich su. no bat dau hoat dong vao ngay 1 thang 4 nam 2004 voi viec khai truong ktx. voi viec khai truong ga asan tren tuyen janghang vao ngay 30 thang 3 nam 2007 , no dong vai tro nhu mot ga trung chuyen va voi viec khai truong ga tau dien ngam vung thu do seoul tuyen 1 vao ngay 15 thang 12 nam 2008, no da co the ket noi voi tau dien ngam o khu do thi, tang kha nang tiep can.
astraea stirps la mot loai oc bien da tuyet chung, thuoc ho turbinidae. phan bo. loai nay duoc ghi nhan tung xuat hien o new zealand. 
xeno-canto la mot du an khoa hoc cong dan va kho luu tru thong tin ma trong do, cac tinh nguyen vien ghi lai, tai len va chu thich cac ban ghi am tieng keu cua chim, cung nhu am thanh cua bo canh thang va doi. ke tu khi bat dau hoat dong vao nam 2005, no da thu thap duoc hon 575.000 ban ghi am tu hon 10.000 loai tren toan the gioi va tro thanh mot trong nhung kho suu tap lon nhat ve am thanh cua cac loai chim tren the gioi. tat ca cac ban ghi duoc xuat ban theo mot trong cac giay phep creative commons, bao gom mot so ban co giay phep tu do. moi ban ghi tren trang web deu duoc kem theo bieu do pho va du lieu vi tri tren ban do hien thi su thay doi dia ly. du lieu tu xeno-canto da duoc su dung lai trong nhieu (vai nghin) bai bao khoa hoc. no cung la nguon du lieu cho thu thach hang nam ve nhan dang tieng chim tu dong ("birdclef") ke tu nam 2014, von duoc tien hanh nhu mot phan cua hoi nghi va phong thi nghiem cua dien dan danh gia ("conference and labs of the evaluation forum"). trang web nay duoc mot so to chuc hoc thuat va quan sat chim tren toan the gioi ho tro, voi nguon ho tro chinh la ha lan. lich su. xeno-canto, co nghia la "ca khuc la", la mot du an chi co am thanh nham lam noi bat am thanh cua cac loai chim, thay vi hinh anh hay video. xeno-canto duoc bob planque (mot nha toan sinh hoc tai dai hoc vu amsterdam) va willem-pier vellinga (mot nha vat ly hien dang tu van cho mot cong ty cong nghe vat lieu toan cau) cho ra mat vao ngay 30 thang 5 nam 2005. vao thoi diem ra mat, trang nay chi luu giu cac ban ghi am cua khoang 160 loai va ban dau nham muc dich thu thap cac ban ghi am o cac loai chim tu trung va nam my.  phat trien. xeno-canto hien nay da duoc toan cau hoa, mo rong pham vi hoat dong ra bac my, chau phi va chau a, va cuoi cung la chau au va chau uc. den nam 2017, viec thu thap du lieu co su tang truong dang ke, voi khoang 360.000 ban ghi cua khoang 9.750 loai chim (gan 90% tong so loai chim). tuy nhien, khu suu tap van chua hoan thanh. co khoang 1.000 loai chua duoc ghi am va nhieu loai chi co mot so it ban ghi am, nghia la dang bi thieu su da dang ve giai dieu va phuong ngu cua cac loai. muc tieu. muc dich cua xeno-canto la tan dung cac kha nang cua internet de tang muc do pho bien, kha nang tiep can va kien ​​thuc chung ve am thanh cua cac loai chim. cho den nay, cac ban ghi tren xeno-canto da duoc su dung theo nhieu cach khac nhau, bao gom ca viec duoc dua vao he thong thong tin hang khong cua an do, dong gop cho du an sterna va duoc dua vao he thong co so du lieu dai hoc cua na uy. ke tu khi thanh lap, trang web da dat ra mot so nguyen tac nham duy tri dich vu huong den cong dong. nhung nguyen tac nay bao gom:
vong dau loai truc tiep uefa champions league 2014–15 bat dau vao ngay 17 thang 2 va ket thuc vao ngay 6 thang 6 nam 2015 voi tran chung ket tai olympiastadion o berlin, duc de quyet dinh nha vo dich cua uefa champions league 2014–15. tong cong co 16 doi tranh tai o vong dau loai truc tiep. thoi gian la cet/cest, do uefa liet ke (gio dia phuong nam trong ngoac don). vong dau va ngay boc tham. tat ca cac tran hoa deu duoc to chuc tai tru so uefa o nyon, thuy si. nhanh dau. &lt;section begin=bracket /&gt;&lt;section end=bracket /&gt; vong 16 doi. le boc tham dien ra vao ngay 15 thang 12 nam 2014. cac tran luot di dien ra vao cac ngay 17, 18, 24 va 25 thang 2, con cac tran luot ve dien ra vao cac ngay 10, 11, 17 va 18 thang 3 nam 2015. tong quan. &lt;section begin=rof16 /&gt; &lt;section end=rof16 /&gt; cac tran dau. "tong ty so 3–3; paris saint-germain thang nho luat ban thang san khach." "barcelona thang chung cuoc 3–1." "tong ty so 1–1; atletico madrid thang tren cham phat den." "juventus thang chung cuoc 5–1." "real madrid thang chung cuoc 5–4." "bayern munich thang voi tong ti so 7–0." "tong ty so 3–3; monaco thang nho luat ban thang san khach." "porto thang chung cuoc 5–1."
astraea bicarinata la mot loai oc bien da tuyet chung, thuoc ho turbinidae. phan bo. loai nay duoc ghi nhan tung xuat hien o new zealand.
astraea heliotropium la mot loai oc bien lon, thuoc ho turbinidae. loai oc bien lon nay duoc chau au biet den khi no duoc thuyen truong cook dua ve lan dau tien. phan bo. loai oc bien nay la loai dac huu cua new zealand.
phanerolepida transenna la mot loai oc bien quy hiem,thuoc ho turbinidae. day la loai con song duy nhat trong chi "phanerolepida". phan bo. loai nay song o vung nuoc sau, xuat hien ngoai khoi philippines va nhat ban o do sau tu 600 m den 800 m.
phanerolepida la mot chi oc bien thuoc ho turbinidae.
van long co the la:
tropidomarga biangulata la mot loai oc bien thuoc ho turbinidae. mo ta. loai nay co the phat trien kich thuoc vo dat den 15 mm. phan bo. chung thuong xuat hien ngoai khoi quan dao nam georgia.
canh my co the la:
tran quyet thang la mot chinh khach viet nam. ong tung dam nhan cac chuc vu: pho chu tich uy ban nhan dan tinh ha tinh va cuc truong cuc quan tri a thuoc van phong trung uong dang cong san viet nam. xuat than va hoc van. tran quyet thang sinh ngay 24 thang 3 nam 1957. que quan: xa tien dien, huyen nghi xuan, tinh ha tinh. tai tien dien, cac dong ho nguyen, ho dang, ho ha, ho tran la nhung dong ho da san sinh nhieu nguoi tai cao, chi lon, khong chi hoc gioi, do dat ma con co nhieu cong nghiep lon.  hoi con hoc o truong huyen, tran quyet thang dat giai nhat trong ky thi chon hoc sinh gioi mon toan lop 7 toan tinh ha tinh. len cap 3, ong vao hoc tai khoi pho thong chuyen toan, truong dai hoc su pham vinh.  ong la dang vien dang cong san viet nam vao nam 1987; co bang cao cap ly luan chinh tri vao nam 1999 va hoan thanh chuong trinh boi duong kien thuc quoc phong, an ninh tai hoc vien quoc phong vao nam 2001.  ong tot nghiep giao duc pho thong (10/10) vao nam 1973, tot nghiep dai hoc su pham vinh vao nam 1980, bao ve luan an tien si tai hoi dong truong dai hoc bach khoa ha noi va duoc cap bang vao nam 1994. khen thuong. ong da duoc nha nuoc tang thuong: 
 la phim dai, phim hoat hinh dau tien cua nhat ban. no duoc dao dien boi mitsuyo seo, nguoi duoc phim tuyen truyen yeu cau thuc hien phim tuyen truyen cho chien tranh the gioi thu hai boi bo hai quan nhat ban. shochiku phong thi nghiem hinh anh chuyen dong quay bo phim dai 74-phut vao nam 1944 va chieu vao ngay 12 thang 4 nam 1945. day la phan tiep theo cua "momotarō no umiwashi", mot bo phim dai 37-phut phat hanh nam 1943 boi cung mot dao dien. trong tieng anh, phim doi khi duoc goi la nhung chien binh bien than thanh cua momotaro. kich ban. sau khi hoan thanh khoa huan luyen hai quan, mot gau con, khi, ga loi va mot chu cho con noi loi tam biet voi gia dinh cua chung. trong khi ho dang ban tam, em trai cua chu khi la santa roi xuong song khi dang duoi theo chiec mu cua chu khi va bi cuon ve phia thac nuoc. chu cho va chu khi phoi hop giai cuu de cuu ong gia noel ngay truoc khi ong bi cuon xuong ha luu. ho thanh cong va chu khi cung em trai cua minh sau do tan huong phong canh cua nui phu si va vung dat xung quanh. trong khi ong gia noel vui dua tren canh dong duoi theo chiec mu trong gio, chu khi quan sat nhung bong bo cong anh dang rai hat va bi me hoac boi ve dep cua no. nhung bong bo cong anh nhe nhang bay xuong khien chu khi nho den nhung nguoi linh du tu tren troi lao xuong, chuyen sang thoi gian bo qua. nguoi ta thay luc luong nhat ban dang don sach mot khu rung va xay dung mot can cu khong quan tren mot hon dao o thai binh duong voi su giup do cua cac loai dong vat rung hot khi chung lam viec. mot chiec may bay ha canh xuong duong bang va tu ben trong xuat hien momotaro, duoc mieu ta la mot vi tuong, cung voi gau, khi, cho va ga loi, nhung nguoi den thoi diem nay da tro thanh quan chuc cap cao. cac cu dan dong vat tren dao duoc the hien la nhung nguoi nguyen thuy don gian, bi me hoac boi nhung loai dong vat nhat ban quyen ru va tien tien. nhung canh tiep theo cho thay cac loai dong vat trong rung duoc day kana tieng nhat bang cach hat va chung tiep tuc hat bai aiueo trong khi giat, phoi quan ao va chuan bi bua an. sau do, cac si quan chuan bi dan duoc va phao cho may bay chien dau. sau do, phan tuong thuat ve cau chuyen hon dao celebes duoc cong ty dong an ha lan mua lai nhu the nao va tiet lo rang nguoi nhat dang co gang xam chiem no. khi, cho va gau con tro thanh nguoi nhay du trong khi ga loi tro thanh phi cong. linh du phuc kich mot chiec nua duong va voi vang xam chiem mot phao dai cua anh, khien nhung nguoi linh anh khong chuan bi truoc hoang so va bo chay. sau do, thuyen truong momotaro, con khi va chu cho con dang dam phan voi ba quan chuc anh dang so hai va lap bap. sau mot hoi tranh cai, nguoi anh dong y dau hang celebes va cac hon dao xung quanh cho su cai tri cua nhat ban. doan ket ngan gon cho thay ong gia noel va nhung dua tre khac dang choi tro nhay du va nhay len duong vien bang phan cua luc dia chau my. vi vay, mieu ta hoa ky la muc tieu cua the he ho. co mot so canh am nhac. dang chu y la , canh linh nhat day dong vat dia phuong cach noi. nen. bo hai quan truoc do da cho thay seo "fantasia" (1940), phim disney. lay cam hung tu dieu nay, seo da co gang chap canh uoc mo cho tre em cung nhu khoi day niem hy vong ve hoa binh, giong nhu anh da lam trong phan tien nhiem cua bo phim momotaro's sea eagles. vao thoi diem do, khong giong nhu hoat hinh duc va hoat hinh my, hoat hinh nhat ban chua duoc chinh phu nhat ban quang ba hoan toan nhu mot cong cu tuyen truyen. hoat hinh khong duoc cac quan chuc chinh phu nhat ban coi la hieu qua nhu cac phuong tien truyen thong khac. nhu chung ta co the thay trong canh dau tien cua bo phim, "cho tre em (小国民に捧ぐ shokokumin ni tsugu)", bo phim duoc thiet ke danh cho tre em. trong mot thoi gian dai, bo phim duoc cho la da bi [[nhat ban chiem dong|my chiem dong] tich thu va dot bo). tuy nhien, mot ban am ban cua phim da duoc tim thay trong nha kho ofuna cua shochiku vao nam 1983 va duoc phat hanh-lai vao nam 1984. mot bo phim sao chep sau do da duoc trinh chieu va goi vhs hien da co san o nhat ban. di san.  noi tieng vi duoc ton kinh trong bo truyen boi [[osamu tezuka]]. tezuka da xem bo phim vao thang 4 nam 1945. sau do, ong noi rang ong da cam dong roi nuoc mat truoc nhung goi y ve uoc mo va hy vong an duoi be ngoai tuyen truyen chien tranh trong phim. phim da duoc chon de trinh chieu trong hang muc cannes classics tai [[lien hoan phim cannes 2016]]. cong ty [[all the anime]] co tru so tai vuong quoc anh da thong bao vao thang 5 nam 2016 rang se phat hanh bo phim tren [[blu-ray]] va trong cung thang do, cong ty cung thong bao rang nha phan phoi [[funimation]] cua hoa ky cung se phat hanh bo phim. tren blu-ray va [[dvd]] cung voi "[[kumo to tulip|spider and tulip]]" tren mot dia don. lien ket ngoai. [[category:japanese world war ii propaganda films]] [[category:1945 anime films]] [[category:1940s war films]] [[category:1940s japanese-language films]] [[category:japanese black-and-white films]] [[category:japanese sequel films]] [[category:1940s rediscovered films]] [[category:funimation]] [[category:films set in indonesia]] [[category:shochiku films]] [[category:films directed by mitsuyo seo]] [[category:1945 animated films]] [[category:1945 films]] [[category:rediscovered japanese films]] [[category:films about navies]] [[category:imperial japanese navy]] [[category:historical anime and manga]] [[category:films about military animals]] [[category:films scored by yūji koseki]] [[category:animated films set in asia]]
tong giao phan danh thanh chua giesu cebu (; ; ; ), thuong duoc goi tat la tong giao phan cebu la mot tong giao phan cua giao hoi latinh truc thuoc giao hoi cong giao roma tai philippines, quan li giao tinh cebu. lich su. giao phan danh thanh chua giesu cebu duoc thanh lap vao ngay 14/8/1595 theo tong sac "super specula militantis ecclesiae" cua giao hoang clemente viii, tren phan lanh tho tach ra tu giao phan manila. cung luc do giao phan manila duoc nang cap thanh mot tong giao phan va giao phan cebu tro thanh giao phan truc thuoc cua tong giao phan manila moi. vao ngay 27/5/1865 mot phan lanh tho cua giao phan duoc tach ra de thanh lap giao phan jaro (hien la tong giao phan jaro). vao ngay 17/9/1902 lanh tho quan dao mariana duoc tach ra khoi giao phan de tro thanh mot hat phu doan tong toa (tien than cua giao phan chalan kanoa). vao ngay 10/4/1910 mot phan lanh tho cua giao phan duoc tach ra de thanh lap giao phan calbayog va giao phan zamboanga (hien la tong giao phan zamboanga). vao ngay 15/7/1932 mot phan lanh tho cua giao phan duoc tach ra de thanh lap giao phan bacolod. vao ngay 28/4/1934 giao phan duoc nang cap thanh mot tong giao phan do thanh theo tong sac "romanorum pontificum" cua giao hoang pio xi. vao ngay 8/11/1941 mot phan lanh tho cua giao phan duoc tach ra de thanh lap giao phan tagbilaran. vao ngay 22/7/2003 bo phung tu va ky luat bi tich da xac nhan duc me guadalupe la thanh bon mang chinh cua tong giao phan. lanh dao giao phan. giam muc giao phan cebu. cac giai doan trong toa khong qua 2 nam hay khong ro rang bi loai bo. thong ke. den nam 2021, tren toan tong giao phan co 4.588.435 giao dan tren dan so tong cong 5.242.499, chiem 87,5%.
trong ngon ngu hoc xa hoi, ngu vuc la mot bien the ngon ngu duoc dung cho mot muc dich va tinh huong giao tiep cu the. vi du, khi noi chuyen chinh thuc hoac trong mot moi truong cong cong, mot nguoi noi tieng anh co the co nhieu kha nang tuan theo cac quy tac tieu chuan khi su dung trang trong hon la trong moi truong thong thuong, vi du, bang cach phat am nhung tu ket thuc bang duoi "-ing" voi mot am mui ngac mem thay vi mot am mui loi (e.g. "walking" thay vi "walkin&amp;apos;"), chon nhung tu duoc coi la "trang trong" hon (chang han nhu "father" voi "dad", hoac "child" voi "kid"), va ngung su dung nhung tu duoc coi la khong chinh thuc, chang han "ain't" va "y'all". nhu voi cac loai bien the ngon ngu khac, co xu huong mot loat ngu vuc thay vi mot tap hop roi rac cua cac bien the khac biet ro rang—nhieu ngu vuc co the duoc xac dinh, khong co ranh gioi ro rang giua chung. phan loai dien ngon la mot van de phuc tap, va tham chi theo dinh nghia chung cua "ngu vuc" noi tren (bien the ngon ngu duoc xac dinh theo cach su dung thay vi nguoi dung), co nhung truong hop cac loai bien the ngon ngu khac, chang han nhu phuong ngu vung hoac tuoi, lan len nhau. boi su phuc tap nay, su dong thuan hoc thuat chua duoc dat den cac dinh nghia cua cac thuat ngu nhu "ngu vuc", "linh vuc", hoac "y nghia"; dinh nghia cua cac hoc gia khac cua nhung thuat ngu nay thuong mau thuan voi nhau. cac thuat ngu bo sung nhu kieu phuong ngu, the loai, loai van ban, van phong, acrolect, mesolect, basilect, phuong ngu xa hoi va phuong ngu dan toc, trong so nhieu thuat ngu khac, co the duoc su dung de bao ham cung mot nen tang hoac tuong tu. mot so thich han che mien cua thuat ngu "ngu vuc" hon mot tu vung cu the (thuong goi la tieng long, biet ngu, noi long), trong khi so khac phan doi viec su dung thuat ngu nay hoan toan. crystal va davy, vi du, da phe binh cach su dung thuat ngu nay "mot cach gan nhu bua bai." nhung cach tiep can khac nhau nay doi voi khai niem ngu vuc nam trong pham vi cua cac nganh nhu ngon ngu hoc xa hoi (nhu da luu y o tren), phong cach hoc, ngu dung hoc, va ngu phap chuc nang he thong. lich su va su dung. thuat ngu "ngu vuc" duoc su dung lan dau tien boi nha ngon ngu hoc t. b. w. reid vao nam 1956, va duoc pho bien rong rai vao nhung nam 1960 boi mot nhom cac nha ngon ngu hoc muon phan biet giua cac bien the trong ngon ngu theo "nguoi dung", "theo nghia la moi dien gia co nhieu su da dang va lua chon khac nhau vao nhung thoi diem khac nhau." trong tam nay la cach su dung ngon ngu trong cac tinh huong cu the, chang han nhu ngon ngu hop phap hoac ngon ngu me de, ngon ngu cua mot phong thi nghiem nghien cuu sinh hoc, cua mot bai bao, hoac cua phong ngu. m. a. k. halliday va r. hasan thong dich "ngu vuc" nhu "cac dac diem ngon ngu thuong gan lien voi cau hinh cua cac dac diem tinh huong—voi cac gia tri cu the cua cac linh vuc, cach thuc, y nghia." linh vuc cho chung la "toan bo su kien, trong do van ban dang hoat dong, cung voi hoat dong co muc dich cua nguoi noi hoac nguoi viet; bao gom chu de la mot trong cac yeu to." cach thuc la "chuc nang cua van ban trong su kien, bao gom ca kenh duoc ngon ngu – noi hoac viet, ung khau hoac chuan bi – va the loai, cach thuc tu tu cua no, nhu tuong thuat, mo pham, thuyet phuc, 'lien lac phatic', v.v." y nghia de cap den "loai tuong tac vai tro, tap hop cac moi quan he xa hoi co lien quan, lau dai va tam thoi, giua nhung nguoi tham gia". ba gia tri nay – linh vuc, cach thuc, y nghia – la nhung yeu to quyet dinh dac diem ngon ngu cua van ban. "ngu vuc la tap hop cac nghia, cau hinh cua cac mau ngu nghia, thuong duoc rut ra theo cac dieu kien cu the, cung voi cac tu va cau truc duoc su dung de hien thuc hoa cac nghia nay." ngu vuc, trong cai nhin cua m. a. k. halliday va r. hasan, la mot trong hai khai niem xac dinh van ban. "van ban la mot doan dien ngon mach lac ve hai mat sau: no mach lac voi boi canh cua tinh huong, va do do nhat quan ve mat ngu vuc; va no gan ket voi chinh no, va do do gan ket." ngu vuc nhu thang do hinh thai. mot trong nhung linh vuc duoc phan tich nhieu nhat trong do viec su dung ngon ngu duoc xac dinh theo tinh huong la quy mo hinh thuc. thuat ngu "ngu vuc" thuong la, trong giao duc ngon ngu dac biet la, cach toc ky cua phong cach trang trong/khong trang trong, mac du day la mot dinh nghia loi thoi. sach ngon ngu hoc co the su dung thuat ngu "y nghia" thay the, nhung ngay cang thich thuat ngu "van phong" hon—"chung toi mo ta phong cach nhu su da dang cua ngon ngu nhin tu quan diem hinh thuc", dong thoi xac dinh "cac ngu vuc" hep hon khi su dung ngon ngu chuyen mon lien quan den mot hoat dong cu the, chang han nhu thuat ngu hoc thuat. co rat it su dong y ve cach phan chia pham vi hinh thuc.
tranh cai ve cach xac dinh thuong vong bang dem xac trong chien tranh viet nam () la mot phuong phap cua quan doi hoa ki va dong minh su dung nham xac dinh thuong vong cua quan giai phong mien nam viet nam va quan doi nhan dan viet nam trong chien tranh viet nam. nhung cach nay thuong gay tranh cai boi quan doi hoa ki va dong minh thuong giet va dem lan ca dan thuong va quan giai phong, hoac la phong dai thuong vong cua quan giai phong. khi chien luoc tim va diet duoc tien hanh,muc tieu cua hoa ki khong phai la chiem lanh tho,nen mot chien dich 'tim diet' se duoc coi la thanh cong neu my va dong minh gay thiet hai nang cho quan giai phong, ngoai ra, quan doi my thuong bao cao tieu diet nhieu ke dich nhung vu khi thu duoc lai it hon nhu trong cac tran danh va chien dich: tran doi thit bam, chien dich speedy express...
albert matta bahhuth (sinh ngay 6 thang 10 nam 1956) la mot giam muc nguoi liban thuoc giao hoi cong giao, ong duoc bo nhiem chuc giam muc phu ta dai dien tong giao phan los angeles vao nam 2023. tieu su. dau doi. bahhuth sinh ra o beirut, liban vao ngay 6 thang 10 nam 1956, la con ut trong gia dinh co 7 nguoi con. mac du ong duoc rua toi va nhan cac bi tich khac trong giao hoi cong giao hy lap melkite, nhung gia dinh ong dac biet khong coi trong viec thuc hanh duc tin, ong sinh truong trong "moi truong nhieu tin lanh hon cong giao", vi ong theo hoc tai mot truong do giao hoi bap-tit quan ly. khi bahhuth 19 tuoi thi noi chien liban xay ra, ong cho biet "gia dinh toi sinh song o dong beirut, phan lon theo kito huu, va toi den truong o tay beirut, phan lon la nguoi hoi giao. chuyen bang qua thanh pho rat nguy hiem vi ban co the bi giet do nham ton giao". cuoc xung dot buoc bahhuth di cu sang hoa ky de tiep tuc viec hoc, vi bi gian doan do tinh trang bat on. ong hoan thanh bang cu nhan ve ky thuat hoa hoc tu dai hoc missouri tai rolla, dat bang thac si va tien si cung linh vuc tu dai hoc mississippi. do khong tim duoc cong viec trong linh vuc ky thuat hoa hoc, bahhuth day ky thuat mot thoi gian ngan tai dai hoc wyoming truoc khi chuyen den nam california vao nam 1984 va lam viec trong nganh ban le va thuc an nhanh, so huu hai nha hang subway nhuong quyen kinh doanh. bahhuth duoc mot nguoi ban goi y ong den nha tho, viec ma ong chua tung thuc hien khi con nho. ong bat dau tham du thanh le tai nha tho thanh john vianney o hacienda heights va cuoi cung nghi viec kinh doanh mot nam va hoat dong cung mot nhom nha truyen giao tai nha tho thang thien o nam los angeles noi david g. o'connell la muc su. ong vao chung vien thanh gioan nam 1991, chuyen sang giao hoi latinh vao thang 11 nam 1993 roi duoc thu phong vao ngay 1 thang 6 nam 1996, tai nha tho thanh giuise cong nhan o canoga park boi hong y roger mahony. tu te. nhiem vu dau tien cua bahhuth la cha xu tai nha tho thanh gregorio ca o whittier, california, va giu chuc muc su dau tien tai nha tho thanh finbar o burbank. nam 2015, ong tro thanh tong dai dien va dieu hanh giao trieu cua tong giao phan los angeles, nam 2017 duoc phong tuoc cha tuyen uy cua duc giao hoang va ban tuoc hieu duc ong. nam 2021, ong duoc bo nhiem chuc muc su cua nha tho thanh gia o nam pasadena. ong con phuc vu trong ban quan tri cua chung vien thanh gioan. giam muc. vao ngay 18 thang 7 nam 2023, giao hoang phanxico da bo nhiem bahhuth chuc giam muc phu ta cua tong giao phan los angeles va giam muc hieu toa cua vadesi. tong giam muc jose horacio gomez ton phong bahhuth voi tu cach giam muc vao ngay 26 thang 9 nam 2023, tai nha tho chinh toa los angeles.
sau ban mieu, con duoc goi la nguyen thanh, ban manh, ban mao (trung quoc), sau dau (viet nam) (danh phap khoa hoc: hycleus pustulatus) la mot loai bo canh cung trong ho meloidae. loai duoc tim thay o an do, sri lanka, trung quoc va java. cac ca the truong thanh an chu yeu hoa tu nhieu ho thuc vat. giai doan au trung dau tien la dang planidium, la giai doan sau ban mieu san con trung mem nhu rep. trong khi nhung au trung thuong co loi cho cay trong bang cach uc che nhung loai an thuc vat khac thi nhung con truong thanh co the la mot van de khi hien dien voi so luong lon. viec an cac loai thuc co gia tri nong nghiep cao dan den nang suat thap hon va day co the la mot van de o mot so cay ho dau. tuy nhien, chung co the duoc kiem soat de dang bang cach thu thap thu cong. tuy nhien, can can than khi thu thap cac ca the truong thanh vi chung co the gay bong rat va lo loet. mo ta. chieu dai co the khoang 15,4 den 32,8 mm. dau va nguc co cac vet lom sau va day vua phai. doi mat nho ra khoi dau. xuc giac o ham tren bao gom doan dinh hinh tam giac bi de manh. nguc co mot vung o giua co vet lom doc theo duong van o giua. canh co do nham va sau vua phai voi cac vet lom sau. long to tren canh kha ngan, rat day dac o vung den nhung thua thot o cac dom va vach mau do. goc canh co hai dom do. nhung dom nay co hinh chu nhat tinh tu mat lung va mat ben. bung co cac dau lam cham tho vua phai, mo duc. con duc co ria canh khia co the nhin thay duoc (goi la emarginate), trong khi con cai co ria canh tron hoan toan hoac co khia it, kho nhin thay. sinh hoc. sau ban mieu la mot loai an thuc vat co bieu hien da thuc. con truong thanh duoc coi la loai gay hai chinh cho dau trieu. loai nay an cac hoa va qua dang phat trien cua nhieu loai cay nong nghiep nhu "hibiscus rosa-sinensis", "pavonia zeylanica", "helicteres isora", "cassia occidentalis", "acacia caesia", "cleome viscosa", "zea mays", "mangifera indica", "murraya koenigii" va "tridax procumbens". hoat dong kiem an dien ra manh me vao cac thang 7, 8, 9, 10 voi mua ra hoa cua nhieu loai thuc vat. tuy nhien, loai nay cho thay tan suat kiem an on dinh quanh nam. day la loai co gia tri kinh te quan trong do co kha nang sinh tong hop chat gay phong rop phong thu manh cantharidin.
co quan van tai hang khong lien bang nga ( - "federalnoye agentstvo vozdushnogo transporta", "favt"), cung co ten rosaviatsiya (), hay fata, a co quan chinh phu nga chiu trach nhiem giam sat nganh hang khong dan dung o nga. tru so chinh cua no o moscow. co quan nay cung co ten la cuc hang khong dan dung lien bang nga. co quan van tai hang khong lien bang thuong xuyen lam viec cung voi uy ban hang khong lien bang trong cac cuoc dieu tra ve tai nan va su co hang khong. co quan tuong duong o hoa ky la cuc hang khong lien bang.
rim-66 standard mr (sm-1mr/sm-2mr) la mot loai ten lua dat doi khong (sam) tam trung, voi vai tro chong may bay va muc tieu bay thap, nhu ten lua doi ham, duoc phat trien va trang bi cho tau chien cua hai quan my (usn). mot thanh vien cua ho ten lua ham doi khong standard missile nay la sm-1, duoc phat trien de thay the cho ten lua ham doi khong rim-2 terrier va rim-24 tartar duoc trien khai tu nhung nam 1950s tren cac tau chien cua my. ten lua rim-67 standard (sm-1er/sm-2er) la phien ban nang cap tang tam ban so voi cac phien ban khac nho co them dong co nhien lieu ran. mo ta. chuong trinh phat trien ho ten lua doi khong standard missile standard duoc bat dau tu nam 1963 de che tao mot dong ten lua doi khong du kha nang thay the cac ten lua co phong khong co dieu khien terrier, talos, va tartar. y tuong la che tao mot the he ten lua co dieu khien moi co kha nang bo sung cho cac he thong ten lua phong khong co dieu khien the he cu. standard missile 1. rim-66a la phien ban tam trung cua ho ten lua standard missile va ban dau duoc phat trien de thay the cho ten lua rim-24c trong chuong trinh mk74 "tartar" guided missile fire control system. ten lua moi duoc phat trien dua tren than ten lua tartar cu, de de dang su dung chung tren cac gia phong dan va khoang chua dan ten lua cu. rim-66a/b trong khi nhin be ngoai giong voi cac ten lua rim-24c nhungdduwowcjj thiet ke lai he thong dien tu va co he thong khoa muc tieu dang tin cat hon va ngoi no cai tien khien chung co tinh nang tot hon ten lua tartar. ten lua rim-66a/b standard mr, (sm-1mr block i cho den block v) duoc su dung trong chien tranh viet nam. hien tai hai quan my van con su dung mot phien ban thuoc the he standard missile 1 la phien ban rim-66e (sm-1mr block vi). trong khi cac phien ban khac thuoc dong sm 1 da duoc cho nghi huu, phien ban rim-66e van con nam trong trang bi cua nhieu luc luong hai quan cac nuoc tren the gioi va se duoc su dung den nam 2020. standard missile 2. dong ten lua rim-66c/d standard mr (sm-2mr block i) duoc phat trien tu nhung nam 1970s va la thanh phan chinh cua he thong phong thu aegis va new threat upgrade (ntu). ten lua sm-2mr su dung phuong phap dan duong quan tinh va dan duong theo lenh o pha giua. he thong tu lai cua ten lua duoc lap trinh de bay theo duong bay hieu qua nhat toi muc tieu va co the hieu chinh lai duong bay o pha giua. dau tu dan radar ban chu dong cua ten lua chi can phai chieu xa muc tieu trong vai giay cuoi cua hanh trinh danh chan. dieu nay giup cho tau me mang he thong phong thu aegis va new threat upgrade co kha nang giao chien voi nhieu muc tieu hon. ten lua sm-1 va sm-2 tiep tuc duoc nang cap qua cac block. ten lua sm-2 duoc trang bi trong cac ong phong thang dung mk 41. ten lua standard cung co the duoc su dung de chong tau, su dung che do dan duong radar ban chu dong theo duong ngam, o cu ly ngoai duong chan troi su dung phuong phap dan duong quan tinh va dan duong hong ngoai pha cuoi. ten lua sm-2 da thuc hien tren 2.700 lan phong thanh cong. thang sau nam 2017, raytheon da tuyen bo se khoi dong lai day chuyen san xuat sm-2 de cung cap cho ha lan, nhat ban, uc va han quoc. viec san xuat truoc do da bi ngung ke tu nam 2013 do thieu don dat hang quoc te. dot chuyen giao sm-2 block iiia va iiib du kien se duoc thuc hien vao nam 2020. hai quan my thong bao se tiep tuc duy tri ten lua phong khong tam trung standard missile 2 cho den nam 2035. cac nha thau phat trien. ten lua standard duoc san xuat boi bo phan pomona general dynamics cho den nam 1992, khi no duoc mua lai boi hughes missile systems company. hughes ky ket thoa thuan lien ket voi raytheon lap cong ty chuyen san xuat ten lua sm la standard missile company (smco). hughes missile systems sau do da ban dut cho raytheon khien raytheon la nha thau duy nhat cung cap ten lua standard missile. sau khi hai quan my ngung cac hoat dong lien quan den ten lua sm-1 trong bien che hai quan dai loan, vien khoa hoc va cong nghe trung son da tiep nhan va ho tro quan doi dai loan trong san xuat va thay the dong co ten lua.  ten lua doi dat. rgm-165 lasm, co ma dinh danh la sm-4, la phien ban ten lua doi dat chinh xac tam xa de ho tro hoa luc cho luc luong thuy quan luc chien hoa ky. ten lua nay van su dung dau dan mk 125 va dong co mk 104, voi dau do radar duoc thay the boi dau dan duong gps/ins.
hd 45166 la mot sao doi bao gom 1 quasi sao wolf–rayet (qwr) va sao day chinh loai b, gan cum sao mo ngc 2244, co vi tri bieu kien thuoc chom sao ky lan. mot ngoi sao quasi wolf–rayet la mot ngoi sao co quang pho giong voi quang pho cua cac sao wolf–rayet thuc su, nhung co khoi luong va do sang kem hon mot ngoi sao wolf–rayet thuc su. ngoi sao chinh trong he sao doi hd 45166 chinh la vi du duy nhat ve sao qwr. nam 2023, ngoi sao chinh cua hd 45166 duoc cong nhan co tu tinh rat manh, mot trong nhung sao co khoi luong tu tinh lon nhat duoc biet den. hd 41566 co cuong do tu truong len den 43 kg, gap khoang 43.000 lan cuong do tu truong cua mat troi, dieu nay khien cac nha khoa hoc du doan cai ket suy sup thanh sao tu cua no, sau mot vu no sieu tan tinh loai ib hoac iib. thuoc tinh. hd 45166 is currently a wide binary made up of a hot, small quasi wolf–rayet star and a larger b-type star, with masses of and respectively. they are separated by approximately 10.5 au and orbit each other every 8200 days, or every 22.5 years. the orbit is moderately eccentric, and inclined from our view at about 49°. the hd 45166 system is estimated to be around 105 million years old. the orbital period was formerly thought to have been 1.6 days, which would have made the primary about , but a 2023 study instead identified this signal as a pulsation mode of the secondary. the primary qwr star is slightly smaller than the sun, with a surface temperature of 56,000 k. it is also mostly composed of helium, and is only composed of about 25% hydrogen. some carbon, nitrogen and oxygen is also present in the star. the b-type star is about two and a half times the size of the sun, and has a temperature of about 13,000 k. tien hoa. it is hard to explain the existence of the exotic qwr primary in hd 45166. a stellar merger from white dwarfs is extremely unstable, and would explode after about 10,000 years. therefore, the most likely scenario for the creation of the qwr primary would be the merger of two helium stars in a tight binary. the system likely formed as a triple star system, with a tight inner binary and a distant third star, which is now the b-type star. in the tight binary, the more massive star expanded, and lost its outer layers via mass transfer to the secondary star, becoming a helium star. the same thing then happened to the secondary star of the tight binary, and so both stars became helium stars. due to unstable mass transfer, a gaseous envelope formed around the two stars, causing them to lose orbital energy via friction, spiral inwards and eventually collide. this merger formed the quasi wolf–rayet primary of hd 45166 that we observe today. tuong lai. the qwr primary of hd 45166 is currently burning helium in its core. after it has exhausted this, it will likely start shell burning, and expand, forming a supergiant of about (well within its roche lobe). then, it will explode in a type ib or iib supernova. the remnant will be a neutron star, probably also with a very strong magnetic field, i.e. a magnetar.
vuong toc borbon, hay borbon-anjou, la vuong toc hien dang tri vi tay ban nha, xuat phat tu vuong toc bourbon co nguon goc tu phap, khi philippe cua phap, cong tuoc xu anjou tro thanh quoc vuong tay ban nha voi ten hieu felipe v. do do, co the goi ten vuong toc la vuong toc borbon-anjou mac du thuong duoc goi la vuong toc borbon. vuong toc borbon-anjou da tri vi o tay ban nha tu nam 1700 cho den nay ngoai tru thoi ky napoleon (1808-1813), cach mang sau nam (1868-1874), de nhi cong hoa (1931-1939) va che do doc tai cua tuong quan franco (1939-1975). vuong toc borbon o tay ban nha. vuong toc borbon-anjou xuat phat tu philippe cua phap, cong tuoc xu anjou, chau noi cua louis xiv cua phap. voi cai chet cua carlos ii cua tay ban nha, vi quoc vuong tay ban nha cuoi cung cua vuong toc habsburgo, philippe da tuyen bo la vua cua tay ban nha vao nam 1700 voi ten hieu felipe v, voi tu cach la hau due cua maria teresa cua tay ban nha. tuyen bo nay da dan den cuoc chien tranh gianh quyen ke vi cua nguoi tay ban nha, chong lai nguoi doi ngai vang tay ban nha khac cua vuong toc habsburg la dai vuong cong karl cua ao, mot hau due cua maria ana cua tay ban nha. su ton tai cua cung mot dong doi cai tri o phap va tay ban nha khong can tro hai quoc gia co chinh sach cai tri doc lap, nhung tao dieu kien thuan loi cho cac lien minh chinh tri va quan su giua cac vi vua phap va tay ban nha, chang han nhu cac thoa thuan cua hiep uoc gia dinh hoac viec tien vao dat tay ban nha cua quan doi phap les cent-mille fils de saint louis nham giup fernando vii gianh lay ngai vang tay ban nha. vuong toc borbon-anjou chia re vao thanh hai nhom doi dich vao the ky 19. mot la phai carlist den tu ke doi ngai vang carlos maria isidro cua tay ban nha doi dich voi isabel ii cua tay ban nha va chong la phoi vuong francisco de asis cua tay ban nha. xung dot nay dan den cac cuoc noi chien khac nhau, cai goi la cuoc chien carlist. sau khi dong chinh cua nhanh carlist tuyet tu, hau het nhung nguoi con lai theo chu nghia carlist cong nhan nhanh borbone-parma la nguoi thua ke, hien duoc dai dien boi carlos javier cua borbon-parma .
bao vera , o philippines goi la bao bebeng ,  o viet nam la bao so 3 da gay lu lut dang ke cho philippines vao thang 7 nam 1983. mot ranh gio mua da hinh thanh ap thap nhiet doi vao ngay 12 thang 7 o phia dong philippines. mac du ban dau ap thap hinh thanh cham, he thong di chuyen theo huong tay-tay bac, manh len thanh bao nhiet doi vao ngay hom sau va bao cuong phong trong ngay 14 thang 7. vera di chuyen vao dat lien som vao ngay hom sau duoi dang con bao toi thieu o philippines truoc khi suy yeu nhe hon dao. tuy nhien, vera da co gang tang cuong tro lai tren bien dong trong khi tang toc, sau do dat van toc gio 85 mph (135 km/h). sau khi vuot qua hai nam trong khi van o cuong do cuc dai va di chuyen vao khu vuc phia bac vinh bac bo , vera do bo vao bo bien mien bac viet nam voi suc gio cap 12-13 , tam bao di qua phia nam tinh quang ninh vao ngay 18/7.bao suy yeu dan sau khi do bo nhu nhung con bao binh thuong khac. den ngay 19/7, vera da tan trong dat lien. tren khap philippines, bao vera da khien 123 nguoi thiet mang, 60 nguoi mat tich va 45 nguoi bi thuong. khoang 200.000 nguoi vo gia cu. con bao da pha huy 29.054 ngoi nha va gay thiet hai "nang ne" cho 5.558 ngoi nha khac. tong cong co 76.346 ngoi nha bi hu hai "mot phan". hon nua, 24.280 nguoi da tim noi tru an vi vera. khoang 80% cu dan manila bi mat dien. nhieu khu vuc trung thap o manila chim trong nuoc trong khi gio manh lam hu hai nha cua va cay coi. tinh bataan chiu thiet hai nang ne nhat do con bao va 10 ngoi lang gan do bi pha huy. tren toan tinh, 50 nguoi thiet mang, chu yeu do duoi nuoc. tong cong, thiet hai len toi 42 trieu usd (1983 usd). ngoai anh huong den philippines, bao vera da cuop di sinh mang cua 62 nguoi o viet nam va lam hu hai 2.500 ngoi nha. ngoai khoi trung quoc, mot nguoi boi loi bi chet duoi do bien dong do vera gay ra. lich su khi tuong. nguon goc cua bao vera co the bat nguon tu mot ranh gio mua duoc to chuc kem keo dai ve phia tay tu philippines den kinh tuyen 160 phia dong vao dau thang 7 nam 1983. vao ngay 4 thang 7, con bao da phat trien mot hoan luu dai dang . bon ngay sau, mot cap khu vuc doi luu co to chuc bat dau hinh thanh, mot khu vuc gan kinh tuyen 120
