thuan nao trong viec thiet lap cac dieu luat nay. thoa thuan da duoc mo ta la khong mang lai ket qua va co the that bai, neu no van chua duoc nhieu quoc gia phe chuan, dac biet la nhung quoc gia co hoat dong trong khong gian. chi mot quoc gia (an do) co kha nang thuc hien cac chuyen bay tu phong vao vu tru da tham gia ky (nhung chua phe chuan) hiep uoc. cac chuyen gia phap ly gay tieng vang, nhu s. neil hosenball, tong co van cua nasa va truong doan dam phan hiep uoc mat trang cua hoa ky, da quyet dinh vao nam 2018 rang viec dam phan cac quy tac cua co che quoc te nay nen duoc tri hoan cho den khi tinh kha thi cua viec khai thac cac nguon tai nguyen tren mat trang duoc thiet lap vung chac. mot chuyen gia ve luat phap vu tru va kinh te da tom tat rang hiep uoc se can dua ra cac dieu khoan thich hop de chong lai bat ky cong ty nao gianh duoc vi tri doc quyen tren thi truong khoang san the gioi, dong thoi tranh viec "xa hoi hoa mat trang." nam 2020, hiep dinh artemis da duoc ky ket, tuy khong de cap den hiep uoc nhung hiep dinh nay van co cong kich hiep uoc. vao thoi diem ky ket hiep dinh, tong thong hoa ky donald trump cung da ban hanh them mot sac lenh co ten "encouraging international support for the recovery and use of space resources" ("khuyen khich ho tro quoc te cho phuc hoi va su dung tai nguyen vu tru"). sac lenh nhan manh rang "hoa ky khong coi khong gian ngoai thien the la 'tai san chung toan cau" va goi hiep uoc mat trang la "mot no luc that bai trong viec han che doanh nghiep tu do." viec uc ky va phe chuan ca hiep uoc mat trang va hiep dinh artemis da gay ra mot cuoc thao luan lieu chung co the duoc hai hoa voi nhau hay khong. theo huong nay, mot "thoa thuan thuc thi" hiep uoc mat trang nhan duoc su ung ho, nhu mot cach de bu dap cho nhung thieu sot cua hiep uoc mat trang va hai hoa no voi cac dieu luat khac, cho phep no duoc chap nhan rong rai hon
ga yamok (tieng han: 야목역, hanja: 野牧驛) la ga tau dien ngam tren tuyen suin–bundang, nam o nam o yamok-ri, maesong-myeon, hwaseong, gyeonggi-do. no bat dau hoat dong voi viec khai truong tuyen suin vao thang 8 nam 1937, ngung xu ly hanh khach vao thang 1 nam 1996 va tiep tuc hoat dong nhu mot ga duong doi kho tieu chuan vao ngay 12 thang 9 nam 2020
la liga 2023–24 (con duoc goi la laliga ea sports vi ly do tai tro) la mua giai thu 93 cua la liga, giai dau bong da hang dau cua tay ban nha. giai dau bat dau vao ngay 11 thang 8 nam 2023 va du kien ​​ket thuc vao ngay 26 thang 5 nam 2024. barcelona la duong kim vo dich, da gianh chuc vo dich thu 27 o mua giai truoc. cac doi tham du. thang hang va xuong hang. tong cong co 20 doi tham du giai, bao gom 17 doi tu mua 2022–23 va 3 doi thang hang tu segunda division 2022–23 (2 doi dau bang va 1 doi thang play-off thang hang). elche la doi dau tien xuong hang vao ngay 2 thang 5 nam 2023, sau tran thua 2–1 truoc almeria. doi thu hai la espanyol, vao ngay 28 thang 5 nam 2023, sau tran hoa 2–2 truoc valencia. doi cuoi cung xuong hang la real valladolid, sau tran hoa 0–0 truoc getafe vao ngay 4 thang 6 nam 2023. hai doi dau tien gianh duoc suat thang hang la granada va las palmas, hai doi dung dau mua giai 2022–23. granada tro lai la liga sau mot nam vang bong, las palmas tro lai sau 5 nam. doi cuoi cung duoc thang hang la alaves sau khi gianh chien thang 1–0 trong tran chung ket play-off truoc levante, tro lai la liga chi sau 1 nam bi xuong hang. nhan su va nha tai tro. ! doi ! huan luyen vien truong ! doi truong ! nha tai tro trang phuc ! nha tai tro chinh ! (cac) nha tai tro khac  
ga eocheon (tieng han: 어천역, hanja: 漁川驛) la ga tau dien ngam tren tuyen suin–bundang, nam o nam o eocheon-ri, maesong-myeon, hwaseong, gyeonggi-do. truoc khi mo cua tro lai vao ngay 12 thang 9 nam 2020, tuyen suin kho hep hoat dong cho den nam 1995 va toa nha ga vao thoi diem do duoc su dung lam phong nghi cho nhan vien cua cac nha may gan do trong mot thoi gian ngay ca sau khi nha ga bi dong cua va bi pha bo vao nua dau nam 2013
alycia parks va taylor townsend la nha vo dich, danh bai nicole melichar-martinez va ellen perez trong tran chung ket, 6–7(1–7), 6–4, [10–6]. lyudmyla kichenok va jeļena ostapenko la duong kim vo dich, nhung thua o vong 2 truoc parks va townsend. hat giong. 4 hat giong hang dau duoc mien vao vong 2. 
maximo gonzalez va andres molteni la nha vo dich, danh bai jamie murray va michael venus trong tran chung ket, 3–6, 6–1, [11–9]. day la danh hieu atp tour masters 1000 dau tien cua gonzalez va molteni. rajeev ram va joe salisbury la duong kim vo dich, nhung thua o vong 2 truoc gonzalez va molteni. hat giong. 4 hat giong hang dau duoc mien vao vong 2.  ket qua. chung ket. &lt;section begin=finals /&gt;&lt;section end=finals /&gt;
coco gauff la nha vo dich, danh bai karolina muchova trong tran chung ket, 6–3, 6–4. day la danh hieu wta 1000 dau tien cua gauff va la tran chung ket wta 1000 dau tien cua ca gauff va muchova. co cung tro thanh tay vot tre nhat vo dich giai dau. voi viec vao tran chung ket, muchova co lan dau tien vao top 10 tren bang xep hang wta. caroline garcia la duong kim vo dich, nhung thua o vong 2 truoc sloane stephens. hat giong. 8 hat giong hang dau duoc mien vao vong 2. 
novak djokovic la nha vo dich, danh bai carlos alcaraz trong tran chung ket, 5–7, 7–6(9–7), 7–6(7–4). day la danh hieu cincinnati masters thu 3 va la danh hieu atp tour masters 1000 thu 39 cua djokovic. tran dau giua djokovic va alcaraz la tran chung ket atp tour theo the thuc danh ba thang hai dai nhat va cung la tran dau dai nhat trong lich su giai dau, voi 3 tieng 49 phut. borna ćorić la duong kim vo dich, nhung thua o vong 2 truoc hubert hurkacz. alcaraz va djokovic canh tranh vi tri so 1 bang xep hang don atp. alcaraz giu nguyen thu hang sau khi vao tran chung ket. day la giai dau dau tien cua djokovic o hoa ky ke tu sau giai quan vot my mo rong 2021, sau khi yeu cau tiem chung vac-xin covid-19 doi voi hanh khach quoc te duoc do bo vao thang 5 nam 2023. hat giong. 8 hat giong hang dau duoc mien vao vong 2.  ket qua. chung ket. &lt;section begin=finals /&gt;&lt;section end=finals /&gt;
western &amp; southern open 2023 la mot giai quan vot nam va nu thi dau tren mat san cung ngoai troi dien ra tu ngay 13 den ngay 20 thang 8 nam 2023. day la mot giai dau masters 1000 trong atp tour 2023 va wta 1000 khong mandatory trong wta tour 2023. giai dau nam 2023 la lan thu 122 (nam) va lan thu 95 (nu) giai cincinnati masters duoc to chuc va dien ra tai lindner family tennis center o mason, ohio, ngoai o phia bac cincinnati, hoa ky. noi dung don atp. hat giong. duoi day la nhung tay vot duoc xep loai hat giong. hat giong dua tren bang xep hang atp vao ngay 7 thang 8 nam 2023. xep hang va diem truoc vao ngay 14 thang 8 nam 2023. van dong vien khac. dac cach: bao toan thu hang: vuot qua vong loai: thua cuoc may man: noi dung doi atp. van dong vien khac. dac cach: noi dung don wta. hat giong. duoi day la nhung tay vot duoc xep loai hat giong. hat giong dua tren bang xep hang wta vao ngay 7 thang 8 nam 2023. xep hang va diem truoc vao ngay 14 thang 8 nam 2023. † diem tu ket qua tot nhat cua lan 16 (cho diem bao ve) hoac ket qua tot nhat cua lan 17 (cho diem thang), vao ngay 14 thang 8 nam 2023.&lt;br&gt; ‡ diem tu giai wta 1000 khong mandatory thu hai tot nhat cua tay vot, phai duoc tinh vao xep hang cua tay vot.&lt;br&gt; § khong thay doi diem vi diem tu giai dau khong duoc tinh la mot trong 16 ket qua tot nhat cua tay vot. van dong vien khac. dac cach: bao toan thu hang: vuot qua vong loai: thua cuoc may man: noi dung doi wta. van dong vien khac. dac cach: bao toan thu hang: thay the:
phosphoryl hoa oxy hoa hoac phosphoryl hoa lien ket van chuyen dien tu hoac oxy hoa dau cuoi la con duong trao doi chat trong do te bao su dung enzyme de oxy hoa chat dinh duong, do do giai phong nang luong hoa hoc de tao ra adenosine triphosphate (atp). o sinh vat nhan chuan, dieu nay dien ra ben trong ti the. hau nhu tat ca sinh vat hieu khi deu thuc hien qua trinh phosphoryl hoa oxy hoa. con duong nay rat pho bien vi no giai phong nhieu nang luong hon cac qua trinh len men thay the nhu ky khi glycolysis. tnang luong duoc luu tru trong cac lien ket hoa hoc cua glucose duoc te bao giai phong trong chu trinh acid citric tao ra carbon dioxide, va nang luong chat cho dien tu nadh va fadh. phosphoryl hoa oxy hoa su dung cac phan tu nay va o2 de tao ra atp,duoc su dung khap te bao bat cu khi nao can nang luong. trong qua trinh phosphoryl hoa oxy hoa, cac electron duoc chuyen tu cac chat cho dien tu sang mot loat chat nhan dien tu trong mot chuoi phan ung oxy hoa khu ket thuc bang oxy, phan ung giai phong mot nua tong nang luong.
martin perscheid (16 thang 2 nam 1966 – 31 thang 7 nam 2021) la mot hoa si truyen tranh nguoi duc. ong da tao ra mot nhan vat chinh vao nam 1994, nhan vat nay xuat hien tu nam 1998 voi tua de "perscheids abgründe" (tam dich la "vuc tham cua perscheid"). hon 4.300 cot tranh biem hoa da xuat hien tren mot so to bao va tap chi cua duc. ong con duoc biet den voi "cai nhin khong so hai ve vuc tham cua con nguoi ve phan biet gioi tinh, phan biet chung toc, su thieu hieu biet, tham nhung va ngu si tat ca duoc ghi lai duoi su hai huoc cua hai den." cuoc doi. perscheid sinh ra o wesseling vao ngay 16 thang 2 nam 1966, noi ong da song va lam viec cho den khi qua doi. ong da duoc dao tao lam mot hoa si in thach ban. perscheid da ket hon va co hai con nhung vao thoi diem qua doi, ong dang co moi quan he tinh cam voi dong nghiep la nu hoa si truyen tranh nadia menze. perscheid qua doi vao ngay 31 thang 7 nam 2021 sau mot thoi gian dai doi mat voi can benh ung thu.  sinh ra trong mot gia dinh cong giao, perscheid som tro thanh mot nguoi theo chu nghia vo than va nhan van, dieu nay anh huong dang ke den su nghiep cua ong. tu nam 2020 cho den khi qua doi, ong la thanh vien ban co van cua giordano bruno foundation, mot to chuc phi loi nhuan den tu duc nham thuc day chu nghia nhan van tien hoa va su khai sang. truyen tranh. phong cach ve cua perscheid duoc so sanh voi phong cach cua gary larson. cac chu de trong truyen tranh cua ong thuong la cham biem, ke ca nhung chu de bi cho la cam ky va thuong bao gom ca hai den. loat truyen tranh cua ong duoc ve o dinh dang o thang dung khong thay doi, co khung mau den, duoc ve bang cac net thua thot va phong net ve mot cach chinh xac ("mit zielsicherer pointenführung"). cac tac pham cua perscheid da duoc dang tren nhieu to bao va tap chi cua duc. nam 1994, ong gia nhap lappan verlag va gan bo cho den khi qua doi. sau do, vi hoa si nay con sang tao ra nhan vat chinh cua minh, mot nguoi dan ong hoi dau, deo kinh va la nguoi thay the cho chinh ban than perscheid. loat truyen hoat hinh xoay quanh nhan vat cua ong nam 1996 co ten la "perscheids abgründe". ong da ve hon hon 4.300 tranh biem hoa ve tac pham. perscheid da xuat ban cuon sach dau tien cua minh vao nam 1995. trong su nghiep cua minh, ong da cho ra mat hon 25 cuon sach voi truyen tranh.  giai thuong va di san. truyen tranh cua perscheid da duoc trung bay tai cac vien bao tang, bao gom mot buoi trung bay tai bao tang caricatura o kassel va bao tang der niederrheinischen seele vao nam 2017. perscheid da nhan duoc nhieu giai thuong cho su nghiep cua minh, bao gom giai thuong max &amp; moritz 2002 cho hang muc truyen tranh bang tieng duc hay nhat, cung nhu "kulturplakette" (giai thuong van hoa) tu que huong wesseling cua ban than ong. bao tang caricatura da vinh danh ong bang mot tac pham dieu khac nhan vat hoat hinh cua ong co ten la "der unbekannte idiot" (tam dich la "ke ngoc vo danh"). sau khi qua doi, nha xuat ban cua perscheid bay to trong cao pho rang: "su dung cam cua ong ay khi nhin thoang qua tan cung vuc tham cua con nguoi ve phan biet gioi tinh, phan biet chung toc, su thieu hieu biet, tham nhung va ngu si, cung nhu cach ong the hien lai tat ca nhung dieu nay trong truyen tranh voi su che nhao gay gat va hai den la dieu doc nhat vo nhi."
fundadores de sao paulo (tam dich: nhung vi dang sang lap sao paulo) la mot tuong dai nam o khu pho vila mariana cua sao paulo, brazil. tac pham duoc tac boi nha dieu khac nguoi brazil nham vinh danh nhung vi thuy to co cong sang lap thanh pho. tuong dai duoc khanh thanh vao ngay 25 thang 1 nam 1963 sau 10 nam xay dung. mo ta. tuong dai duoc dieu khac boi luis morrone, co vi tri nam tren pho nabia abdala chohfi, o goc dai lo sargento mario kozel filho, gan r. manoel da nobrega, trong khu pho vila mariana cua sao paulo, brazil. tac pham dieu khac nay nam giua nha thi dau ibirapuera va dai tuong niem bandeiras. tuong dai nam o phia truoc , nhung ban dau duoc dat gan praça da se cho den nhung nam 1970. co chin nhan vat tuong dong duoc dieu khac trong tac pham, trong do co 3 nhan vat mang vai tro ton giao (, va ), 2 nha tham hiem nguoi bo dao nha (martim afonso de souza va ) va 3 nguoi ban xu (bartira, tibiriça va cau be curumim). nhan vat thu chin la mot em be nam trong long bartira khong duoc xac dinh ro danh tinh. mot cay thanh gia duoc dat o trung tam nham de cap den ton giao chu yeu cua thanh pho la cong giao. hai tam bang tren be da hoa cuong dai dien cho quan chung nhan dan dau tien o sao paulo va su thanh lap cua sao vicente. phan chinh cua tuong dai duoc lam bang dong va da hoa cuong co kich thuoc , nam tren mot be da cung lam tu da hoa cuong co kich thuoc . cay thanh gia o vi tri trung tam co chieu cao . lich su. viec xay dung tuong dai bat dau bang viec dat vien da nen vao ngay 18 thang 10 nam 1952 va duoc hoan thanh vao nam 1962. tac pham duoc khanh thanh vao ngay 25 thang 1 nam 1963 vao ngay ky niem thanh lap thanh pho. tam bang tuong trung cho quan chung nhan dan dau tien da bi lay trom vao nam 2004. va vi khong co buc anh nao chup lai tam bang nay, no da duoc thay the bang mot tam bang tam thoi ghi lai vu trom. it nhat ke tu nam 2016 duong nhu khong con cay thanh gia nao ngoai tru cay thanh gia dang dat o vi tri giua.
katie higgins cook (nhu danh johnson) la mot nu phi cong nguoi my thuoc thuy quan luc chien. nam 2015, co tro thanh nu phi cong dau tien cua blue angels, va dieu khien chiec may bay van tai c-130 "fat albert" trong hai mua. cuoc bieu dien dau tien cua co voi doi blue angels dien ra o el centro, california, vao thang 3 nam 2015. co con duoc biet voi ten katie higgins va gia nhap blue angels o tuoi 28. dau doi va hoc van. higgins la phi cong the he thu ba, co sinh truong trong mot gia dinh theo quan su thuong chuyen den sinh song o california va nhat ban. cha co, bill johnson, tot nghiep hoc vien hai quan nam 1981, ong da dieu khien chiec f-18 hornet trong hai quan hoa ky roi lam ky su cho northrop grumman. co tot nghiep trung hoc w. t. woodson o fairfax, virginia nam 2004. higgins hoan thanh bang cu nhan khoa hoc ve khoa hoc chinh tri tai hoc vien hai quan hoa ky o annapolis, maryland vao nam 2008. co nhan bang sac phong ham thieu uy tu thuy quan luc chien hoa ky, co theo hoc an ninh quoc te tai dai hoc georgetown va hoan thanh bang thac si xa hoi va nhan van nam 2009. co co mot nguoi em trai hoat dong trong linh vuc chat no tot nghiep truong annapolis nam 2010. su nghiep. higgins tro thanh phi cong hai quan thuoc phi doi vmgr-252. co phuc vu tai afghanistan de ho tro chien dich tu do ben vung. o tuoi 26, trong hanh dong dau tien chong lai taliban vao nam 2013, co dieu khien chiec kc-130 (tin hieu goi "filth02"), ban hai ten lua hellfire va loai bo vi tri quan dich, cuu song mot nhom thuy quan luc chien. co trien khai den chau phi cung de ho tro cac hoat dong du phong. trong nam 2015, co da bay gan 400 gio chien dau qua bay quoc gia. blue angels. vao thang 7 nam 2014, blue angels tuyen chon higgins va cac si quan khac vao doi bieu dien nam 2015. thong bao duoc dua ra ngay sau khi cuu chi huy cua blue angels, ham truong gregory mcwherter bi khien trach khi de cap duoi xem hinh anh khieu dam trong buong lai cung nhung hanh vi dam o khac. higgins nhan nhung binh luan ly do duy nhat co duoc chon vi la phu nu, nhung khang dinh voi blue angels, "ung vien thich hop nhat se co duoc cong viec – khong quan trong gioi tinh nao." higgins tham gia cuoc bieu dien blue angels dau tien vao thang 3 nam 2015. chiec c-130 hercules mang ten "fat albert", do co lai luan phien cung voi cac thuy quan luc chien khac, la phan mo dau cua cuoc bieu dien blue angels keo dai khoang tam phut. dien tap nhanh nhat do fat albert thuc hien duoc goi la "con duong bang phang", bay voi toc do 370 dam tren gio o do cao 40 feet. cac dien tap khac bao gom "vuot qua duyet binh", qua do cao 300 foot o goc 60 do va "leo doc", leo 45 do toi do cao 1.200 foot, tiep theo lao xuong mui doc dung gay ra khong trong luong doi voi hanh khach o phia sau may bay. trong nam 2019, co duoc biet voi ten katie higgins cook voi quan ham thieu ta. truyen thong. nam 2020, cook tro thanh khach moi trong buoi ra mat mua thu 24 cua chuong trinh "the bachelor". trong chuong trinh, co giup phi cong peter weber thuoc delta air lines, to chuc mot buoi hen ho theo nhom, trong do anh dua cac thi sinh nu vuot qua chuong trinh huan luyen bay bao gom di bang con quay hoi chuyen. katie higgins cook duoc vinh danh trong "american valor: a salute to our heroes", mot chuong trinh truyen hinh dac biet tung doat giai emmy do trung tam cuu chien binh hoa ky san xuat va dan chuyen boi harrison ford. gia dinh. katie higgins ket hon voi dusty cook la phi cong cua blue angels, ca hai gap nhau lan dau o vmgr-252 va bat dau hen ho sau khi dusty cook roi khoi doi blue angels. ho co hai nguoi con va sinh song o texas.
trong suc ben cac mon the thao nhu dap xe duong dai va chay bo duong dai, dung tuong la tinh trang dot ngot met moi va mat nang luong do can kiet glycogen du tru trong gan va co. cac truong hop nhe hon co the duoc khac phuc bang cach nghi ngoi ngan va an thuc an hoac do uong co chua carbohydrate. mat khac, no co the duoc khac phuc bang cach dat duoc ho hap lan thu hai bang cach nghi khoang 10 phut hoac bang cach giam toc do dang ke va tang toc do tu tu trong khoang thoi gian 10 phut. muoi phut la khoang thoi gian can thiet de axit beo tu do san xuat du atp de dap ung nhu cau gia tang.. co the tranh duoc tinh trang nay thuong bang cach dam bao rang muc glycogen cao khi bat dau tap luyen, duy tri muc glucose trong khi tap luyen bang cach an hoac uong cac chat giau carbohydrate hoac bang cach giam cuong do tap luyen. co xuong chu yeu dua vao glycogenolysis trong vai phut dau tien khi no chuyen tu trang thai nghi ngoi sang hoat dong, cung nhu trong suot hoat dong hieu khi cuong do cao va tat ca cac hoat dong ky khi. viec thieu glycogen gay ra luong du tru atp thap trong cac te bao co dang tap luyen. cho den khi dat duoc ho hap lan thu hai (tang san xuat atp chu yeu tu axit beo tu do), cac trieu chung cua du tru atp thap khi tap luyen co do can kiet glycogen bao gom: moi co, co chuot rut, dau co nhip tim nhanh khong phu hop khi tap the duc (nhip tim nhanh), kho tho (kho tho) hoac tho nhanh (tho nhanh), phong dai tim mach phan ung voi tap the duc (nhip tim nhanh &amp; kho tho/tho nhanh). tim co gang bu dap cho su thieu hut nang luong bang cach tang nhip tim de toi da hoa viec cung cap oxy va nhien lieu tu mau den cac te bao co de phosphoryl hoa oxy hoa. khong co glycogen trong co, dieu quan trong la phai buoc vao con gio thu hai ma khong di qua nhanh, qua som cung nhu khong co gang vuot qua con dau. di qua nhanh, qua som khuyen khich chuyen hoa protein hon chuyen hoa chat beo va dau co trong truong hop nay la ket qua cua ton thuong co do du tru atp thap nghiem trong.
mim-46 mauler la mot he thong ten lua phong khong co dong duoc phat trien boi general dynamics tu cuoi nhung nam 1950s nham dap ung yeu cau cua luc quan my ve mot he thong ten lua phong khong chong lai muc tieu bay thap nhu may bay cuong kich va cac ten lua dan dao tam ngan. he thong duoc dat tren xe thiet giap xm546, dua tren khung gam xe thiet giap m-113, cung voi trang bi chin ten lua mim-46, radar chuyen theo doi va chieu xa muc tieu bang song lien tuc va he thong dieu khien hoa luc. la mot thiet ke co nhieu tham vong vao thoi diem no ra doi, mauler da trai qua qua trinh phat trien gap nhieu van de va kho khan, nen no da bi huy bo vao thang 11 nam 1965. viec huy bo chuong trinh phat trien mim-46 da khien cho quan doi my bi bo trong khong co mot vu khi phong khong luc quan hien dai nao trong trang bi, bat buoc luc quan my phai day nhanh viec phat trien he thong mim-72 chaparral va m163 tracked vulcan don gian hon nhieu de trang bi. nhung he thong vu khi nay co tinh nang thap hon nhieu so voi mim-46 mauler, va chi dong vai tro la mot giai phap tam thoi cho den khi phat trien he thong phong khong moi cao cap hon. mac du vay, chung khong bi loai bien cho den tan cuoi nhung nam 1990s. ca hai quan my va hai quan anh deu mong doi rang mauler se dam duong tot vai tro phong khong tam ngan ma hai luc luong nay van con thieu. sau khi chuong trinh phat trien mim-46 mauler bi huy bo, ca hai da phat trien ten lua phong khong tam ngan rim-7 sea sparrow va rapier, de dam duong vai tro phong khong tam ngan. boi canh ra doi. duster va vigilante. sau chien tranh the gioi thu hai, cac loai vu khi phong khong co dong dau tien ma luc quan my phat trien deu duoc dua tren phao phong khong bofors co nong 40 mm voi ten goi la m19 multiple gun motor carriage sau do la m42 duster. lan dau duoc dua vao trang bi nam 1952, he thong phao phong khong duster nhanh chong tro nen loi thoi do toc do va tinh nang cua may bay ngay mot duoc nang cao. do do viec theo doi, bam muc tieu, xac dinh khoang cach toi muc tieu thu cong da tro nen loi thoi va quan doi my da trien khai them radar raduster cho he thong duster. den nam 1955 nguoi ta nhan ra rang can phai phat trien loai khi tai moi de dap ung yeu cau dat ra chu khong the nang cap m42 duster duoc them nua. do do vao nam 1956 ke hoach dat ra la cai tien he thong dieu khien hoa luc t50 cho he thong raduster. do yeu cau dat ra la chong lai may bay phan luc bay cao toi va tam ban thang la , cac ky su da ket hop phao 37 mm gatling len khung gam m113 armored personnel carrier tao thanh he thong phong khong moi mang ten t249 vigilante cuoi nam 1956. ngoai ra con co mot phien ban t248 dang xe keo cung duoc phat trien. mac du vigilante ngam ban bang quang hoc giong nhu duster, nhung van toc ban cao cua no (3.000 phat/phut) giup no co hieu suat tot hon nhieu trong viec chong muc tieu bay co van toc lon. khi chuong trinh phat trien phao phong khong vigilante con dang tien hanh, luc quan my da dua ra quyet dinh se huy bo cac chuong trinh phat trien phao phong khong do vo dung truoc may bay phan luc co van toc lon cung voi thoi gian giao chien giam xuong. phao phong khong vigilante co tam ban hieu dung khoang , va dan phao se mat khoang 5 giay de bay toi cu ly toi da, trong khi may bay phan luc bay o van toc da di chuyen duoc hon mot km trong khoang thoi gian nay. do do, he thong radar ngam ban se khong the dua ra giai phap de dieu khien phao ban trung dich. sau cung luc quan my da quyet dinh tiep tuc su dung phao phong khong duster trong luc cho doi giai doan phat trien thu 3 (phase iii) phat trien loai ten lua phong khong co nang luc de thay the no. phase iii. phase iii duoc mong doi se dap ung yeu cau cap thiet cua luc quan my ve he thong phong khong co dong. he thong co kich thuoc nho, co kha nang co dong va co kha nang ban may bay bay o do cao len toi 10.000 feet.  faad. trong du an "phong khong khu vuc phia truoc-forward area air defense", luc quan my trien khai thu thap cac thong so ly thuyet de phat trien he thong phong khong dua tren ten lua vao nam 1959. he thong dan duong cho ten lua la mot moi quan tam chinh. phan lon cac he thong ten lua phong khong trong thoi ky nay deu su dung phuong phap dan duong bang radar ban chu dong, voi radar mat dat de chieu xa muc tieu, song phan xa tro lai tu muc tieu duoc thu lai boi bo phan thu tin hieu dat tren dau ten lua. he thong nay co uu diem la tin hieu radar se ngay cang manh hon khi ten lua ngay cang bay lai gan muc tieu, khien no de dang bam muc tieu. ngoai ra tin hieu phan xa tu muc tieu co dang hinh con, do do cang tang do chinh xac khi ten lua tiep can muc tieu. ve nhuoc diem, viec su dung dan duong bang radar ban chu dong sarh cung dong nghia voi viec cac tin hieu radar phan xa tu noi khac cung se duoc ten lua thu nhan va lam nhieu dau do cua ten lua. cac ten lua sarh doi dau thuong de dang bi nhieu boi cac tin hieu radar phan xa tu cay, cac toa nha hoac phan xa boi mat dat. rat kho de ten lua co kha nang xac dinh dung dau la tin hieu phan xa tu muc tieu trong mot moi truong day dac nhieu nhu vay. trong du an faad, luc quan hoa ky quyet dinh su dung phuong phap lai ten lua bang chum tia. phuong phap nay da duoc su dung tu rat som tren ten lua rim-2 terrier, tuy nhien no da bi bo xo do quan doi ua thich he thong dan duong bang radar ban chu dong do cac uu diem liet ke ben tren. tin hieu lai ten lua co dang hinh con dong nghia voi viec ten lua se ngay cang "thieu chinh xac" khi bay gan den muc tieu. phan lon cac ten lua su dung phuong phap lai ten lua theo chum tia nhu mot phuong phap phu de dan duong giai doan cuoi. mac du co cac nhuoc diem nhu tren, nhung phuong phap lai ten lua bang chum tia da tro thanh phuong an de dan duong cho ten lua o tam thap gan mat dat trong du an faad. do tin hieu dieu khien duoc thu lai qua canh than ten lua, tin hieu se van gan nhu khong bi nhieu. faad su dung radar voi hieu ung doppler de xac dinh chinh xac muc tieu trong moi truong nhieu nen. o giai doan cuoi, faad su dung he thong do tim hong ngoai tien tien. faad se co che do hoat dong ban tu dong. trong chien dau, kip dieu khien co the lua chon muc tieu tren radar tim kiem tu xa va ra lenh phong bang giong noi. sau do he thong may tinh se tu dong dieu khien va dan ban ten lua ngay khi muc tieu bay vao tam ban. sau khi chay mo phong monte carlo tren may tinh ibm 650, cac nha thiet ke su dung dau dan no vang manh thay vi dau dan continuous-rod warhead. de co dong, he thong duoc dat tren khung gam xe m113, loai xe thiet giap cho quan tot nhat cua luc quan my khi do. sau khi sua doi xe m113 mang dinh danh xm-546. phat trien. general dynamics (convair pomona division) danh duoc hop dong phat trien he thong phong khong moi vao nam 1959. chuong trinh phat trien mauler duoc bat dau vao thang nam nam 1959 nhung thuc su duoc trien khai tu thang ba nam 1960. luc quan my khong phai la khach hang duy nhat cua he thong mauler, ca hai quan my va luc quan anh cung du kien se trang bi loai ten lua phong khong nay. tu nam 1960, hai quan my phat trien he thong mang ten "basic point defense missile system", voi viec sua doi mauler tro thanh "rim-46a sea mauler". tham chi tau ho tong cua hai quan my da duoc che tao voi du dia de lap dat ong phong ten lua sea mauler khi no duoc tiep nhan. viec phat trien he thong tren nhieu nen tang khac nhau kha phuc tap. trong do van de dac thu la su tuong hop cua he thong nhan dien dich ta (iff). viec phat trien cau hinh khi dong hoc cua ten lua va dong co dien ra rat nhanh chong. tuy nhien hai lan phong thu nghiem khong dieu khien va co dieu khien deu gap nhieu van de. trong khi do anh va nato da phat trien thanh cong rapier missile la mot he thong tuong tu nhu mauler. van de. von phat trien he thong mauler bi han che va viec phat trien bi keo dai toi hai nam. ke hoach san xuat duoc dieu chinh lai vao nam 1963 khi he thong phao phong khong m42 duster bi loai bien. chuong trinh feasibility validation program duoc de ra nam 1963 de xac dinh lieu mauler co kha nang duoc phat trien thanh cong trong khoang thoi gian va chi phi hop ly. chuong trinh di den ket luan rang mauler co kha nang chong lai may bay phan luc va may bay canh quat du o cu ly khong khong nhu mong doi. chuong trinh phat trien mauler bi khai tu thang bay nam 1965 khong lam gioi chuyen mon bat ngo. thieu von, thieu dan duong tu trung tam chi huy, thay doi ve yeu cau dac tinh ky thuat, va cac van de ky thuat moi chua duoc kiem chung da dan den tuong lai mu mit cua chuong trinh phat trien mauler. ket qua cua sau nam phat trien cuoi cung la su huy bo. huy bo chuong trinh. luc nay da co nhieu nghi ngai ve viec he thong phong khong se duoc trien khai som. ngay 16 thang chin nam 1963, army materiel command yeu cau aviation and missile command nghien cuu kha nang phat trien he thong ten lua phong khong tam ngan dua tren aim-9 sidewinder. theo danh gia cua co quan nay, viec chuyen doi se don gian, nhung se khong hieu qua. ban luc quan voi su ho tro tu army air defense artillery school tai fort bliss, da bat dau nghien cuu moi duoi su lanh dao cua lieutenant colonel edward hirsch. theo do uy ban nay dua ra mot he thong phong khong nhieu lop bao gom he thong ten lua phong khong mim-72 chaparral mang ten lua sidewinder dam nhiem phong khong tam xa va he thong m163 vads duoc trang bi phao m61 vulcan dong vai tro phong khong tam gan, va radar canh bao phia truoc an/mpq-49 forward area alerting radar se gui tin hieu cho ca hai he thong phong thu. ngoai ra nhung to hop phong khong tren se duoc ho tro boi ten lua phong khong vac vai fim-43 redeye. mac du co the khong hieu qua nhu mauler nhung nhung to hop phong khong nay se duoc san xuat va trang bi som hon nhieu trong khi qua trinh phat trien mot he thong phong khong tien tien van con chua hoan thien. thang muoi mot nam 1963, mauler duoc dinh huong se su dung cac cong nghe kem tien tien hon, mot vai mau thu nghiem da duoc de xuat nhung van khong duoc trang bi truoc nam 1969. cac thu nghiem van duoc tiep tuc cho den khi toan bo chuong trinh bi huy bo vao thang muoi mot nam 1965. chaparral cung voi dau do hong ngoai cua mauler da to ra co hieu qua cao hon nhieu so voi nguyen mau aim-9c. cai ket. su ket hop cua bo doi chaparral/vulcan la su bo sung hoan hao trong khi mot he thong phong khong hoan thien hon duoc phat trien. tuy nhien trong nhung nam 1970s cac moi de doa duong khong chuyen tu may bay cuong kich-bom chien thuat sang may bay truc thang mang ten lua co kha nang tan cong tu phia sau doi hinh can bao ve. dieu nay dan den viec can thiet phai co he thong dua tren sung phao ban nhanh, co tam ban xa hon tam ban 1.200 met cua phao vulcan. mot giai phap dua ra la su dung m247 sergeant york. tuy nhien chuong trinh phat trien phao nay gap nhieu van de ky thuat dan den bi huy bo vao nam 1985. sau khi chuong trinh phat trien sergeant york bi huy bo, luc quan my tham gia cung voi luc quan canada de phat trien mot he thong moi voi cai ten adats dua tren phao oelingkon, rat tuong dong voi nguyen mau cua mauler cung dua tren khung gam xe m113. adats co nang luc tot hon mauler, voi tam ban toi 10 km va toc do ten lua cao hon. tuy nhien, sau khi chien tranh lanh ket thuc, luc quan hoa ky da rut khoi chuong trinh phat trien adats. vai tro phong khong duoc thuc hien boi he thong bradley linebacker, dua tren fim-92 stinger. hai quan my trong khi do can thu co the thay the duoc rim-24 tartar, hai quan my cung tim kiem mot loai vu khi co kha nang thay the cho cac he thong sung phong khong tam ngan tren ham tau cua minh. hai quan mong doi mauler se duoc trang bi tren khong chi la tau hien dai nhat cua hai quan khi do nhu lop knox ma con hinh thanh nen mot cau hinh phong khong co ban cua hai quan my vao nhung nam 1970s. nguoi ta cung tin tuong rang mauler se cai thien dang ke kha nang phong khong cua cac tau co nho, giup no co kha nang dam duong nhiem vu tuong duong mot phan voi cac tau co lon hon nhu tau khu truc. tuy nhien, sau khi chuong trinh mauler bi huy bo, hai quan my buoc phai khoi dong lai chuong trinh da do dang truoc do de phat trien mot he thong phu hop. do ten lua hong ngoai sidewinder bi gioi han trong viec chong lai muc tieu bay nhu may bay va ten lua bay den truc dien, nen hai quan my da su dung aim-7 sparrow de thay the. du cho sparrow la mot ten lua tot, nhung no duoc thiet ke chuyen biet de doi pho voi may bay toc do cao do do no co gia toc kha thap, doi lai cho viec bay hanh trinh o cu ly xa hon va tam ban lon hon. do do, mot dong co moi da duoc phat trien va trang bi rieng cho rim-7 sea sparrow, mot ten lua moi dua tren aim-7. de dan duong cho ten lua, mot radar chieu xa thu cong moi duoc phat trien. radar tim kiem muc tieu cua tau chien se gui thong tin ve muc tieu thong qua kenh am thanh toi kip dieu khien, kip dieu khien se van hanh thu cong huong chum tia radar ve phia muc tieu va phong ten lua. ten lua se duoc chua trong tam ong phong quay. toan bo he thong lon hon nhieu so voi mauler nhung lai co tam ban ngan hon, va mat nhieu thoi gian de chuyen trang thai chien dau hon. do nguyen mau sea sparrow don gian va tinh nang khong cao, no da nhanh chong duoc nang cap. nho ap dung kieu canh co the gap lai duoc nen da lam giam kich thuoc cua ong phong ten lua, va he thong tu dong bat bam muc tieu cung som duoc bo sung cho radar chieu muc tieu. sea sparrow con tiep tuc duoc nang cap voi radar mang pha tren cac tau chien hien dai giup truc tiep dan duong cho ten lua sparrow, thay vi su dung radar chieu xa cong kenh truoc kia. phien ban moi nhat co kha nang phong tu gieng phong thang dung giup tang dang ke so ten lua co the mang tren tau. cuoi cung, hai quan va luc quan my da tim duoc giai phap cho cau hoi phong thu, bat dau tu mauler cho den cac he thong co kha nang tot hon rat nhieu.
  cum tap doan quan nam ukraina (, ) la mot phien hieu doi hinh tac chien chien luoc cap cum tap doan quan cua lien quan duc quoc xa va vuong quoc rumani tren mat tran phia dong trong the chien thu hai. cum tap doan quan nay dat ban doanh tai slanic-moldova, chiu trach nhiem tren tuyen mat tran dai 680 km, trong do gan phan nua do quan romania tran giu. khu vuc hoat dong cua no bao phu toan bo mien dong romania, tu mot duong 40 km ve phia dong bucharest. hoat dong. cum tap doan quan nam ukraina duoc thanh lap vao ngay 5 thang 4 nam 1944 tren co so doi ten thanh tu cum tap doan quan a. quan so luc cao diem cua cum tap doan quan nay len den 905.000 nguoi (gom 500.000 quan duc va 405.000 quan rumani), 400 xe tang va phao xung kich (gom 120 xe tang va 280 phao xung kich), 7.600 phao cac loai, 810 may bay cum tap doan quan nay tham chien trong chien dich iaşi–chişinau va sau khi chiu thuong vong nang ne duoc doi ten thanh cum tap doan quan nam vao nua dem ngay 23 thang 9 nam 1944. 
ca trau tien vua co the la:
channa amphibeus la mot loai ca loc trong chi "channa" (ca qua/ca loc) thuoc ho channidae co nguon goc tu an do (bang tay bengal, assam?) va co the co o bhutan. mau dien hinh thu thap tai song chail (cua song khoang 6 km o phia bac jalpaiguri), chi luu ta ngan cua song teesta - chi luu huu ngan cua song brahmaputra tai bang tay bengal, an do. "c. amphibeus" co kich thuoc dai toi da toi 90 cm. loai nay tung bi nham lan voi "channa barca" co o bang assam.
tam tri te () la mot dao cat nho thuoc nhom dao an vinh, quan dao hoang sa. no nam giua dao trung va dao nam, nhung gan dao nam hon. cac toa do dia ly la 16°57'00"n vi do bac va 112°19'48"e kinh do dong. hien tai, dao nay dang duoc quan ly boi thanh pho tam sa, tinh hai nam, trung quoc. thuc the nay moi duoc trung quoc dat ten vao ngay 19 thang 4, 2020.&lt;mapframe latitude="16.949590" longitude="112.330323" zoom="16" width="508" height="204" text="tam tri te (dao nho, giua). goc ben phai la dao nam." align="center" /&gt;
trong bong da chuyen nghiep, mot vu chuyen nhuong la hanh dong duoc thuc hien bat cu khi nao mot cau thu theo hop dong di chuyen giua cac cau lac bo. no de cap den viec chuyen dang ky cua mot cau thu tu cau lac bo bong da nay sang mot cau lac bo bong da khac. noi chung, cac cau thu chi co the duoc chuyen nhuong trong ky chuyen nhuong va theo cac quy tac do co quan quan ly dat ra (dap ung cac yeu cau cua fifa, cac co quan cap chau luc va quoc gia dieu chinh cac cau lac bo mua va ban). phi chuyen nhuong thuong luong la khoan boi thuong tai chinh theo thoa thuan duoc tra tu mot cau lac bo quan tam, cho cau lac bo so huu quyen thi dau theo hop dong doc quyen cua cau thu. khi mot cau thu chuyen tu cau lac bo nay sang cau lac bo khac, hop dong cu cua ho se bi cham dut trong khi cau thu va cau lac bo dich moi cua ho se thuong luong ve cac dieu khoan hop dong moi (hoac da cung nhau dong y truoc do ve cac dieu khoan ca nhan). do do, phi chuyen nhuong co chuc nang nhu boi thuong tai chinh (tra cho cau lac bo so huu cac quyen thi dau hien co) doi voi cham dut hop dong cua mot cau thu bong da chuyen nghiep duoc hai ben dong y som. phi chuyen nhuong phu thuoc vao kha nang choi bong hien tai cua cau thu, tiem nang trong tuong lai, thoi han cua hop dong hien tai, so tien luong no trong tuong lai (trong thoi han con lai cua hop dong hien tai) va su san long cua cac cau lac bo trong viec dong y can bang kinh te thong qua cung va cau. chuyen nhuong trong hiep hoi bong da khac dang ke so voi giao dich trong cac mon the thao cua my, canada va uc, trong do cac doi ve co ban giao dich hop dong cau thu hien co. tuy nhien, tien mat hoac nghia vu hop dong co the duoc su dung thay vi hoac voi nguoi choi, chang han nhu major league baseball va national football league de giam bot gioi han tien luong va cac moi quan tam tai chinh khac. tuy nhien, trong mot so truong hop khong pho bien, chuyen nhuong co the hoat dong theo cach tuong tu nhu giao dich cau thu, vi cac doi co the cung cap mot cau thu khac trong doi cua ho nhu mot phan cua khoan boi thuong duoi hinh thuc giao dich hoan doi, nham giam khoan boi thuong tai chinh cho phi chuyen nhuong. theo fifa, tu thang 1 den thang 9 nam 2018 da co 15.049 vu chuyen nhuong cau thu nam quoc te voi tong phi 7,1 ty usd va 577 vu chuyen nhuong quoc te cau thu nu voi gia 493.235 usd. hau het cac hoat dong chuyen nhuong duoc tien hanh trong ky chuyen nhuong mua he chau au (ky truoc mua giai o chau au), trung lap tu ngay 1 thang 7 den ngay 31 thang 8 cua bat ky nam nhat dinh nao (bao gom ca hai ngay), voi cac thay doi nho cua ca ngay bat dau va ngay ket thuc, cho moi giai dau trong nuoc tuong ung. prominent transfers also occur during the european winter transfer window of 1–31 january. most notably, the transfer deadline dates of the transfer windows, are solely reliant upon the country jurisdiction of the purchasing club, in order to successfully perform the registration of newly transferred players (football clubs worldwide may agree to sell the playing rights of any contracted player at any time to another club whose country's transfer window is still open, in addition free agents may be signed at any time outside the prescribed transfer windows).
only friends (; ; tam dich:ban cam ky)la mot bo phim truyen hinh thai lan phat song nam 2023 voi su tham gia cua kanaphan puitrakul (first), thanawat rattanakitpaisan (khaotung), jiratchapong srisang (force), kasidet plookphol (book), trai nimtawat (neo) va pakin kuna-anuvit (mark). bo phim duoc dao dien boi tichakorn phukhaotong va san xuat boi gmmtv cung voi hard feeling film. day la mot trong 19 du an phim truyen hinh cho nam 2023 duoc gmmtv gioi thieu trong su kien "gmmtv 2023 diversely yours," vao ngay 22 thang 11 nam 2022. bo phim duoc phat song vao luc 20:30 (), thu bay tren gmm 25, bat dau tu ngay 12 thang 8 nam 2023.
' (; "cong ty co phan"), thuong duoc viet tat la oy (), la thuat ngu chi mot cong ty trach nhiem huu han cua phan lan (vi du: , llc, or gmbh). con theo thuat ngu tieng thuy dien la ", thuong duoc viet tat (o phan lan) thanh ab"', con chu viet tat theo tieng thuy dien doi khi duoc viet nhu sau: "ab company oy", "oy company ab", hoac "company oy ab". cac chu viet tat da duoc tao theo nhieu kieu cach khac, chang han nhu "oy", "oy", "o.y". hoac tham chi la "o/y". dang viet tat trong tieng anh la "ltd". julkinen osakeyhtiö. "julkinen osakeyhtiö" (pl. "julkiset osakeyhtiöt") co nghia la "cong ty co phan (dai chung)" va duoc viet tat la oyj (). mot "julkinen osakeyhtiö" co the duoc niem yet tren . thuat ngu tuong tu trong tieng thuy dien la "abp" ("publikt aktiebolag"). mot "oyj" co the duoc goi la cong ty trach nhiem huu han dai chung hoac cong ty dai chung bang tieng anh va co the su dung chu viet tat la plc hoac thuat ngu cong ty trong ten tieng anh cua cong ty, vi du nhu: , va nokia corporation.
stephen hopkins (7 thang 3 nam 1707 – 13 thang 7 nam 1785) la mot thanh vien nhom lap quoc hoa ky, thong doc cua rhode island va don dien providence, chanh an cua toa an toi cao rhode island, va la nguoi ky ket ban thao hiep hoi luc dia va tuyen ngon doc lap hoa ky. ong xuat than tu mot gia dinh noi tieng o rhode island, va la chau trai cua william hopkins, mot chinh tri gia loi lac. ong co cua ong, thomas hopkins da di thuyen tu anh cung voi nguoi anh ho benedict arnold vao nam 1635 la mot trong nhung nguoi da dinh cu ban dau tai don dien providence. ve sau, benedict arnold da tro thanh thong doc dau tien cua thuoc dia rhode island theo hien chuong hoang gia nam 1663. thua be, hopkins la rat ham me doc sach, va dac biet to ra chuyen can trong cac bo mon khoa hoc, toan hoc va van hoc. ong tro thanh mot nha khao sat, nha thien van hoc va la nguoi thuc hien cac phep do trong qua trinh sao kim di qua mat troi, nam 1769. vao nam 23 tuoi, ong tham gia hoat dong cong ich o thi tran moi thanh lap thoi bay gio la scituate, rhode island. hopkins nhanh chong tro thanh tham phan cua toa an chung tham, dong thoi phuc vu voi tu cach la nguoi phat ngon cua ha vien va chu tich cua hoi dong thi tran scituate. ngoai viec hoat dong tich cuc trong cac van de dan su, hopkins con la mot thuong gia thanh dat nho vao xuong duc sat cua ong. nam 1750, hopkins la nhan vat chinh chinh trong buc tranh cham biem "sea captains carousing in surinam" cua john greenwood. thang 5 nam 1747, hopkins duoc bo nhiem lam tham phan cua toa an toi cao rhode island, cong viec duoc duy tri cho den thang 5 nam 1749. tiep do, vao thang 5 nam 1751, ong tro thanh chanh an thu ba cua co quan nay, chuc vu duoc ong nam giu ket thuc vao thang 5 nam 1755. nam 1755, hopkins tro thanh thong doc cua thuoc dia va buoc vao thoi ky nhiem ky dau tien. chuc vi nay duoc hopkins nam giu suot tu 9 den 15 nam tiep theo cua cuoc doi. vao thoi hopkins song, van de ve su dung dong tien te va mot trong nhung van de chinh tri gay mau thuan nhat. samuel ward, doi thu chinh tri hang dau cua hopkins la mot nguoi ung ho manh me cho viec dung tien te cung, trong khi hopkins ung ho dong tien giay. viec canh giua hai chinh tri gia da co luc len den dinh diem khi co lan hopkins da kien ward doi 40.000 bang anh, nhung vu kien nay cuoi cung da khong thanh cong va chinh hopskin da phai tra mot khoan chi phi cho vu kien. samuel ward, cung la mot dai bieu cua quoc hoi luc dia va da tung luan phien voi hopkins lam thong doc cua rhode island trong mot so nhiem ky. hai nguoi ho da tro thanh doi thu gay gat cua nhau. vao giua nhung nam 1760, nhung bat dong giua hopkins va ward da tro thanh moi phan tam nghiem trong doi voi chinh quyen tai rhode island, trong tinh the nay ca hopkins va ward sau do da chon cach xoa diu lan nhau mac du ban dau van khong may thanh cong. den nam 1768, samuel ward va hopkins thong qua thoa thuan va khong dung ra tranh cu, ung cu vien josias lyndon da tro thanh thong doc thu 35 cua thuoc dia rhode island va don dien providence. nam 1770, mot lan nua hopkins dam nhiem chuc vu chanh an cua toa an toi cao rhode island, ong dam nhan vai tro xu ly chinh trong vu gaspee vao nam 1772, khi nhom cong dan tai dao rhode island trong luc noi gian da tan cong ngoai khoi len mot con tau hai giam anh quoc. nam 1774, voi tu cach la mot trong hai dai bieu quoc hoi tai rhode island, ong duoc giao nhiem vu tham du dai hoi luc dia lan thu nhat cung voi samuel ward. ten tuoi cua hopkins da tro nen noi tieng tai muoi ba thuoc dia anh-my vao nam nam truoc khi hopkins cho xuat ban mot bai tieu luan nho mang ten "the rights of colonies examined" de chi trich quoc hoi anh cung chinh sach thue tai quoc gia nay. hopkins da ky ban tuyen ngon doc lap hoa ky vao mua he nam 1776, tai thoi diem nay, mot ben canh tay cua ong gap phai chung te liet nghiem trong. ong da ky ban tuyen ngon bang tay phai va dung tay trai nam chat tay con lai va noi rang, "chi co tay toi run, nhung trai tim toi thi khong." hopkins van phuc vu trong quoc hoi luc dia den thang 9 nam 1776, sau do ong da tu chuc vi suc khoe suy giam. ong la mot nguoi ung ho nhiet thanh cho truong dai hoc thuoc dia rhode island va cac don dien providence cua anh (duoc doi ten thanh dai hoc brown ve sau), va dong thoi cung la hieu truong danh du dau tien cua truong hoc nay. ong qua doi tai providence vao nam 1785 o tuoi 78 va duoc chon cat o nghia trang burial ground cua thanh pho nay. stephen hopkins duoc coi la mot nha chinh khach vi dai nhat cua rhode island. truoc do, nam 1774, hopkins nam giu sau hoac bay nguoi no le, khien ong nam trong so 5% nhung chu no hang dau o providence vao thoi dai nay. nien thieu. stephen hopkins sinh ra o providence tai thuoc dia rhode island va don dien providence, la con thu hai trong mot gia dinh co chin anh chi em, cha me ong la william va ruth hopkins (nhu danh wilkinson). ong noi cua stephen, william hopkins, la mot chinh tri gia thuoc dia noi bat va da phuc vu hon 40 nam voi tu cach la pho thu truong providence, chu tich ha vien va la thieu ta. ba noi cua stephen, abigail whipple hopkins, la con gai cua john whipple, mot trong nhung nguoi dinh cu ban dau som nhat tai providence, ba abigail cung la em gai cua joseph whipple, mot thuong gia tai providence giau co, dong thoi la di cua joseph whipple jr, pho thong doc thu 27 va 29 cua thuoc dia rhode island. ong thomas hopkins, cu co cua stephen la mot trong nhung nguoi dau tien di cu den don dien providence. thomas la mot dua tre mo coi va duoc nuoi nang boi nguoi chu william arnold, va vao nam 1635 ong cung voi nhung nguoi nha arnold trong do co benedict arnold di cu den new england, benedict la anh ho cua stephen, nguoi sau nay da tro thanh thong doc dau tien cua thuoc dia rhode island va don dien providence theo hien chuong hoang gia vao nam 1663. hopkins trai qua phan lon nhung nam dau doi cua minh tai phia bac cua providence, mot khu vuc co nhieu cay coi duoc goi la ngon doi chopmist, ve sau noi nay tro thanh thi tran scituate cua rhode island. vao thoi diem do, khu vuc nay khong co truong hoc, hopkins da tu bo sung kien thuc cho minh bang viec doc ngau nghien nhung cuon sach va tai lieu co san trong gia dinh. irving richman, mot nha su hoc da de cap hopkins la "mot cau hoc sinh nghiem tuc va chuyen can, thuong danh phan lon thoi gian cua minh de doc sach nhung luc thu nhan." john sanderson viet rang, "hopkins hoi tre gan bo voi viec nghien ngam ve sach va nhung nguoi dan ong." hopkins thua huong duoc kha nang khao sat tu nguoi ong noi samuel wilkinson. ong da su dung ky nang nay trong viec thiet ke duong pho va tao dung ban do thi tran scituate, va cung nhu cho chinh providence sau nay. khi hopkins 19 tuoi, ong nhan tu cha va tu ong noi , nhu mot phan trach nhiem cua tuoi tre. con duong chinh tri va thuong mai. hopkins bat dau hoat dong cong ich vao nam 1730 khi ong 23 tuoi, va tro thanh tham phap hoa binh cho thi tran scituate moi thanh lap bay gio, vi tri nay duoc ong giu cho den nam 1735. ong cung lam thu ky tai scituate vao nam 1731, mot cong viec duoc ong nam giu suot 11 nam cho den khi chuyen den providence nam 1742. sau nhiem ky tham phan cho thi tran scituate, ong giu chuc vu inferior court of common pleas va general sessions tu nam 1736 den 1746, nhiem ky thu ky cua hopkins cung ket thuc trong nam nam cuoi cung trong thoi gian do. mot so chuc vu khac duoc hopkins nam giu trong thoi gian nay gom chu tich hoi dong thi tran, pho dai bieu va la nguoi phat ngon cua ha vien. nam 1744, hopkins duoc bau tro thanh dai bieu providence, chuc vu nay duoc ong giu trong bay nam tiep theo, va danh hai nam phuc vu voi tu cach la mot dai bieu cua ha vien trong khoan thoi gian nay. hopkins ban trang trai cua minh o scituate vao nam 1742 de chuyen den va dinh cu tai providence. tai day, ong da bo ra nhieu cong suc trong viec giup phat trien thuong mai o providence. ong tro thanh mot thuong gia dong, chu so huu va trang bi cac thiet bi cho nhung con tau, hopkins cung la mot trong nhung chu so huu cua con tau tu nhan ten "reprisal" vao nam 1745, phi vu duoc hop tac voi con trai cua dai ta peter mawney la ong john mawney, canh sat truong cua providence. giua nhung nam 1750, john greenwood, mot hoa si ve chan dung o boston duoc mot nhom thuyen thuong nhan va truong, trong do co hopkins, thue de ve ra mot buc hoa cham biem. hoa pham nay da ve len mot buc tranh gom nhung nguoi dan ong ket lai tai mot thuong cang lon o suriname nam tren bo bien phia bac nam my, vung ma greenwood sinh song vao thoi diem do. greenwood da phat hoa mot khung canh trong mot quan ruou gom 22 nguoi, the hien hopkins duoc bao quanh giua nhung thuong nhan giau co khac, nhieu nguoi trong so nhung thuong gia nay bi biem hoa trong tinh trang say ruou. mot trong nhung cong viec cua hopkins sau nay la hoat dong nhu mot nha kinh doanh va san xuat, ong da hop tac cung voi nhung nguoi anh em khac cua ong bao gom moses, nicholas, joseph va john brown de thanh lap hope furnace. khu xuong nay chuyen thuc hien nhung viec lien quan den duc sat cung nhu viec san xuat gang thoi va dai bac phuc vu trong chien tranh cach mang. ve sau viec quan ly nha xuong nay da duoc giao cho rufus, con trai cua hopkins trong bon thap ky. tro thanh thong doc. hopkins nham vao nhiem ky thong doc dau tien vao nam 1755, khi ong danh bai nguoi tien nhiem truoc do william greene voi ty so cach biet khong qua lon. khoang thoi gian nay, hopkins chu yeu ban ron voi luat phap va cong viec lien quan den cuoc chien dang dien voi phap. voi that bai cua thieu tuong braddock va viec dong chiem phao dai crown point da khien rhode island gui mot luc luong den albany. cuoi nam truoc do, hopkins va bo truong tu phap hoa ky, ong daniel updike, la mot dai bieu tu rhode island khac da den dai hoi albany, hoi nghi nay duoc trieu tap voi muc dich thao luan ve cac van de bao ve cac thuoc dia chung dong thoi mo mot hoi nghi moi voi nam bo lac da do song tai day de yeu cau su vien tro cua ho trong viec ngan su xam luoc cua phap. hopkins cung nhung nha lanh dao khac da xem qua ban ke hoach ban dau do benjamin franklin de xuat cho viec thong nhat cac van de ve thuoc dia, nhung cac nguyen tac cua ban ke hoach cuoi cung da bi bac bo o ca thuoc dia rhode island va vuong quoc anh. vao thang 2 nam 1756 thoi diem bung no chien tranh voi phap, 500 nguoi dan ong sinh song tai rhode island da duoc dai hoi dong huy dong tham gia vao tran danh ho george o new york. sau hai nam tren cuong vi cua minh, hopkins bi danh bai boi william greene trong viec canh tranh chuc thong doc, nhung viec greene qua doi khi dang tai chuc vao thang 2 nam 1758, khien hopkins mot lan nua dam nhiem vai tro nay. khi do, mot trong nhung van de gay mau thuan nhat trong chinh tri la viec su dung giua hai loai dong tien te la dong tien cung va dong tien giay, so voi viec dung tien te cung, hopkins da ung ho cho viec su dung tien giay. van de chinh tri gay mau thuan thu hai vao thoi nay la loi ich giua newport va providence. trong nhieu nam, hopkins da vuong vao cuoc tranh chap gay gat voi samuel ward, pho cua westerly, nguoi ung ho manh me trong viec su dung dong tien te cung va la mot nguoi dat loi ich cua newport hang dau, hopkins sau do da kien ward toi danh vu khong va doi 40.000 bang anh. vu kien nay duoc len massachusetts trong viec dua ra xet xu mot cach cong bang; vao nam 1759, ket qua phan quyet cuoi cung nghieng ve phia bat loi cho hopkins, va chinh ong da phai tra gia cho vu kien nay. trong muoi nam, hopkins va samuel ward giu moi quan he qua lai voi tu cach la thong doc cua thuoc dia, ca ward va hopkins deu la nguoi dung dau cua mot dang the luc khac nhau. ward la nguoi dan dat cho su giau co va chu nghia bao thu tai quan newport, narragansett va kent, trong khi hopkins dai dien cho suc manh ngay cang tang cua cac quan thuoc rhode island va bristol. hai chinh tri gia duoc vi nhu nhung dau si tren dau truong, luon them muon diet tru lan nhau. cuoi cung, ward danh bai hopkins thong qua bau cu va nam giu chuc vu thong doc vao nam 1762. nam 1763, hopkins gianh lai chuc thong doc, dau hieu hoa binh giua hopkins va ward chi xuat hien vao mot nam sau khi ward viet thu cho hopkins yeu cau ca hai nen tu bo "tham muon dung dau chinh phu." cung ngay nay, hopkins khong biet ve la thu, ong viet thu cho ward de bo nhiem ward nhan chuc pho thong doc, mot vi tri trong sau cai chet cua john gardner. cuoi cung, ca hopkins va ward deu khong chap nhan de xuat lan nhau, nhung giai doan nay giua hai chinh tri gia da tro thanh la mam mong cho su hop tac sau nay. dau nam 1765, nghi vien va ha vien cua quoc hoi anh thong qua ve mot dao luat mang ten dao luat tem. ve dao luat nay la mot trong nhung ke hoach nham danh thue va vao cac thuoc dia, chi thi neu rang tat ca cac tai lieu phap ly va thuong mai phai duoc viet tren giay co dau xac nhan duoc ban voi gia co dinh boi cac quan chuc chinh phu, dong thoi chi thi cung ap dung thue doi voi bao chi. quoc hoi co quyen trong viec danh thue vao cac thuoc dia cung nhu viec tang thue doi voi cac san pham nhu duong, ca phe va cac loai mat hang khac, dong thoi yeu cau hai loai mat hang la go va sat tu cac thuoc dia hoa ky chi duoc xuat khau sang vuong quoc anh.  tin tuc ve noi dung cua dao luat nay mang lai da khien nguoi dan my tuc gian, va samuel adams o massachusetts phai moi tat ca quan chuc cua cac thuoc dia den tham du mot dai hoi dai bieu o new york de thao luan ve viec giam bot cac khoan thue duoc de ra truoc do mang tinh bat cong. vao thang 8 nam 1765, dai hoi dong rhode island da thong qua mot nghi quyet duoi su chi dao cua chinh tri gia cua virginia la ong patrick henry. nha phan phoi tem cua rhode island duoc bo nhiem la augustus johnson, nhung ong da tu choi nhiem vu nay vi cho rang "trai voi dieu ma chua toi cao cua chung ta muon." cuoc hop tai east greenwich cua dai hoi dong rhode island vao thang 9 nam 1765, chon cac dai bieu tham du dai hoi o new york va quyet dinh bo nhiem mot uy ban xem xet dao luat tem 1765. uy ban dua ra sau nghi quyet loai tru moi su uu ai cua hoa ky doi voi anh quoc tru khi nhung bat loi tu dao luat mang lai duoc giai quyet. dao luat tem chinh thuc bi bai bo vao nam 1766, tin tuc duoc dua den my vao thang 5 cung nam do va cong dan my da to ra vui mung. nam 1764, mot dao luat duoc thong qua nham muc dich thanh lap truong dai hoc tai rhode island. hopkins va ward deu la nhung nguoi ung ho nhiet thanh cho mot co so giao duc dai hoc o thuoc dia, va ca hai chinh tri gia da tro thanh uy vien cua hoi dong uy thac uy cua rhode island college. hopkins cung da tro thanh mot trong nhung nha tai tro hao phong nhat va la hieu truong dau tien cua truong hoc nay, mot vi tri duoc ong giu trong suot nhieu nam cho den khi qua doi vao nam 1785. vao nam 1767, cuoc tranh cu vao chuc thong doc rhode island cua hopkins la cuoc tranh cu gay gat nhat trong su nghiep chinh tri cua ong, nhung hopkins cuoi cung da danh bai ward voi ket qua ap dao chua tung co trong bat ky cuoc bau cu truoc nao. den nam 1768, hopkins dua ra loi de xuat voi ward nham khuyen nhu ca ward va ong nen tu bo yeu sach canh tranh trong cuoc bau cu va dong y cho viec chon ra mot ung vien thoa hiep thay the. ong ward da chap thuan loi nghi nay va josias lyndon la nguoi tiep theo duoc bau de tro thanh thong doc, hopkins ve sau da tro thanh ban than cua ward va tinh ban giua ong van duoc truy tri trong suot quang thoi gian sau nay. tieu luan "the rights of colonies examined". thang 11 nam 1764, dai hoi dong rhode island cho xuat ban mot cuon sach tieu luan nho do chinh hopkins bien soan mang ten "the rights of colonies examined" (tam dich: "quyen cua cac thuoc dia duoc kiem tra"). bai tieu luan nay chu yeu nham den dao luat tem va trong viec tao dung danh tieng cua hopkins voi tu cach la mot nha lanh dao cach mang, cuon sach chi trich thue va nghi vien nay da duoc phan phoi mot cach rong rai. van ban trong bai tieu luan duoc bat dau rang, "tu do la phuc lanh lon nhat ma con nguoi duoc thu huong, che do no le la loi tru rua nang ne nhat ma ve co ban con nguoi co the mac phai;" noi dung bai tieu luan dua ra mot danh gia ro rang ve moi quan he cua cac thuoc dia anh-my. bai luan van cua hopkins da nhan duoc su luu hanh rong rai cung nhu su tan thanh nong nhiet tu khap cac thuoc dia. nha su hoc thomas bicknell goi bai luan la "tai lieu dang luu tam nhat duoc xuat ban trong thoi ky truoc chien tranh cach mang." ong thomas hutchinson, thong doc massachusetts nhan xet ve bai bao rang, "bai tieu luan cua hopkins duoc lam ra o muc do cang thang cao hon bat ky cac bai bao thuoc dia nao truoc day." hopkins duoc cong nhan la mot trong nhung nha lanh dao du luan cua cac thuoc dia va tieu luan "the rights of colonies examined" cua ong da duoc xuat ban rong rai. chanh an toa an toi cao rhode island. in may 1747, hopkins was first appointed as a justice of the rhode island superior court, whose long title was the "superior court of judicature, court of assize, and general gaol delivery." in 1751, he became the third chief justice of this court, which he held until 1755 when he became governor. hopkins was once again appointed as chief justice of the court in 1770 after a total of nine years as governor; he served until october 1775 while simultaneously serving as a delegate to the continental congress. one of the most important events with which hopkins dealt during his final tenure as chief justice was the gaspee affair. in march 1772, deputy governor darius sessions in providence sent a letter of concern to governor joseph wanton in newport, having consulted with chief justice hopkins. sessions expressed alarm that the british schooner "gaspee" had been cruising the narragansett bay, disrupting the traffic by stopping and searching commercial ships. sessions wrote:sessions went on to request that the governor take measures to bring the ship's commander to account. a chain of threatening correspondence ensued between the governor and "gaspee" commander lieutenant william dudingston, and dudingston's superior admiral john montagu. on the night of june 9–10, a party of incensed colonists attacked the vessel and burned it to the waterline. officially, sessions was outraged at the incident and offered the colony's assistance in bringing the perpetrators to justice. to ameliorate retribution by the british authorities, rhode island officials took visible steps to find the culprits who burned the ship. behind the scenes, however, sessions and hopkins did all they could to thwart any attempts to identify the attackers. a royal commission was appointed by the british to investigate the incident, and they demanded that any indicted person be sent to england for trial. this egregious threat to local liberty prompted the colonists to form the committees of correspondence. loyalist massachusetts governor hutchinson further aggravated the colonists' sensitivities by urging britain to rescind the rhode island royal charter. sessions conferred with chief justice hopkins, lawyer john cole, and moses brown, and the four men drafted a letter to massachusetts' statesman samuel adams. adams replied by urging rhode island to remain defiant, or at least to stall matters by appealing the creation of the royal commission. governor wanton was put at the head of this commission but was compliant with sessions' and hopkins' attempts to frustrate the aims of the commission. sessions, hopkins, and others coordinated their efforts to lose evidence, threaten potential witnesses, and discredit those who testified. the vast majority of rhode island's citizens were supportive of the attackers and kept quiet about their identities. a year after the incident, the royal commission was terminated without a single indictment. quoc hoi luc dia. cuoc hop de nhat quoc hoi luc dia lan dau tien dien ra vao nam 1774, hopkins va ward la hai dai bieu dai dien cua rhode island. khi do hopkins, da 68 tuoi, ong la nguoi lon tuoi nhat trong so tat ca cac thanh vien dai bieu vao thoi diem do, va chi co hopkins la dai bieu duy nhat tung cung benjamin franklin tham du dai hoi albany vao 20 nam truoc. trong nhieu nam, hopkins gap phai chung te liet o tay va lam anh huong lon den nang luc viet cua ong. tai hoi nghi nay, henry arniett brown da viet ve hopkins rang, "nguoi ngoi o dang kia la nguoi gia nhat trong so ho. dang ong hoi nghieng, nhung lon toc thua thot, vang tran cua ong triu xuong vi tuoi tac va long phung su tan tuy, doi tay cua ong run khi dat chung vao long. do la stephen hopkins." hoi nghi de nhat quoc hoi luc dia duoc trieu tap voi muc dich xem xet cac doi sach cua vuong quoc anh nham dam bao quyen loi va dac quyen cua 13 thuoc dia. ca hopkins va ward truoc do deu du doan rang doc lap se chi xuat phat tu chien tranh. hopkins noi voi cac cong su cua minh tai quoc hoi: "thuoc sung va dan se quyet dinh cho cau hoi. rieng khau sung va luoi le se ket thuc cuoc dau giao chien nay, va bat ky ai trong so cac anh khong the dieu chinh su tap trung cua minh vao cuoc dao cham, tot hon la nen rut lui kip thoi." sau cac cuoc tan cong nham vao thang 4 cua tran lexington va concord, phien hop lap phap lan thu hai de nhi quoc hoi luc dia dien ra vao ngay 10 thang 5 nam 1775 va hopkins mot lan nua la dai bieu tham du cuoc hop nay. dai hoi nay duoc trieu tap voi muc dich dieu hanh chien luoc chien tranh, va sau do tien hanh viec tuyen bo doc lap khoi vuong quoc anh. thang 7 nam 1775, quoc hoi ap dung he thong buu chinh quoc gia duoc de xuat boi ong william goddard, va benjamin franklin tro thanh tong buu ta truong hoa ky dau tien. day la mot y tuong da duoc rhode island thuc hien vao mot thang truoc do. den thang 12 nam 1775, hopkins gop mat trong uy ban de bao cao ve ke hoach trang bi vu khi hai quan cho cac quan doi thuoc dia. luong kien thuc ma hopkins so huu ve kinh doanh van tai bien duoc ong phuc vu voi tu cach la thanh vien cua uy ban hai quan quoc hoi von thanh lap nham muc dich mua, trang bi cung nhu van hanh nhung con tau dau tien cua hai quan luc dia moi da tro nen thuc su huu ich. hopkins la nguoi co cong trong viec xay dung nen bo luat hai quan hoa ky va soan thao ra cac nguyen tac cung nhu nhung quy dinh can thiet de phuc vu cho cong viec quan ly mot to chuc hang hai non tre vua moi ra doi hoi chien tranh cach mang my. hai doi hai quan dau tien cua my duoc ha thuy vao ngay 18 thang 2 nam 1776. hopkins da su dung suc anh huong cua minh de dam bao cho vi tri tong tu lenh hai quan moi cho nguoi anh trai la esek hopkins, vi cuoc bo nhiem truoc cho thay mot ty le ket qua khong mong muon.  the colony of rhode island and providence plantations declared its absolute independence from great britain by a nearly unanimous vote on may 4, 1776; the continental congress adopted the united states declaration of independence two months later on july 2. hopkins had to support his palsied right hand with his left as he signed the document, remarking, "my hand trembles, but my heart does not." the gathering of the founding fathers was depicted in john trumbull's "declaration of independence", where hopkins is pictured standing in the back wearing a hat. john adams appreciated hopkins' contributions during the congressional sessions: hopkins va che do no le. stephen hopkins la mot chu no va co so huu no le, giong nhu phan lon nhung chinh tri gia ky ban tuyen ngon doc lap my o thoi diem do, hopkins da de cap 5 nguoi no le trong di chuc cua minh vao nam 1760 trong so do bao gom mot dan ong, mot phu nu va ba dua tre. nhung nguoi no le nay se duoc de lai cho cac thanh vien than thiet trong gia dinh hopkins sau khi ong mat cung voi loi huong dan ve cach cu xu voi ho; day la mot dieu hiem co o bat ky chu no nao. nhung thong tin trong ban di chuc da neu ra rang nu no le fibbo (hoac ten phibo hay phebe) se den phuc vu vo hopkins la anne va duoc doi xu theo cach giup "fibbo khong con cam thay no le la mot ganh nang"; va saint jago se den phuc vu rufus, con trai ca cua hopkins va duoc doi xu theo cach "giup cuoc song cua anh ta co the tro nen de dang va thoai mai hon." mac vay, ban di chuc chua bao gio duoc thuc hien vi hopkins da song them 25 nam va noi dung trong ban di chuc nay da duoc thay doi. vao ngay 28 thang 10 nam 1772, hopkins tra tu do cho saint jago, trong van thu giai phong no le cua minh, ong viet: hopkins thay rang su troi buoc vao nhung "loai sinh vat co ly tri" von tu lap la trai voi y muon chua troi; nhung ong cung cho rang viec tra tu do khong mang dieu kien cho nhung nguoi no le la mot hanh dong vo trach nhiem doi voi ong. cung chinh vi dieu nay, hopkins tu choi tra tu do cho fibbo, va ong da tra gia bang viec tu bo tu cach thanh vien quaker. hopkins cho rang "nhung dua con cua nu no le fibbo can su cham soc tu mot nguoi me." va nhung no le khac cua do ong so huu khong duoc tra tu do cho den sau khi ong mat, nhung trong do co primus va bonner jr., hai no le hiem hoi khac cua hopkins da duoc giai phong vai nam truoc khi ong qua doi. vao nam 1774, trong thoi gian phuc vu trong hoi dong rhode island, hopkins dua ra mot du luat trong do ngan cam viec nhap khau no le vao thuoc dia. du luat nay da tro thanh mot trong nhung dao luat chong buon ban no le dau tien tai hoa ky. ngoai ra, mot so ap luc lon khac tai rhode island dan den nay sinh nhieu han che hon doi voi viec buon ban no le tai vung dat nay la ty le dan cu sinh song la tin huu quakers chiem mot ty le lon. qua doi va di san. thang 9 nam 1776, voi tinh trang suy giam suc khoe da buoc hopkins phai tu bo chuc quoc hoi luc dia de tro ve rhode island, tuy nhien hopkins van la mot thanh vien tich cuc cua dai hoi dong rhode island trong suot nhung nam 1777 den nam 1779. ong mat tai providenc trong nha rieng cua minh vao ngay 13 thang 7 nam 1785, o tuoi 78, va duoc chon cat tai nghia trang north burial ground cung thanh pho nay. nam 1753, hopkins da ho tro thanh lap providence library company, ong dong thoi la thanh vien cua hiep hoi triet hoc newport. thi tran hopkinton cua rhode island sau nay duoc dat theo ten ong. mot con tau lop tu do mang ten ss "stephen hopkins" da duoc dat theo ten hopkins de vinh danh ong, day la con tau buon duy nhat cua hoa ky danh chim mot tau chien hai quan duc trong the chien ii. ong cung co cong trong viec thanh lap truong dai hoc thuoc dia rhode island va cac don dien providence cua anh (ngay nay la dai hoc brown) va la nguoi duoc uy thac sang lap. tu nam 1764 den nam 1785, hopkins la hieu truong dau tien cua truong hoc nay. nha thong doc hopkins cua ong ban dau nam tren goc duong hopkins va south main tai providence, sau khi hopkins qua doi ngoi nha nay ve sau da duoc chuyen di hai lan nam tren cac dia diem khac nhau cua pho hopkins. ngoi nha nay hien toa lac ria khuon vien dai hoc brown nam tai so 15 pho hopkins, goc pho benefit, va day la mot di tich lich su quoc gia hoa ky. ezra stiles, mot muc su cong giao, trong nhat ky cua minh da viet ve hopkins rang, "toi hieu ro ve gov. hopkins. ong ay la mot thien tai sang suot, rat tinh te, muu meo, hap dan va gan da." stiles de cap them ve hopkins la mot "con nguoi co tinh kien tri va quyet tam cao quy" dong thoi la "mot nha ai quoc quang vinh!" hopkins da nhan duoc nhieu loi phe binh tich cuc tu nhieu nha su hoc, trong so do la sanderson, arnold va bicknell, nhung richman don thuan goi hopkins la "chinh khach vi dai nhat cua rhode island." doi song ca nhan. vao nam 1726, hopkins ket hon voi sarah scott, con gai cua sylvanus scott va joanna jenckes, ho deu la hau due cua richard scott va katharine marbury, nhung nguoi dau tien dinh cu tai don dien providence; ba marbury la em gai ut cua anne hutchinson, mot nha cai cach ton giao. con richard scott la mot tin do thuoc giao phai quaker dau tien cua providence. hopkins co tong cong bay nguoi con, va co nam nguoi trong so ho song den tuoi truong thanh. sau khi ba sarah scott qua doi vao ngay 9 thang 9 nam 1753, o tuoi 46, hopkins da ket hon voi anne smith, con gai cua benjamin smith va khong co con. mot trong nhung nguoi em trai cua hopkins la esek hopkins da tro thanh tong tu lenh dau tien cua hai quan luc dia hoa ky, nguoi anh trai william cua ong la mot thuong gia co tieng. jemima wilkinson, mot nha thuyet giao quaker, mot trong nhung nguoi ho hang cua hopkins, da duoc ong xem la mot nguoi ban.
duoi day la danh sach tich phan (nguyen ham) voi ham vo ti. doi voi danh sach day du ham tich phan, xem danh sach tich phan. trong bai nay, hang so tich phan duoc luoc bot di cho ngan gon. tich phan chua "s" =. gia dinh "x"2 &gt; "a"2 (doi voi truong hop "x"2 &lt; "a"2, xem muc sau): tich phan chua "r" =. gia dinh rang ("ax"2 + "bx" + "c") khong the chuyen ve dang ("px" + "q")2 voi "p" va "q" la hang so.
m247 sergeant york divad (division air defense) la mot loai vu khi phong khong tu hanh (self-propelled anti-aircraft gun) (spaag), do ford aerospace phat trien vao cuoi thap nien 1970. phao duoc phat trien dua tren khung gam xe tang m48 patton, voi viec loai bo thap phao va thay bang mot thap phao moi voi hai radar dan ban truc tiep cho phao ban nhanh bofors 40 mm. xe thiet giap duoc dat theo ten cua trung si alvin york, mot anh hung thoi chien tranh the gioi lan thu nhat world war i. sergeant york duoc du tinh se duoc trien khai ket hop voi m1 abrams va m2 bradley trong luc quan hoa ky, tuong tu nhu phao zsu-23-4 cua lien xo va phao flakpanzer gepard cua duc. no se thay the cho m163 vulcan air defense system spaag va ten lua phong khong mim-72 chaparral, trong khi he thong ten lua phong khong mim-46 mauler chua duoc hoan thien. du ap dung nhieu cong nghe da tieu chuan hoa de cho phep phat trien nhanh va giam gia thanh nhung mot loat loi ky thuat cung voi gia thanh doi gia da khien quan doi my huy bo chuong trinh vao nam 1985.
laszlo bölöni (; sinh ngay 11 thang 3 nam 1953) la mot cuu cau thu bong da chuyen nghiep nguoi romania hien tai dang la huan luyen vien truong cua cau lac bo metz tai ligue 1. sau khi bat dau su nghiep tai asa targu mureș, bölöni da tro thanh mot phan khong the thieu cua doi hinh steaua bucurești vo dich uefa champions league nam 1986, tro thanh doi bong romania duy nhat—va la mot trong hai doi bong dong au dat duoc vinh du nay. ong hai lan gianh duoc giai thuong cau thu xuat sac nhat nam cua romania va ra san 484 tran tai divizia a, so lan ra san nhieu thu tu trong lich su giai dau. tren dau truong quoc te, bölöni ra san 102 tran cho doi tuyen quoc gia, giup ong dung thu nam trong danh sach ra san nhieu tran cho doi tuyen quoc gia va ghi duoc 23 ban thang, cao thu sau trong tat ca. do do, ong duoc coi la mot trong nhung cau thu bong da romania xuat sac nhat trong lich su. sau khi giai nghe voi tu cach la mot cau thu, ong tiep tuc huan luyen cac cau lac bo o phap, bo dao nha, ban dao a rap, bi va hy lap. bölöni cung la huan luyen vien cua doi tuyen quoc gia romania tu nam 2000 den nam 2001. xet ve so danh hieu gianh duoc, thoi gian thanh cong nhat cua ong la o sporting cp va standard liege voi moi doi gianh duoc ba danh hieu trong nuoc. su nghiep thi dau. bölöni sinh ra o targu mureș, romania, trong mot gia dinh dan toc hungary den tu tarnaveni. doi bong dau tien cua ong la chimica tarnaveni, va vao nam 1970, ong chuyen den asa targu mureș. ong o do cho den nam 1984, khi ong gia nhap steaua bucurești, noi ong la mot phan cua doi da gianh chien thang tran chung ket cup c1 chau au 1986 (noi ong sut hong qua phat den trong loat da luan luu) va sieu cup chau au vao nam sau. bölöni o lai steaua cho den nam 1987. nam 1988, o tuoi 35, bölöni roi dat nuoc de choi o bi, tai cau lac bo racing jet bruxelles va sau do o phap tai us creteil. ong tu gia su nghiep bong da vao nam 1992. vao ngay 25 thang 3 nam 2008, ong da duoc tong thong romania, traian basescu tang huan chuong ordinul "meritul sportiv" — (huan chuong "the sportive merit") hang ii, vi da gop phan gianh duoc danh hieu cup chau au nam 1986. su nghiep quoc te. bölöni gianh huy chuong vang voi doi tuyen bong da tre romania tai dai hoi the thao sinh vien the gioi nam 1974 to chuc tai phap, thi dau cung voi gheorghe mulțescu, dan paltinișanu, romulus chihaia va paul cazan. thi dau cho doi tuyen bong da quoc gia romania vao nam 1983, bölöni da ghi mot trong nhung ban thang dang chu y nhat cua ong, trong chien thang 1–0 truoc y trong tran dau tai vong loai euro 1984, tran dau cuoi cung da chung minh la vo gia doi voi quoc gia du dieu kien tham du giai dau. o vong chung ket o phap, ong da choi trong ca ba tran dau cua romania, va ghi ban go hoa trong tran hoa 1-1 voi tay ban nha tai stade geoffroy-guichard. tong cong, bölöni da ra san 102 tran cho romania va ghi duoc 23 ban thang—hoac 108 tran va 25 ban thang neu bao gom ca vong loai the van hoi. su nghiep huan luyen vien. la mot huan luyen vien bong da, bölöni bat dau voi cau lac bo as nancy, noi ong la huan luyen vien truong trong vai nam. ong da thang hang cung doi bong o ligue 1. nam 2000, ong duoc bo nhiem lam huan luyen vien doi tuyen quoc gia, nhung den mua he nam 2001, ong quyet dinh roi bo cong viec nay. sau do, ong gia nhap cau lac bo cua bo dao nha, sporting clube de portugal, noi ong da gianh duoc chuc vo dich quoc gia va cup quoc gia trong nam dau tien cua minh. ong bi sa thai vao cuoi mua giai tiep theo do ket qua tam thuong. di san cua ong tai sporting la viec dua cac cau thu cua doi tre nhu ricardo quaresma, hugo viana va cristiano ronaldo vao doi hinh xuat phat cua doi 1. nam 2003, ong tro lai phap voi tu cach la huan luyen vien cua stade rennais; vao nam 2005, ong da dan dat doi bong den vi tri tot nhat trong lich su (hang 4 o ligue 1), va mot suat tham du uefa cup sau do. vao thang 5 nam 2006, bölöni ky hop dong hai nam voi as monaco nhung bi sa thai vao ngay 23 thang 10 vi khong co ket qua (monaco dung thu 19/20 trong giai dau vao ngay do). vao ngay 9 thang 6 nam 2008, standard liege da bo nhiem bölöni lam huan luyen vien moi cua ho, khi ong ke nhiem michel preud'homme, nguoi da dan dat cau lac bo den chuc vo dich dau tien. danh hieu giai bong da vo dich quoc gia bi sau 25 nam (2007–2008). vao ngay 24 thang 5 nam 2009, ong gianh chuc vo dich giai bong da vo dich quoc gia bi trong mua giai dau tien tai standard (2008–2009) sau khi choi tran play-off tranh chuc vo dich voi anderlecht. vao ngay 10 thang 2 nam 2010, bölöni tu chuc huan luyen vien tai standard liege. vao ngay 29 thang 5 nam 2010, co thong bao chinh thuc rang bölöni da ky hop dong voi cau lac bo al-wahda. vao ngay 2 thang 9 nam 2010, al-wahda sa thai bölöni, bat chap chien thang 3-1 cua doi truoc ittihad kalba. vao ngay 2 thang 1 nam 2011, ong duoc bo nhiem boi rc lens, theo hop dong mot nam, nhung ong khong the cuu doi bong khoi viec xuong hang.  bölöni ngay lap tuc bi sa thai vao thang 6 va ky hop dong hai nam voi paok vao ngay 8 thang 6 nam 2011, sau mot thoi gian dam phan ngan. paok. nhiem ky cua bölöni tai paok bat dau voi hai chien thang truoc vålerenga fotball o vong so loai thu ba cua uefa europa league, giup ho dau voi karpaty lviv o vong play-off. paok thang tran luot di tren san nha va hoa tran luot ve, gianh quyen vao vong bang. trong mot bang dau kho khan bao gom tottenham hotspur f.c., fc rubin kazan va shamrock rovers f.c., paok cua bölöni da vuot qua vong bang voi thanh tich bat bai, gianh chien thang tai white hart lane, mot ky tich dang chu y khi khong co doi hy lap nao gianh chien thang tren dat anh ke tu nam 1999 khi paok danh bai arsenal tai highbury. o vong 32 doi, paok doi mat voi udinese calcio, va mac du tran hoa 0–0 o y da lan truyen su lac quan, nhung mot paok suy yeu da bi loai khoi giai dau khi tran luot ve tren san nha ket thuc voi ty so thua 0–3. nhin chung, su hien dien cua chau au la tich cuc mac du ket thuc dot ngot, khi paok gianh duoc 6 chien thang trong so 12 tran, voi man trinh dien an tuong va chien thang quan trong truoc tottenham. tren san nha, paok da co mot mua giai day song gio khi doi bong nay chi can dich o vi tri thu 3 trong mua giai chinh thuc, voi vi tri thu 5 la vi tri cuoi cung sau vong play-off. trong mua giai, paok da thang cac tran san khach truoc aek athens f.c. va panathinaikos f.c., danh dau su ket thuc cua truyen thong 10 nam khong thang truoc cac doi bong do khi thi dau xa nha. tuy nhien, phong do cua doi khong nhat quan va su ra di - do kho khan tai chinh cua cau lac bo - cua hai trong so nhung cau thu quan trong nhat cua doi, vieirinha va pablo contreras khong giup ich duoc gi. bölöni da phai ung bien de bu dap cho doi hinh thieu chieu sau, voi nhieu ket qua khac nhau. mac du mua giai duoc coi la khong thanh cong, nhung nguoi ham mo khong do loi cho bölöni, nguoi da chiem duoc cam tinh cua ho nho tinh cach cua ong, ket qua cua ong truoc mot so doi thu lon va loi choi cua doi khi co phong do tot. vao ngay 25 thang 5 nam 2012, paok da sa thai bölöni sau mot nam dan dat doi bong. huan luyen tai trung dong. bölöni duoc cau lac bo al khor bo nhiem lam huan luyen vien truong vao ngay 21 thang 6 nam 2012. vao ngay 26 thang 1 nam 2013, trong tran dau voi qatar sc, ong da dinh vao mot su co gay tranh cai. ong nem mot chai nuoc vao mot cau be nhat bong phia sau khung thanh sau khi cau be lay qua bong ra ngoai san. tuy nhien, cai chai khong trung cau be, tuy nhien, nguoi quan sat tran dau, ali al-naimi, da phat hien ra no, nguoi da chuyen thong tin cho mot tro ly trong tai, nguoi nay cuoi cung da thong bao cho trong tai, fahad jaber, nguoi da quyet dinh duoi cau ta khoi san. thay vi di thang den khan dai, ong chon o lai bat hop phap trong tram kiem soat. cac nhan vien an ninh da co gang duoi ong di, nhung ong dap tra bang cach su dung ngon tu tho tuc va xo day cac nhan vien canh sat. ket qua la, mot bao cao cua canh sat da duoc de trinh chong lai anh ta. sau do, ong bi hiep hoi bong da qatar phat 75.000 riyal qatar va bi cam chi dao 5 tran. vao thang 8 nam 2013, cac phuong tien truyen thong o croatia suy doan rang bölöni co the duoc bo nhiem lam tan huan luyen vien truong cua dinamo zagreb, sau khi huan luyen vien truong cu cua doi bi sa thai, krunoslav jurčić. bölöni truoc day cung da duoc lien ket voi hajduk split, doi thu khoc liet cua dinamo zagreb. vao ngay 21 thang 7 nam 2015, cau lac bo al-ittihad tai giai vo dich quoc gia a rap xe ut thong bao bo nhiem bölöni lam tan huan luyen vien truong cua doi bong. royal antwerp. vao ngay 16 thang 6 nam 2017, bölöni duoc cong bo la huan luyen vien moi cua cau lac bo royal antwerp. trong mua giai dau tien cua minh tai cau lac bo, doi bong da can dich o vi tri thu 8 trong mua giai thong thuong va vi tri thu 3 trong nhom da play-off europa league de giup doi tru hang thanh cong. trong mua giai thu hai cua minh, antwerp da gay bat ngo cho nhom tranh chuc vo dich, ket thuc mua giai thong thuong o vi tri thu 6 va lan dau tien du dieu kien tham du vong play-off tranh chuc vo dich. antwerp da gianh nhung chien thang quan trong truoc genk (1–0), anderlecht (2–1), gent (2–1), standard liege (2–1), cung nhu nhu mot tran hoa khong ban thang voi club brugge trong nua dau tran play-off va leo len vi tri thu 3, nhung nhung tran thua sau do truoc nhung doi bong nay dong nghia voi viec antwerp dung thu 4, do do se tham du vong loai play-offs cuoi cung cua europa league. trong tran chung ket, antwerp danh bai charleroi 3–2 sau khi bi dan truoc 0-2 trong nhung phut dau tien. nhu vay, antwerp da gianh quyen vao vong so loai thu ba cua uefa europa league sau 26 nam vang bong o chau au. sau khi bat ngo ha guc viktoria plzeň nho luat ban thang tren san khach o vong thu ba, antwerp da dung buoc o vong bang khi sau do bi az loai o vong play-off. ve mat noi bo, bölöni da dan dat doi can dich o vi tri thu 4 khac trong giai dau, cung nhu lot vao tran chung ket cup quoc gia bi o mua giai 2019–20, lan dau tien ke tu nam 1992. bi hoan lai den ngay 1 thang 8 do dai dich covid-19 va hop dong cua bölöni sau do het han vao ngay 20 thang 5, khien nguoi ke nhiem cua ong ivan leko huan luyen doi bong cho tran chung ket. gent. vao
