giai bong da cup quoc gia 2023-24 (tieng anh: "2023-24 vietnamese national football cup") la mua giai thu 32 cua giai bong da cup quoc gia, du kien dien ra tu ngay 24 thang 10 nam 2023 den ngay 7 thang 7 nam 2024. day la mua giai dau tien co thoi gian to chuc thi dau tu nam truoc den nam sau. giai dau quy tu 14 cau lac bo v.league 1 va 12 doi bong v.league 2 cung nhau tranh tai. cau lac bo vo dich se gianh quyen tham du tran sieu cup bong da viet nam 2024.  la duong kim vo dich va se thi dau tu vong 1/8 (cung voi doi a quan va hai doi dong hang ba , ).
giai bong da hang nhat quoc gia 2023–24, () la mua giai thu 30 cua v.league 2. day la mua giai dau tien co thoi gian to chuc thi dau tu nam truoc den nam sau. giai du kien bat dau vao ngay 20 thang 10 nam 2023 va ket thuc vao ngay 29 thang 6 nam 2024. thay doi truoc mua giai. thay doi doi bong. den v.league 2. xuong hang tu v.league 1 – 2023 thang hang tu giai hang nhi 2023 roi v.league 2. thang hang len v.league 1 – 2023–24 xuong hang den giai hang nhi 2023–24
sua chua lassi la mot loai do uong lam tu sua chua cua an do voi do dac set giong nhu sinh to. sua chua lassi duoc goi la "thuc uong lam tu sua chua truyen thong va pho bien nhat" o an do. mon do uong nay cung duoc mo ta la dang sua chua set ""duoc yeu thich nhat va pho bien nhat o punjab" hoac con duoc menh danh la "do uong mua he duoc yeu thich nhat" va "thuc uong giai nhiet cua punjab"".  lassi co nguon goc tu vung punjab cua tieu luc dia an do. trong tieng punjabi thi tu "lassi" co nghia la sua chua tron voi nuoc trong. lassi duoc che bien bang cach tron sua chua, nuoc va gia vi. o punjab thi sua chua theo truyen thong duoc lam tu sua trau. tuy nhien, cac bien tau cua lassi co the duoc chuan bi theo nhung cach khac nhau. gia vi cua mon nay gom rau thi la va bach dau khau cung chinh la nhung gia vi pho bien nhat duoc them vao mon thuc uong nay. lassi theo truyen thong duoc dung va don ra trong mot chiec coc bang dat set duoc goi la kulhar
“i still believe” la mot bai hat duoc sang tac boi antonina armato va giuseppe cantarelli, ban dau do ca si nhac pop brenda k. starr thuc hien va thu am cho album phong thu thu hai mang chinh ten ba (1987). “i still believe” la mot ban r&amp;b ballad noi ve viec mot nu ca si co long tin rang mot ngay nao do co va ban trai cu cua minh se yeu nhau mot lan nua. bai hat nay la ban hit lon nhat cua brenda k. starr tai hoa ky, tro thanh mot trong 20 bai hat dung dau bang xep hang am nhac "billboard" hot 100 va duoc coi la bai hat tru danh cua ba. “i still believe” duoc ca si mariah carey hat lai cho album #1’s (1998) cua co va sau do tro thanh mot dia don (1999). ngoai ra bai hat con duoc ca si nhac cantopop lam uc lien (sandy lam) hat lai va thu am vao nam 1989. boi canh ra doi. sau khi brenda k. starr phat hanh ban thu am dau tien, “i want your love”, vao nam 1985 va chua dat duoc tieng vang nhu mong muon, ba tiep tuc thuc hien va phat hanh bai hat “i still believe”, tac pham thu hai trong su nghiep cua minh, vao nam 1987 cho album brenda k. starr. bai hat do eumir deodato pho nhac va do antonina armato va giuseppe cantarelli sang tac cung nhu soan loi. tac pham nay la mot ban nhac ballad tru tinh voi noi dung dua tren cau truyen co thuc ve moi tinh cua nhac si armato: ba tung tu choi loi cau hon cua ban trai minh vi cam thay chua dung thoi diem cho lam. dieu nay da khien cho nguoi ban trai khong hai long va cho ba hai lua chon: hoac la ket hon voi anh ay, hoac la chia tay. mac du armato rat yeu ban trai cua minh, ba van kien dinh va cap doi chinh thuc chia tay. de xoa diu noi buon cua minh, ba da cung voi cantarelli sang tac va soan loi cho bai hat “i still believe”. don nhan. justin m. kantor cua allmusic da danh nhieu loi khen va danh gia day la mot bai hat duoc the hien voi “cam xuc chan thanh, say dam va day kich tinh”. bai hat la duoc phat hanh duoi dang dia don cho album brenda k. starr vao nam 1988 va dat den dinh diem khi leo len thu hang 13 tren bang xep hang hot 100 cua tap chi billboard, tro thanh bai hat dau tien cung nhu duy nhat cua brenda k. starr tung lot vao top 20 tren bang xep hang hot 100. video am nhac cua bai hat xoay canh cac phan canh ca si starr hat trong mot nha kho va phan canh ba bat gap nhieu cap doi voi cu chi lang man khi dang dao pho. ben canh ban tieng anh, starr con cho ra doi ban thu am bang tieng tay ban nha mang ten "yo creo en ti” va cho phat hanh duoi dang dia don. nam 1998, starr thuc hien mot phien ban mang phong cach salsa cua bai hat voi ten goi "i still believe/creo en ti" cho album "no lo voy a olvidar" cua minh. phien ban tieng tay ban nha tung dat den cuc diem la thu hang 20 tren bang xep hang tropical airplay cung cua tap chi billboard. phien ban cua mariah carey. boi canh ra doi. khi thuc hien album tong hop dau tien trong su nghiep cua minh, "#1’s", mariah carey da quyet dinh trinh bay lai bai hat “i still believe” de tri an den ca si brenda k. starr – nguoi da giup su nghiep ca hat cua co khoi sac thong qua viec giao ban thu thu cua carey den tay tommy mottola, giam doc hang cbs records, ve sau ong la nguoi da ky ket hop dong thu am chinh thuc voi ca si carey. co noi them rang: "bai hat nay goi nho rang truoc day khong lau, toi tung la mot thieu nu voi gia tai khong la gi khac ngoai mot ban thu demo, giong hat va kha nang sang tac nhac. brenda k. starr doi dai toi nhu mot "minh tinh" va da cho toi co hoi de the hien minh". khi duoc phong van tren kenh "entertainment tonight", co da co doi loi bay to rang:toi cam thay that vui vi toi da co co hoi trinh bay lai bai hat “i still believe” cho album "#1’s" va day la tac pham dau tien toi hat voi tu cach la mot ca si chuyen nghiep. toi tung duoc di luu dien cung brenda [k. starr]. hoi do toi chi la mot co gai gay go, khong co tien, va co ay da luon che cho va doi xu tot voi toi. co ay da chon toi vao vi tri hat phu hoa [cho co ay] sau buoi thu giong, thuong mang quan ao va do an cho toi va cham soc toi nhu mot nguoi chi ca. toi biet da phan se khong co ai lo cho toi an can den nhu the. mot dieu quan trong can nhan manh do la co ay da tin tuong toi, va viec thuyet phuc mot nguoi nao do de nghe nhac cua ban la mot viec rat kho nhan. […] co ay that su tuyet voi va luon ho tro toi trong moi tinh huong. toi yeu bai hat nay. va gio khi toi cat loi hat bai hat ay, moi ky niem ve co ay lai ua ve trong tam tri toi. bai hat “i still believe” la dia don thu hai duoc phat hanh cho album "#1’s" vao ngay 8 thang 2 nam 1999 tai hoa ky. tai vuong quoc anh, bai hat duoc phat hanh duoi dang dia don cd (2 chiec) va dia don cassette (1 chiec) vao ngay 29 thang 3 nam 1999. ban hat lai cua mariah carey mang phong cach pop va r&amp;b, do co cung stevie j va mike mason phoi nhac. theo cong ty phat hanh am nhac emi music publishing, ban nhac duoc sang tac theo cung sol truong, voi nhip do 59 phach trong mot phut, tuc la voi toc do cham vua phai. ca si carey the hien phan hat voi quang giong g3 – d6.
giao phan busan (; ) la mot giao phan cua giao hoi latinh truc thuoc giao hoi cong giao roma co toa giam muc dat tai busan, han quoc. lanh dao duong nhiem cua giao phan la giam muc giuse son sam-seok. dia gioi. dia gioi giao phan bao gom: toa giam muc va nha tho chinh toa thanh tam cua giao phan duoc dat tai thanh pho busan. giao phan bao phu dien tich 3.300 km² va duoc chia thanh 125 giao xu. lich su. hat dai dien tong toa busan duoc thanh lap vao ngay 21/1/1957 theo tong sac "quandoquidem novas" cua giao hoang pio xii tren phan lanh tho tach ra tu hat dai dien tong toa taiku (hien la tong giao phan daegu). vao ngay 10/3/1962 hat dai dien tong toa duoc nang cap thanh mot giao phan khi hang giao pham han quoc duoc thiet lap theo tong sac "fertile evangelii semen" cua giao hoang gioan xxiii. vao ngay 15/2/1966 mot phan lanh tho cua giao phan duoc tach ra de thanh lap giao phan masan. giam muc quan nhiem. cac giai doan trong toa khong qua 2 nam hay khong ro rang bi loai bo. thong ke. den nam 2020, giao phan co 460.003 giao dan tren dan so tong cong 5.562.110, chiem 8,3%.
ten lua aim-95 agile la mot loai ten lua khong doi khong do hai quan my phat trien va trang bi cho f-14 tomcat, thay cho ten lua aim-9 sidewinder. trong khi do, khong quan my cung phat trien ten lua khong doi khong aim-82 de trang bi cho may bay tiem kich hang nang f-15 eagle, nhung sau do da huy bo chuong trinh phat trien va tham gia chung du an ten lua agile. sau cung, cac phien ban cai tien cua ten lua sidewinder da dat duoc tinh nang du de khong can phai trang bi them mot loai ten lua moi do do chuong trinh ten lua agile bi huy bo. tong quan. boi canh ra doi. cac ten lua khong doi khong tam nhiet thoi ky dau co hai dac diem lam gioi han chung trong chien dau. dau tien la dau do nhiet cua ten lua khong co du do nhay can thiet, va chung chi co the bam theo muc tieu phat ra nhiet luong rat manh. trong thuc tien, dieu nay dong nghia voi dong co cua may bay doi thu phai luon hien ro trong truong nhin cua ten lua khi ban ten lua. ngoai ra pham vi quan sat (fov) cua ten lua khong du rong, khien ten lua chi co the "nhin thay" duoc muc tieu o phia truoc ten lua. nhung gioi han nay cang the hien ro qua chien tranh viet nam, khi cac ten lua hong ngoai doi dau nhu aim-4 falcon va aim-9 sidewinder co ti le ban ha may bay doi phuong lan luot la 9 va 14%. phan lon nguyen nhan la do su that la phi cong phai duoc dan duong bang radar hay so chi huy danh chan mat dat (ground-controlled interception), de dat may bay danh chan bay den o vi tri doi dien voi may bay doi phuong, nhung khong nhat thiet la o cung huong. trong nhung tinh huong nhu tren, dau do tren ten lua co kha nang bat duoc tin hieu nhiet tu dong co may bay doi phuong, khi tin hieu du lon se dua ra chi thi khoa muc tieu cho phi cong, nhung ten lua khong du kha nang bam muc tieu sau khi phong di do muc tieu se ra ngoai pham vi quan sat cua dau do ten lua khi ten lua vua bay khoi ray phong. truoc ket qua thuc chien qua te cua ten lua hong ngoai doi dau, hai quan va khong quan my da dua ra giao trinh huan luyen moi cho phi cong trong do nhan manh toi viec co dong may bay den vi tri don long truoc khi phong ten lua, tu do may bay tan cong se co kha nang vua o vi tri phia sau may bay dich vua bay cung huong voi muc tieu. dieu nay se giup toi da kha nang muc tieu van o trong tam nhin dau do cua ten lua sau khi ten lua duoc phong di. tuy nhien, viec co dong nhu vay se lam mat thoi gian va kho chuan bi truoc, va trong qua trinh khong chien, se co rat nhieu tinh huong ma muc tieu se bay cat ngang qua truoc mat may bay ta. trong truong hop nay, buoc phai bo sung cac khau phao tu dong cho may bay tiem kich. agile. cuoi nhung nam 1960s, hai quan my bat dau chuong trinh phat trien grumman f-14 tomcat, co tinh nang cao cap hon rat nhieu so voi f-4 phantoms. tomcat ban dau duoc su dung trong mang luoi fleet air defense (fad) ma dua tren ten lua phong khong ham tau san bay va radar tau san bay co cu ly phat hien rat lon, cho phep may bay tiem kich f-14 co kha nang tan cong may bay doi phuong tu cu ly . trong khi he thong fad van con dang duoc phat trien, cac kinh nghiem thu duoc qua chien tranh viet nam cho thay cac cuoc khong chien tam xa khong kha thi, cho thay su gioi han ve mat chien thuat. yeu cau ve viec cai thien kha nang co dong duoc dat ra va chiec f-14 ra doi dua tren nhung phat trien nay. dong thoi, cung ro rang la can phai trang bi mot loai ten lua tam xa moi tot hon de may bay khong can phai tien vao trong tam qua gan voi muc tieu. do co ket qua thuc chien cua ten lua tam ngan sidewinder khong may sang sua, co quan phat trien no la china lake naval weapons center bat dau buoc vao phat trien mot loai ten lua khong doi khong tam gan moi thay the cho sidewinder. thiet ke moi nay se co dau do moi cho phep ten lua khoa duoc muc tieu tu moi goc do, bao gom ca muc tieu o phia truoc, dong thoi cai thien kha nang co dong giup ten lua co kha nang tan cong muc tieu ngay ca khi no re ngoat gap, va co dong co lon, manh hon giup no co tam ban lon hon trong moi dieu kien thoi tiet. ten lua agile duoc trang bi dau do hong ngoai cho phep no phong va quen. dau do co kha nang khoa muc tieu qua mu phi cong helmet mounted sight (hms), cho phep phong ten lua du cho muc tieu khong nam truoc mat, khien viec chiem linh vi tri de ban ten lua tro nen don gian hon rat nhieu. dong co ten lua nhien lieu ran voi voi phun dieu chinh huong luc day cung giup no co kha nang co dong lon hon nhieu so voi ten lua sidewinder. trong khi hai quan my phat trien chuong trinh may bay tiem kich thu nghiem cua hai quan (vfx), khong quan my cung phat trien chuong trinh f-x concept, von bao gom gan nhu tat ca cac yeu cau ky thuat giong nhu vfx. va no cung bao gom ca viec phat trien ten lua moi phu hop la aim-82. do ca hai loai ten lua deu co tinh nang gan tuong duong nhau, nen cuoi cung aim-82 bi huy bo de tap trung vao phat trien ten lua agile. aimval. phien ban aim-95a duoc tien hanh ban thu nghiem tai china lake va tham gia ca chuong trinh thu nghiem lien hop aceval/aimval joint test &amp; evaluation tren may bay f-14 va f-15 tai can cu khong quan nellis tu nam 1975 den nam 1978. do chi phi qua cao nen du an phat trien da bi huy bo nam 1975. thay vao do, mot phien ban moi cua ten lua sidewinder duoc phat trien de trang bi cho ca hai quan va khong quan my. mac du no ban dau chi la giai phap tam thoi, nhung tren thuc te, ten lua aim-9 van con dang trong trang bi quan doi my hien nay. trong khi chuong trinh ten lua aim-95 van con dang trong giai doan phat trien, khong quan hoang gia anh cung co nhu cau ve mot loai ten lua moi co kha nang thao dien cao. tuy nhien nhung nghien cuu cua cac ky su nguoi anh dua den viec che tao mot loai ten lua nho hon voi tam ban ngan hon nhieu. nhung nghien cuu dan den concept taildog, ma sau nay tro thanh sraam, ve sau cung bi khai tu do quan doi anh lua chon skyflash. lien xo cung bat dau phat trien ten lua srm tien tien voi dong co thay doi luc day vector va ket qua la su ra doi cua ten lua r-73/aa-11 archer trang bi tren mig-29 vao nam 1985. nato biet duoc tinh nang va muc do tien tien cua r-73 sau khi nuoc duc thong nhat va bat dau no luc de cai thien chat luong ten lua khong doi khong cua minh bang chuong trinh phat trien ten lua hong ngoai iris-t, aim-9x va mica.
lich jalali la mot bo lich mat troi duoc bien soan trong thoi ky cai tri cua jalaluddin malik-shah i nha seljuk, theo chi thi cua nizam al-mulk, thong qua viec su dung cac quan sat duoc thuc hien tai cac thanh pho isfahan (thu phu cua de quoc seljuk), rey va nishapur. cac bien the cua bo lich jalali van duoc su dung o iran va afghanistan cho toi ngay nay. tai iran, cac ten goi cua cung hoang dao duoc su dung, trong khi tai afghanistan, cac ten goc tieng a rap duoc su dung. bo lich them khoang 1 ngay vao lich julius moi 128 nam. lich jalali nhiet doi (), thua huong mot so khia canh tu lich yazdgerdi, da duoc vuong trieu sultan seljuk jalal al-din malik shah i (dat theo ten cua ngai) chap thuan ap dung vao ngay 15 thang 3 nam 1079, dua tren cac de xuat cua mot uy ban cac nha thien van, bao gom omar khayyam, tai dai thien van hoang gia o thu do isfahan. viec tinh toan so thang dua tren su dich chuyen cua mat troi qua cac cung hoang dao. bo lich da duoc su dung trong tam the ky. no duoc khai sinh ra la do su bat man voi hien tuong troi dat theo mua trong lich hoi giao do lich nay la lich am thay vi la lich duong; mot nam am co 354 ngay, mac du duoc xem la chap nhan duoc doi voi nguoi dan du muc sa mac, nhung lai khong the nhu the duoc doi voi nguoi dan dinh cu trong trot, do do lich iran la mot trong so cac bo lich khong phai lich am, duoc nhieu nguoi hoi giao dinh cu thua huong su dung cho muc dich nong nghiep (nhung bo lich khac bao gom lich coptic, lich julius va cac lich semitic o mien can dong). sultan jalal da uy nhiem du an nay vao nam 1073. cong trinh duoc hoan thanh truoc cai chet cua quoc vuong sultan vao nam 1092, sau su kien do, dai thien van da bi bo hoang. mot nam duoc tinh ke tu thoi diem ngay xuan phan (nowruz), va moi thang duoc xac dinh qua viec mat troi di qua vung cung hoang dao tuong ung, mot he thong ket hop nhung cai tien tu he thong an do the ky thu 4 sau cong nguyen cua surya siddhanta ("surya" = mat troi, "siddhanta" = phan tich), dong thoi cung la co so cua hau het cac bo lich hindu. vi thoi gian mat troi di qua co the bien doi trong khoang 24 gio, do dai cua cac thang bien doi nhe qua cac nam khac nhau (moi thang co the tu 29 den 32 ngay). vi du, cac thang trong hai nam cuoi cung cua lich jalali la: boi vi cac thang duoc tinh toan dua tren thoi gian chinh xac theo su dich chuyen cua mat troi di qua cac vung cung hoang dao, su troi dat theo mua khong bao gio vuot qua mot ngay, va cung khong can thiet co nam nhuan trong lich jalali. tuy nhien, lich nay rat kho tinh toan; no doi hoi tinh toan thien van mot cach toan ven va cac quan sat thuc te nham xac dinh su di chuyen ro rang cua mat troi. mot so nguoi cho rang cac phuong phap don gian hoa duoc gioi thieu trong nhung nam qua co the da cho ra doi mot he thong voi tam ngay nhuan trong moi chu ky 33 nam. (quy tac khac biet, chang han nhu chu ky 2820 nam, cung tung duoc cho la do khayyam de xuat.) tuy nhien, lich jalali nguyen ban, dua tren cac quan sat (hoac du doan) ve su dich chuyen cua mat troi, se khong can den nam nhuan hoac dieu chinh theo mua. do su bien doi ve do dai cac thang va cung nhu nhung kho khan trong viec tinh toan chinh bo lich, lich iran da duoc dieu chinh de don gian hoa cac khia canh nay vao nam 1925 (1304 ap), ket qua la su ra doi cua bo lich duong hijri.
natri diacetat, natri biacetat hoac natri hydro acetat la mot hop chat hoa hoc co cong thuc nah(c2h3o2)2. hop chat nay la muoi natri cua acid acetic va la mot chat ran khong mau duoc su dung trong gia vi. hop chat nay cung duoc su dung nhu mot chat khang vi sinh vat. dieu che va cau truc. natri diacetat hinh thanh khi trung hoa mot nua dung dich acid acetic, sau do lam bay hoi dung dich. hop chat nay co the duoc xem nhu la ket qua khi ket hop mot base voi mot acid lien hop cua no thong qua lien ket hydro, duoc goi la , mot hieu ung lam tang tinh acid cua acid acetic trong dung dich dam dac: duoc mo ta la muoi acid natri cua acid acetic, natri diacetat duoc mo ta chinh xac nhat la hop chat natri cua anion co lien ket hydro (ch3co2)2h−. khoang cach giua hai phan tu oxy la khoang 2,47 ångström. hop chat nay khong duoc hoa tan dang ke trong cac dung dich nhung hinh thanh cac tinh the on dinh. ung dung. natri diacetat la mot chat phu gia thuc pham voi so e la e262 va duoc su dung de tao huong vi muoi va giam.
makeba la bai hat do ca si kiem nhac si nguoi phap, jain the hien va ra mat vao ngay 6 thang 11 nam 2015 tu album phong thu dau tay cua co, "zanaka" (2015). do co tu viet loi, bai hat da duoc san xuat boi cong tac vien lau nam, maxim nucci. phan diep khuc cua bai hat su dung mau am thanh tu ca khuc nam 1978, "me and the gang" cua nghe si choi nhac cu go, nhac si, nguoi dan dung va nha san xuat thu am nguoi my, hamilton bohannon. bai hat dat duoc vi tri thu 7 - vi tri cao nhat tren bang xep hang french singles chart. bai hat nay de tuong niem than tuong cua co la miriam makeba, hay con duoc goi la "mama africa", mot ca si, dien vien, dai su thien chi cho lien hop quoc va nha hoat dong nhan quyen nguoi nam phi. thang 6 nam 2023, "makeba" da nhan duoc su noi tieng tro lai do tinh lan truyen ma no dat duoc tren nen tang mang xa hoi tiktok. bai hat da duoc su dung trong cac quang cao cua marshalls va levi's. chuong trinh truyen hinh thuc te cua uc, "i'm a celebrity...get me out of here!" su dung bai hat cho phan hinh hieu. ke tu nam 2019 &amp; 2021, no cung duoc su dung lam chu de gioi thieu cho pham vi phu song giai bong da ngoai hang anh cua amazon prime video's tai vuong quoc anh va ligue 1 o phap. video am nhac. video am nhac dai 3 phut 43 giay cho bai hat "makeba" duoc ra mat vao thang 11 nam 2015, tren kenh youtube chinh thuc cua jain. video mo dau bang khung cuoi cung cua bai hat "come" cung tu album "zanaka", khi co vo nat khung hinh tu may anh nhu the no la mot to giay va di ve phia ben phai man hinh. khi jain xoay cac nut tren san am thanh, cac cot dien tren duong dung len hoac ha xuong, va cac toa nha moc len va ha xuong. video am nhac duoc quay o nam phi, da duoc de cu cho giai grammy.
trong khoang ba nam, nha soan nhac wolfgang amadeus mozart da nuoi mot con sao da xanh lam thu cung. con vat nay duoc nho den vi giai thoai cach ma mozart mua no ve, va vi viec mozart lam han mot tang le cho con vat de tuong niem khi no lia doi. day cung duoc xem la mot vi du ve tinh cam cua nha soan nhac noi chung doi voi cac loai chim. mua ve. ghi chep dau tien ve con chim sao da nay la dong ghi chep cua mozart trong so chi tieu khi ong mua sao da xanh vao ngay 27 thang 5 nam 1784: \relative a' { \set staff.midiinstrument = #"recorder" \set score.tempohidenote = ##t \tempo 4 = 145 \key g \major \time 2/2 \partial 4 b8 c &lt;/score&gt; dong nhac ma mozart ghi lai trong cuon sach kha tuong dong voi nhung o nhip mo dau cua chuong thu ba trong ban concerto cho piano so 17 cung sol truong, k. 453 ma mozart da hoan thanh vai tuan truoc do (ngay 12 thang 4). co the mozart da day con chim hot giai dieu nay trong cua hang thu cung, hoac bat cu noi nao ma ong mua no. theo ban ky am cua mozart, duong nhu con sao da xanh da hot nham mot dau mat ngong vao nhip cuoi cung cua o nhip day du dau tien, va hat not sol thang thay vi sol thuong o o nhip sau. neu sua loi thi giai dieu dung se la: \relative a' { \set staff.midiinstrument = #"recorder" \set score.tempohidenote = ##t \tempo 4 = 145 \key g \major \time 2/2 \partial 4 b8 c &lt;/score&gt; mozart co le da khong dua gion khi ong thuc hien viec ky am nhung gi con chim hot, boi vi chim sao da duoc biet den la loai chim co kha nang bat chuoc giong hat rat tot. 2 nha ghi chep tieu su meredith j. west va andrew p. king cho rang nhieu yeu to trong "a musical joke" (1787) cua mozart cung "mang dau an giong hat cua mot con chim sao". lia doi. con chim ma mozart mang ve nha da song nhu mot con vat cung trong gia dinh ong trong ba nam va no lia doi vao ngay 4 thang 6 nam 1787. cac ghi chep cua georg nikolaus von nissen (chong thu hai cua constanze, vo cua mozart) voi muc dich viet tieu su cua ong ve nha soan nhac da mo ta nghi le tuong niem nhu sau:khi con chim lia doi, ong [mozart] to chuc mot dam tang, trong do tat ca nhung ai co the hat deu phai tham gia, che mang kin mat – lam mot kieu tuong niem, van bia viet bang tho ngan.franz niemetschek, nguoi da phong van constanze va mo ta lai su kien tuong tu:ong ay [mozart] thuong tu viet tho; chu yeu la loai tho hai huoc. [fn.:] day la mot truong hop, trong so nhung truong hop khac, khi con chim sao cung qua doi, ong da dat mot tam bia dang hoang trong khu vuon thue cua minh, va tren do ong da viet mot dong chu. ong ay rat thich dong vat, va – dac biet – la cac loai chim.bai tho tang le cua mozart duoc dich boi robert spaethling sang tieng anh ban ngu nhu sau:&lt;poem lang="de" style="float:left;"&gt;hier ruht ein lieber narr, ein vogel staar. noch in den besten jahren mußt er erfahren des todes bittern schmerz. mir blut't das herz, wenn ich daran gedenke. o leser! schenke auch du ein thränchen ihm. er war nicht schlimm; nur war er etwas munter, doch auch mitunter ein lieber loser schalk, und drum kein dalk. ich wett', er ist schon oben, um mich zu loben für diesen freundschaftsdienst ohne gewinnst. denn wie er unvermuthet sich hat verblutet, dacht er nicht an den mann, der so schön reimen kann. —june 4, 1787. mozart&lt;/poem&gt;&lt;poem style="margin-left:1em; float:left;"&gt;here rests a bird called starling, a foolish little darling. he was still in his prime when he ran out of time, and my sweet little friend came to a bitter end, creating a terrible smart deep in my heart. gentle reader! shed a tear, for he was dear, sometimes a bit too jolly and, at times, quite folly, but nevermore a bore. i bet he is now up on high praising my friendship to the sky, which i render without tender; for when he took his sudden leave, which brought to me such grief, he was not thinking of the man who writes and rhymes as no one can.&lt;/poem&gt; cac nha ghi chep tieu su west va king nhan manh rang nhung con sao da xanh co su than thiet chat che voi nhung nguoi nuoi giu chung, va thuong khien chu nhan cua chung gan bo voi chung. vi vay, su bay to noi buon cua mozart, mac du hai huoc, nhung cung co the kha chan thanh. spaethling cung cap them mot so thong tin khac:bai tho cua mozart ve cai chet cua con chim cung yeu quy cua ong ... mang su hai huoc, buon vui lan lon va tu suy ngam ve thoi diem mat mat va noi dau lon. cha cua ong ay da qua doi, mot nguoi ban than cua ong da chet tre, va ban than nguoi dan ong nay co moi lien quan sau sac voi "don giovanni", vo nhac kich bi tham nhat cua ong. nhung con chim khac. co bang chung cho thay con sao ma mozart mua duoc nam 1784 duong nhu khong phai la con chim cung duy nhat ma ong thich bau ban. nam 14 tuoi, mozart viet thu tu napoli gui ve nha cho chi gai nannerl o salzburg (ngay 19 thang 5 nam 1770) khi ong dang tren duong di du lich voi cha minh la leopold:chi oi, cho em biet ngai chim hoang yen the nao? ngai van cat tieng ca chu? ngai con hot khong? chi co biet tai sao em lai nghi ve chim hoang yen khong? boi vi co mot vi trong phong cho cua em va bo dang tao ra nhung am thanh nho giong nhu cua chung em.mot la thu sau do, do nannerl viet cho me co tai nha o salzburg khi ba den tham münchen nam 1775 cung voi wolfgang va leopold, chi ra nhung con chim khac trong ngoi nha thoi tho au cua mozart:cam on chua, chung con van song kha no am. con hy vong rang me cung song rat tot. mot cau hoi nho, la chim hoang yen, bac ma va chim oanh con song hay ho da de nhung con chim chet doi?mot cau chuyen buon tu nam 1791 duoc nguoi viet tieu su cua mozart hermann abert ke lai, lien quan den mot con chim hoang yen khac co the la ke tuc cua chim sao da, dang o trong gia dinh mozart khi nha soan nhac nam tren giuong benh.ong ta cung cuc phai mien cuong dong y dua con chim hoang yen cung cua minh di, truoc het la sang phong ben canh, sau do tham chi la xa hon nua, vi ong khong the chiu noi tieng hot cua no nua.
bua an chinh ("dinner") la bua an thinh soan nhat va trang trong nhat dien ra trong ngay theo quan niem nhieu nen van hoa phuong tay. trong lich su, bua an thinh soan nhat thuong duoc an vao khoang giua trua va duoc goi la bua an toi ("dinner"). dac biet la trong gioi thuong luu, phong cach an uong dan dan di cu den nhung vung dat moi cuoi the ky 16 den the ky 19. trong tieng anh thi tu dinner co nhieu nghia khac nhau tuy thuoc vao nen van hoa, va co the co nghia la mot bua an voi khoi luong thuc an bat ky duoc an vao bat ky thoi diem nao trong ngay. dac biet, doi khi thuat ngu bua an chinh van duoc dung trong bua an trua hoac dau gio chieu trong nhung dip dac biet, chang han nhu bua toi giang sinh. o vung khi hau nong, bua an chinh co nhieu kha nang duoc an vao buoi toi, sau khi nhiet do giam xuong tao cam giac de chiu khoan khoai.  tren the gioi. o chau au, nguoi ta bat dau an toi muon hon trong ngay trong nhung nam 1700, do su phat trien trong thuc tien cong viec, dieu kien anh sang, tinh trang tai chinh va thay doi van hoa. trong nhieu cach su dung hien dai, thuat ngu "bua an chinh" dung de chi bua toi, hien nay thuong la bua an thinh soan nhat trong ngay o hau het cac nen van hoa phuong tay. khi y nghia nay duoc su dung, cac bua an truoc do thuong duoc goi la bua an sang, bua an trua va co le la tiec tra.  thoi gian an toi o hoa ky muon nhat luc 6:19 chieu, theo phan tich khao sat su dung thoi gian cua nguoi my, voi hau het cac ho gia dinh an chinh trong khoang thoi gian tu 5:07 chieu va 8:19 toi theo du lieu tu nam 2018 den nam 2022, nguoi dan cac bang an som nhat la pennsylvania (cao diem 5:37 chieu) va maine (cao diem 5:40 chieu), trong khi nguoi dan cac bang an muon nhat la texas va mississippi (ca 7: 02 gio chieu cao diem) va washington, d.c., an luc 7:10 toi luc cao diem. mot cuoc khao sat cua jacob's creek, mot nha san xuat ruou cua uc, cho thay thoi gian dung bua toi trung binh o vuong quoc anh la 7:47 toi.
layover (viet cach dieu la layo(v)er) la album phong thu dau tay sap toi cua nam ca si nguoi han quoc va la thanh vien cua nhom nhac bts v. album du kien se duoc big hit music phat hanh vao ngay 8 thang 9 nam 2023. boi canh. vao thang 6 nam 2022, nhom nhac nam bts da phat hanh album tuyen tap dau tay mang ten "proof". sau khi phat hanh, nhom thong bao se tam ngung hoat dong trong mot khoang thoi gian nhat dinh. cho den nam 2023, nhung thanh vien khac cua nhom bao gom co j-hope, jin, rm, jimin, suga va jungkook deu da ra mat cac tac pham solo cho rieng minh. trong thoi gian hoat dong voi bts, v cung tung phat hanh cac tac pham solo truoc day nhu "winter bear", "sweet night" hay "chirstmas tree". da so la de lam nhac phim cho nhung loat phim truyen hinh nhu "tang lop itaewon" hay "mua he yeu dau cua chung ta". phat hanh va quang ba. vao ngay 2 thang 8 nam 2023, v duoc cong bo la dang hop tac voi min hee-jin, giam doc sang tao cua nhom nhac newjeans de chuan bi cho du an dau tay sap toi. ngay sau do, big hit music da cong bo album tren mang xa hoi vao ngay 8 thang 8 kem theo mot video gioi thieu va ngay phat hanh cua no. danh sach bai hat cung duoc thong bao se co tong cong sau ca khuc cung voi mot ban nhac phu khac va tat ca deu co mot video am nhac cho rieng chung. video am nhac dau tien cua ca khuc "love me again" da duoc ra mat vao ngay 9 thang 8 nam 2023. ngay hom sau, video am nhac tiep theo cho ca khuc "rainy days" cung duoc phat hanh tren nen tang youtube. am nhac va ca tu. theo thong cao cua big hit, album phan lon chiu anh huong tu cac the loai nhac r&amp;b xen ke voi nhung yeu to nhac pop. cac bai hat trong album bat dau tu nhung am huong r&amp;b day sau lang nhu "blue", "love me again" va "for us" cho den phong cach nhac soul day lang man mang am huong tu nhung nam 70 tu bai "slow dancing".
dau thang 8 nam 2023, mot loat vu chay rung da bung phat o bang hawaii cua hoa ky, chu yeu la tren dao maui. cac dam chay do gio da buoc nguoi dan phai so tan, gay thiet hai tren dien rong va giet chet it nhat 110 nguoi o thi tran lāhainā; 1.500 nguoi van mat tich. su gia tang cua cac vu chay rung duoc cho la do dieu kien kho rao, gio giat duoc tao ra boi khu vuc ap suat cao hoat dong manh o phia bac hawaiʻi va bao dora o phia nam.  tuyen bo khan cap da duoc thong qua vao ngay 8 thang 8, cho phep chinh quyen thuc hien mot so hanh dong, bao gom kich hoat luc luong ve binh quoc gia hawaii, hanh dong thich hop cua giam doc co quan quan ly khan cap hawaii va ban quan tri tinh trang khan cap, va chi tieu quy thu nhap chung cua tieu bang de ho tro thiet hai do dam chay tao ra. den ngay 9 thang 8, chinh quyen bang hawaii ban bo tinh trang khan cap tren toan bang. ngay 10 thang 8, tong thong hoa ky joe biden ban hanh tuyen bo tham hoa lon cap lien bang. ke tu ngay 12 thang 8, so nguoi chet trong vu chay lāhainā bien no tro thanh vu chay rung chet choc nhat o hoa ky ke tu vu chay cloquet nam 1918, vuot qua vu hoa hoan camp nam 2018 voi 85 nguoi duoc xac nhan thiet mang. chi rieng vu chay lāhainā, trung tam tham hoa thai binh duong (pdc) va co quan quan ly khan cap lien bang (fema) uoc tinh hon 2.200 toa nha da bi pha huy, phan lon la khu dan cu trong tu nhien va bao gom ca nhieu dia danh lich su o lāhainā. thiet hai do vu chay gay ra uoc tinh khoang 5,52 ty usd.
sau day la cac ngay le tai ukraina. ngay le theo luat. truoc khi giao hoi chinh thong giao ukraina va giao hoi cong giao hy lap ukraina chuyen sang lich julius cai cach vao thang 9 nam 2023, tat ca cac ngay le ton giao duoc cu hanh theo lich julius, ke tu do le giang sinh duoc cu hanh chinh thuc vao ngay thang 12. tu nam 2017 den 2022 le giang sinh duoc cu hanh tai ukraina vao hai ngay khac nhau, 7 thang 1 (ngay theo lich julius) va 25 thang 12 (theo lich gregorius va lich julius cai cach). tu nam 2023, le giang sinh chi duoc cu hanh chinh thuc tai ukraina vao ngay 25 thang 12. khi mot ngay le cong cong roi vao cuoi tuan (tuc thu bay va chu nhat), ngay lam viec sau do (tuc thu hai) chuyen thanh mot ngay nghi. neu chi co mot hoac hai ngay lam viec giua ngay nghi le va mot ngay nghi khac thi noi cac bo truong ukraina thuong dua ra khuyen nghi de tranh khoang cach nay bang cach chuyen nhung ngay lam viec nay sang mot ngay thu bay nhat dinh (nghia la de co nhung ky nghi khong bi gian doan, nhung de bu dap dieu nay bang cach lam viec vao mot ngay nghi khac). thong thuong nhung khuyen nghi nhu vay chi lien quan den nhung nhan vien co ngay nghi hang tuan la thu bay va chu nhat.
calci ferricyanide la mot hop chat vo co thuoc loai muoi phuc cua calci va acid ferricyanic co cong thuc hoa hoc ca3[fe(cn)6]2 – tinh the mau do, tan trong nuoc. dieu che. co mot so cach sau de dieu che calci ferricyanide: tinh chat vat ly. calci ferricyanide tao thanh tinh the ngam nuoc ca3[fe(cn)6]2·12h2o – tinh the hinh kim mau do, de tan trong nuoc. tinh chat hoa hoc. hop chat on dinh trong khong khi kho khi dun nong den 100 °c va trong dung dich nuoc lanh. tuy nhien, khi dun soi trong dung dich nuoc, no bi phan huy voi su giai phong acid hydrocyanic, calci hydroxide va ket tua sat(iii) oxide. ung dung. calci ferricyanide la thanh phan cua chat xuc tac cho phan ung trung hop epoxide.
hiep hoi cong nghiep quoc phong va hang khong chau au ("aerospace and defence industries association of europe)" (asd) la mot hiep hoi thuong mai cho hang san xuat hang khong vu tru, cong nghiep quoc phong va an ninh tai chau au. theo to chuc, no dai dien cho hon 3.000 cong ty tai 17 quoc gia. lich su. to chuc duoc thanh lap vao nam 2004 thong qua viec sap nhap hiep hoi cong nghiep khong gian chau au (eurospace), hiep hoi cong nghiep hang khong chau au (aecma) va nhom cong nghiep quoc phong chau au (edig). hoat dong. to chuc hoat dong nhu mot nhom van dong va dong vien chinh sach cho nganh cong nghiep trong co cau lien minh chau au, dac biet la co quan quoc phong chau au, co quan an toan hang khong chau au va co quan chuong trinh vu tru chau au. to chuc chiu trach nhiem duy tri tieu chuan asd-ste100 simplified technical english (ste) cho tai lieu ky thuat hang khong vu tru.
concerto cho piano tay trai cung re truong la mot tac pham am nhac duoc sang tac boi maurice ravel trong khoang thoi gian tu nam 1929 den nam 1930 cung luc voi ban concerto piano cung re truong cua ong. tac pham duoc dat hang boi nghe si duong cam nguoi ao paul wittgenstein, nguoi da mat canh tay phai trong the chien thu nhat. ban concerto duoc cong dien lan dau vao ngay 5 thang 1 nam 1932, trong do wittgenstein la nghe si doc tau bieu dien cung dan nhac giao huong vien. sang tac va cong dien. tac pham duoc uy dat hang boi paul wittgenstein, mot nghe si bieu dien duong cam. ong la nguoi bi mat canh tay phai trong the chien thu nhat. de chuan bi sang tac, ravel da nghien cuu mot so tac pham viet cho dan piano mot tay, bao gom "six etudes pour la main gauche" (6 khuc luyen tap cho tay trai) (op. 135) cua camille saint-saëns, ban chuyen soan cua leopold godowsky cho tay trai tu 2 quyen khuc luyen tap cua frederic chopin (op. 10 va 25), "ecole de la main gauche" (tam dich la "truong phai tay trai") cua carl czerny (op. 399), "24 etudes pour la main gauche" (op. 718, "24 khuc luyen tap cho tay trai"), "fantaisie cung la giang truong" (op. 76 no. 1) cua charles-valentin alkan va "khuc dao dau va nocturne cho tay trai" (op. 9) cua alexander scriabin. wittgenstein da co buoi cong dien tac pham voi robert heger va dan nhac giao huong vien vao ngay 5 thang 1 nam 1932. ravel ban dau muon arturo toscanini la nguoi chi huy tac pham nhung sau do toscanini da tu choi. nghe si piano nguoi phap dau tien bieu dien tac pham la jacques fevrier, cung do ravel lua chon. cau truc. mot tai lieu da trich dan lai loi noi cua ravel rang ban nhac chi co mot chuong nhung mot nguon khac thi cho rang tac pham duoc chia thanh hai chuong duoc lien ket voi nhau. theo marie-noëlle masson, tac pham lai co cau truc ba phan: cham–nhanh–cham, thay vi nhanh–cham–nhanh thong thuong. tiep nhan va di san. mac du luc dau, wittgenstein khong ua nhip dieu va hoa am chiu co chiu anh huong tu nhac jazz, nhung ong dan dan to ra thich thu voi ban concerto nay. khi ravel lan dau tien nghe ong choi ban concerto tai mot buoi hoa nhac rieng o dai su quan phap o vien, ong tham chi da to ra rat tuc gian. sau do, wittgenstein dong y bieu dien ban concerto nhu da viet, va hai nguoi dan ong da dung hoa lai nhung bat dong cua ho, "nhung toan bo tinh tiet deu de lai cuc dang trong mieng cua ca doi ben". vao thang 5 nam 1930, ravel da co bat dong lon voi arturo toscanini ve nhip do chinh xac cho "bolero" (khi do toscanini da chi huy tac pham qua nhanh so voi y muon cua ravel. ravel da noi rang toscanini hoac la chi huy no o toc do cham hon ma ong lam, hoac tot nhat khong chi huy nua). vao thang 9, ravel co gang han gan moi quan he va moi toscanini chi huy buoi cong dien the gioi ban concerto cho piano danh cho tay trai, nhung nhac truong da tu choi. ngay ca truoc khi cong dien, vao nam 1931, alfred cortot da bien soan lai ban nhac thanh concerto piano hai tay va dan nhac; tuy nhien ravel khong chap nhan va da cam xuat ban hoac bieu dien no. cortot phot lo va bieu dien phan chuyen soan cua ban than minh, dieu nay khien cho ravel phai viet tam thu gui den nhieu nhac truong de cau xin dung moi cortot choi ban concerto cho hai tay. sau khi ravel qua doi vao nam 1937, cortot tiep tuc bieu dien ban chuyen soan va tham chi con thu am voi charles munch chi huy dan nhac nhac vien paris. roger muraro cung da choi ban nhac nay trong cuoc thi tchaikovsky quoc te nam 1986. tac pham giup anh gianh duoc vi tri thu tu trong cuoc thi piano.
tieu chuan chau au en 3 quy dinh cac yeu cau cho binh chua chay di dong. tuan thu tieu chuan la yeu cau phap ly cho viec cau tao tat ca cac binh chua chay trong lien minh chau au. tieu chuan da duoc cong bo thanh 10 phan: en 3-1, en 3-2, en 3-4 va en 3-5 da bi rut lai va duoc thay the bang en 3-7, en 3-8 va en 3-9. en 3-6 da bi rut lai va duoc thay the bang en 3-10.
tieu chuan chau au (thinh thoang con goi la euronorm, viet tat la en, tu ten tieng duc ("chuan european")) la cac tieu chuan ky thuat da duoc phe chuan boi mot trong ba to chuc tieu chuan chau au: uy ban tieu chuan chau au (cen), uy ban tieu chuan ky thuat dien chau au (cenelec), hoac vien tieu chuan vien thong chau au (etsi). tat ca cac tieu chuan chau au (en) duoc thiet ke va tao ra boi tat ca cac ben lien quan thong qua quy trinh minh bach, coi mo va dong thuan. cac tieu chuan chau au la mot thanh phan cot loi cua thi truong chung chau au. chung rat quan trong trong viec tao dieu kien thuan loi cho thuong mai va co tinh minh bach cao trong so cac nha san xuat trong va ngoai lanh tho chau au. mot tieu chuan dai dien cho mot thong so ky thuat mau, mot giai phap ky thuat ma thi truong co the thuc hien giao dich dua vao do. cac tieu chuan chau au phai duoc chuyen thanh tieu chuan quoc gia tai tat ca cac quoc gia thanh vien eu. dieu nay dam bao rang nha san xuat de dang tiep can thi truong cua tat ca cac quoc gia chau au nay khi ap dung tieu chuan chau au. cac quoc gia thanh vien cung phai rut bat ky tieu chuan quoc gia xung dot nao: tieu chuan en thay the bat ky tieu chuan quoc gia nao. cac to chuc duoc cong nhan theo quy dinh cua eu nham xac lap tieu chuan bao gom cen, cenelec va etsi. xu huong hien tai o chau au huong toi su hoa hop cac tieu chuan quoc gia duoi bo tieu chuan thong nhat euronorm. tai day, euronorm tro thanh tuong duong cua mot tieu chuan quoc gia tai tat ca cac quoc gia thanh vien va thay the bat ky tieu chuan quoc gia xung dot nao truoc do. danh so va dat ten. viec gan so bat dau voi en 1 (bep dau voi dot hoi). cac khoang so duoc xac dinh truoc sau day la mot ngoai le. since standards are updated as needed (they are reviewed for currency approximately every five years), it is useful to specify a version. the year of origin is added after the standard, separated by a colon, example: en 50126:1999. in addition to the en standards mentioned, there are also the en iso standards with the numbers iso 1 to 59999 and the en iec standards from iec 60000 to 79999, as well as en standards outside the defined number ranges. when an en is adopted by a national standards body into the national body of standards, it is given the status of a national standard (e.g. german institute for standardisation (din), austrian standards international (önorm), austrian standards international (sn)). the name is then prefixed by the country-specific abbreviation (e.g. önorm en ...), and the number of the european standard is usually adopted, e.g. din en iso 2338:1998 or önorm en iso 9001:2000. tim cac tieu chuan chau au o dau. cac tieu chuan chau au co the duoc tim thay tren cac danh muc catalogue tuong ung cua cac co quan tieu chuan chau au (cen, cenelec va etsi). cac phien ban quoc gia cua cac tieu chuan chau au co the duoc tim thay tren cac danh muc catalogue tuong ung cua cac co quan tieu chuan hoa quoc gia. cen la mot trong ba to chuc tieu chuan chau au va phat trien tieu chuan cho nhieu loai san pham, vat lieu, dich vu va quy trinh khac nhau. mot so linh vuc ma cen pho quat bao gom thiet bi va dich vu van chuyen, hoa chat, xay dung, san pham tieu dung, quoc phong va an ninh, nang luong, thuc pham va thuc an gia suc, suc khoe va an toan, cham soc suc khoe, nganh cong nghe so, may moc hoac dich vu. cen ap dung cac tieu chuan iso tai chau au thong qua tien to "en iso" (xem them hiep dinh vienna). cac tieu chuan cen thuong duoc de cap trong phap luat va chinh sach chau au, nhu trong truong hop cua cac tieu chuan chau au cenelec hoac etsi.
giai doan vong loai va vong play-off uefa champions league 2023–24 bat dau tu ngay 27 thang 6 va ket thuc vao ngay 30 thang 8 nam 2023. co tong cong 52 doi thi dau o he thong vong loai cua uefa champions league 2023–24, bao gom giai doan vong loai va vong play-off, voi 42 doi o nhom cac doi vo dich va 10 doi o nhom cac doi khong vo dich. 6 doi thang o vong play-off (4 doi tu nhom cac doi vo dich, 2 doi tu nhom cac doi khong vo dich) di tiep vao vong bang, de cung voi 26 doi tham du vao vong bang. thoi gian la cest (), nhu duoc liet ke boi uefa (gio dia phuong, neu khac nhau thi nam trong ngoac don). vong so loai. &lt;section begin=pr /&gt; vong so loai bao gom hai tran ban ket vao ngay 27 thang 6 nam 2022 va tran chung ket vao ngay 30 thang 6 nam 2023. le boc tham cho vong so loai duoc to chuc vao ngay 13 thang 6 nam 2023.&lt;section end=pr /&gt; tom tat. &lt;section begin=pr /&gt; doi thang cua tran chung ket vong so loai di tiep vao vong loai thu nhat. cac doi thua cua cac tran ban ket va chung ket duoc chuyen qua vong loai thu hai europa conference league nhom cac doi vo dich. vong loai thu nhat. &lt;section begin=q1 /&gt; le boc tham cho vong loai thu nhat duoc to chuc vao ngay 20 thang 6 nam 2023.&lt;section end=q1 /&gt; tom tat. &lt;section begin=q1 /&gt; cac tran luot di duoc dien ra vao ngay 11 va 12 thang 7, cac tran luot ve duoc dien ra vao ngay 18 va 19 thang 7 nam 2023. doi thang cua cac cap dau di tiep vao vong loai thu hai nhom cac doi vo dich. 13 trong so 15 doi thua duoc chuyen qua vong loai thu hai europa conference league nhom cac doi vo dich va 2 doi thua nhan suat dac cach va duoc chuyen qua vong loai thu ba europa conference league nhom cac doi vo dich. ghi chu &lt;section end=q1 /&gt; cac tran dau. "astana thang voi tong ty so 3–2." vong loai thu hai. &lt;section begin=q2 /&gt; le boc tham cho vong loai thu hai duoc to chuc vao ngay 21 thang 6 nam 2023.&lt;section end=q2 /&gt; tom tat. &lt;section begin=q2 /&gt; cac tran luot di duoc dien ra vao ngay 25 va 26 july, cac tran luot ve duoc dien ra vao ngay 1 va 2 thang 8 nam 2023. doi thang cua cac cap dau di tiep vao vong loai thu ba thuoc nhom tuong ung cua ho. doi thua thuoc nhom cac doi vo dich duoc chuyen qua vong loai thu ba europa league nhom cac doi vo dich, trong khi doi thua thuoc nhom cac doi khong vo dich duoc chuyen qua vong loai thu ba europa league nhom chinh. nhom cac doi vo dich. "galatasaray thang voi tong ty so 3–2." "olimpija ljubljana thang voi tong ty so 3–2." "rakow częstochowa thang voi tong ty so 4–3." "tong ty so 3–3. ki thang 4–3 tren cham phat den." "slovan bratislava thang voi tong ty so 3–2." "dinamo zagreb thang voi tong ty so 6–0." nhom cac doi khong vo dich. "panathinaikos thang voi tong ty so 5–3." "tong ty so 3–3. servette thang 4–1 tren cham phat den." vong loai thu ba. &lt;section begin=q3 /&gt; le boc tham cho vong loai thu ba duoc to chuc vao ngay 24 thang 7 nam 2023.&lt;section end=q3 /&gt; tom tat. &lt;section begin=q3 /&gt; cac tran luot di duoc dien ra vao ngay 8, 9 va 15 thang 8, cac tran luot ve duoc dien ra vao ngay 15 va 19 thang 8 nam 2023. doi thang cua cac cap dau di tiep vao vong play-off thuoc nhom tuong ung cua ho. doi thua thuoc nhom cac doi vo dich duoc chuyen qua vong play-off europa league, trong khi doi thua thuoc nhom cac doi khong vo dich duoc chuyen qua vong bang europa league. ghi chu &lt;section end=q3 /&gt; nhom cac doi vo dich. "psv eindhoven thang voi tong ty so 7–3." "braga thang voi tong ty so 3–1."
keymark la mot con dau, chung nhan tu nguyen cua chau au, the hien su tuan thu theo tieu chuan chau au (en). no thuoc so huu cua cen, uy ban tieu chuan chau au, va cenelec, uy ban tieu chuan ky thuat dien chau au. keymark la con dau chau au dua tren nguyen tac "mot tieu chuan, mot thu nghiem, duoc chap nhan o moi noi". no duoc van hanh boi cac co quan chung nhan da duoc uy quyen boi cen hoac cenelec va duoc cap phep dua tren en 45011 (huong dan 65 iso/iec) boi mot ben ky ket thoa thuan da phia (mla) cua hiep hoi hop tac chau au ve chung nhan (ea). dieu kien tien quyet cho viec chung nhan la su thiet lap va hoat dong cua kiem soat san xuat nha may lien quan den san pham (fpc), co xem xet cac yeu to cua loat tieu chuan iso 9000 va quy trinh cua day chuyen san xuat lien quan tu nguyen lieu tho den san pham hoan thanh va luu tru san pham. fpc phai la mot phan khong the tach roi cua he thong quan ly chat luong cua nha san xuat, neu co. mot vi du ve viec ap dung bieu tuong keymark chinh la solar keymark.
ai wa katsu (はつ, nghia den la "tinh yeu se chien thang") la mot bai hat do ca si kiem nhac si nguoi nhat ban sang tac va thu am, duoc phat hanh duoi dang dia don thu tam cua nghe si vao thang 9 nam 1990. ban dau no duoc gioi thieu trong album "" cua anh ay "(がだった。 "giac mo cua toi la cau nguyen bong chay."), phat hanh mot thang truoc khi dia don ra mat. bai hat da tro thanh ban hit dau tien cua nghe si bieu dien va la dia don thanh cong nhat voi doanh so hon 2 trieu ban, dong thoi duoc coi la bai hat dac trung cua anh ay. "ai wa katsu" da dung dau bang xep hang oricon trong 8 tuan, dung o vi tri thu ba trong danh sach dia don ban chay nhat cua dat nuoc nam 1991. doanh so cua dia don nay da vuot qua con so 2 trieu trong suot 52 tuan ton tai tren bang xep hang.
doi tuyen bong da nu quoc gia thuy dien (tieng thuy dien: "svenska damfotbollslandslaget") la doi tuyen dai dien cho thuy dien tai cac giai dau bong da nu quoc te va duoc quan ly boi hiep hoi bong da thuy dien (svff). thuy dien duoc cong nhan la mot trong nhung doi tuyen nu xuat sac nhat the gioi. doi da co mot lan gianh chuc vo dich tai giai vo dich bong da nu chau au vao nam 1984, ben canh do la ba lan gianh ngoi a quan vao cac nam 1987, 1995 va 2001. tai giai vo dich bong da nu the gioi, thanh tich tot nhat cua doi la vi tri a quan nam 2003. ngoai ra, doi cung co bon lan gianh hang ba vao cac nam 1991, 2011, 2019 va 2023. cho den nay, thuy dien da tham du muoi giai vo dich chau au, tam giai vo dich the gioi va sau the van hoi mua he. cau thu. doi hinh hien tai. doi hinh cac cau thu duoc trieu tap tham du giai vo dich bong da nu the gioi 2023. trieu tap gan day. cac cau thu duoi day duoc trieu tap trong vong 12 thang. inj rut lui vi chan thuong&lt;br&gt; wd rut lui vi li do ca nhan&lt;br&gt;
datex ii hoac datex2 la mot tieu chuan trao doi du lieu nham trao doi thong tin giao thong giua cac trung tam quan ly giao thong, nha cung cap dich vu giao thong, nha dieu hanh giao thong va doi tac truyen thong. no bao gom vi du ve cac su co hoac tai nan giao thong, cong truong duong hien tai va cac su kien lien quan den giao thong dac biet khac. nhung du lieu nay duoc trinh bay duoi dang dinh dang xml va duoc mo hinh hoa bang uml. tieu chuan nay duoc phat trien boi co quan ky thuat he thong van chuyen thong minh "intelligent transport systems" (cen/tc 278) cua uy ban tieu chuan chau au. tieu chuan bao gom 12 phan:
trong lich su, ton giao va chinh tri hoc, thanh trung la hanh dong cach chuc hoac hanh quyet nhung nguoi bi coi la khong mong muon cua nhung nguoi nam quyen tu chinh phu, to chuc khac, lanh dao nhom cua ho hoac toan xa hoi. mot nhom thuc hien no luc nhu vay duoc coi la tu thanh trung. cac cuoc thanh trung co the dien ra duoi hinh thuc bat bao dong hoac bao luc. trong truong hop bat bao dong, muc tieu thuong don gian la cach chuc nhung nguoi bi thanh trung, trong khi voi hinh thuc bao luc, nhung nguoi bi thanh trung se bi bo tu, luu day hoac giet. dac diem. trong cac vu tham sat thuong hai (1927) va dem cua nhung con dao dai (1934), viec lanh dao cua mot dang chinh tri chong lai mot bo phan hoac nhom cu the trong dang va thu tieu cac thanh vien cua dang thuong duoc goi la "thanh trung". trong khi do, cac su kien truc xuat hang loat voi ly do phan biet chung toc va bai ngoai, nhu su kien truc xuat nguoi tatar krym (1944), thi khong phai la "thanh trung". mac du cac cuoc thanh trung dot ngot va bao luc thuong dang chu y, hau het cac cuoc thanh trung khong lien quan den hanh quyet hoac bo tu ngay lap tuc, vi du nhu cac cuoc thanh trung lon dinh ky cua dang cong san tiep khac tren co so cua su tho o hoac lo la, hay viec dich vu dan su duc thanh trung nguoi do thai va nhung nguoi bat dong chinh kien trong nhung nam 1933–1934. chu tich mao trach dong va cac cong su cua ong da thanh trung phan lon lanh dao cua dang cong san trung quoc, bao gom ca chu tich nuoc luu thieu ky va tong bi thu luc bay gio dang tieu binh, tu nam 1966 nhu mot phan cua dai cach mang van hoa vo san. o cac quoc gia theo tu tuong mao trach dong, cac ban an thuong lien quan den lao dong kho sai trong cac trai "laogai" va hanh quyet. dang tieu binh sau do da noi tieng vi da tro lai nam quyen sau nhieu lan bi thanh trung.
wilberforce ( – 19 thang 5 nam 1988) la mot chu meo song o so 10 pho downing duoc thue lam truong quan bat chuot tai van phong noi cac tu nam 1973 den nam 1987. wilberforce da phuc vu trong bon nhiem ky thu tuong: edward heath, harold wilson, james callaghan va margaret thatcher. trong cao pho duoc cong bo ngay sau khi con meo mat, wilberforce duoc menh danh la "chu meo bat chuot gioi nhat nuoc anh". dau doi va nghe nghiep. wilberforce la mot con meo muop duc tam tuan tuoi mau trang duoc chi nhanh hounslow cua rspca nhan nuoi vao nam 1973. no duoc chi dinh lam con meo cua nguoi quan ly van phong pho downing de doi pho voi viec can pha cua chuot va nhan tien tro cap. con meo duoc dat ten la "wilberforce" de vinh danh william wilberforce nguoi theo chu nghia bai no nguoi anh. cac buc thu tham hoi va nhung loi chuc may man gui den con meo duoc nhan vien pho downing hoi am. mac du giu vai tro truong quan bat chuot tai van phong noi cac, nhung wilberforce hiem khi den bat chuot tai van phong noi cac, thay vao do no thich den van phong scotland, 11 pho downing va van phong doi ngoai. cuu thu ky bao chi pho downing bernard ingham cho biet, thu tuong margaret thatcher tung mua cho wilberforce "mot hop ca moi tai mot sieu thi o moskva". theo "the daily telegraph", margaret thatcher chon ca moi vi "khong co gi khac de mua". wilberforce thuong deu dan ngu tren va duoi ban lam viec cua ingham, dieu nay khien ingham kho chiu vi ong mac benh hen suyen. khi nhung con vit tu cong vien st. james gan do co trung sap no, thatcher cho nguoi dua wilberforce ra khoi noi do. trong luc bbc tuong thuat ve cuoc tong tuyen cu nam 1983, esther rantzen da cam wilberforce va gioi thieu voi khan gia. ve tuoi tho cua wilberforce, vao nam 1985, to "sunday mirror" tuyen bo wilberforce "duong nhu ton tai mai mai"; vao thang 12 nam 1986, truoc cuoc tong tuyen cu nam 1987, to "lincolnshire echo" viet: cai chet. wilberforce nghi huu vao ngay 3 thang 4 nam 1987, sau 14 nam phuc vu duoi bon nhiem ky thu tuong khac nhau. wilberforce den song o essex voi mot nguoi trong nom da nghi huu tu so 10 pho downing; truoc khi chu meo roi di, thatcher da tang wilberforce mot mon qua. wilberforce mat vao ngay 19 thang 5 nam 1988, o tuoi 15. thoi diem wilberforce mat, edward heath dang o tokyo, ong noi "rat tiec vi cu dan lau nhat da qua doi". harold wilson, nguoi "cuc ky thich" wilberforce, bay to su thuong tiec cua ong; vo cua james callaghan, audrey duoc cho la bi "soc". thatcher duoc thong bao ve cai chet cua wilberforce vao cuoi cuoc hop noi cac, ba cho biet la "rat buon". trong nhieu cau chuyen tren bao va cao pho dua tin ve cai chet cua no, wilberforce duoc menh danh la "chu meo bat chuot gioi nhat nuoc anh". wilberforce duoc chon cat gan nha huu tri.
giai thuong sach quoc gia lan thu 5 duoc to chuc trong nam 2022. co tong cong 26 cuon sach duoc trao giai, bao gom:
giai thuong sach quoc gia lan thu 4 duoc to chuc trong nam 2021. co tong cong 24 cuon sach duoc trao giai, bao gom:
giai thuong sach quoc gia lan thu 3 duoc to chuc trong nam 2020. co tong cong 27 cuon sach duoc trao giai, bao gom:
giai thuong sach quoc gia lan thu 2 duoc to chuc trong nam 2019. co tong cong 27 cuon sach duoc trao giai, bao gom::
giai thuong sach quoc gia lan thu 1 duoc to chuc trong nam 2018. giai thuong duoc chia thanh 2 hang muc sach hay va sach dep. co tong cong 35 cuon sach duoc trao giai, bao gom: giai a:. giai a hang muc sach hay (3): giai a hang muc sach dep (3): giai b. giai b hang muc sach hay (9): giai b hang muc sach dep (5): giai c. giai c hang muc sach dep (5): giai c hang muc sach hay (10):
rachanun mahawan (tieng thai: ฟิล์ม รชานันท์ มหาวรรณ์, sinh ngay 14 thang 7 nam 2000) con co nghe danh la film, la mot dien vien nguoi thai lan truc thuoc gmmtv. co bat dau su nghiep dien xuat cua minh khi gianh chien thang trong cuoc thi 'go on girl &amp; guy: star search' (2019) va ki hop dong voi gmmtv. co bat dau dien xuat khi dong vai phu "earn" trong bo phim vao nam 2020 tieu su. rachanun sinh ra tai thu do bangkok, thai lan vao ngay 14 thang 7 nam 2000. vao thang 12 nam 2022, co tot nghiep khoa kien truc, chi nhanh nghe thuat midea tai dai hoc cong nghe king mongkut thonburi. su nghiep. nam 2019, rachanun da tham gia chuong trinh truyen hinh thuc te 'go on girl &amp; guy: star search' do clean &amp; clear tai tro, gianh chien thang cung voi mot thi sinh khac - nattawat finkler (patrick), sau do co da ky hop dong doc quyen voi gmmtv va xuat hien tren dark blue kiss voi vai dien khach moi "namwan". nam 2020, co ra mat voi vai phu dau tien khi dong vai "earn" trong bo phim . vao ngay 10 thang 10 nam 2022, the three gentlebros duoc phat song tren gmm25, co gop mat voi tu cach la vai chinh "view". ngay 27 thang 4 nam 2023, my precious, bo phim dua tren tac pham you are the apple of my eye, la phim dien anh dau tien duoc san xuat boi gmmtv duoc khoi chieu sau 3 nam tri hoan do dai dich covid-19, co gop mat voi vai chinh "lin", hop tac voi ban dien korapat kirdpan.
seifollah louis hakimi (1932 – ) la mot nha toan hoc nguoi my goc iran, sinh ra tai iran, giao su danh du tai dai hoc northwestern, noi ong chu tri khoa ky thuat dien tu nam 1973 den nam 1978. ong la chu nhiem khoa ky thuat dien tai dai hoc california, davis, tu nam 1986 den nam 1996. hakimi nhan bang tien sy tu dai hoc illinois tai urbana-champaign nam 1959, duoi su giam sat cua mac van valkenburg. ong co hon 100 hau due hoc thuat, hau het trong so ho la thong qua hoc tro cua ong la narsingh deo. ong duoc biet den voi viec mo ta cac chuoi bac cua do thi vo huong, voi viec xay dung bai toan cay steiner tren cac mang luoi, va cong trinh cua ong ve cac bai toan vi tri co so tren mang.
farideh firoozbakht ( – ) la mot nha toan hoc nguoi iran. ba da de xuat gia thuyet firoozbakht ve phan phoi so nguyen to nam 1982. ba tung hoc nganh duoc va sau do hoc toan tai dai hoc isfahan va giang day toan hoc tai cac truong dai hoc iran, bao gom ca dai hoc isfahan.
sara zahedi (sinh 1981 tai tehran) la mot nha toan hoc nguoi iran goc thuy dien lam viec trong linh vuc tinh toan dong luc hoc chat long va giu chuc pho giao su ve giai tich so tai vien cong nghe hoang gia kth o thuy dien. ba la mot trong muoi nguoi doat giai va la nu chu nhan duy nhat giai thuong cua hiep hoi toan hoc chau au nam 2016 "cho nghien cuu noi bat cua ba doi voi viec phat trien va phan tich cac thuat toan so cho cac phuong trinh vi phan tung phan, tap trung vao cac ung dung cho cac bai toan hinh hoc bien doi dong". chu de bai thuyet trinh giai thuong ems cua sara zahedi la nghien cuu gan day cua ba ve phuong phap cutfem de giai cac bai toan dong luc hoc chat long voi hinh dang bien thay doi, chang han nhu phat sinh khi mo phong dong luc hoc cua he hai chat long khong the tron lan. phuong phap nay ket hop cac phuong phap thiet lap muc do de bieu dien cac mien ranh gioi khi cat qua mot luoi thong nhat nam duoi, cung voi cac ky thuat mo phong so co the thich ung voi hinh hoc phuc tap cua cac o luoi duoc cat boi cac ranh gioi nay. khi zahedi muoi tuoi, viec cha ba bi giet boi che do sau cach mang iran da thuc day me ba gui ba sang thuy dien ti nan mot minh va chi gia nhap lai voi ba vai nam sau do. ba bi cuon hut vao toan hoc mot phan vi ba hieu toan hoc tot hon tieng thuy dien, va co hoc chat long boi cac ung dung trong the gioi thuc cua no. ba lay bang thac si tai kth nam 2006 va bang tien si nam 2011; luan an cua ba, "phuong phap so cho cac bai toan giao dien chat long (numerical methods for fluid interface problems)", duoc chi dan boi gunilla kreiss. sau khi hoan thanh nghien cuu sau tien si tai dai hoc uppsala, ba tro lai kth voi tu cach la tro ly giao su nam 2014.
cuoc bau cu tong thong hoa ky nam 1872 la cuoc bau cu tong thong bon nam mot lan lan thu 22, duoc to chuc vao thu ba, ngay 5 thang 11 nam 1872. bat chap su chia re trong noi bo dang cong hoa, tong thong duong nhiem ulysses s. grant da danh bai ung cu vien dang cong hoa tu do (duoc chong lung boi dang dan chu) horace greeley. grant da duoc nhat tri tai de cu tai dai hoi toan quoc dang cong hoa nam 1872, nhung cac doi thu trong dang cua ong da thanh lap dang cong hoa tu do va to chuc mot dai hoi cua rieng ho. dai hoi toan quoc dang cong hoa tu do nam 1872 sau cung da de cu greeley, mot nha bao tu new york, va soan thao mot ban cuong linh keu goi cai cach dan vu va cham dut tai thiet. cac nha lanh dao dang dan chu tin rang hy vong duy nhat cua ho de danh bai grant la cung nhau doan ket de ung ho greeley, va dai hoi toan quoc dang dan chu nam 1872 da de cu lien danh ma dang cong hoa tu do da de cu truoc do. du duoc chong lung boi lien minh giua dang cong hoa tu do va dang dan chu, greeley la mot nha van dong chinh tri toi va grant, do do, van duoc yeu thich rong rai. grant da gianh chien thang cach biet trong chien dich tai tranh cu cua minh, thang 31 trong so 37 bang, bao gom mot so bang mien nam se khong bo phieu cho dang cong hoa cho den tan the ky 20. grant se la nguoi duong nhiem cuoi cung thang cu hai nhiem ky lien tiep cho den tan khi william mckinley gianh chien thang trong cuoc bau cu tong thong nam 1900, va cach biet phan tram phieu pho thong cua ong la 11,8% la cach biet lon nhat tu nam 1856 den nam 1904. vao ngay 29 thang 11 nam 1872, sau khi so phieu pho thong duoc kiem dem, nhung truoc khi dai cu tri doan nhom hop, greeley qua doi. ket qua la cac dai cu tri theo ly thuyet truoc do phai bau cho greeley da buoc phai bo phieu cho 4 ung cu vien khac cho chuc tong thong va 8 ung cu vien cho chuc pho tong thong. cuoc bau cu nam 1872 cung la lan duy nhat trong lich su hoa ky ma mot ung cu vien tong thong tu 2 dang lon qua doi trong cuoc bau cu. cuoc bau cu nay da xac lap ky luc ve chuoi chien thang lau nhat cua dang cong hoa trong lich su hoa ky voi 4 cuoc bau cu, mot ky luc se duoc lap mot lan nua boi dang cong hoa vao nam 1908. ban than grant la 1 trong 4 tong thong dang cong hoa duy nhat da phuc vu tron ven 2 nhiem ky, nhung nguoi con lai la dwight d. eisenhower, ronald reagan va george w. bush. de cu. de cu cua dang cong hoa. tai dai hoi, dang cong hoa da de cu tong thong ulysses s. grant ra tai tranh cu chuc tong thong, nhung lai de cu thuong nghi si henry wilson tu massachusetts tranh chuc pho tong thong thay vi pho tong thong duong nhiem schuyler colfax, mac du ca hai deu dinh liu den vu be boi credit mobilier no ra 2 thang sau khi dai hoi cua dang cong hoa be mac. mot so nguoi khac, von da tro nen met moi voi nan tham nhung tran lan trong noi bo chinh quyen grant, da quyet dinh cung nhau thanh lap dang cong hoa tu do. de cu cua cac dang doi lap. voi hy vong danh bai grant, dang dan chu da ung ho cho cac ung cu vien cua dang cong hoa tu do. de cu cua dang cong hoa tu do. mot nhom nhung dang vien cong hoa bat dong chinh kien co anh huong da roi khoi dang de thanh lap dang cong hoa tu do vao nam 1870. tai dai hoi toan quoc duy nhat cua dang, duoc to chuc o cincinnati nam 1872, bien tap vien to "new york tribune" cuu dan bieu horace greeley duoc de cu lam tong thong o lan bo phieu thu 6, danh bai charles francis adams. sau do, thong doc missouri benjamin gratz brown duoc de cu lam pho tong thong trong lan bo phieu thu hai. de cu cua dang dan chu. dai hoi trieu tap tai baltimore, maryland, tu ngay 9 den 10 thang 7. vi mong muon danh bai ulysses s. grant dang cao, dang dan chu quyet dinh de cu lien danh greeley/brown cua dang cong hoa tu do va thong qua cuong linh cua ho. greeley nhan duoc 686 trong so 732 phieu bau tu dai bieu, trong khi brown nhan duoc 713. thong qua cuong linh cua dang cong hoa tu do tuc la dang dan chu da chap nhan chien luoc khoi hanh moi, chien luoc da bac bo cuong linh chong tai thiet ban hanh nam nam 1868. ho nhan ra rang de gianh chien thang trong cuoc bau cu, ho phai nhin ve tuong lai chu khong the mai luan quan voi cac van de lien quan den noi chien. ho cung nhan ra rang ho se chi phan tan so phieu chong grant neu ho de cu mot ung cu vien khong phai greeley. tuy nhien, greeley noi tieng tu lau la mot nhan vat chong doi dang dan chu tich cuc nhat, do do da lam giam muc do ung ho cua cac dang vien dang dan chu voi ung cu vien tong thong cua chinh ho. mot so dang vien dang dan chu lo lang rang viec ung ho greeley se khien dang sup do ngay lap tuc, giong nhu viec dang whig tren bo vuc sup do da hoan toan sup do sau khi ung ho ung cu vien cua nhat vo so tri millard fillmore vao nam 1856, mac du nhung nguoi khac cam thay rang dang dan chu dang o vi the manh hon nhieu so voi truong hop cua dang whig. hon nua, dang whig duong nhu da sup do truoc nam 1856 va nhieu nguoi con du doan (chinh xac, nhu da xay ra) rang dang cong hoa tu do se khong ton tai lau dai do khong khac biet gi nhieu ve mat tu tuong voi dang cong hoa. mot nhom nguoi do james a. bayard lanh dao da tim cach de cu mot lien danh khac voi lien danh cua dang cong hoa tu do, nhung phan lon ho sau cung cung dong y ung ho greeley. dai hoi, chi keo dai 6 gio trong 2 ngay, la dai hoi cua dang lon ngan nhat trong lich su. dang cong hoa tu do va dang dan chu sau do hoat dong cung duoi mot ten o tat ca cac bang ngoai tru louisiana va texas. o nhung bang ma dang cong hoa manh hon, dang cong hoa tu do hoat dong soi noi hon; trong khi o nhung bang ma dang dan chu manh hon, dang dan chu hoat dong tich cuc hon. ngay ca cac nha lanh dao dang dan chu nhu thomas f. bayard, von phan doi greeley, sau cung cung ung ho greeley. de cu khac. cac ung cu vien tong thong: dang cai cach lao dong. dang cai cach lao dong chi moi duoc thanh lap vao nam 1870 boi dai hoi lien doan lao dong quoc gia voi hy vong no se tham gia cuoc bau cu tong thong nam 1872. truoc cuoc bau cu tong thong nam 1872, dang da to chuc nhieu chi nhanh cap tieu bang va dat duoc chut thanh cong. mot trong nhung chien thang quan trong cua no la thanh lap mot lien minh da so voi dang dan chu tai ha vien new hampshire vao nam 1871, trong do william gove, thanh vien cua dang nay, duoc bau lam chu tich. dai hoi toan quoc dau tien cua dang duoc to chuc tai columbus, ohio vao ngay 22 thang 2 nam 1872. ban dau, da co kha nhieu tranh luan ve viec lieu dang co nen thuc su de cu bat ky ai cho chuc vu tong thong vao thoi diem do hay khong, hay ho nen doi dang cong hoa tu do de cu lien danh cua minh truoc. sau cung, ho de cu david davis lam tong thong do ong dang dan dau cac cuoc tham do cua dang cong hoa tu do vao thoi diem do. joel parker, thong doc new jersey, duoc de cu lam pho tong thong. mac du davis khong tu choi de cu chuc tong thong cua dang cai cach lao dong, nhung ong da quyet dinh uu tien gianh duoc de cu dang cong hoa tu do hon, de it nhat ong co the duoc ho bao tro chong lung. sau dai hoi cua dang cong hoa tu do, ong khong gianh duoc de cu tong thong nen da dien bao cho dang cai cach lao dong va thong bao cho ho ve y dinh rut lui hoan toan khoi cuoc bau cu. sau do, joel parker tiep buoc davis va cung rut lui. dai hoi thu hai duoc to chuc vao ngay 22 thang 8 tai philadelphia, noi ho quyet dinh rang thay vi pham sai lam tuong tu mot lan nua, dang se hop tac voi dang dan chu thang than moi thanh lap gan day. sau cuoc bau cu, cac chi nhanh cap tieu bang cua dang ngay cang it hoat dong hon, va den nam sau, dang nay giai tan. hoat dong cua dang cai cach lao dong van tiep tuc den nam 1878, khi cac dang vien cai cach lao dong va dong bac xanh, cung voi cac dang khac, thanh lap dang quoc gia. dang dan chu thang than. khong muon ung ho lien danh cua dang dan chu (greeley/brown), mot nhom hau het la dang vien dang dan chu tu mien nam da to chuc cai ma ho goi la "dai hoi" dang dan chu thang than o louisville, kentucky, vao ngay 11 thang 8 nam 1872. ho de cu charles o'conor lam tong thong, nguoi da tu choi de cu cua ho qua dien tin; john quincy adams ii cho chuc pho tong thong. do khong co thoi gian de chon nguoi thay the, dang van de cu hai ung cu vien. ho nhan duoc 0,36% so phieu pho thong va khong co phieu trong dai cu tri doan. dang quyen binh dang. victoria woodhull duoc cong nhan la nguoi phu nu dau tien tranh cu tong thong. ba duoc de cu lam tong thong boi dang quyen binh dang nho. frederick doulass da duoc de cu lam pho tong thong, mac du ong khong tham du dai hoi nhung van chap nhan de cu cua dang va dong vai tro tich cuc trong chien dich tranh cu. tong tuyen cu. chien dich. chinh quyen cua grant va nhung dang vien dang cong hoa cap tien cua ong da bi cao buoc tham nhung tran lan, va dang cong hoa tu do yeu cau cai cach dan vu va cham dut qua trinh tai thiet, bao gom ca viec rut quan doi lien bang khoi mien nam. ca dang cong hoa tu do va dang dan chu deu that vong ve ung cu vien greeley cua ho. la mot nha van dong kem coi voi it kinh nghiem chinh tri, su nghiep bien tap bao chi cua greeley da khien cac doi thu cua ong co nhieu co hoi de tan cong. voi nhung ky uc ve nhung chien thang cua minh trong noi chien, grant duong nhu van duoc cong chung yeu men. grant cung co mot ngan sach lon cho chien dich cua minh. mot nha su hoc tung noi rang, "chua bao gio mot ung cu vien nhan duoc nhieu tien tu nhung nguoi giau co nhieu nhu grant." phan lon quy chien dich cua grant den tu cac doanh nhan, bao gom jay cooke, cornelius vanderbilt, alexander turney stewart, henry hilton va john astor. quyen bau cu cua phu nu. day la cuoc bau cu dau tien sau khi hiep hoi quoc gia ve quyen bau cu cua phu nu (nwsa) va hiep hoi quyen bau cu cua phu nu hoa ky (awsa) thanh lap vao nam 1869. do do, cac cuoc bieu tinh doi quyen bau cu cua phu nu tro nen pho bien hon. nwsa to chuc hoi nghi thuong nien tai thanh pho new york vao ngay 9 thang 5 nam 1872. mot so dai bieu da ung ho victoria woodhull, nguoi da danh ca nam ke tu cuoc hop thuong nien truoc do cua nwsa de di toi cac vung lan can cua thanh pho new york va phat bieu ve ly do tai sao phu nu nen duoc phep bo phieu. cac dai bieu da chon victoria woodhull ra tranh cu tong thong va frederick douglass lam pho tong thong. ong ay da khong tham du dai hoi va khong bao gio chap nhan de cu, mac du ong ay se phuc vu voi tu cach la dai cu tri bau tong thong trong dai cu tri doan hoa ky cho bang new york. woodhull da co mot loat bai phat bieu xung quanh thanh pho new york trong chien dich tranh cu. tai chinh cua ba ay rat eo hep, va buoc phai vay tien tu nhung nguoi ung ho du khong the tra lai cho ho. vao mot ngay truoc cuoc bau cu, woodhull da bi bat vi "xuat ban mot to bao tuc tiu" va vi vay khong the bo phieu cho chinh minh. woodhull thuc ra chac chan khong du tu cach de tro thanh tong thong vao ngay nham chuc 4 thang 3 nam 1873, khong phai vi ba la phu nu, ma vi ba se khong dat den do tuoi toi thieu de tro thanh tong thong theo quy dinh cua hien phap la 35 cho den ngay 23 thang 9 nam 1873; cac nha su hoc do do da tranh luan ve viec co nen coi cac hoat dong cua co ay la mot chien dich bau cu thuc su hay khong. woodhull va douglass khong duoc liet ke trong "ket qua bau cu" ben duoi, vi lien danh nay nhan duoc so phieu pho thong khong dang ke va khong nhan duoc bat ky phieu dai cu tri nao. ngoai ra, mot so phu nu da co gang bo phieu trong cuoc bau cu. susan b. anthony da bi bat khi ba dang co gang bo phieu va bi phat 100 do la trong mot phien toa sau do. ket qua. grant da tai dac cu mot cach de dang truoc greeley, voi cach biet ty le phieu pho thong la 11,8% tuong ung voi 763.000 phieu bau. grant cung thang phieu dai cu tri doan voi 286 phieu; trong khi greeley gianh duoc 66 phieu dai cu tri. greeley qua doi vao ngay 29 thang 11 nam 1872, 24 ngay sau cuoc bau cu nhung truoc khi bat ky dai cu tri nao dang ly phai bau cho ong (tu texas, missouri, kentucky, tennessee, georgia va maryland) co the nhom hop va bo phieu. sau do, 63 dai cu tri dang ra phai bau cho greeley da bo phieu cho cac dang vien dang dan chu khac: 18 nguoi trong so ho bo phieu bau tong thong cho dong tranh cu cua greeley, benjamin gratz brown, va 45 nguoi bo phieu bau tong thong cho 3 nguoi khong phai la ung cu vien. trong so 2.171 quan, grant thang 1.335 trong khi greeley thang 833. ba quan duoc chia deu giua grant va greeley. tranh chap. trong phien hop chung cua quoc hoi de kiem phieu dai cu tri vao ngay 12 thang 2 nam 1873, 5 bang da phan doi ket qua bau cu tai bang ho. tuy nhien, khong giong nhu nhung phan doi se duoc dua ra vao nam 1877, nhung phan doi nay sau cung khong anh huong den ket qua cua cuoc bau cu. cuoc bau cu nay la lan cuoi cung ma arkansas bo phieu cho dang cong hoa cho den nam 1972, va la cuoc bau cu cuoi cung arkansas bo phieu chong lai dang dan chu cho den nam 1968. alabama va mississippi se khong bau cho dang cong hoa cho den nam 1964, va ho se khong bo phieu chong lai dang dan chu cho den nam 1948. bac carolina va virginia se khong bo phieu cho dang cong hoa cho den nam 1928. west virginia, delaware va new jersey se khong bo phieu cho dang cong hoa cho den nam 1896. bang ket qua. tong quan. (a) "nhung ung cu vien nay da nhan duoc phieu bau tu cac dai cu tri von phai bau cho horace greeley, nguoi da chet truoc khi dai cu tri bo phieu." (b) "cac phieu bau pho tong thong cua brown da duoc kiem, nhung cac phieu bau tong thong cua horace greeley da bi bac bo vi ong khong du dieu kien cho chuc vu tong thong do da qua doi." (c) "xem ket qua theo lien danh ben duoi." (d) "14 phieu dai cu tri tu arkansas va louisiana da bi bac bo." "neu chung khong bi tu choi, grant se nhan duoc 300 phieu dai cu tri trong tong so 366, vuot 184 phieu can thiet de gianh chien thang va ong se tro thanh ung cu vien dau tien nhan duoc hon 300 phieu dai cu tri." ket qua theo lien danh. (a)"nguon duoc su dung khong du du lieu de xac dinh lien danh thang 4 phieu dai cu tri o missouri; do do, cac lien danh co the duoc liet ke voi so phieu dai cu tri toi thieu va toi da co the gianh duoc." (b) "cac phieu bau pho tong thong cua brown da duoc kiem dem, nhung cac phieu bau tong thong cho horace greeley da bi tu choi vi ong khong du dieu kien cho chuc vu tong thong do ong qua doi du ho cung la mot lien danh tranh cu." ket qua theo bang. nguon: du lieu tuwalter dean burnham, "presidential ballots, 1836–1892" (johns hopkins university press, 1955) pp 247–57. tieu bang sit sao. mau do bieu thi bang dang vien cong hoa ulysses s. grant thang; xanh bieu thi bang dang vien cong hoa tu do/dan chu horace greeley thang. cac bang co ty le chien thang duoi 1% (19 phieu dai cu tri) cac bang co ty le chien thang tu 1% den 5% (32 phieu dai cu tri) cac bang co ty le chien thang 5% den 10% (133 phieu dai cu tri): su sup do cua dang cong hoa tu do. mac du to chuc cap quoc gia cua dang sup do sau nam 1872, mot so thanh vien dang cong hoa tu do van tiep tuc phuc vu trong quoc hoi sau cuoc bau cu nam 1872. hau het cac dan bieu dang cong hoa tu do cuoi cung da gia nhap dang dan chu. ben ngoai mien nam, mot so dang vien dang cong hoa tu do tim cach thanh lap mot dang moi doi lap voi dang cong hoa, nhung dang vien dang dan chu khong muon roi dang cua ho va ngay ca nhung dang tuong doi thanh cong nhu dang cai cach cua wisconsin sau cung cung sup do. ngay ca dang cong hoa tu do missouri vo cung noi tieng cung sup do khi dang dan chu tro lai la dang doi lap chinh voi dang cong hoa. trong nhung nam tiep theo, cac dang vien cong hoa tu do truoc day da tro thanh thanh vien co uy tin cua ca hai dang lon.
nickel(iii) floride la hop chat hoa hoc co cong thuc nif3. no la mot hop chat ion cua nickel va fluor. dieu che. nickel(iii) fluoride co the duoc dieu che bang phan ung cua kali hexafluoronickelat(iv) voi arsenic pentafluoride trong acid hydrofluoric.
du hoa () sinh ngay 3 thang 4 nam 1960 tai hang chau, chiet giang, la nha van duong dai tai trung quoc. bat dau noi len tu nhung nam 80 cua the ki xx, du hoa duoc biet la mot trong nhung cay but tieu bieu cua phong trao "truyen ngan tien phong". tu nhung nam 90 cua the ki truoc, nhung bo tieu thuyet cua du hoa lan luot duoc xuat ban cho thay su chuyen huong trong sang tao, the hien su tim toi loi di rieng cua ong. trai qua ba thap nien sang tac, du hoa de lai mot dau an dam net tren nen van hoc duong dai, phan chieu sinh dong nhung chuyen bien trong doi song tu tuong cua thoi dai cung nhu dien mao cua van hoc trung quoc tu khi tien hanh cai cach va mo cua.
trong mon the thao bong chay, moi nguoi trong so chin cau thu cua mot doi duoc chi dinh mot vi tri phong ngu tren san cu the khi doi cua ho dang trong luot phong ngu cua hiep dau. moi vi tri se duoc danh so tuong ung de su dung boi nguoi phu trach ghi lai ti so tran dau, de cau thu ghi diem chinh thuc su dung trong viec ghi diem, bao gom: 1 - cau thu giao bong (pitcher), 2 - cau thu bat bong (catcher) , 3 - cau thu chot 1 (first baseman), 4 - cau thu chot 2 (second baseman), 5 - cau thu chot 3 (third baseman), 6 - cau thu chan ngan (shortstop), 7 - cau thu trai ngoai (left fielder), 8 - cau thu giua ngoai (center fielder) va 9 - cau thu phai ngoai (right fielder). cac vi tri nay thuong duoc chia thanh ba nhom: cau thu san ngoai (trai ngoai, giua ngoai, phai ngoai, cau thu san trong (chot 1, chot 2, chot 3, chan ngan) va battery (cau thu giao bong va bat bong). thong thuong, cau thu trong moi nhom co the thay doi vi tri linh hoat (vi du nhu chot 2 co the choi chan ngan, giua ngoai co the choi phai ngoai). tuy nhien, cau thu phat bong va cau thu bat bong la nhung vi tri dac thu va hiem khi choi o cac vi tri khac. phong ngu tren san. cau thu phong ngu tren san phai co kha nang bat bong tot. cau thu phai bat duoc bong da bi danh truoc khi chung cham dat de loai cau thu danh bong (out), cung nhu tao co hoi de chan va loai cau thu chay chot (putout). ngoai ra, vi tri nay cung phai co kha nang nem bong tot, cau thu phong ngu phai bat bong da bi danh trung roi roi nem cho mot cau thu phong ngu khac, cau thu nay co the cam bong tay khong hoac bang gang cua ho. luc nay, ho phai cham vao cau thu dang chay chot hoac cham vao chot nhanh hon cau thu dang muon chiem chot do de loai. cau thu phong ngu thuong phai but toc, do nguoi va xoac mot cach nhanh chong de lay duoc bong da duoc danh de luan chuyen bong toi nhung cau thu phong ngu khac. ho cung co nguy co va cham manh voi cau thu chay chot khi co gang cham (tag out) de loai cau thu do tai chot. cau thu phong ngu co nhieu nhiem vu khac nhau tuy thuoc vao tinh hinh tran dau. vi du, khi mot cau thu san ngoai co gang nem bong tu gan hang rao den mot trong cac chot, cau thu san trong dong vai tro nhu mot "tram chung chuyen" tiep nhan bong va dua bong toi noi can den. cung voi nhau, cau thu san ngoai co trach nhiem ngan chan home run bang cach vuon len tren hang rao (va co kha nang thuc hien dong tac leo tuong) de bat lay bong da bi danh len tren khong trung. cau thu san trong co nhiem vu cham vao (tag) chot hoac cau thu chay chot, dong thoi cung can phan xa nhanh de bat duoc bong da bi danh truoc khi bong roi khoi san trong. cau thu giao bong va bat bong co trach nhiem dac biet trong viec ngan chan cuop chot, vi ho la nhung nguoi xu ly bong khi bong chua duoc danh. cau thu bat bong doi khi cung se co gang chan dia nha de ngan doi ban ghi diem.
viez.vn la mot trang thong tin dien tu tong hop duoc cung cap boi cong ty co phan viez truc thuoc to hop dat viet vac tai viet nam. trang bao duoc phat hanh vao nam 2020,chi sau hon 6 thang day manh phat trien ve so, viez.vn da ghi nhan luong nguoi dung truy cap hang thang dat trung binh hon 3 trieu users, nam trong top 60 market leader cua toan nganh online news publishing tai viet nam (so lieu cua similarweb) va su ra mat cua z.futurenow, viez.remix de phuc vu doc gia  lich su. trang viez.vn duoc len ke hoach phat trien vao nam 2016, chi sau hon 6 thang day manh phat trien ve so, viez.vn da ghi nhan luong nguoi dung truy cap hang thang dat trung binh hon 3 trieu users, nam trong top 60 market leader cua toan nganh online news publishing tai viet nam (so lieu cua similarweb).   . viez chinh thuc duoc tap doan dat viet vac phat hanh vao ngay 02 thang 6 nam 2020. niem tu hao 2022 cua viez con nam o "viez.remix – vu tru nhac phieu". su kien nay dua viez thanh thuong hieu bao chi dau tien tai viet nam tu san xuat mot chuong trinh live concert am nhac tu original format cua minh. san choi hoi he am nhac danh cho cac tai nang tre va giao thoa the he nay du kien dien ra hang quy tu nam 2023.  thang 12/2022, con danh dau su xuat hien cua viez app -
